mi dga' ba med na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag galus 'di snga mkho bzhin du gyuracig ces byas nas/ de skad brjod ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus de snga mkho bzhin du gyur to//
des lha'i dbang po brgya ba'i gyis rang bzhin gyagazugs su bsgyur te rkangapa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod par gsol te/ grogs po khyod la ngas gtseba'i bsam pas gnod pa byas par bzodapar
mdzod cig/ de lta mod kyi/ khyod nyid spro ba bskyod pa'i phyir khyod la gnod pa byas par zad ngo zhes smras nas/ lhabadebang po brgya byin de nyid du masnang bar gyur te/ rate/
slong dag ji snyam dusams/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa le gnas pa gang yinub dan de nyid yin te/ de'i tshe na yang ng 'dul ba'i dbang gis sdug
bsngal bar gyur to// de ltar yang nga 'dul ba'i dbang gis sdug bsngal bar gyur to// yon ra bsazhes bya ba ni/ gleng gadumanyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshom
duyod pan/ khyim bdag gcig gnas pa des/ thabs zar bab pa las chungam rungs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dagur spyod de// phyi zhig na des sangs rgyas la dad
pa dang/ chos la dud pa dang/ dge 'dun la dad par gyur nas/ skyabs su 'gro bdud/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod
nams dag byed pa la zhugs so// de'i khyim de khron pa dang 'dra bar gyur to/ nyin gcig bzhin du de'i khyim dudage 'dun gyi spyir bskos pa'i dag slong rnams zan zago/ de nas spyi zhig nas
bar g des sangs rgyas la sogs par gaslong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te/ daser dag bza' bdang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang ngo mang pos tshim par byas te/ tsapand pa bstabasanas/ bcom ldan 'das
bangashos gsol zin te/ gsang sderanaMg+ho phyaga' bsubasabar rig nas/ stan tshesadama' ba zhig blangs techos mnyan ng 'phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ge/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dad/ khams dang/ shes pa dung/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ dadang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na khyim bdag
des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsim mthon po nyi shu ya shis rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag bar bstan/ yang dag4 ra 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdam las bzhengs te gshegs so//
de nas phyi zhig na dge slong gsar du dgra bcom pa zhig khyim der ga'adun gyi phyi'i bskos pa'i chos ston gyi ris la bab ste 'ongs so// phyi bzhin du gtsug lag khang gi sna la gtogs pa'i phyi'i ma
'ong ba zhig kyang 'ongasas// de nas khyim bdag des de gnyis zan sbyin par byas s/ tshe dang ldan pashA ri'i bus bsams pa/ dge slong dosan khyim bdag de la yonagyi rabs gdon bar
minus so snyam/ khyim de'i nang dus ste/ stan bshams bal 'dug nas/ dag slong des tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la gsol ba btab ste/ gnas brtan yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol
zhes byas so// denusatshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ khyim den yon gnas tshogs par mthong nas de khon dang 'thun pa'i yon gyi rabs bton nas bdag gisan sbyin pa 'bras bu'i tshod rgyas/
bar brjod bar ma nus so// bcom ldanu'adas ni thams cad gzigs pa yin pas/ 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen to zhes smras to/ des yon gyi rabs bton nas/ khyim
bdag de'i chung ma la yang de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des nakhyim bdagade dang chung mas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bus chos kyi gtam
gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ stan las langs te song ngo/ de nas bya zhog
na khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag khyim na gnas pas chog gas/ bcam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo sAmanas bza' bran gnyis kas sbyin bdagasmyon/
zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ bamaldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo/ rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs to/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/
de dgra bcom pa khams gsum ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lagamabral du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan dan sbangs palta
bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang/
bkur stalam ltar/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang/ gusapar smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di gza' branaganyis kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/
'diganyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/ mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dag
ba bcom pa nyid mngosum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to// gsol pa/ btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab
lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal ba bzang bo 'di nyid la skyeragu'i tshe lohi khrithubapan/ yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs ba/ 'jigartonamkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyurab/ blun med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs
zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ do'i gsung rab la 'diganyis rab tu byung nas/ der 'di gnyis kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhung/ bsod nams dag byas te/ tshagacig tu tshangs par spyod pa/
spyad nas/ 'di kar smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyugatsang nor mang lalongs spyodachub rigs su skye ba
shog cig/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze khyi'u blam lung bstanapa gang yon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dedug cag gnyis kyis mnyesapar byed par gyur
ni/ ma mnyis bar byed par ma gyur cig/ de kho na'i btsun pa la rab tubyung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgrabcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//
dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ 'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i bza' bran de gnyis ni'i ba tu byung ba 'di gnyis kho
kAn yin te/ de gnyis kyisader rab tu byung nas/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byas te/ tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa bsrungs nas/ 'chikAr smon lam btab pa'i
las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyagatso nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ de gnyis kyis ngamanyis par byas te/ mi mnyes par ma byas la/
!/ nganyid kyi bstan pal rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thamasaMcad spangs te/ dgrabcom panyid mngon sum du byaso////bam po nyi shu drug pa/
bya/ rgan zhugs gnyis zhes bya bde la/ rgun zhugs dang po ni/ gleng gazhi mnyanadu yod pa na bzhugs taM/ denAgangag ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal po rgyal byed kyi
tshal dupa/tsug lag khang rnam pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogs bar byed du bcug nas/ sangs rgyas lasogs par gaslengag deg 'dunal phul to/ sbyin pajag sbyin zhing/ bsong rnams dag
byed pal tshugs pa de'i tshe/ mnyanadu yod pa de nyid na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa des bsams pa/ bdag gis khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin 'di sbyin pa gtong bas zil gyis non par
'gyur ba'i thabs lta ru yodaAmame// de nas des bsams ba/ ma la bdag gis rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs la/ gal te bdag gis der rgya mtsho'i gru bo cho'i don grub par gyur te
phyir 'ong nan/ de lta na bdag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sbyin pa gtong bas zil gyis gnon par nus so snyam mo// de nas de rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ ni po che'i gling du
'gro ba bsgrubs te/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo tshe'i rin grub nas mnyan du yod par phyin to// de der 'ongs nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs nas/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon/
med zas sbyin bril gyis gnon par ma nus so// de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag des/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dros pa/ gtsun pa shAri'i bu thabs tsazhig gsan/ bdag gis khyim bdag mgon
med zas sbyin dge ba bgyis pas zil gyis gnon par nus/ modang ldan pa shA ra'i bus smras ba/ khyami bdag mgon med zas sbyin nibasod nams can che bar grags pa yin te/ des na gter
bdag po yod pa dang/ bdag ba med pa dang/ chu na yod pa dang/ skam la yod pa dang/ ra ba dang nye ba rnams kyang mthong bas na/ na khyod kyis sbyin pa gtungabs thol gyis gnon par ma nus
te / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byungan/ de 'ba' zhig gis de khyod kyis thal gyis gnon par nusaso// de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsor
nams dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// de rab tu byung ste/ brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ babad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/
shA dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyuras/gser dang bong ba'amanyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthul du 'drab sims dngaldan b/
tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thobang/ srid pa'i rid pa dang/ chags pa dang/

bkur sti lam lta ba/ dbangapo dang nyi dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnasasu gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag che gemo zhig

gis khyed thal gyisaganonapar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa larab tu byung// de ltar rab tu byung nas/ nyen mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so zhes zlos so//

de thosam thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' bgyur te/ dge slong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste phyin nas/ rkangapa la phyag 'tshal tam+b+hasapa/ khyod rab tu byung bas bdag zil gyis non pagyur
to// da bdagagis khyod rdasrid 'tsho ba'i kheradu gos dang/ thas dang/ mal cha dang/ stanadang/ nad gsos dang/ sman thong rnams rtsabazhed pa bstan par bgyi'o zhes byas so/
denas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa khyim bdag 'dis khyim bdag mgon med zas ni sbyin bgatong bas zil gyis gnonapar 'tshal ba las//
la gyis gnon bar ma nus te/ rab tu byung pos la gyis non par gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyang 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes pa ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
ba la rab tuts+tshang nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid jiltar mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yon
te 'das pa'i dusan yang khyim bdag 'dis khyim bdag chu stod zil gyis gnon par bya'osnyam pa las/ zilagyis gnon par ma nus te/ rab tu byung bas zilagyis mna gnas / de der rab tu
byung ste/ gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas/ 'chikar smon lam btab pa// kyi 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan ba la gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad
nas sbyin bdag byin zhing/ bsod nams dag byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ni/ bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bde dang der phyugatsang nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog
gig yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khyi'u nga ra lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mamanyam
ba'i byed bar ma gyur gi/ de khona'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cud sbyangs te/ dgra bcom panyade mngon sumadu byed par gyuratsag ces byas
(dge slong dag Am dusems/ de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de na dge slong 'di kho na yin te/ de'atshe yang 'di khyim bdag chu stod sbyin pa gtong pas zil
gyis gnon par bya'o snyam pa las/ zil gyis gnon pa'i m nus nas rab tu byung bas hril gyisazhen par gyural/ da ltar yang 'dis khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin sbyin pa gtong ngs zil gyis gnon
'i par bya'o snyam pa la/ zil gyis gnon par ma nus nas/ rang du byung nas zol gyis non par gyur to// des der tshegacig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ 'tshikar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus kyi pestan pa la tshog tsagi tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs
kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa 'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyuracig/ mamanyes par byed par mgyur cig/ da khonabastanapa larab
du byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
lagasolab/ btsun pa dge slong 'don chen po'amos te/ gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par 'tshalal/ bdagan gzhan gyis thol gyisanon par mi 'tshal ba lagazigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ daltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dusan yang 'di ji ltar rgya chen po lamos te/ gzhan rnams zal gyis gnon par 'dod la/ bdag ni gzhan gyis tsali gyis gnon pa mi
'dod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
ba/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamed pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser thubaces bya ba 'jig rten

du phyung ste/ degang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang bde ldan du byon te/ re'aphyir rgyal bo bde bas rang gi skyed mos tshal du
gtsug lag khang ba rtsig par btsums te/ des der gzhon nu rnams dang/ blon bo rnams dang/ dba' bo'i sde tshan rnams dang/ grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang/ yul gyi mi rnams dang/ skya
bo mang po thams cad bsags nas bsgo ba/ khyed las su 'dir nor shin tumang po'i bskyed nus pa des/ gtsug lag khang 'di rdzogs shigaces byas so// de'i tshe khyim bdag gcig gis rgyal
ka @#/ pe de dang/ gong nas gong du nor bskyod pa la zhugs te/ gser byab brag dgu la thug par bskyed do// de nas des de skadachad du bskyed pa'i thugs mthubaste/ 'di na rgyalarage
spyi nas dbang skur ba yin te/ 'di'i se+engs pa 'gyur du 'od de snyams bskyed pa de btango/ de nas rgyal po bde bsagatsug lag khang re rnam ba thams cad du yongs su rdzogs bar byas nas/

sangs rgyas gser thub nasakyi dga' dun dang bas ra la phul te smon lam btabab/ kyemadage ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyugatsang nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs
su skye bar shog 'go ston pa 'di kho na dang 'dra bamanyis bar byed par gyur cig/ mamanyes par ma gyur cig/ dakho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dag
bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed bar gyur tsag ces byas so// dge slong dag ji sumadusems/ de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag 'di khon yin te/ 'ani yang
rna 'dirgya chen po'ames to/ gzhan rnams nazol gyis gnon pa'i dod la/ bdag ni gzhan gyis gnonapa'i m 'a dodapar gyur to/ de ltar yang 'adin chen po la mos te/ gzhan rnams na zol gyis
gnon par 'dod l/ bdagan gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'dod par gyur to// rgan zhugs gnyis pa ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ der gang ga tshim blun po

[p/]'phags skyes pos shAkya rnams kha btag pa de'i tsha/ yul ser skya'i gnas ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i slong mo'i bu pham gnyis dang bral te/ ser skya'i gnas ni ma don med pal 'khyam zhing 'dug go/

de'atsho mnyan du yod pa na gnas ba'i khyim bdag ni de gnyis kyi pha'i grogs bor gyur pade/ bya gzhag la yul ser skya'i gnasasu phyin te/ des khye'u de ba gnyis mthong ma thag tungo shes nasadris te/ bu
khyed gnyis kyi pha ma gal 'khod ces byas so// khye'u de gnyis kyis smras pa// 'phags skyes pos bsad de/ doganyis dang bral bas bdag cag gnyis mgonamed de phanatsuna'akhyam zhing 'dug go
khyim bdag des smras pa/ gal te khyed gnyen 'dun rnams kyis bskyang ba medan/ mnyan du yod par deng zhig dang/ btsun pa kun dga' bo da khyadaganyis kyi zhang po yin te/ de yang gnyel
mnyen gshin ba so/ des khyodaganyis skyang bar 'gyur ro// khye'u gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du'agro ba'i lamam shesan/ dera'agro ba'i lam gang yin/ sa
bdag des smras r/ bu gnyis tshur shog dang re zhigang yul ser skya'i gnas su don cig bsgrubs la/ de nas ngas khyed gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bkri zhes byas nas/ khyim bdag de song

ngo/ des bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad bsgrubs nas/ khye'u de gnyis khrodadamanyan du yod par 'ongs nas/ de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalagyi sgor bzhapa ste bsgo ba/ khyed gnyi/
tsa @#// kyi zhad po dka' thub kyi gnasa'adi'i 'dug ste/ des khyedaganyis skyang bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas khyim bdag de song ngo// de song nas khye'u de gnyis sgo khang gnangadu zhugs te
'khodapa la kun dga' bos ngoms te dras ba/ bu khyed gnyis su yin galasa'ongs/ de gnyis kyis smras kha/ yul sar skya'i gnas kyishAkya che ge mo zhig gi bu lags so// kun dga'/
sa smras pa// khyod nyis kyi lam gar sod/ khye'u gnyis kyis smras kha/ 'phags skyes pos bsad de bdag cag gnyis rwa ra lus nas/ mgonamamatshes bar gyur pas/ de'i slad dubadag cag
gnyis phan tshun 'khyam zhing mchis so// bdag cag gnyis kyis thosanas/ rgya babu rgyu 'byed kyi tshal 'dan/ bdag cag gnyis kyi zhang po 'dug ces gragasanas bdag cag gnyis de'i thadadum ris so//
de nas de thosam thag tu tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas/ da ji ltar bya samamo// de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir yi mug bar gyur/
kun dab kha ba bos smras pa/ khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi sring mo'i bu yin te/ 'daganyis phamadapagyur bas 'dir 'ongs te/ bdag gis 'di gnyis mthongo nas yi mug par gyur te/ bdag gis
'diganyis ji ltare bskyang bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dad pas byin pa chud gson bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs so snyam mo// dpe slong rnams kyis smras pa/ phan 'dogs pa la phan/
bar bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs sam/ 'di gnyis kyis kyang bdag caga' lhung bzed kyi bya bta'adang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams kyis phan thogs par 'gyur re nas
byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis khrungs te bskyang bar byas so// dgeslongo rnams kyis kyang kha zas nyung zad tsam dag kyo ta'ong zhing deganyis la sbyin par byed do// medang
ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms gang ba blangs shing des nyisal phyid sbyin par byed d// phyadan bdag nyid bru bar byed de/ de'i rgyus kun dga' bonyam chung zhing 'di la sgrig cing lus kyi mthu
med par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong kun dga' bonyam chung zhing de la sreg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyurapa gzigs so// gzagis nas dge slong rnams la bka'
stsal ba/ dgaslong dag ci'i phyir dag spyod kun dga' bo nyamachung zhing rid la sgrog cing lus kyi mthumed par gyur/ dgeslong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bosasring
mo'i bu gnyis blangs nas/ des bsod snyoms gang ba drungs shing phyed na bdag nyid 'tshal/ phyudanadi gnyis la stsol bar bgyid de/ btsun pa rgyu ni de lags/ can nadalags te/ des n
tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bonyam chung zhingarid la sbagatsang lus kyi mthum mchis par gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bol bka' stsal pa/ kun
@#// dga' bo khya'u de gnyis rab tu 'byung ngom gsol ba/ rab tu 'byung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag ngal/
chubya'i dge 'dunagyi zas rab tu 'byungabal bltos par ngs gnang ngo/ kyi rigs pa'i las ltungabazed kyi bya btangadang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ so shing rnams kyang 'bul du chug
gi ces bka' stsal to// de nas gang gi tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi zas zuragaunang ste/ dganyis de za zhing 'dug pa dang/ rtsodamo la zhugs shing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'astsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyedan re tu'u gnyis rad tu 'byung ngo zhen/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byud/ gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung/
lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'on rar tu cungan tsanyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zagolo bco lnga ma lon pa rab tu byungar ma bya/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma bya'o zhes bka'
stsal te/ 'diganyis lo bdun las ma lags na/ bdag gis 'di gnyis rab tu ji ltar dubyung lags/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyo'u 'di gnyis kyis dge 'dun gyi kha zas bshams palas/
carog skrod nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das rdo thigalags so// bka' stsal ba/ dbasan lo bdun lon pa bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu 'byung bar ngas gnang gas/ rab tu byung zhig/ da nas/
de ltar dacom ldan 'das kyis lo bdun lon pa bya rog skrod nus pa'i ba tu 'byung bar gnang gas/ rab tuphyung zhig ces bka' stsalas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyabudaganyis rab tu byung
ste kha tog slob tu bcugage/ de nas bdag gis gnyen yin snyam ste byams snyams pas slob dum btubanas/ nyin par na dramo gtam gyis dus 'das par byed de// mtshan mon rmugs pa dang
gnyid kyis dus 'das par byed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthor nas/ das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa// kun dga' bo khye'u 'di gnyis ci'i phyir mi
slob d+ha kun dga' bos smras pa/ btsun pa mo 'u 'galagyi bu chen po 'di gnyis bdag la nyam bu shed bgyid de/ bdag kyadabyams pa'i dbang dugyu gnas atshar gcod ma phod do// mo'u 'gal
gyi bus smras pa ]kun dga' bo khyed byams pa'i dbang du gyur te slob ma yodan/ dge slong gzhan dag la gtod cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras b/ btsun pamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo su
zhig rang gi dge ba'i phyogs bor to/ 'di gnyis slob turatub/ des smras pa/ khyod kyi ba shes gang yin pa de la chol cig kun dga' bos smras ba/ btsun pa khyodanyid bdagagi bshesagos/
so zhes byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun bos bye'u de gnyis gyi lag pa nas bzung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la phul nas smras pa/ bu khyed gnyis pa la slob tu mi btub na/ btsun
pa'i di la slobs shig ces byas so// de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis bsams pa// dganga'adi mi bsrun pa zhig na gor mchog/ de bas bdag cag gnyis 'di lag tar/

gA dosAmanas/ brtson 'grusasu slob par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang des shing/ 'grogs na bde bar khye'u de gnyis kyis shes nas nyam bu shad byed de de'i thad du slob tu mi
btub go/ das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bosasnus ba/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chanapo khye'u 'diganyis pa'i slad du ma slob/ des smras pa// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag la mda' gnyis kyis
nyamashad byed de bdag la slob tumi btub bo/ (kun dga' bos smras pa// 'di gnyis skyo ba bskyed 'tshal lo// de ltar ma bgyis na/ 'di gnyis slog tu ma btub bo// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
ba kun dga' bo ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin dubya'ozhes byas nas/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u de gnyis khrid de 'chag tu song nas/ des de gnyis skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir sems can dmyal ba zhig sprul

to// de nas khye'u de gnyiso'anag pa'is nas thag mi ring ba zhig nas/ 'jigs ba chen po'i sgra grag ste/ de thos nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i thad duso dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan M/

pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ de gnyis la dris ba/ bu gnyis sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ slob dpon sgra chen po 'di ci zhig gi sgra lags pa bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang glo bar mchud
ro/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ re gnyis lasmras ba/ khyed gnyis deng la sgra chen po 'di ga las byung pa ltosashag/ de nas da gnyis kyis tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsgo ba bzhin
dumanyan te phyogs der song ngo// de gnyis kyis der soraste bltas na/sems can dmyal ba mang po dgagacod pa dang/ gtub pa dang/ brdeg pa dang 'tshod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
rnams nyams su myong ba mthong nas dras pa/ khyed su dog cig/ sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa sems can dmyal ba pa yin no// deganyis kyis de nyidi na lcags kyi rdza bum chen de zhogi khor
zhing 'dug pa mthong la de'i nad du 'tshed pa na'i ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo// deltar mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir lcags kyi rdza bum 'didan med par khol zhing 'dug/ sprulapa rnams kyis smras
pa 'di ni don med par ma yin gyi/ kun dga' po'i sringama'i bu gnyis rab tu byun gnas / dadapas byin pa spyod la/ le lo bud cing 'dug pa de gnyis shi ba'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar gyur te/ de
gnyis kyi phyi'i lcags kyi rdza bum 'di khol zhing 'dug go/ de nas de thosam thab tu khye'u de gnyis 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/ de gnyis 'jigs shing skrag nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
bu chen po'i thad dusongade// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nasadris pa/ bu gnyis sgra chen po 'di ga las byung/ de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa//
thag/// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas mo'u 'galagyi bu chen pos/ de gnyis la smras pa// ruganyisade na ngas khyed gnyis la byas n khyed
gnyis nga la yid machis te/ da ni don de khyed cag pa/nyis kyis mngon sum du mthong ba yin gyis/ de'i phyir khyed gnyis sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur pa de lta gyis shig/ de nas de/
thos ma thag tu khye 'u gnyis brtson 'grus su slob pa la zhugs so// de nas de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de gal te snga dro dran par gyur na/ de gnyis zan stor bar 'gyu'o/

deste phyam red dran par gyur na natsozos pa yang skyug par 'gyur ro/ rgyu des na de gnyis nyam chung zhing 'di la sbrag codi lus kyi mthumed par gyur to// de nas tshodang ldan pakun dga' bosadi gnyis

mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshonapol dris ba/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis nyam chung zhing nyid la sbagacilus kyi mthu med pa gyur/ de nas tshe dang
ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ dalasas pa/ 'diganyisaha cang mi dag bzhes te/ brubs gzir bar gyuran/
na bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ spro ba bskyed dgos so// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ khyod ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin dubya'o zhes byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ khyo'u deganyis
la smras pa/ stan khyer lo'achag tu'adod// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag cagaganyis 'chag pas chog lags so/ bdag cag gnyis n didanamanus shing slob bar/
'tshal lo// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu gnyis 'chug sa de logs su 'dong bar 'chug sa gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes byas nas/ khye'u de ga nyis khrid de bacha ga sa gzhan du dong nas/
dang ldan phamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis spro ba bskyed pa phyi thag mi ring ba zhig tu mtho si shig sprul te/ den lha'i bu rnacha gdug ko dag ri mgul par thogs pa/ lus do shal
dang seme des brgyan pa/ lha 'bu mo dag gis bskor ba dag pheg rdob par byed de/ rtse zhing dag la dag bdagur spyod do/ des khye'u de gnyis 'chag pa'i sa nas thag cha'ing pa zhig nas pheg
rdzob pa'i sgra gragaste/ de thos nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'galas bu chen po'i thad du song/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris ba/ bu gnyis sgra'adi
tsazhig gi sgra/ dganyis kyi sgras pa/ slob dpon sgrubadatso zhig gi sgralags pa bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang glo bar mchudango// mo'u 'gal gyi du chen pos/ de gnyis la sgras ba/ khyad
gnyis deng la sgra'adi ba ga las phyung ba ltos shig/ de nas de gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'asgo ba bzhin du mnyan te phyogs de song ngo// de gnyis der song ste
bltasan/ lha'i bu rna cha gdung kor dag cing mgul par thogs pa// lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa lha'i bu dag gis bskor ba dag pheg rdob par byed de/ 'di
dga' ladag 'dagur spyod pa mthong nas dris pa// khyed su dag cig/ sbrulob rnams kyis smras// lha'abuin/ de gnyis kyis de danas nig ga'i khro gnyis lha'abumamang po dag gis
bskor cing 'dug ba mthong al/ desnyingan lha'i dusu yang mi 'dug go/ doltar mthong nas dganyis de mtshar du gyur to// dematshar du gyur nas dwasel/ ci'i phyir song ga'i khri 'di gnyis stod
bar 'dug ste/ 'diganyis la lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug/ sprul pa rnams kyisany+tsasopa/ kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i gnyis rab tu byung nas/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing 'du kha 'diganyis
nam shi'i phos te dus las 'das pa de'i/'dir skye bar 'gyur ti/ de gnyis dang bdag cag lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgu'i spyod par gyur ba'i song ge'i khri yin// de nas de thosam/
khag tu khye 'u gnyis dga' bar gyur nas/ bdag cag gnyis kyi brtson 'grus kyis 'bras bu chen po thob par gyur te/ sems can dmyalabar skye ba las kyang thar la/ lhar skye ba yang thob bar gyur
togam du'i gzhas/ sems dga' bzhin dumo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song do// de nas mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/ bu gnyis sgra 'di las byung/ de nas
0khye'u de gnyis kyis/ tshedaldan bamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la thams cad rgyas ba'i bstod do// de nas mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ de gnyi'ams ba bu gsadenangs khyed gnyis l
byas na/ khyod gnyis nga la yid machis te/ nadi de khyed cag gnyis kyis mngon sumadu mthong ba yin gyis/ de'i phyi lhag par yang brtson 'grus btsan bar gyis shig/ des de thosam
thag tu khye'u deb nyis lhag par brtson 'grus su slob pa la zhugs so// de nas phyi zhig na dganyis kyisa 'khor lolta bsdus pa'i mdo brtsams te/ de gnyis kyis de shes nas 'di snyam dusems te/
'khor ba 'khor phanand/ rnyan rgyunamo'a'akhrul 'khor bzhin du yang dang yang du sems can dmyal ba dung dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha dang mi'i 'khor dgos pas na/ bdag
nag gsal lhar skye ba yang mi dgos/ mir skye ba yang mi dgos kyis/ bdag cag gnyis kyis dngos pamed pa nyid du brtsena'agus patshumapar bya'oskamamo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
gyi bu chen pos de gnyis yid skyo bar gyur par ' gnas / yid la bya ba'ilung phog ste/ de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'badabs tolongs pa thams cad spros nas
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas ti/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' lag mthil du 'drab 'i/
[Â©j ]se mas dang ldan pa datsanadan sangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag/
bka'ag pa thob pa/ sradi pa'id pa dang/ rnags par ng/ bkur sti lam lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dngang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed dang/ gus pa smra ba'i gnas su
gyur to// deganyis kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyis gnas tha dadapa gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro zhing/ dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams dang 'bras bu rnams blangs te/ dge 'dun
la dbul bar byed do// de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod bgazhan dgags tshorata/ 'diganyis ni mthu che ba yin snyam mo// de ltar mthong nas de rnams bdag cag nyid la skyo ba skyes te/ lo
[%/ ]bdunalon pa 'di gnyis kyis kyang yon tan 'dolta bu thob na/ bdag cag skra'i mdog lan gsum gyur kyi bar du bdag cag gas culangam thobade snyam ste// skyo bar gyur nas nyon mongs pa thams/
cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sumadu byas so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa dag tshul ba de gnyis kyis
las ci bgyisan/ las de'i rnam par smin pas lo bdun lon nas pa byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyisi 'khas/ bcomoldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalal/ smon lam gyi dbang lasagyur to// gsol ba btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis smonalam gang du btab lags/ bka' stsal ba/ sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dusan/
bskal pa bzang po 'dinyidal/ skyedagu'i tshalo nyakhri sgrub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyenang/ skyes
bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srus zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de phyi zhig nadage slong gi dge 'dun mang pos nam

ring byas te yulaM kangashi'i phyogs su ljongs rgya zhing gshegs pa las/ wA rANAsir byon to// de'i tshomadza' sde lnga brgya tsam skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung nas pheg rdob bar byed do/ rtse zhing dag
' dga' dgur spyod pa las/ mdza' sdede rnams kyis thag ring pazhi gnas yang dgabar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dgag blo skyes ba/ daltar sangs
rgyas byung bas 'jog rten bdun te/ 'dzam bu'i gling dgra bcom pas gang zhang bdun bdag rug khyim n 'dug pas chog gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo//
dgatsacig na re/ rjesrid du bdag cag gi 'byung ba chen po gzhon pa de srid du 'dod pa rnams longs spyad la/ phyir rgas pa'i tsho btubyung bas slebs so zhes zer nas/ de dag rab tu ma byung ste/ der
de dag las kha cig na bu yadabyung/ bumo yad byung ngo// kha cig nada'o// de nas phyi zhog na bag gi blo skyes pa/ da ni bdag cag gi khyim so 'dzin pa dag byung zin gyis
wA bdag cag dong la/ bcom ldan 'das ma dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer ro// der kha cig re/ danabadag nugag bu rnams kyi khyim yang
dbub par bya/ bumo rnams kyang bag mar gtang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de'i skabs su yang rab tu ma byung ngo// de nas phyi zhogan de dag thams cad ris/ de dag ga nang nas gnyis shig lus pa
gyur te/ de gnyis phyis skyo ba skyes nas/ bdag cag sngon le nyingashu rtsa lnga lon pa na/ bdag cag gzhon nu'i gnasaskabs su bab pa'i tshe/ rab tu byung bar dad pa skyes pa las/ bdag cag/
do'atshorab tum byung nas thams cad ste/ bdag cag gnyis ka lus par gyur la/ bdag cag kyang danargasashing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur to/ bdag cag gnyis kyang ring po ma thogs par
'chi bar 'gyur bas na/ bdag cag gnyasi khyim na gnas pas chog gis 'dongal/ bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo sAmAnas sbyan
ba dgatsazhing/ bsod nams dag byas te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo
bas gyis shig ces bka' stsal pas/ de gnyis kyis dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed cing 'dug la/ gzhan dgags kyang rganazhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig rjod par byed do/ de nas de gnyis gtsug shin tuma dga'
bar gyur to// cig shosanabazod pa dang ldan te/ des de la bshad de/ btsun pa dgeslong 'di dag lasems sdang bar byed cig/ 'di 'di rnams kyis nyes pa ma yin gyi/ 'di'i bdag cag
gnyis kyis nyes pa yin no// gal te bdag cag gnyis gzhon nus che nas rab tu byunganani/ 'di rnams kyis bdag cag gnyis la rgan zhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig rjod pa'i m 'gyur ba zhig na/danargas bas tshe
rab tu khyud bar gyur te/ de bas tang bdag cagagasal rgan 'ugasazhes bya ba'i tshig brjod bar zad do zhes/ dge slongadas de la bshad kyis byang bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas re
gnyis kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bdumangos par spyod pa spyad nas/ bani kar smonalam btab pa/ de ltar bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa 'dzasridi 'tsho ba'i

bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshog satu yang m thob kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungasakyis bram ze khye'u blamalung bstan pa gang yin ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de bdag cag gnyis samanyes pa byed par gyur cig/ mamanyes par byed par mgyur cig/ de kho na'i bstan la rab tu byun gnas / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgrabcom pa[4]
nyida mngon sumadu byed bar gyur cig/ gal te des byis pa chung chos paratubyung bar ma bya zhes bslab pa gzhi rnams bcas bar gyur nayang/ de'am bdag cag gnyis
las brten nas gnang bar gyur cig/cesabyas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sud+mibastan bal rab tu byung ba'irgan zhugs pa

gang yin pa de gnyis ni dag tshul pa rab tubyung ba 'di gnyis kho na yin te/ de gnyis kyisader dzasrid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'tshakarasmon lam btab pa des do dge slong dag na yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bodasungs dang shin tu mnyamang dang/ rgyugs mnyam pa dang/ mdzad pa mnyamar dang/ glabasamam pa bzhes par gyur nas/ 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par
byas te/ ma mnyes pa mabyas l/ 'diganyis lo bdun lon pa na/ nganyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas zhas/
'diganyisakhonalas brten te/ lo bdun lon bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu dbyung bar ngas gnang las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa cug pa rdzogs so//
sdoman/ 'phye bo grum stod long ba dang/ gcer bu'od srungasagatso bo dang// glang chen gnas dang sar no// 'dig sa ni brtul zhugs can// zla ma'am ciganyis po// 'phye bo zhes
bya ni/ gleng gzhimanyan du yodar na bzhugs te/ de'atshamanyan du yod pa na/ khyim bdagacig kha nasal des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan si/tu rtse zhing dga'
la dga' dagur spyod pa las/ phyis de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang/ bu btsas na/ de rostodon gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug 'amadzes la/ ro smad ni/

yan lag ma tshang ba zhig byang/ de btsas pa'i rikhyim der don thams cad 'byor grub par gyur te/ thang la 'gro ba'i tshong pa dang/ chu la 'gro ba'i tshong pa dang/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo chu'i don yadagrub
nas phyir 'ongs/ ba gling dngam ho'akhyu yar 'phel bar gyur/ las kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'byor grub par gyuranas/ khyim bdag des bsags pa// 'di khye'u 'di'i mthu yin te/ des Mn
bdag gi don thams cad 'byor grub pa gyur pas na/ bdagags bu 'phye bo banus pa 'di'i dpal yon can zhig yin no snyam mo// de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming
jiskad gdags zhes ming 'dogs bar byed de/ khye'u 'di'aphyi bo yin pas ming yang 'phye bo de narab/dgas so zhes zer// de nas khye'u 'phye bo rom dang/ modang/ mar dang/ kun
mar dang/ mar gyi snying rus bskyodabasringasaso// de nas de jim du mar skyes pa de tsam du khyim bdag de'i khyog 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to// de nas de kun tu grags par gyur te/ 'di'i mthus
las ni'i sgo bsams pa de dag thams cad 'byor grub pa lasan/ khye'u 'din dpal yon can zhig yin no zhes grags so// de nas de thos ma thag tu ma nyan du yod pas gnas
ba'i skye bo mang bo dag dus dus su de la blta ra'agro zhing don rtsom de dag thams cad mong gis rtsom bar byed de/ dedag gamathusa'abyor grub par 'gyur ro// de nas de lhagab yang mnyan du yod
ba shugathag tu grags pagyur to// danag de gang gatshimar skyes pa de'itsi/ pas de'i khyogs rinabo ci las byas te/ dad lanon zhing 'grogo/ de nas de khyi de nyid du yi ga slob tu bcug ste
yi gdad/ khonganyis dang/ shod dgod pa dang/ lagatshus dang/ dbyung ba dang/ sbub dang/ dgram pa dung/ gos brtag pa dang/ nor bu brtag pa dang/ rin po che brtag pa dang
sbos brtag pa dang/ sman brtag pa dang/ glang por brtag pa dang/ rta brtag pa dang/ go mtshon brtag pa bsubs ta/ yib mkhas pa dang/ klog mkhas pa dang/ mdzangs pa dang/ bya ba
lags l ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ brtag ba rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to// des phyizhig na khyogs la zhon te/ skye bo bal bo ches g.yog byas nas/ spyodamosatshal gyi sar song ba

las des bltasan/ skya bo phal bo ni sde tshan nas sde tshan dang/ pha mnanas phatsan du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong ba mthong anas yamtshan du gyur tadris ba/ skye bo phal po cha'adi dag gang du'adod/
de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bltar 'gro'o// grum pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhig/ de dag gis smras pa// gangasakyings dang nye ba drang srong saraskya'i
dkab thub kyi gnas nas thag mi ring ba zhig tu shAkya'i du zhag skyes nas/ dengumakhrematsha mkhan bye brag phyedang dgags lung bstan pa// gal te 'ad khyim na gnas na na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
por 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ chos gos tshon can gyon te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nasatsam med par rab tu byunganan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yaMng dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ grags pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ dethos ma thag dud bcom ldan 'adas la blta'adod par gyur te/ de skye bophal po che de dag gis g.yog
byas nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mi 'dudong ngo// de'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag duma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas khye'u 'phye bo des thag ring pozhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum curtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyanatsung spa bar ngus pa/ me lus kyi debyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/ ma lcamar gyis btab pa lta bu/ mar me gsar gyi snod du

bzhag pa lta bu/ mchod sdong rin pochosnatshogs kyis smras ba lta bu/ blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang mchog tu dag2
// ba skyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang re sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde nga 'dra ba de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhabs kyi
sams la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// deltar mthong nas kyang sangs rgyas l gusaba'i phyir khyogs las babs te/ zug bzhis 'phya zhing bcom ldan 'das ga
ba lab der song ste phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos ma nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ sa bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal/
dang khams dang/ shes pa dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ dadang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas 'phya bo des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du'ajig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsimaman de
nyi shuye shesaderjes bcomanas rgyun du zhugs pa 'bras bu mngon sum dubyas to/ des bdenapa mthong nas bsams ba/ gal te bdag gi lus 'di 'dra bar ma gyur tu branin/ bdag kyang
legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul larab tu byung ste/ chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang/ sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'badapar bya ba
zhig gu sAmamo// de nas sems bskyedamathagatude'i lus kyi yan lag rangs bar gyur to// de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas stan
00 las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bam ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ga legs
ngar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar ng/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rungan/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'dasakyi thadadu tshangs bar spyod pa spyad par 'tshalo// de
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgo slong tshur shog tsos bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyungs bsnyen par rdzo gas par mdzad de/ des kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad
spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dag khortsom pa khams gsum r gi 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gseradongabe bar mnyamapa/ mamakha' dbalag ma'i
du 'dra ba'asims dang ldan pa// tsan dan sbas pa lta bur bsal bar rab/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa cho
pa rta srid pa'i nyid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la ma lteb/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod nyid rjed pa dang/ gusapa slu ba'i gnas su gyur to//
de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhusal/ btsun pa'i phyo bas las cungegyisan/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyagonganor mngolalos spyod miba'iriges/
su skyes lags/ las rigyisan/ las de ma bar smin pasa'aphye bo gyur la/ 'dis bcoma'an bdas mnyes par bgyis te/ mchanyes par ma bgyis la/ rab tu 'byung ba'i
gsems bskyedamathog tu 'di'i bkramaM saramamasi ba'agyur te/ bkrashis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan ba la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgrabcom pa
ba nyid mngon sumadubagyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dga' nyidakyis las byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa zapo 'di
nyid laskye pu'i lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasasu ldan ba bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ named// lha dngam

rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'itsiwan sin/ dge bsnyenamang du thos pa rig pa dang grol ba'i smobs pa dang won pa'i chos smra ba/ dge bsnyen gyi

skye bo thams cad kyis bkur sti byed/ blamarabyed/ rimor byed/ mchod pa byed pa zhig gnasaso// de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungasawadats+tshasir gnas bcas te bzhugs pa de'i

tshodage bsnyen gyi skye bo rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi thad dungoste tshesamnyan to// bas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saargyas do sus ljongs der gnas gud du gshegs b de'i tshe/

[.]dge bsnyen de dag dge bsnyen de latshesamanyan to// dge bsnyen gyi spyi be dedag gis kyang dge bsnyen de la yon du 'asha pa Nildabargya lnga brgya sbyin par byed do// dge bsnyenades kyang kar sha paNalnga brgya bo de dge 'dun

la 'bul bar byed do// de nas phyi zhig na dge bsnyen gyi sde tshanade dag dang lhan tsag tugatsug lag khang du dong ngo// de'i tshadage slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dul ba'itshiga'i las bya bzhig byung nas/ gtsug lag khang

skyongags dge bsnyen thams cad gtsug lag khang gi phyi'i lo du spyad de/ 'di khyed kyisamanyan par ma byed cig ces byas so// de nas ngag bstan gyi sde tshan dedag gis/ dgabasten de la smras// de ltar ba dag cagazhi

dge slong rnams kyis bskyad du rung na/ khyod lta bu mang du thos pa rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos skya ba yin/ ste bskradaces zer nas/ de dag der mkhas pa 'dzad ba gang yib de med par gyurato/
denas dge bsnyen de gzhi des khros s/ des dge slong mas la smras pa/ ngas ni bye bo khri la 'dug pa khyed rnams la med pa bsgrubs te nyin/ khyed kyis bdag gcig pu lam zer ba mang po'i nad du
smra phab bzhes byas so// de nas dge slong rnams kyisakhasamasang/ nyomongasapa danasmas shing nyams par gyur tosam nas dge bsnyenade la smras pa/ dge bsnyen khyod kyis tshig rtsub po smras kyis/
nyes pal nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig/ lasa'adi'i 'bras bu ma sdug pamyong bar gyur tarezhes byas so// de nas dag bsnyen de yang 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/
yo na gnas 'di lta bu dag la tshig rtsubaskyaragi bdag gis ma legs pa byas so sAm ste/ nyes pa lanyes so zhes bshog sanas/ sbyin pa dag
sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/ tshog cig tu skyobs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang bsrungasazhas 'ari ka'asmon lam btab ba/ kyam 'di ltar bdag gis sems can

ba ga pa 'dilta bu dag la tshig rtsu ba po skyas pa'i las 'di bdag la 'ongab mgyur cig/ de ste yang las 'di'i 'bras bugadonami za bar bdag la smin par gyur na yang/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/
bdag gi bkramashis pamed par gyur te/ bkrashis par gyur cug/ bdag gis sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bkur sti byas pa dang/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dgabyas/

padad/ tshe gcig tu skyabasasu 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa gzhi rnams bsrus pa'i rig ba'i rtsa ba 'disan/ bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba ded der phyugatsang nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye/
bar shog gi 'jig rten bdag ming 'jig rten thams cad kyi bkra shasi su gyur cig/ bdag gis bsams pa dang/ rtsa'i dod pa de dag thamasacad 'byor grub par gyur cig ces byas so/
dge slong dag ji snyam dusems/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'phye bo 'di bon yin te/ des dge slong de dag la tshig rtsu ba po smras pa lasade'i rnam pa sman pas na/ tsherabs
lnga brgyar 'phye bor gyur to/ des sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byas te/ tshegatsayig tu skyabs su 'grub dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas/ 'akarasmon lam btab pa'i

lasade'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa dedang der phyugatsang nor mang lalongs spyod che ba'i rogs su skyes te/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bkra shisasu gyur nas/ 'dis ngamanyes par byas te/
mims par ma byas la/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sems baskyedamathog tu bkram shis pamed par gyur/ bkra shis par byung bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
sbyangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sumadubyas so//bam po nyi shu bdun pa// grum stodaces bya ba ni/ gleng gzhimanyan yodang na bzhugs
te ra nags khrodatsagin/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas te/ dadag de khon khod cing mo'i sbyin srog byed de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu lam ston pa/ ma pa
gnyis kyang shes bya dang yo shesalamanga' brnyes pa// ma 'dres pa'idrin nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi'ajigs khagazhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba ltar 'grobalas rnam par grol ba/
skye mched drug la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa
stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan ba/ yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrags ba rnams nasos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas/
lta kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gabrigs te/ sunargud/ sun dar/ suni'aphongs shing 'dug/ sum nyam nga bar gyur/ sun gnod pa dang ldan/ sun phongs pa dang/ nyamang bdang/ gnod pa dang
na/ sun ngan song du gzhol/ sunangan song du 'bab/ sun ngan song du bab/ sunas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu lagazhag par bya sunyis par
spyod pa'i 'damadu bying ba las la gnas drang bar bya/ su'aphags pa'i r bdunamed palas 'phags pa zhi'i bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ sunadage ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed
las bskyed par bya/ sun dga' rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ sun dgeba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa lasaye shes kyi mtshon gyisabartogabar bya/ sun sangs rgyas byang
bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par byas maduye shes gasregs pa 'jug go/ rgyamar cusrin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul babya ba'i sras
rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa drang srong lnga brgya po rnams gdul ba'i dus la bababo snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan

'das kyis nas drang srong lnga brgya po dedag gis me'i sbyin sreg gi thab de dag thams cad kyi nang dusangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjesa mthong al/ de pa nad me 'kha minus pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so//
degs de dag 'disAr dusems te/ rjes 'di'i thus bdag cag gas thaba rnams kyi nang du ma nus par gyur pa lasan/ rjes 'di ni dag bzhag yin pa 'draste/ rjes 'di lha chen ngo'i rjesam yin grwar

sAmanas/ drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rjes de dag la bsreg bya phulas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sbyin sreg dedag rang 'bar bar gyur te/ me lcatshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug par song
ngo/ des drang srong rnams kyis de mthong nas mtshan du gyur te/ lha chen pos bdag la dgongs so snyam me// nas bam ldan 'das kyis de rnams drang ba'i phyi'i/ rgyalakhu rgyul byed kyi tshal
la thug pa'i bar du zhabs su rjes gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so// de 'disnyam du sems te/ lhachen nalam 'di'i gshogs so snyam nas zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gtsug tu rjes ded
lamachod pa byed tsang deng nas/ de dag mthar gyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to// des drang srong
lnga brgya po de dag gisasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasasku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyanatsang sla bar byas pa/ che lus kyi dbyibs su bdug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis
btab pa lta bu/ mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/ mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyi spros pa lta bu/ blo gsal zhing dra mchedal rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs

g+ha rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ng// mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' bskyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dadasangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba de'i dra ba de ltabun/
lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du gnas kyi sems la goms pa byas pa la yang nyams bdabade lta bu skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar mthong nas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dongastaphyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar bodad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal bdang/ khams dang/ shes/
pa dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/ danas drang srong de dgags stan de nyid la 'khodangazhan du bden pa rtogs pa med la phyir ma 'ong ba'abras bu mngon sum
dubyas so// dudag si bdonapo mthong nas stan las langs to/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa la ba de logs su shul mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdagacagalegs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul b.laMrab tu 'byungabadang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rungan/ bdag cag kyang bcom
ldan 'das kyi rjed dutshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// deShas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slongatshur shog ces bya ba'itshig gis rab tuphyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogasapar mdzad nas/ de rnams
lalung yang phog ste/ de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'badapas nyon mongasaM ba thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dag dgra bcom kha
khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyunas/ gsaraMdang bong bamanyam pa/ nam mkha'adang lag mthil du 'dubu'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan dan sbyangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur//
ga pa'isgonga'i sgrubs bcom pa rig pa dang/ masho par shes pa dang/ soso yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa'i dpa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur stalamaltab/ dbang po dang nye
dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyisamachod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dgeslonga rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong 'di rnams kyi zhabs kyi rjes bstan pas drangs te/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsalang/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dusan yang drang srong lnga brgya po 'di rnams ji ltar zhabasakyi rjes bstan pasadrangs te/ rab tuphyung nasatshegacig tutshangs par spyod pa spyodadu
'bcug pa de nyenacig/ dge slong dag sngon byungaba'adas pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshale nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rig pa
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyonapa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur bya/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams M kyi ston pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes

bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ der gang gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs kyisamo'aphrulamin pa bstan pa de'i/ des skye bo ma rnams la thugs brtse bdang/ drang srong lnga brgya po dedag

tsang ba'i phyi'i rtags su rung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rjes ban gyis brlabs so// de'i tshe lho phyogs na dko thungakyi nags shig na/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag stengagabar snang las ra spos kyi ded
lcang lo nas te dong ba las/ de dag ni rab la rdugs pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes rnams kyi steng du rdugs nas/ de rnams yamtshan du gyur te/ bdag cag rdzu 'phrul yang mnyamasal
nam mkha' la yang thogs par gyur to snyam m// de nas dedag la dga' ba'i lhas/ de dag la smras pa/ khyad ni rdzu 'phrulam nyams mod khyed kyi 'og na sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes yod la/
de'i steng dun brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang 'gro ma nus so// de nas drang srong de rnams zhabasakyi rjes de lashin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas/ sal babs te zhabs kyi rjes

de dag la bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis de rnams drang ba'i phyir drang srong gnas pa la thubapa'i bdu zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu byin gyisabarlab
nas/ drang srong rnams kyis bsams pa/ rjes 'di dag lharen po'i yin te/ den lama'adir gshegs so snyam nas/ rjes de thog thag tu drangasrong gnas par dong nas/ drang srongalnga brgyabo de
dag gis thag ring po zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la shin tu dga' bar gyur to//
dga' bar gyur nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungasaM ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'dul te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugatsang nas//
yang dag pa'i rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i
chos 'dul bal rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen pa ra rdzogs shing dge slong gdangos po thob tu rungan/ bdag nug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshalalo// de nas
yang dag par rdzogs pa'osangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis de dag rab tu phyung ste// bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de rnams la lungayang phog ste/ de dag gis der tshegacig tu tshangs
[jag]// par spyod pa spyad kyang gang gis kyang yon tanagyi tshogs ma thob nas/ 'di kar de dgags smon lam btab pa/ 'diltar bdag cag gis yang dag par rje gas pa'i sangs

rgyus 'od srungs kyi bstanapa la tshegacig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang/ gangagasakyang yon tan gyi tshog gsum thob kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma/
lung bstan ba gang yin pa des ngasargyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed pagyur cig/ mamanyes par byed pal gyur cig/ de lon bstanapal rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs/
ba thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du soms/ de ni drang srong lnga brgya por gyur pa gang yin pa dedag ni ring

srong lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de dag gis der tsho gtsugeg tu rungs par sbyod pa spyad nas/ 'chikar smon lam btab ste/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze khye'u bla ma
lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gsum nyes par byed par gyur nug/ mamanyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byun gnas / nyon mongs
pa thams cad spangs te/ dgrabcom pa nyida mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'isaMsargyas 'od srungs dang shin tumanyam pa dang/ shugs
mnyamar dang/ mdzad pamanyam pa dang/ thabs mnyam brnyes par gyur nas/ 'di rnams kyis ngamanyes par byas te/ mi mnyes pa'i m byas l/ nganyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byun gnas / no
mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// long ba zhes bya ni/ bcom ldan 'das yulamathe lan/ lhachen pa amra'i tshal na bzhugs te/ deTaM

tshe yul ma Ti lan/ khyim bdag sna tshogs can zhes bya ba phyagatsang ner mang la longs spyod che ba/ma thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa// thamakhresakyi bu'i nad dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des/ thab zlar bab pa lasachua byadwa ta/de/

dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod par byed do/[Â° ]/phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags naas/ de zla ba dgu ma bcu lon pa dang/ bu khyad ngan po long ba zhig bcasaso// de nas khyim bdag des

bur mthong ngo// de mthong m thag tu pha ma gnyis sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/ bdag cag gnyis brgya lam lan tsag na dung sus kyang 'di 'dra bar rgyun/ bdag cag gnyis la bu byadadan ngo leng ba 'di lta bu
mi dgos kyis/ phyam red nam sros la phyir phyung la bya rnams la sbyin no zhes byas nas/ pam gnyis kyis de phyir phyung ste/ lam pe ra bor nas khyi rnams la byin no// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pus lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa// ma'adres pa/'dren pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum lamakhas pa// mi 'joges/
pa bzhasama'ajigs pa// 'gro bltar 'gro ba'as rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug lamakhas pa/ byang nub kyi yan la bdun la spyod yul ba// rnam par thar pa brgyad la
bsam gtan// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jugapa/ stobasalanu'i stobs dang ldan pa// yang dgar ra seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrigang rnams chos nyid kyis nyin
dus gsum mtshan dus gtub ste/ nyin mtshan dusajul tusangs rgyas kyispyanagyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ sunargud/ sun der/ sun 'phongs shing 'dug/ sun nyamang bar gyur/ su
na gnod pa dang ldan/ sun 'phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ sunangan song du gzhol/ sunangan song du 'bab/ snyan ngan song du bab/ sun des ngan sogs phyung
lta mtho ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la gzhug par bya/ su ni nyes par spyod pa'i dam du bying ba las la gnas drang bar bya/ su 'phags pa'i nor bdunamed pa lasa'aphagu pa ni

bdun gyi dbangaphyag la dbang byed du gzhug pa rabya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams maskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ mun dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams baskyed zin pa las yongs susmanararubya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
gos su smanawanipalasaye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su lan sangs rgyas byung ba'i brgyan pa ni 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du yoshos gzigs pa 'jugago/ rgya mtsho chu
srin rnams kyi ba nas/ dus rlabs yo pa bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i srid rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ dadanas pacom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa// khye'u 'di lung bstan pa'i dus la babaste/ khyabu'adi las brten nas gdul ba bya ba'i skye bomang po drang bar bya dgosasosnyam dudagongasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas khye'ud
khyis bza' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nang par sdur bzhengasanas/ shamathabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzedabasnamasanas/ dgaspyod
gi tshogs kyis khamarang byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun dubadar nas/ yulami thi lar gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u de 'dabanye ba zhig tu bzhugs so// de nas yul miji
na gnas pa'i skye bomang pos sasargyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang yamtshan du gyur to// sngon gyi dpe ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de lhag saso//
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ mal bdagags nas khye'u 'disan sngamadran par 'gyur zhing tshig kyang slal/ ngadangalhan cig tu gtam zer bar 'gyur ba delta bu'i tore re
'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'i snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ khye'u des sngon gyi rabs dran s tshig smra zhing/ bcom ldan 'das dang
gdi ga/ lhan cig gtam zer bar gyur to/ der bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ khye'u de la bka' stsalapa/ khye'u khyodam sdug pa yin m/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdug pa
lags so// khye'u khyod sdug pa yin nam/ bde bar gshegs pa mi sdug bal gsaso// bka' stsal pa// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi nyis pa spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras
bu rnam par smin pa sdug banyams su myong ba yod med/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi nges par spyodang las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma sdug pa/
nyams su myong bamanasilags s// bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyi ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/ gsol pa// rang gi sems lags so// de nas de thos ma thag tusu de phal po che
rnams ya mtshan du gyur te/ sems can 'dulta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran l/ tshig kyang skya zhing/ bcom ldad 'das gtam zerab r zhig tu snyam me// sangs rgyas bcom 'das rnams ni
snyan slebs par dka'o ba yin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'i thugasam thu gnas / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngo 'dris nga// btsun kun dga' bo sems can 'di lta bu sngon
gyi tshor bas kyang dran l/ tshig smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang lhan tsapi gtam zirab 'di su zhig/ rtsodang ldan pa kun dga' ngosasmras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig
/ de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan slebs ra tsa dka'angasan/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs mi thub bo// kun dga' bos
smras pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasan bdag gis kyang sAnaslobs par dka' ba yin mod kyi/ khyed la snying dartse ba'i phyo gzhungabyagozhes byas nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos
phrag pa gcagi tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa sems can 'di lta bu sngonagyi
tshe rabs dran latshig smra zhing/ bcom ldan 'das dang bka' mchid bgyid pa su lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo sems can 'di'i sdig pa byed byed
pa yin/ 'dis sdig pa las mang pa byas so// kun dga' bo sde byudang 'das pa'i dus na/ yul mi thal 'dinyid na rgyal po ma sdug pa zhes bya ba rgyal bo byed de//
rgyal po de phragadog can zhig tugyul nas/ de gang gi tshe btsun mo'i 'khor gyis kham ring byas nasaM/ skyed mos tshal gyi sa 'am gzhan gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa na/ de'i lam thams cad duma med
bar byed do// skar khung rnams dang/ sgo rnams kyang yol ba stug pos gcod pa byed do// brgya la 'ga' zhig gis glo thor du btsun mo'i 'khor mthong na dos de'i mig 'byin par byed de//
de lta bu'i tshul gyis des sems can mang po mig med par byas so// de nas phyi zhig na de btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zham ring byas te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar songang/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rtenanam bzhugs pa'i/ rangasangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal na gnas pa/ 'jig rten/
gyi yon gnas gcig bu bse ru lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rangasangs rgyas shig lam de nas 'ongs pa de rgyal po'i gam ring ba rnams kyis ma mo nas/ de de'i btsun mo'i 'a khor gyi
mdun du bab bo// bud med de dag gis de'i lus mdzes pa dang/ sems madzes pa mthong nas/ de dag dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas gdong g.yogs pa phye ste//
btud cing phyag byas so// de nas rgyal pos kyang de thos te/ thos ma thag tu de phrag dog gi gzhi las khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te/ de bros nas rgyal po'i gam ring ba rnams la
bka' stsal to khyadadang la rab tu byung ba de'i mib gnyis byung zhig ces bsgo// de nas de thosam thag durgyal po'i gam ring ba rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de bzung nas/ mig
gnyis phyung ste/ rang sangs rgyas de yang sngon gyi las myongabar 'gyur ba mngon sum du gyur pas rdzu ba yang m dran na/ 'phrul pa lta tsa smos/ de nas rangasas rgyas des/
bsams pa/ nyon mongs 'di ni sman shing nyams par gyur te/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yun ring por sdug bsngal chen po redan ma rung gis 'di'i ramada' bya dgos so snyal
ste/ steng nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags pas 'bar ba dang/ lam mer 'dug pa dang/ cha 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'gyu ba'i cho'aphrul rnams bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams
ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ rgyal po de sdong po sogalas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smras// skal ba chon po dang ldan pa mar sbyin/ bdag nyes par spyod pa'i/
'dam du bying ba'i u0f38ga nas drang du gsol zhes byas so// bdag nyid chen po de yang gzhi des yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ rgyal po des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te smon lam
btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems dag pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byed du bcug pa las de'i 'bras bu bdagags myong bar ma gyur cig/ 'di ltar phyir yang bkur sti byas ba rnams kyi dag pa'i
rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skyeba'agyur ba de dang deraphyug cing nor mang la longs spyodane ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig/ 'dibs kyang ches khyad par du'aphags pa'i ston pa mnyes
par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes pa 'byed bar ma gyur cig/ de kha 'bastan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa
gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'atshi rgyal po mi sdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni long ba 'di kho na yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas de'i mig
gnyis byung ba dang/ sems can stong phrag du ma'i migamed par byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin bas lo brgya phrag du ma dang/ lo stong phrag du mar dmus long 'bar zhig tu gyur te/ sems can
dmyal par yang bcos bar gyur to// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dgas su skyes te/ der yang 'dis dmus longs du gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sdug bsngal chen ba myong bar gyur/
to yi dgas las shi 'phos nas/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar dud 'gror skyes te/ der yang dmus long 'ba' zhig tu gyur to// dud 'gro las shi 'phos nas/ tshar bas lnga brgyar sar skyes ti
thams cad du dmus long du gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsunab sems can 'di sdug bsngal 'di las ma thar bar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa//
dgeslong dag nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid bzung zhes bya ba'ajig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'igasung rab la sems can 'di mir/
skye bar 'gyur te/ dbang po tshang bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i gsung rab la rab tu byun gnas / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum dubyed par 'gyur ro// sa
dgra bcom pa thob kyang nyal ba'in/ las las skye pa'i bya rog dag lha gnas / mig gnyis 'byin par gyural/ dgazhi delas yongs sumya ngan las 'das par 'gyurato/ dera'adi las de las

thar par 'gyur ro// de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phalapo nad dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba nasdug bsngal 'di lta burnyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyud dag yadi skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas// de dang 'thun pa'i nas bstan te/ des n skye bo mang po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa skyed do//
kha tsag gisan spyi bo dang/ bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang/ mthong pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do// kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gisan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gsan rab tu
byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do// kha cig gis ni stobs kyis bor los sgyur bar 'gyurang
dang kha cig gsan brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang/ gcig gis nangs par 'gyur ba dang/ khacig gsan nyan thos kyi byang nub dang/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang/
btsag gisan named yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyedad// 'khor de dag ginanas phalameranas nigs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab
shA dge 'dun la bde bar gyur to/ gcer bu pa 'odosrungs zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i ri khrod cig na dram ze'i dbul po zhig gnas pa dang/
zlas kyis 'tsho bar byed de// de nas phyi zhig nad 'a chungamal bu chags nas daklu ba dgu 'am bculenang dang/ bu btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ khye'u'adis/
mang ji skad gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed do// khyedu'adi'od srungasakyi rigs yin bs// khye'u 'di'i ming 'od srungs su gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u 'od kung
zla 'om dang nadang/ mar dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyi snying khu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/ degangagi tshacher skyes pa de'i tshe/ de pa dang lhan cig tu zhing las la 'grogs/
de nas des bltasan/ phades srog chags stong phragadum kha 'dogs par byed pa mthongs/ phal smras l/ yabacig khyod gyis srog chags stong phrag dum gyin dad la sdug bsngal ra
byed pa 'di lta bu'i 'tsho ba khyod ci dgos/ phas smras pa// bu bdag cag gi 'tsho bani 'di yin te/ gzhan med do// de nas khye'u des bsams pa/ bdag 'tsho ba'id lta bu btang la
nags khrod du gnas bca'a'o snyam nas/ nges par 'byung bar nas so// de nas gangag tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi ban med pa'i ye shes b.resanas/ mthar gyi sa gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi don/
mdzad cing/ rgyal po'i bang tugshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa kun tu rgyas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing/ bdud rtsis 'gro
b rnams tshim par mdzad do/ khyabu 'od sungs kyis kyang dagasbyong go'u tan rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de bdud rtsi'i char 'bebasang shing/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mad
do zhes thosanas/ byes ma thug tu mal gsol te/ yab yum bdag dag sbyong go'u ta ma'i thodadu tshangs par sbyodapa spyodadumachi'ozhes byas nas song// de nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro
bas byas na/ des der gcer bu ba gnyen gyi bu mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ dge sbyong go'u man bod yig no snyam nas/ de de'i thad du rab tubyungago/ rab tubyung nas kyang
des lta sak+Shid pyad lobs nas/ de de la slob dpon gyi mchog tu gyur to// de nas de'i ming 'od srungs zhes bya ba gang yaning de med par gyur te/ ming gcir bu pa 'od srungs dang dus gcig
bgacer bu pa 'od srungs dang rus gcig pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ phyizhiganadas bdag nyid zad pa'i rtagasa mthong nas bsams pa/ bdag ni zhag bdund med par 'gyur ro snyam mo//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' ba'i lhas de la sbran ]gan+yadabu pa 'od sungs drang rus gcig pa ma dgaram byed cig/ bcom ldan 'dasadi ni 'chi ba las
jis bar 'byang bar 'gyur pa'i lam ston yin te/ de ni rgyal po'i khab 'dinyid na bzhugs kyis/ de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/ de ltar byas dang khyodal legs par 'gyurapozhes byas so//
de nas de 7sam thag tugacer bu pa yod srungs dang dus gcig pa rgyal bo'i khabanas byung ste/ 'od ma'i tshal logs su chas pa las/ lam khyad du de'i blo skyes pa/ dge slong rnams ni ngo tsha
shas shing khrel yod pa yanal/ bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas na/ de dag dang mngon sum du phrad du 'gro ma phod kyis/ bdag re zhag 'od ma'i tshal du mi 'gro bar lam phyed 'dinyid du 'dug
par bya'o// lam phyed 'di nyid du 'dug bzhin du bdag gis dag sbyong go'u tam la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa ra cig pu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi
shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' bar s pa ma 'dres pa'i rdan pa nyebar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa// mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba ltar 'gro las rnam par grol ba/ skye man
drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis kha/nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa// stobs
bcu'i stobs dang ldan ng/ yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan
gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ sun rgud/ sun dar/ su ni' phongs shing 'dug/ suni nyam da par gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ sun phongs pa dang/ nyam nga ba dang/
gnodapa dang ldan/ sun ngan song du gzhol/ suni ngan song du 'bab/ suni ngan song du bab/ sun saM n gnas ong nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la
gzhag khar/ sunanyis par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las ' gnas drang bar bya/ sun 'phags bzhir bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdunagyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par
bya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ba skyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su nidage ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyedazin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las
ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su la ni sangs rgyas byung ngas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/
dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul ba/bya ba'igros rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gcer bu pa 'od srungs
dngarus gcig pa gdul ba'i dus la bababo snyam du dgongs nas/ 'od ma'i tshal nas byung ste/ sa phyogs gang nagacer bu pa 'od srungs dang rusagacig pa ba dug pa'i
shA sa phyogs der gshegs nas/ gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang dus gcig pas thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la na der song ste/
phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon sum du yang dag par mgu ba dang/ yang dag bdag ra bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de
nas gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang rusagacig las/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyago'u tam gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad dugo'u tams bdag la skabs
nabadag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ 'od srungs ra zhigang rgyal po'i khab tubasod snyoms la 'gro dgos pas/ khyod kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs
su ma bab kyis/ kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol tushog cig dang/ der khyod kyi zhu ba bstan pa'i skabs su bab bo// gsol ba/ kyi go'u ta ma gal tebadag kyang gzhan du 'gyur srid la/
yang go'u tam yang gzhan du 'gyur srid do// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum dug cer bu pa 'od srungs dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung paMstan pa'i slad/
ru skabs khyen go'u ta ma khyod la 'di nyid du phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de nas lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar dub com ldan 'adasakyis/ gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang dus gcig pa la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungasar zhigangargyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'gro dgos pas/ khyodakyi zhu galung bstanaba'i skabs su mabang kyis/ kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol tu
shog cig dang/ der khyod kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs su bab/ gsol pa// kyi go'u ta mgal te zhusan zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye nago'u ta ma khyod la 'di nyid du phyogs gal/
zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkaT stsalar/ 'od sungs khyod don 'di lan gnyis lanagasum gyi bar du nges par blang bar byed na/ 'od srungs khyod ci dang 'dod pa zhus shig/
gsolo pa// go'u tam ci lags/ sdug bsngal rang gis bgyisasam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs sdug bsngal rang gis byas nas ngas ma bshad do// kyi go'u tam ci lags/
sdug bsngal gzhan gyis bgyis sam/ 'od srungs sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas zhes bya bden sa lung ma bstan to// kye ga'u tam ci lags/ sdug bsngal rang gis kyang bgyis/ gzhu
gyisikyang bagyis pa lags sam/ 'od srungs stugabasngal rang gis kyang byas/ gzhan gyis kyang byas zhes bya ba de yang ngas lung ma bstan to// kyi go'u tam rtsalags/ sdugabasnga lo rang gis
bya// ma bgyis pa dang/ gzhan gyis ma bgyis pa dang/ rgyu las byung ba yang m lags sam/ 'od srungs 'di yang ngas lungam bstan to// go'u tam lags/ sdug
bsngal la bdag gis bgyis pa dang/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa dang/ rgyu las byungab yongamalags zhes bgyi ba yang lung bstan to zhes gsung ngam/ 'od srungs sdug bsngal rang gis byas te
dang/ gzhan gyis byas pa dang/ rgyu las byung ba yang ma yin nam zhes Mbadrin/ lungam bstan to zhes zer/ kyi go'u ta ma ru lags/ sdug bsngal mamachis pa kho na lags sam
'od srungs sdug bsngal ni yamed pa ma yin te/ yodapa kho na yin no/ kye go'u tam sdug bsngal rang gis bgyis pa lags na/ nas bdag gi sdug bsngal shes par 'gyur ba dang/
mthong bar 'gyur bde lta bu'i chos bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bstan par smonano// 'od srungs gang gi tshor ba yang de nyid yin la/ myong ba yang de nyidayazhin/ da lta nasdug bsngal
rangags byas pa yin par 'gyur la/ 'od srungs nganadaskudamazur ro// 'od srungs gang tshor ba yang gzhan yin la/ myongab yang gzhan yin// de lta na sdug bsngal gtan
gyis byas pa yin par 'gyur na/ 'od srungasang de skadamazer ro// 'od srungs gang gi sdug bsngal skyon rnams med par byung ba'agyuranan/ de lta na sdug bsngal rang gis byas ba dang/
gzhan gyis byas pa dang/ rgya las byung ba yang ma yin par 'gyuran/ 'od srungasangani da skadamazer ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' dganyis lami rtenapar dbumalam gyis chos/
ston tsung/ 'di lta ste/ 'dwayidaMnabade 'byung la/'di skyes pas 'di skyo bar gyur te/dilta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'byung/ 'du byed kyi rkyenagyis rnam pa rashes pa byung/ rnam
par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mdang gzugs 'byud/ mang dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyasi skye mchedadrug 'byung/ skyemaredatsug gi rgyan gyis reg pa 'byung/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byung/
tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'byung/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis lenapa 'byung/ lon pa'i rgyan gyis srid pa 'byung/ srid pa'i rkyenagyis skye ba babyud skyiba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ myang n
dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// 'dilta ste/ 'dimadan 'dim 'byung la/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed
'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skyemachor drug
@#/// 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba'agag/ tshor ba 'gags pasasredapa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ lenapa
'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skyeb 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shadang/ mya nganadang/ smre sngags 'dinang dang/ stugabasngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba
dang 'khrugapa rnams 'gog par 'gyur to/ doltar n sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ dachos kyi rnam grangs 'di boshadangan/ gcer bu pa stod
srungs dang dus gcig pa chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang rus gcig pas chos mthong/ chos red/ chos rtogs
chos kyi gting slobs/ so nyi las rgyal/ de tsam las rgal te/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing/ gzhan gyi sa bkri ba medal/ ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la ma 'jags pa
thobanas/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab de logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdugan 'dasapa lags s// mngon par
zhugs pa lags s// btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa dang chos la skyabs su mchis pa dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs sumachis pa lags te/
bdag dge bsnyen lags par gzungadu gsol// bdag mngon par dad par 'gyur te/ dasu'achadasnying thag pa nas skyabs su mchi lags so zhes gsol nas/ de ltar gcer bu pa'od srungs/
dang rus gcig pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodachu rjes su yi ran gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nasasong
ngo de nas gcer bu ba 'dasungasadang rus gcig pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bdunas song nas/ ring po ma lon par bsdus ma zhig gis brdungs tabasadanas/ dbati kar dbang po rnams dang zhing
bzhin gyi mdog yongs sudag la pags pa'i mdogadakar der 'dug go/ donas dgeslongamang po dag snga drosham thabs dang chos gos gyonanas/ lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu
bsod snyoms la dong nas/ dge slong mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyub na/ gcer bu pa'od srungs dang rus gcig pas lam phyed de nyid du bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus/
dung com ldan 'das kyi thadanas song nas/ ring pom len par ng dus mas brdungs tabasadanas de'am kar dbang po rnams dang zhingabazhin gyi mdog yongs su dag la pags pa'i mdog dkar por 'dug
ge zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal de'akhab nas bsod snyomasaM blangs nas zan thos te phyis bsod snyoms blang ba spangs nas/ lhung bzedadang chos gos bzhag ste/ rkang pa bkrus nas
