bcom ldanu'adas ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bsaphyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tub khodad// phyogs gcig tu'akhod nas/
dge slong mang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon te/ lhungabazedathogasanas/ rgyal

po'i khab bsod snyomasalamachis pa na/ btsun pa bdag cag dag slong mang po rgyal po'i khab tubasod snyoms la rgyu ba rnams kyisagacor bu pa 'od srungs dang rus gcig pas shul phyed de nyidadu bcom ldan/
'das la zhub zhus nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas songs/ ring po malags r ba jus mas brdungs to/ bkum nas de 'gum kar dbang po rnams dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongasasu
dag la/ pags pa'i madog dkar por mchis so thos lags na/ btsun pa de'i 'grob gang lags/ spyira'i gnas ni gang lags/ 'chiba'i gnas na gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de nanor du gyur pa yin te/ des nga'i chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos mngon par rtogs pas na/ des na nga la gnod pa ma byas kyis/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu des ni/
'di lta ste/ chos la lhag par bya ba byas nas mya ngan las 'das kyis/ de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa gyis shig ces bka' stsal to/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang dus
gcig pa mchog tugyur par lung bstan nas// rgyal po'i khab der lha rnams kyis gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang rus gcig pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dasaso zhes bsgrags so// de nas de thosam
thug gtug zhan mu stegs pa rnams kyis ras kyi ba dan dag bsgrengaste/ lam po che dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su bsgrags te/ dag sbyong go'u tam na re/ nga'i/
chos 'dul ba 'di 'ba' zhig la mthar thug pa yod kyi/ gzhan la mdad zhen/ nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyodang 'di yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes smras nas/ dedagod brad/
dudang ste// 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag kyang de'i thad du dong ste/ 'do'i rus bu lamachodang phya'o snyam mo// de nas der gzhan mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu rnams n ro/
'dini bdag cag gitshangs par tsungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ bdag cag gis 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o zhes zer ro// dge slong dag na re/ yang 'di ni bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs/
par spyod pa yin gyis/ bdag cag gis 'di rus bu lamachod par bya'o zhes zer ro// de nas gzhan mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu dganar/ bdag gi dpang ni lcagang dag gis rgyal po'i khab 'di bsgrags

pa de dag yin nozhes zer ro// dge slong dag na re/ yang 'di su'i tshangasapa mtshungs par sbyod pa yin pa lha de dag nyid la dri bar bya'o zhes zer ro// de nas de thos ma thag tu gzhan mu stegs pa kun tu
rgyu ba dag gis lhade dag nyid la gsol ba btab ste/ 'di su'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pa dang/ su'i ma yi pa de lha rnams gsungs shig ces byas so// dan
h+pha chos rtogs pa'i lha rnams ra/ 'dinadag slong rnams kyi tshas pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/ 'dis bcom ldan 'dus las chos rtogs nus/ des na 'di bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las
'das bar gyur to zhes zera'o// de nas dgosam thag tugazhan mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu rnams skyengs nas/ sa phyogs de nas song ngo// de nas dge slong rnams kyis de'i rus bu la rus dus tshod
pa byas te/ 'od ma'i tshal du don gnas / bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang dus gcig pa 'dis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ba jus mas
brdungs te bkum lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slengadag denyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags te/ 'di'i sngon gyi gtam rgyud nipus ka sngas pa'i gtam rgyud
las 'byung ba bzhin du ming po zhes sring mo bsad pa'i bar du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// gsol pa// btsun pa gcer bu pa 'od srungs dang rus gcig pas las ci bgyis no/
las re'i rnam par smin pas 'das bcom ldan 'dasamanyes par bgyis te/ mimanyes par ma bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to//
gsol pa// btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang dubatab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sngon byang ba 'dus pa ki dusan/ bskal pa bzung deb de nyid la/ skye
dgu'i mi lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blo named
pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'a yig rten du byung ste/ de'i grags pa kun tu rgyas par gyur to// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od srungs kyis wArANAsir gnas bcas te/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do// de'i tshe yuladen bram ze zhig gnas pa des kyang/ wArAtsAsIn
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes bya ba bdud rtsi'i char 'be bas te/ bdud rtsi'i 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yul drang srong sgrubar son gnas /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dgal bzhugs pa der song ste phyaninas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas 'od srungs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan
pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sus las chos thos nas
skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas song ngo// de nas des tshe gcig tusbyin bo dgabyin shing/ bsod nams dag byas te/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang
grwa bslab pa'i gan rnams bsrungs nas 'chikar smon lam btab pa// 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa sang sargyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi
rnams bsrungs kyang yon tan spyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyisakhram ze khye'u bum lung bstan pa gangayanipa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag
'o gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe bram ze ra gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gcer bu pa'od
srungasadad rus gcig pa 'di kho na yin te/ dos der sbyin pa dag phyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byas te/ tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas/
'chekar sminalam btab ste yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u blu ma lung bstan pagang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das debadag gis mnyasapa 'byed par
gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des n/ dgeslongadagang yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs dang shin tu mnyam pa dang/ shugs mnyam pa dang//
mdzad pamanyam bdad/ thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/ 'dis ngamanyes bar byas te/ mimanyes po ma byas so////bam po nyi shu brgyadang//
'od srungs gtso bo zhes bya ba ni/gleng gazhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe ri'i sulazhig na/ drang srong 'khor khri nyis stong yod pa zhig gnas te/ drang srong de yang bstan bcos thams
chudakyi mthar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul mazhing mthu che ba zhig ste/ des bram khre khri nyis stong po de dag bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das/
kyis mtshonanapo ma dros pa'i nang du las kyi rnam par smin pa lung bstan nas/ mtsho de nyid kyi nang nas 'khor lnga brgya dang/ nam mkha' la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so// drang srong
de 'khor dang bcas pas kyang/ bcom ldan 'dasamatsho de nyidakyi nang nas nam mkha' la gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad bor
te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing/ de dag rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ste lhags so// bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgonges phyag 'tshal te/ chos manyan pa'i phyir spyanasduga'abod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/
[f g]bya// khams dang/ shes pa dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstanata/ des na drang srong khri nyis stong ba de rnams kyis stan dag
nyidal 'khodazhin dubaden pa rtogs ba'amod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// drang srong gtso bo des thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas ci yang ma thob bo// de nas drang sro
khri i stong po de rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
to/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos bo thog tu rung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thadadu
tshungs par spyod ba spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srongakhri nyis stong ba de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya pa'i tshig gas rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa mdzad
nas do rnams la lung yang phog ste/ de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'badabs nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs taM/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
so/ drang srong gtseb de ni rab tubyung yang ci yang ma thob bo// de nas des de thos nas bad pa bzhugs te/ des rang bo ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs nas/ rig pa dang grol ba'i
smobasal dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to// de nas khyi zhig na de'i blo skyes l/ bdag ni sems can stong phrag du ma dag la chos ston la/ bdag nyid ni chos ston param 'dod de/ bdag
gi grogs po 'di dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas// bdag gis nad thos nas nuphyagatol med pa gyur te/ khyadapar yang ma thob kyis/ bdag gis mnyan pa dang sems
pa btang la re zhig bsgrib par bya'o snyam nas/ sa thos ba de nyid sems pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ tangarab rtags pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas// dgra bcom pa nyid
mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bra'abar gyur nas/ gser dang bong par manyamar// nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig bdang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa globang/ sridapa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags
ra dang/ bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bas ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod rnying rjed pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/
sangs rgyas btsemaldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa drang srong de thos pa'i rgyags pas bregs nas yang m thobal/ slad kyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ nyibar brtags
pas nyon mongs pa thams cad smras nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du bgyis pa la gcigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// daltar 'ba' zhig ma
inate/ 'dasar 'jus la 'dis sems pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ brtags pas/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon pa ras blta ji ltar bskyed pa denyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon

ltung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ ri khrodatsun khram bre'od srungs gtso bo zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ phyi zhig na de snub dang 'bras bu dag gi don la ri'i sul zhig tu song ba las/ des deradrang srong khri nyis
stonga mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tud dag la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag ni khyim gyi chos la gnas la/ 'di rnams ni khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung ba la san/
'di rnams na 'khor ba las grol ba yin gor ma chag gis/ ma la bdag kyang 'di dag kho na'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des thams cad bor te/ drang srong de dag gi thad du rab tu

kyang ste// dadar son gnas bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud par gyur to// de nas phyi zhiganadrang srong gtso ba de shin s/ bram ze'i khye'u khri nyis stongang da rnams drang srong de shi ba'i phyir shin tu
myongan byed tsang sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'donapar byed de// de nas 'daslungs gtso bo des/ de dag la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dgahacangamya ngan ma byed/ sdugabasngal bar m byed/ skye/
sngags 'don pa'i m byed cig dang/ ngas khyod kyi dgongs pa masacad sbyar bar bya'o zhes byas nas/ des bram ze'i khye'u khris stong ba de dag thams cad basdus te/ dadag la yid la byed pa yang
phog nas/ dedag thams cad kyis kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lha bskyed do// de nas phyi zhig na 'od srungs gtse nges bsams pa// bdag gi slob ma 'di rnams kyis ni
bdag gi yid la byed pas ches de lta burtogs par gyural/ bdag ni thos nga sa rgyags shing dregs pas ci yang ma thob na/ bdag la thos pa 'di ci dgos snyam nas des kyang samasapa dang/
'jal ba dang/ chu bar brtogs bas/ bsaMm gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe 'dasrungs btso por phyur
ba gang yin pa de ni drang srong 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas ci yang ma thobal/ phyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ nying rang rtags
pas bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shesar lta bskyod de// da ltar yang 'di thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas sngar ci yang ma thob la/ phyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang/
'jul ba dang/ nyar brtags pas/ nyon mongs pa thamasacad spangs te/ dgra rtsom pa nyidi mngon sumadu byas so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ btsun pa drang srong 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
mnyes par bgyis te// mi mnyes bar m bgyisal/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas// dgrabcom pa nyid mngon sum du
bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to// gsol ra// btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btang la gas/ bka' stsal
rgyu pa dge slongadag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i mi lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
[>bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rtenamkhyen ng/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan ras 'khor ba 'jig ces byar
'jig rten du byung ste gong gi des ngs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ rgyal po
mdzes ldan gyis de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/ sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas/ mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston gyi lugs ba tod do// de nas

zhig na mchod rtenade'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa na/ rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi khams su gtogs pa// ri khrod kyi rgyal po 'khor khri nyis stong dang ldan pa zhig gis kyang mchod pa'i las la brtson

pa ro byas nas smon lam btabab/ dge ba'i rtsabadis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bde dang der phyugatsanganor mngal las skyed che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig/ ston ng 'di dang 'o drapa'i bstan
la rab tultung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas s// danas zham ring ba rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa/ lha gcig
gis smon lam ci btab lags/ de nas rgyal pas kyang de dag rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas zham ring pa rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis kyang lha cig las brten te ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par
byed par gyuratsag/ mimanyes bar byed bar ma gyur cig/ de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sngangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces
dgeslong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe ri khrod kyi rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni drang srong 'di kho na yin no// de ni de'i 'khor khri nyis stong por gyurar gongayin pa
dani bram ze khri nyis stong po 'di dag khonayin te/ deramachod rten de la bkur sti byas nas/ smon lam btab pa'i lasad rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyag cigenor mngal
[y ]/longs spyod chub 'i rigs su skyes nas/ 'dis nga mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyes pa ram byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
sbangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// drang srong khri nyis stong bo 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid las brtenanas/ 'di rnams kyis nga masapar byas te/ mamanyes par ma byas
la/ nganyid kyi bstan pa la rab tubyung nas/ nyon mongs pa thums cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs
kyi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste/ deb 'di dag thums cad kyis tshe gcig cutshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar rnam
par grol bar gyur to// gling chen gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po gzugasacan snying po'i glang po che'i bya glang chen
snying po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang longs spyod byed// yongs su 'dzin pa mang ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyamapa/ rnam thos kyi bu'anir dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa
las chung ma blangasaM nas/ de de dang lhan cig turtse zhing dag bdagur spyod do// de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang/ bu gzugasabazang
'thazhingabastan sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming jiskadagadags zhes ming 'dogs babyed de/ khye'u 'di rgyu skar nagapa la skyes la//
gcig tu na glang po che'i bla glang chen snying po'i bu yin pas na/ khyo 'di'i ming nag pa glanga chen gnas zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u nag pa glang chen gnasaM dom dang/ no dang/
ma dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas/ degang gi mi char skyes pa de'i tshe/ khye'u de yig slog tu bcug ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po
rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ glangapo ma bzhon pa dang/ rta bzhon pa dang/ mtshon chu bcang pa dang/ 'phong dang/ mdun du brnabadang phyir
bsnar pa dang/ g.yul las shar par bya bdang/ lcags kyus gzung ba dang/ zhagasar gzung ba dang/ mda' bo che'aphang ba dang/ rdorje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang/ mtshon
rtsa gortsig pa gdab pa dang/ 'khor lo 'phang ba dang/ gcad pa dang/ gshogs dang/ lag pas gzung ba dang/ rkang pa'i stangs dang mgobo bskyab pa dang/ rgyang mar 'phang/
bdang/ sgra grag par 'aphang ba dang/ gnadadu 'phang ba dang/ gdon mi zakhar phog par bya ba dang/ tshabasacher gtang ba rnams kyang baslabs nas/ gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to//
de nas phyi zhig nare'i pha ma gnyis ng nas/ de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos glang po che'i bla bskos te pha'i las thabs de nyid byin no// danas des thabs zlar bab pa
[â€“ ]las chungam blangs nas/ dad dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dgabadagur sbyodado// de nas phyi zhig nades bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyedanas/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bsub pa'i
gan rnams blangs te/ des sbyin bdag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstanapa la rab tu byung ngo// derab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bsubs te// rig pa

dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to// de nas phyi zhig na des bsams pa// bdag gis thos pa'i smonas bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni byas zin gyis/ da phyin chad na bdag gis yid la
byed pa la 'badapar bya'osum du bsams te/ des yid la byed pa bzung nas/ srod dang tho rangs mi nyal ba nyams su blangs te gnas pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bsam gtan gyi
bar du bskyod nas/ dasaslobam lnga brgya bsdus te/ 'khor dang ldan par gyur to// de nas phyi zhig na de khor dang bcas pa ljongs rgya zhing dong ste/ de mthar gyis spyodayul rgyu ba las
slar log nas/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal bo gzugs can snying nga la'ang tu byung ngo zhes gsol to/ lha gcig nagab glang chen gnaso narab tu byung la/ de yang bum mchis te/ bu ma
mchis bsan/ de cibadog pa thams cad lhagacig mnga' lags so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal posasmas pa/ dan shi ba'i no dbang du brad kyi/ gson po'i nimi dbang ste/ rigA
kyi bu de yang da dung gson por 'dug la/ drang srong rnams naphyir yang 'bab ring khyim na gnas par 'gyurayang srid do zhes byas nas/ rgyal posade'i khyim nas niu yangs bzhes so// de nas phyi

zhig na de'i chungams nag ra glang chen gnas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab tulhagasaso zhes thos so// thos nas kyang des 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs takhyim du zan byin no// de nas
de'icungams bsams pa// ci 'ding ba byas pa yin nam/ bonate so sa'i skyibo yin zhog gu/ gal te soso'i skye bo yin na 'dirlaba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/ des de zan za ba'i khang thog
nasazangs gzhong gtsugamadun du bor nas/ de de'i sgras skrag par gyural/ gtsas tun can baba'i[@]der zangs gzhong da 'gris bludang ltar yang byed do/ des d mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di
nidagra bcom pa ma yin te// 'di ni so so'i skye bo yin pas/ bdag gis 'di drang nus so snyam nas/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa dang/ jo bo ma zhugs pas bdagag longs spyod 'di dag dmas
par gyur to// debasan jebasangayang 'khor brgya lnga bcu dang khyami 'dir bshos gsol bar ciganang zhes byas so// de nas nagapa glang chen gnas kyis chung ma la cang mizer bar khas blangs nas
des phyi nyin de 'khor ba lnga bcu dang zan byin nas yang phyi de nyin par 'khor lnga brgya dang zan la bos so// de bzhin du mthar gyis budamed des da khor je nyung je nyung du phyi nas/
thama'i nyin par gcig bu zan la bos te/ dades zan byin nas de drang ba'i phyir 'phos pa ni tshig smra zhing/ jo bo mi bzhugs pas 'di ltar dran rnams kyis kyang nas so zhes zer ro// des snga
nas khol bo khya'uzhig la bsgoste/ gang gi ming chos nyanacing 'dug pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis nga lan gsum gyi bar du 'gug pa thongal/ nga' gan dushog cig ces springs shig/ de nas khyed kyi yod/
du ma 'os pa dang/ de'i 'og tukhyod kyis nga'ico tanas bzung la rje bo'i mdun du rdugs shig ces byas te bzhagago/ de nas khol bo 'u des kyang de kho na bzhin du byas nas/ bud med des smras
pa rdo ba da gzigs/ khyod nyid kyi mdun du yang bdag 'di kho na lta zhing mams so zhes byas so// de nas thos ma thag tu nag ba glang chen gnas khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa chen po skyes nas/
khros pas chung mas sn gnas am pa dural gri bzhag bdu blangs nas/ shugasazhas byung nas khye'u de'i steng du brgyugasanas/ chung mas rkyang pa la phyag byas tismras pa/ jo bo re zhig gzu lumasam
mdzad par bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phulal/ de'i 'og gtubadabacos bas slebs so// de nas nag pa glangatsana gnas kyis chungam de nyid kyi mdun dubaslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul te/ chos gosatshon[E]
0 can rnams bor nas// khyim pa'i gos rnams bgos te 'dug go/ de nas chung ma na re 'din bdag gis jo bo drang ba'i thabs bgyi ba'i slad du de ltar bgyis par bas kyis/ japos 'di la kon
dum gzung bar gsol/ rdo po'i khyim gyi 'byor ngan rgya chab lags kyis/ da slan chad rdob 'dod pa rnams kyang spyodacing bzhugs shig/ sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin pa mdzod cagi/ bsod nams
dag kyang mdzod cig ces zeraro// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ nagapa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te nyams par byas so zhes thos nas// rgyal pos de la 'gug pa
btang nas de la sngon gyi las thabs byin no// de nas dge slong mang pa dag snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogasanas/ rgyal po'i khab tubasod snyoms la dong ste/ dge slong
mang po dag rgyal po'i khab tu bkodasnyam sa'agyur na nagapa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te nyams par byas so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab nas bsod snyoms blangs
nas thon zos ta zas phyis len pa spangs nas// lhung bzedadang chos gos bzhag ste/ rkang pa bkrus nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khodonas/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa 'din bdag cag dge slong mang po sde drosham thabs dang chos gos 'tshal te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tubasod snyoms la mchis pa na/
h+pha btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba rnams kyis nag pa glang chen gnasakyis bslab pa rnams phul te nyams par bgyisasozhes thos lags so// bcom ldan bs[.]
kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de ni yunarang du khyim dum gnas te/ dan yang nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur re zhes bka' stsal to// de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis nag po glangachen gnas gdul ba'idus la bab par gzigs nas/ snga drosham
thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ rgyal po'i khab tubasod snyoms la gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ nagapa gling chen gnam
kyi khyim gangan 'dug pa der gshegs to/ byenanas khyim gyi smin bzhes te/ dadrang ba'i phyi'i 'od zer bkra nas/ des d khyim thams cad gser zhun ma'i kha dog lta bur snang bar gyur to// de nas
nag pa glangachen gnas kyis bsams pa 'od 'di su yin zhig gu/ bcom ldan 'das khona'i yin gor ma chagan/ brtsom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs te/ bdag la dgongs shig gu snyam pa
0 dang de'i skabs su 'dzin pa'i ngas nas nagapa glang chen gnas la sbran te/ bcom ldan 'dasasgon bzhugs so zhes byas so// de nas gus par bsgrim nga// bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs
pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasasu thalam sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das bka' nustsal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalas/ khyod khyim na gnas pa thong 'tshub shog/ yang nga'i thad dur ba du byung zhig ces bka' stsal to// 'ad
ltar bcom ldan 'das kyisano/ mi rabs gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla ma dang bla ma'i gnas lta bur gyur pa/ su'i ngag kyang ma bcug pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyisaka' yang sus kyang gcog
nus ba med do// de nas des gsolor// bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad snul pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brong ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'od ma'i tshal du khrid nas/ rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzados de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas na
mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nag pa glang chen
gnas kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sminaras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mimanyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan do/
rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spungs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubagyisalags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur te//
gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ri khrod kyi grong zhig na khyim bdag nag nga zhes
byang phyag tsagi noramang la longs spyodachub/ yongs su 'dzin pamang ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/ rnam thosAkya bunar dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa las/ phyi zhigan de dud
ka'i tsusan shing yal ga 'khrigs shing me tog rgyas pa'i skyed mos tshal gyis byung ngo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dum 'byung ba'itshe/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/
bsamathA'i gnas mal na gnas pa// 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byungaste/ rang sangs rgyas shig 'khrododer bsod snyoms la 'gro 'dod nas/ des snyadams
tshal den rol mo'i sgra grag pa thos nas/ des bsams pa// bdag gang dka' ba ste 'di phyi ni ri khrod du'agro ci dgos kyis/ skyed mos tshal 'di'i nang du song dang/ 'di nas bdag gi bsod
snyams 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ rang sangs rgyas de skye dmes tshal der song nas/ khyim bdag des lus mdzes pa dang/ sa mas mdzes pa de mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang khyim bdag de
rangasangs rgyas de lashin tu dga' bar gyur to// de dga' bar gyur nas/ bshos gsol te smas pa 'phags pa khyod ga la bzhugs/ bdag gis khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// rangasas
rgyas kyis smras pa// nags khrod ga gi mo 'gi na 'dug go zhes smras nas/ rang sangs rgyas de dang ngo// de nas khyim bdag de dus dus su nags khrod der bshos 'bul zhing bsnyen bkur yang byed do//

da nas phyi zhiganakhyim bdag de de blta ba'i phyir song ba las/ rang sangs rgyas deshing zhig gi drung du gnas bcas te/ klu'i rgyal po'i lus bskyil te/ gnyid log pa bzhin skyil mo krungad cas te 'dug
go de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de rab tu dben par gnas mthong nas/ de yang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i sems skyes so// de nas rang sangs rgyas de'i thad du son gnas / rkang
pa la phyag 'tshal tasmras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu phyung zhig dung/ bdag kyang khyed kyi thadangutsangs par spyod bar spyad par 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas kyi myus ra// nganirab tu
'dun pa mkhyidad/ drang srong rnams rab tu 'byin par byed kyis/ drang srong rnams kyi nang du song la rab tu 'byang bar gyis shig/ de nas da thes mthob tu khyim bdag des khyim gyi 'khor btang
[Â©]/ sa sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byas te/ drang srong rnams kyi nad du rab tu byung nas/ de der rab tu byung ste/ bsam ga tanabazhi dang/ mngon/
par shes pa lnga bskyed do// de rab tu byung nas/ rang sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'dasaso// de nas drang srong de'i blo skyes pa// bdag songal yon gnas kyi mchog dge ba'i bshes
gnyen de la bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'on tang de las bdag gis gongama'i khyadapar rtogs par 'gyur de sAm ste/ da nags khrod dar song ba las/ des der rang sangs rgyas d nim mthong gi/
rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig nags khrod der mthong nas/ des de la dris pa// 'phags ba'i dag slongashatshugs dang kha dog 'di lta bu zhiganags khrod 'dan 'dug 'dug pa gar song/ rang sangs
rgyus kyis smras pa// yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// des smras pa/ de gang du mya ngan las 'das/ de nas rang sangs rgyas des des sku gdung de dag bstan to// de nas des sku gdung
gi mchod rten brtsigs nas/ bdug pa dang/ phyag dang smosadang/ me tog rnams kyis bkur sti byas te smon lam btab pa/ kyi ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdagagang dong
gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang dar phyug cinganor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig/ 'dibs kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa bdagags mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi
mnyes par ma gyur cig/ yon tan 'dilta bu dag kyang bdag gis thob par shog cig ces smon lam btab nas sa phyogs de nas song ngo// de nas phyi zhig na de shi'o// deshi 'phos te dus
las 'dasunas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i ma khyim bdag nag bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nag ra glang chen gnas 'di
kho na yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas de la bkur sti byas nas/ smon lam nga tangar lil sa de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gdadu skyes pa de dang der phyagacing nor mang la longs spyodacha ba'i rigs su
skyes te/ nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa ngaltadu 'dis mnyes par byas te/ mimanyes par ma byas la/ nganyid kyi bstan pa 'arab tu byung nas/ nyonamadu
pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcomapa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dag slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsolong datsun ba nag ba glang chen
gnas mi 'brang gis thabs bgyis te 'dod pa spyod du stsal ba lagazigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus nayang 'di chung ma des
thabs byas nas ji ltar 'dod pa spyod du bcug pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wA rAnasin/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/
de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi mdunan 'don bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ phyi zhigan de'i chungam la bu chags nas/ bu mtshe ma gnyis byung ste/ dganyis
kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas te/ khye'u 'di gnyis kyi ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ khye'u 'di gnyis mes byin gyi bu yin bas na/ khye'u gcig gi ming ni me'i bu zhes
gdags so// gcig gi mingan me lce zhes gdags sa zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u ma'i bu dang/ ma lce gnyis 'o ma dang/ zhe dang/ mar dang/ chunamar dang/ mar gyi
snying khus bskyed bsrings nas/ gang gi tshade ga nyis tshur skyes pada'/ yig dang/ bram ze'i spyod lam dang/ spyod pa dang/ o zhes bya ba dang/ b+ha zhes bya ba dang/
gtsang sbra dang/ chogadang/ thal ba byung ba dang/ ril ba phyogs pa dang/ nges brjod kyi rig byed dang/ mchod nigyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang/ sridi
srung gi rigabyed dang/ mchod sbyin dang/ mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ blung ba dang/ kha ton bya ba dang/ kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs
nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram ze'agyur te/ de gnyis mthar gyis ragi pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to// phyi zhig na der nyis kyis pha chos dang chos ma yin
pas rgyal srid 'dzin pa mthong ngo// de nas phyi zhigan deganyisagyi blo skyas pa// phamed par gyur kyi 'og tu ni// bdag cag gnyis ba'i las thabs su bsko bar gyur gyis/ bdag cag
gnyis khyim na gnas pa gtang ngo zhes zer ro// 'di skad ces kyang brer te/ 'jig rten pharo'ogyis 'jig pa'i mis ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir gsod pa dang/ bcing bdang/ rngog pa'i
las byed pa bas/ nags khung du shing shun gyi gsagyon zhing/ shing thog bra la/ gcan gzan dag dang lhan cig gnas kyang bya'o zhes zer nas pha 'a gsol te/ yab yum bdag cag gnyis
dka' thub kyi nags tshal dum zhes byas so// pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa// bu gnyis gang gi phyir drang srong rnams dka' thub spyod pa de ni/ khyad gnyis kyi lag na 'dug ste/ ngod
shi ba'i 'og tu khyed gnyis cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid 'dzin par 'ong ngo// khye'u gnyis kyis smras r/ bdag cag gnyis 'dzagis pa yang da len yin te/ de'i phyi nags khung du gnas
bca' bar 'dod pas na/ bdag cag gnyis 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i rngo mi thogago/ daltar pham gnyis kyis/ deganyis lan du ma bkag kyang dgagam nus nas/ dganyis
la mas smras pa// rab tu dbyung bar gyis la/ gal te khyad par cung zad thob par gyur na/ nged gnyis la ltar shog cig ces byas so// de nas dganyis kyis smras pa/ khyadags
ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin du'atshal lo zhes byas nas/ khye'ude gnyis kyis pham la mchi phyag byas te dugs khungadu gnas bcasaso// dganyis der rab tu byung nas
g+ha bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga bskyodado// de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyi blo skyes pa// bdag cag gnyis kyis pha ma la dam bcas pa// gal te khyad par cung zad thob/
par gyur na khyad gnyis la ltar 'ongango zhes byas kyis 'dong ngo zhes zur nas/ stong gi nam mkha' lasadong ste/ pha ma gnyis kyi thad du phyin to// de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis
skyod la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ khyed gnyi kyang bsod snyoms 'dod la/ nged gnyis kyang bsod nams 'dod kyis/ 'dir bdag cag gi skyed mos
che'i du gnas par gyis shig dang/ bdag cag gnyis kyisi zan sbyar ro zhes byas so// deganyis kyis smras pa// khyadaganyis ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas/ skadares
rtsal de nyid du yalag dang/ loma'i spyil po bcasanas 'khod do// de nas de gnyis wArA si'i phyogs kun tu bkur sti bya ba dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ ri mor bya ba dang/ mchod
pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis mdunan bden mes byin gyi bu gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur te zhes thos nas// thos ma thag tungo mtshar
du gyur te/ g.yar drongs nas zan byin no// zan byin nas/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal taslus pa/ dus dus su khyed gnyis nga la ltar shog cig ces byas so// de nas de gnyis kyis
smras pa/ lha ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du gyi'o zhes byas nas dganyis song ngo// de nas dus dusasu de gnyis steng ginam mkha' las 'gro zhing/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdong bar byed de/
rgyal po tshangs pas byin la bltar 'gre'o// rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang de gnyis 'ongs nas/ nam mkha'ade nyid las pang du blangs te stan la bzhag nas/ bza' ba dang bcar bag
ma bzang po mang pas tsham par byas te/ mosamanyan pa'i phyir mdun du bdug go/ de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi 'bangs ri khrod pa rnams le gnas / dpung gi tshogs go bskon
ta mus nas/ des bu me la bsgo ba/ bu drang srong gnyis nam 'ongs dang nga ltar bkur sti byed nga de kho na bzhin du khyod kyis kun gyis shig ces byas nas/ rgyal po desong ngo/ de nas phyi zhig/

na rgyal po'i phabrang du drang srong me'i bu'i don zhig yod par phyani/ der drang srong me lce btang ste/ de steng gnam mkha' las rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/ bu mo des drang srong nam mkha' la
'dug pa pang du blangs to'akhyud nas stan la bzhagago/ bud med rnams rigan gdug pa yin te/ bu mo des re ma thag tu drang srong me lce rdzu 'phrul de las nyams so// bu mo de yang drang/
sror de gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mthong nas chags par gyur te/ dad dang dben pa zhig tu zhugs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu nyal po byas so//
de nas de btsun mo'i 'khor gyis tshor te/ de dag gis bsams pa gal te bdag cag gis drang srong 'di la tshig 'ga' byas nan/ drang srong 'dirdzu 'phrul che bas dmed pa 'dorasridadasAm ste
dedag 'jigs skrag nas cung zad kyang m smras so// drang srong de yang rgyal po 'pho brang de nyid du 'dug cing/ rkang pas 'gror ngo tsha ste ma podad// danas phyi zhogan rgyul po tshangs pas byan
gyis ra khrod pa phab nas phyir log ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs pa dang/ des drang srong ma lcabada'i khongs so zhes thos nas/ thos ma thag tu rgyal po de la bltar song ste/ des babra' ba dang
bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag phul la// bu mos kyang drang srong de'i skom khyer te 'ongs so// de nas d mthong am thag tu drang srong de shin tu chags par gyur to// drang srong de mes pa
tsam du chugs par gyur nas// rgyalapada'i spyan sngar lag pa brkyang nas/ lag pas bzung zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal pos de mthong nas// mthong ma thug tural gri rnan po thogs te/
drang srong de pa sod pa'i byas pa dang/ phumo'i mthong nas drang srong de la smras pa/ mkhan po tsalags/ khyod gsang nan dgos pa'i phyir phrul te/ khyod kyis di'i phyag brkyang lags
[j]sam zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po tshangs pa sa byin de bzhin du yid ches par gyur te/ drang srong 'dis 'khrul to snyam du bsams nas/ sbyin par skem phul lo// de nas de la zan byin
nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/ de nas drang srong me'i bu dka' thub kyi nags tshal na 'dug pas bsams pa/ ni drang srong de da tsam gyi bar dum 'ongasan snyam ste/ des bltas
'dod pa spyod par gyur la stobs su chud cing 'dug par mthong nas/ 'di deng dusrog yal bar 'gyur srid do snyam nas/ steng gi bar snang 'a sa rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so// rgyal de
tshangs pas byin gyis kyang drang srong de nam mkha' da nyid las pang du blangs nas stan la bzhag ste/ rkyes/mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du bdug se nas des rgyal po de la chos bge tsam bshad
nas/ nupo khrod de steng gi nam mkha' las dka' thub kyi nags rul du song ngo// de nas des de [']da[â€]da pa'i man ngag phog nas des phyir yang bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par
shes pa lnga bskyed do// de nas phyi zhigan rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi btsun mong kher rnams kyis bsams pa// bu mo 'dis ma legs pa 'di lta bu byas pa de gal te bdag cag gis mgaso
na bdag cag la yang 'di'i phyir gyed byungangar gyurare snyam nas/ de rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to// de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhe sdang chen de'i dbang
dugyur nas/ des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi'ig bskyon te/ drang srong de'i gnas su song nas/ drang srong me lcas rgyal po tshangs pas byin dpung gi tshogs yan
b+ha/ lag bzhi dngams te 'ongs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang sems pa la zhugs te/ 'di bsam pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'dir 'ongs snyam ste/ des ltasan/ bdag gsod da ra 'dod de snyam
du'a gnas / de nyid dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ steng gi bar snang la mngon du 'apag te 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong me lce stong gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags
todadug pa mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de'i khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa de mad par gyur to/ the tsom skyas ba/ ci 'di ngas ji skad thos pa de bzhin du gyur tam/ 'on te ma gyur snyam
nas tshigs su decad dmyus pa/ bram ze ma lce bdag gsani/ 'dod pa spyodaces sngar thos na// tshig de bden pa yin nam// 'on te ci lags mi spyod dam// rgyal de tshon po de
bden te// khyod kyis gzhan las thos pa bzhin// bdag lam nazhugagyur te// chags pa'i gnas su myos par gyur// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin khre tsem skyes te/ drang srong mo'i
chu'i thad du song nas/ des drang srong de la dris pa/ drang srong calags/ 'di'i slad du bdag gis ji skad thos pa de kho na bzhin lags sam/ drang srong gis smras ng/ rgyal po chen
pa de kho na bzhin du bden med kyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni de ltar mthu che'o// rgyal pos smras ba/ 'o na ji ltar 'dod pa yang longs sbyod par byed la// rdzu 'phrula'adi lta bu dag dang yang
ldan drang srong gis smras pa// rgyal po chen po drang srong bdagangagi tsha'adod pa sbyad par gyur pa de'i chen rdzu 'phrul las nyamasaso// 'di gnas denas bdag gis khrid de lung yang pheg/
yid la byed pa'i thabs kyang bstan nas/ 'dis kyang phyir yang rdzu 'phrul bskyed do// de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de de la dga' bar gyur nas/ des drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/
badrod pa gsolanas song ngo// dag slong dag jisAmadu soms/ de'i tshe drang srong me'i bur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i zhu

bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nag pa glang chen gnas 'dikhon yin no// de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chung ma 'di tshon yin te/ de'itshe yang des tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas las
nyams par byas te/ 'dod pa spyod pa la gnas par byas pa las/ de ngas de nas drangs to/ phyir yang bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas l/ da ltar yang
'dis 'di tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas las nyams par byas nas/ 'dod pa la gnas par byas pa las/ de bas de nas drangs te/ g.yung drung gi mthA thug ba grub pa dang bdeba'i mya ngan las 'das/
[e]// pa la bzhagago/ gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la 'di rang du byung nas/ des 'dir tshe gtsug du tshangs bar spyod pa spyad nas/
zhwa dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des n/ daltar rnam par grol bar gyur te///bam po nyi shu dgu pa// sar Nazhes bya ban/ gling
gzhirgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yul gyenadu rgyal zhes bya ba nani/ rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba rgyal po byad do// yul dpa' rab ces bya ba nan/ rgyal po 'char ka zhes rtsa ba rgyal po
byed do// de gnyis phan tshunam mthun par gyur pas/ dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do// de nas gang gamin dang ldan pa ka ta ya na'i bus nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de'i tshe/ des bas mas nga/ bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba mang po sel ba yin/ bder dang ya nged bde ba rnam pa dum
sgrub pa yin/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa dum sel ba yin/ chos rnam pa du ma sgrub pa yin la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasal sa brten te rus pa 'a ra la ni gal
khrog gargya mtsho ni bskams na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bka' drin bdag gis ji ltar bsab par bya snyam mo// de nas des bsams pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ba gang yang
0b.rung ba de dag thams nad nisi mas can la phan pa'i phyir 'byung ba kho nar zad kyis ma la bdag gis kyang sems can l phan pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas de sems pa la zhugs te/ bdag gisagadul
bar bya ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam pa dang/ des bltas ni/ yul dang 'a ra bya ba na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams lhag pa bdag gis gdul bar bya ba yin par mthong nas/ bcom ldan
'das galabazhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa bdag cag ljongs rgya zhing mchi bar 'chel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ka t+yaya na'i bu khyod la/
bdag brgal nas gzhan sgra la cig/ bdag grol nas gzhan grol bar gyis shig/ bdag dobugs phyin nas gzhan dbugs phyung zhig/ bdag yongs su mya nganalas 'das nas/ gzhan

yongs su mya ngan las zlo zhog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngas phyag 'tshal to/ 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo// danas de mahAr rgyaso
rgyu zhing song song ba las yulagyen durgyal du phyin nas/ de der phyin nas rgyal pa gtum po rab snang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs par byas so// yul dpa' rab tu song nas rgyal po khomar
ka dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas par byas so// skye ba phal po che yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dadang ra byas so// de nas phyizhig na yul dpa' rab kyi rgyal/
zhwapo 'char ka'i btsun me la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon ba dang/ bu gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i datsas ston rgyas pa ra byas nas/ ming
sa na zhes bya bar btagasaso// de nas khye'u sar nu bom dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skyod drag
bar gyur to// de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/ rgyal rigs spyi pi nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha dad pa'i
'di lta ste/ glang po rab zhon pa dang/ rta bzhon pa dang/ mtshon na bcang ba dang/ 'phong dang/ mdun du banub dang/ phyogs 'badang/ g.yul 'a sa shar pa bya ba dang/ lcags kyus gzung
ba dang/ gas pas gzung ba dang/ mda' ngo ma 'phang ba dang rdorje tsagacigab gar ba dang/ tshon rtse gnag tu gdab pa dang/ 'khor la 'phong ba dang/ gcod pa dang/ gshogs dang/ lag pas
gzung ba dang/ rkang pa'i stangs dang/ mgob bskyab pa dang/ rgyang mar 'a dang ba dang/ sgra grag par 'phang ba dang/ gnad du'aphung ba dang/ gdon na za bar ga par bya ba dang
tshabs cher ga tang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas/ gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to// de nas phyi zhig na gzhon nu sar tshatshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na'i bu la bananas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la/
dad pa red de/ skyabs su 'grob dang/ bsub pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ de nas des bltasan panon dang chos ma yin pas rgyal de khyadapa mthong ngo// de nas des bsams pa//
yab nongs pa'i 'og tun bdag rgyalasar 'jug par 'ong ste// bdag la rgyal srid mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la/ chu bo rnams 'a sa bal bar bya ba dang
sgyur pa rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad bar bya'o snyam nas/ yang shu ma 'a gsol te/ modang ldan pa ka ta ya na'i bu'i thad du rab tu byung ste/
bsnyen par rje gas so// de nas tshudang ldan pa ka t+ya yana'i bus bsams pa// 'di yul 'dis bkaradagos snyam nas/ da khrid de yul gyen du rgyal du song nas de na 'khodado// danas
phyi shog nanedang ldan bas ran sngare tshes gos dang sham thabs gyon te/ lhung badred thogs nas/ grong khyeragyen du rgyal du bsod snyoms la song ngo// de yang spyodayul gyi rgyus ra shesal/
lam po che dang srang gi rgyus la mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ d mthar gyis bsod snyoms rgyu zhing song song ba las rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi pho brang gi chab skor phyin nas/ nub sgo ba rnams med pa 'i
@#// skabs su de rgyal po 'i pho brang ginang dusong nas/ de rgyal po datsun mo rnams kyis mthong nas// gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te lus kyi sha rgyas pa ra
shA 'dug ge/ de nas de mthong ma thag tu de dag de la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ de dag gis bsams pa// dge slong 'di 'di ltar gzugs mdzes shing na so gzhon la// tshangs pa ra spyod
pa la yang gnas so snyam mo// de nas de dag dga' bar gyur bas/ da'i stan bshams te 'dug tu rgyug na/ bza' ba dang da/da' ba ga ngas ngo ma bzung po mang pos tshim parubyas nas/ tshe dang ldan
pa sa ra tsa bskor to/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir gungal bzhag ge/ de nas de na 'dug nga'i skabs su nga gtum po rab snang btsun ma'i 'khor du 'ongs so// btsun mo rnams kyi lugs kyis//
gang gi ri rgyal po btsun ma'i 'khor du 'ong ba de'i tsha langs te bsur 'gro ba yin na/ de rnams chos nyan pa la 'dunames nas ldang ba dang/ bsu nga yang ma byas so// de nas rgyal po gtum re
rab snang gis bsams nga/ mal dag btsun mo rnams kyis ma bsu ba 'ditsalas gyur snyam nas/ rgyal pos do 'phrigs te/ debros bzhin du btsun mo'i 'khor du song ngo// de der song ste bltas
na tshedang ldan pa sa ran btsun mo rnams kyis bskor ba mthong nas/ rgyal po de lhag par yang khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa skyes te/ de khros nas bsams pa// dge slong gis nga'i chungam mthong gis
med desnyam mo// de nas des bsams pa// re zhig 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba yin nam/ 'on te 'dod chugs dang ma bral ba yin brtag par bya'o snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan ba sa ra na
la smras pa// nubyed dagra bcom pa yin nam/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma yin no// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod phyir mi 'od pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ rgyun du
zhugs pa thob pa yin nam/ 'du shes med nga du shasamed min skye mched dang/ rtsi yang med pa'i skye mched dang/ rnam shes la thug yas skye mched dang/ nam mkha' mtho' yas skye mched
thob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan dang po thob pa yin nam/ des smras pa/ rgyal po ron ngo ma yin no// de nas rgyal
pos bsams pa// dag slong 'di 'dod rags dang bral ba ma yin la/ 'dir khan po dang slob dpon gyis ma bslabs kyis/ ngas 'dibaslab par bya'o su ma nas nam ring ba rnams bos te//
da lcag gis zhen par gzhus tegatang ngo// de nas re lcag gis gzhus pas pags pa ral nas khros tabasams pa// bdagamanyes par dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum pa 'dis brdabs kyis//
bdago pa'i yul du song la/ pa'i yul du 'dug ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te song la/ dus ngan pa'i rgyal po rgyal po gtum po 'di rdul bton te btang ngo snyam me// tsho/
dang ldan pa kat+ya ya na'i bu ga la 'dug pa der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa// mkhanango bdagam nangs par dus ngan
pa'i rgyal po rgyal po gtum po des brdabs pas// bdag pha'i yul dumachis te/ der mchis nas dpung gatshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te mchis la/ dus ngan pa'i rgyal de rgyal pagadum
pod=pa bton te tang gis/ bslab pa'i ga'i rnams bzhes su gsol/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa// bu khro ba'i dbang du ma 'gro zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung bas na 'jig rten/
gyi chos brgyad de/ rnyed ba dang/ ma red pa dang/ grags pa dang/ grags pa ma yin pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ smad pa dang/ bde bdang/ stug bsngal thams cad bzod par
bya'i 'asam gsungs sam zhes byas te/ gnas brtan des de la lan du ma bkag kyang dgagog ma nus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na'i bus de la smras pa// bu de ltar khyod khro 'dod na/ da ltar
gnam sras su che ste/ lam naseng ge dang/ stag dang/ gzig dang/ drod me rnams kyis 'jigs pa yod kyis// donub kyi tshul 'dir 'dug la nang par song nag nyes byas so//
denas des smras pa/ maran bsaji skadabaka' stsal pa ngan na 'tshal lo zhes byas na/ de gnas brtan de dang gnas rang gcig tu nyal ti/ tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na'i bus de bzlog pa'i phyir de
phyin gyis brlabs te/ tsunas de nyal ba'i rmi lam du des bslab pa phul te/ pha'i yul du song nas phas de rgyal srid la dbang byed du bcug ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi byin nas 'di
skad ces bsgo ste/ khyod kyis thog ma kho nar las su bya ba na dgra tshar gcod bar gyis shig ces byas nas/ dethos ma thag tu des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/ rgya' pa gal
bo rab snang gi yul du dmag drangs pa las// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de g.yul du pham par byas te/ thug par gyur nas rgyabakyis phyogs par byas te/ gson por bzung nas gson du
btang ste/ degashed ma'i mi rnams kyis khrid de bsad pa'i sar phyin du khyab dang/ des bltas na rmi lam nyidan/ tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na'i bu grong khyer gyen du rgyal na bsod snyoms byed cing
'dug pa mthong nas/ des khus btab sta mkhan po bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol// bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang/ srog 'phangs pa sbyin par mdzad du gsol zhes zer zhing 'dug pa mi
lam du mthong bar byan gyis brlabs so// de nas de des skrag nas sad kyang/ rmi lam la yang dag pa tsam du 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na'i bus de lasmras pa//
bukhyod kyis rmi lama mthong bar zad kyis/ ma 'jigs shig/ de nas de thos ma thag tu sa ra na dga' bar gyur nas/ sems pa la zhugs te/ sa ran zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid yin zhing 'dug/
/ la bdag gisanasems can gtsug la yang 'tshe ba ma byas na/ do bdag khro ba'i dbang du song ste/ rmi lam du yang skye bo mang po de snyed bsad kyis/ don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu
wA/ bdag gas btang ngo snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan des de'i yid skyo bar rig nas/ derang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des n sa ranas stan de nyid la 'dug pahin du nyon mongs pa thams
cad spangs te/ dgra com pa nyida mngon sum du byas so// de nas rgyal re gtum po rab snang gis bdag gis dge slong lcag gis gzhus pa gang yin pa de rgyal de 'charaka'i bu yin/zhes shes
nas/ de'i thad du song ste/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzodar ra gsol te/ de nyid las brten nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na'i du zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so// de
nas phyi dgan modang ldan pa ka t+ya yana'i bus bsamasang/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti skyes kyis gcod dgos snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sa ran dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo//
denas redang ldan pa sa ra na ji ltar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thosaso// thosanas kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sa rananas las dung gyis na//
las de'i rnam par smin pasuphyaganying nor mang la 'a sa spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las nu bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis lcag gis gzhus la/
[ral]'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/ mimanyes par ma bgyis nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab du byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom
pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags te/ ngage slong dag stan byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/
grong khyer wArA nas ni/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal pa byed do// phyi zhiganada'i btsuname 'a khor gyis nam ring byas te// skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba las/ rgyal po gnyid kyis leg go/ bud
med rnams zhine tog dang 'bras bu la sred pas de'i btsuname rnams skyedamos tshal dar phan tshun rgyu pa la zhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rtenadum 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang sangs
rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ste// rang sangs rgyas shig skyed mos tshuladar mtshan mo dgongasaM mal btab nas 'u samadzesar dang sems mdzes pa de budamed de dag gis mthongonas/ mgrong na gtu
de la dga' ba skyes so// dga' bsnyes nas nad pa la phyag 'tshal te// chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod de// de nas rgyal po des d du/ datsun me'i 'khor mi snang nas/ khros te ral gri rnono
]de bgos nas/ rjes gar byung ba'i thog tu song ba las/ rgyal po des rang sangs rgyas de datsun mo'i 'khor la chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dag srung gis pa'i chung ma mthong
ngo snyam ste/ de lhag par yang khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa skyes te/ dus nam rung 'khor rnams la bsgo ste/ radasangs rgyas de lcag gis zhen par gzhus te btang ngo//
klu/ de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa// nyon mongs pa 'din smras shing nyams par gyur te/ 'di gtan du 'khyams na mi rung gis/ ramada' bya dgos so snyam bsams nas/ nam/
mkha' la 'phags te/ 'bar ba dang/ lamamer 'dug pa dang/ mar 'bab ba dang/ glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du
dad par 'gyur te/ da mthong ma thagatud la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas// sdong po srog las bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ skal pa chen
po dang ldan pa mar spyan/ bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drongs shog ces byas so// de nas rang sangs rgyas de de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyi'i sa la babs nas/ des de'i
rkangang la phyag 'tshalo tabazod pa gsol nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yo byad thams cad bstabs te/ skyed mos tshal de nyid du yal ga dang/ lo ma'i spyil re phug nas/ yo byad thams
cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas phyi zhigan rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa// bdag la lus khel ba 'di ni dgos kyis/ bdag ni bamya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su 'gro bar bya'osnyam
da nas 'bar ba dang[0f10 ]lam mer 'dug pa dang/ mar gad pa dang/ glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po des de sku gdung la mchod pa
byas nas/ sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/ mchod rten la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa// kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas ra 'i las

'di bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gis phyir yang bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bde dang der phyagatsang nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs
su skye bar shog cig/ 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mimanyes par byed nga ra mgyur tsagi/ de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung
nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubyed nga ra gyur cigaces byas se/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshergyal po rungs pas byin

zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa din sa ngag 'di khon yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas la gnod pa byas pa'i las de rnam par sman ra sa gang dang gangadu skyes pa derang dor lus la lcag gis gzhus bsalcag 'og tu
shanas/ 'disang rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa nga lta bu mnyes par byas te/ mamanyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ tonamong
pa thams cad skyangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas so// gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung ra ba la 'dirab byung nas 'das
g+ha tshegacig tu tshangs bar spyad de/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ daltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// ri dgas kyi gartul zhugs can zhes bya ba ni/ grong
gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yul ba ti ha'i ljongasan/ ririgs kyi brtul zhugs na'adigs kyi pags pa gyon zhing ru thogs pa 'a rags rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsa ba shing chu ba byung
! ba lnga brgya tsam zhig bkod de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasabagrod nga gtsugabu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes la/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gnag
ba gsum la mkhas ba/ mi 'jig pa bzhis mi 'jig pa/ 'gro ba ltar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mchedadrug la mkhas pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam
par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtanapa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs
pa rnams n chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'ja rten la gzigs te/ sun rgud/ sun dar/ sun phongs shing
'dug/ sun nyamang bar gyur/ sun gnod pa dang ldan/ sun 'phongs pa dang/ nyam nga pa dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ muni ngan song du gzhol/ sun ngan song du 'bab/
sun ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ marasi dang/ thar ba dang/ 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ sun nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas dwang bar
kyi sun 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las skyed par bya/ sun dgopa'i
rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin palas yongs su smin par tu sun dag pa'i rtsa ba rnams yongasasusmin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su lani sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan
pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras
rnams la// sangs rgyas dusalas yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ dgas kyi rtul zhugs can lnga brgya po rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab po
snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can de rnams kyis ri dgas de dag rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro ba mthong l/ mthong nas de rnams kyang ri dgas
de dag dang lhan cig tu rgyu la de 'i khab tu bgro bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so// de nas re dgu der song nas/ ra ma ldan 'das kyis stsal pa'i ri dwags dedagami
snang par byas so// de nas skye bo phal bo de dag gad rnams mthong nas rnam par skyod par byed do// de ltar smadunas de rnams rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ 'dama'atshal logs su nus
so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la thugs rtse ba'i phyir mdun du bzhugs so// de nas ri dgas kyi brtulatshugs can lnga brgya bo de dag gis sdug ring po zhig nas bcom ldan
'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dongastelha gnas / bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'iphyir spyan sngar 'khod de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bgal nyal ba dang/ khams dang/
shes pa dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ dadang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des nar dgas kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa mngon
bar rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ dedag gis bden pa mthong nas/ datsomaMldan 'das la'adi skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdagatsug lag
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thong turung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nangs par spyod pa spyad
rar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshu ra shog ces bya ba tshig gis rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzadran s/ de dag la ludayang phog ste/ de dag gis kyang
brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// datsun padage slong 'di rnams kyis nu bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ri dgas kyi na lugs su mchisal/ ri dwags rnams dang lhan
cig tu rna bu zhing chu 'thung bar gyur nas/ 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes pa ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
nas nyon mongs pa thams cud sbyangs te/ dgra bcom panyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di rnams nyid kyis
lasabyas shing bsags te/ dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'dasaba'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skyo dgu 'tshol nyi bri thub pan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigab dang zhabs
su ldan pa// bdabar gshegs pa// 'jig rtenamkhyen pa// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyuran/ bla na med pa/ lha dngami rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste// de dag slong gi dge 'dunamang po dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs b las rgyal bo'i khab tugashegasaso// degan
rgyal de 'i khaban dka' thub kyi gnas shig na brag bu 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bram ze'i
khye'u rnams la smras ng/ khyed 'od srungs kyi dge slong ri dwags bzhin du rgyu ba 'di dag la ltos/ badri rnams gnas med de/ gang dga' bar rgyu bar byed do zhes byas so// de nas phyi
zhig na bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyedanas/ dobram ze'i rtsa 'dedag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus 'od srungs kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo// de
dag der rab tutsung nas/ tshe gcig tutshangs bar spyad pa spyad pa las/ yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob nas/ de dag gis 'chi kar smon lam btab pa// 'di ltor bdag cag
gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa sbyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang m thob kyis/ yang dgag
par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyisakhram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gisamanyis bar byed r ra gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed po
mgyur cig/ de pona'i stan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cud snangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/
slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'itshadag slong lnga brgyur gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can 'di dag khon yin// de rnams kyis der dge slong rnams la tshig/
rtsub po smras pa/ 'di dagani ri dgas bkon du rgyu'o zhes byas pa'i las de'i rnam par sman pas tshorabs lnga brgyar ri dgas su skyes nas/ da ltar srid pa tha ma dang/ gnas
bam ragyur pa'i bar du yang ri dgas kyi malugs 'dzin par gyur te/ de rnams kyis der tshog tsag tu tshangasapar sbyod pa spyad nas/ 'chi karasmon lam btab ste// yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khyabu bla ma lung bstanang gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ ma mnyes par byed par
mgyur cig/ de khon bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs ba thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sumadu byed par gyur cog ces byas pa des na/ dge slong
dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang shin tu mnyam pa dang/ shugs mnyam pa dang/ mdzad mnyam pa dang/ thabs mnyam pa brnyes bar
shA ranas/ 'di rnams kyisang mnyes 'dabyas te/ mnyes par byas las/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom nyid mngon
sumadu byas so/ zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ glagazhimanyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba zla ba bde zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ des
thubs zur bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/ da de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dag la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhogan de'i chung ma la buchugs nas/ de la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu zhig
rgya skyes te/ gzhung gyis rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam rbar yad ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas des khyim thab la bsnyadado// jo bo bdag la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/
bdag gzhung gis rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam zer yang ci ma rung snyam bgyid de zhes byas so// bram ze de yang ltas la mkhas pa zhig/ de'i blo skyes ng/ 'di lton 'dug pa'i
sems can de'i mthu yin te/ des 'di'i yid la 'dod pa de lta bu skyes so snyam mo// de nas zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes ba zhig btsas
te de'i btsas ston rgyas bar byas nas/ dulo 'di'i ming jiskad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ bu ma 'di zla ba bu deng ngu meyan pas na/ bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdagasas
zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo zla ba 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang zhunamar dang mar gyi snying rus bskyed bsrings te mtshonang gi pad+mabazhin du skye drag par gyur nas/ gangagi
tshadechen mo gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyim de nyidadu ya gi bslabs te/ da ring po ma lon pa rayi ge'i mthar phyin nas/ des khyim de nyid du pha ma las bstan bcos thams cad lobs te/ gzhung
gis rtsod pa brams cad tshar bcad nas/ des tshig tu bya ba blos so cog lo bas so// de nas phyi zhig na des mnyan du yod pa 'di nyid na dge sbyong go'u ta ma yums cad mkhyen pa// thams cad
gzigs pa yin par bdag nyid las 'che ba zhig yodad zhes thos nas/ thos ma thag tu bu mo de yamtshan du gyur te/ bdag song la/ dge sbyong go'u tam de ci 'dra ba blta bar bya'o snyam ste/ pham

gnyis la gsol nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ bu mo des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes du chu pa'i mtshan sumacu rtsa gnyis kyi legs par brgyan cing smra bar
byas pa/ me lus kyidabyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis btab pa ltatu/ marame gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/ mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pa lta bu/ blo gsal zhing
@#// dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las
byung ba'i sems can gyis dang bo sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba 'dra bo de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi
'phyo'o// dede ltar dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan
sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ shesapa dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang mthunapa'i chos las
te/ dasan bumo zla bstan de nyid la 'dug r bzhin du 'jigatshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsi momathon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcomanas/ rgyun tuzhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des
bden pa mthong nas/ stan las langs ta/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bralom sbyarar btud de/ cem 3na 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob tu rungan/ bdag kyang
0/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs bar spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta ma la gtad nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo/
go'u tamis de rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas/ de'alung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs te/
dgra bcom ba hrida mngonosumadubyas so// dar gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slongs rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong ma rnams kyis las la 'du pa logs shig tu gyis shig ces gsung
pa las/ skye dgu'i bdagam go'u ta mis sor thar pa'i mdo 'don mi nus nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
ta 1 phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gtsug tu'adu gnas / bcom ldan 'das la/ skye dgu'i bdag mi go'u ta mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams kyis kyang las kyi 'dun ma logs shab tu gyis shig/ dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang las kyi 'dun ma legs shig tu gyis shig ces bka' stsalal/ bcom ldan 'das kyisadage slong ma
lanaso sor thar pa bstan/ dge slong ma rnams la ni ma bstan lags na/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis so sor thar pa bstan du gsol/ bdag gis bzung bar 'tshal lags so// sangs rgyas
rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams n tshig re res mos shing chos gsungs mi srid de/ de'i skabs med do// de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skye dgu'i bdag mo ga'u tam
h+pha la bka' stsal pa// kyi go'u tam gtsagi smras ras 'dzu zhus na bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de'i tshe dge slongs zla ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ dag slongamazla bas bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa bstanadu
gsol/ lan cig bka' stsal pas bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slongama rnams l so sor thar pa'i mdo bstan te/ lan cig bka' stsal ras dag
slongam khrungs lobasanas/ des sde snod gsum sang lobs so// tshig tubya ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad kyang thos ma thag tu lobs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de thos pa 'dzin pa
rnams kyis chog tu bstan to// de nas dge slonga rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus dra/ btsun padage slongam zla bas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam
kha smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod pa'i rig sasu skyes la/ 'dis bstan bcos thams cad kyang lobs te gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad nas/ 'dis bcom
ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyesadar ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
sumadudagyesal/ 'dis thos pa thums cad kyang 'dzin nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin b rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa smon lam gyi dbang las gyurato// gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'disapa'i
dusan/ bskal pa bzung nga 'di nyid la skye dgu'i mi lo nyi khri thub ban yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i la lesgyur ba/ banu med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas racom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung ras la 'di rab
tu byung ngo// de gang lasarab tu byung bar gyur ba de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sud kyis shesapa 'dzin pa rnams kya mchog tu bstan to// de'os das der tshe gcig tu tshangs bar spyod
ba spyod nas/ 'chi kar smon lam btab pa// 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la tshegacig tu tshangs par sbyod pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshigs ci yang
[rp]/ ma glob kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis brag de'i khye'u blam lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gisamanyes par byed par
wAgyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyurag de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tubyung nas/ nyonamodos pa thams cad sbyangs te/ ragrabcomanyida mngon sum du byed par gyur cig/ ji ltar

bdag gi mkhan mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyisakhros pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdal kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po des thos pa 'dzin pa rnams
nyid kyi chog tu ston par shog cig ces byas so/// dge slong dag ji snyam du soms/ dab tshayang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsung ba la 'di rag byung ba'i dge slong
mar gyur pa gang yin pa de nadage slongam zla ba 'di kho na yin to/ des der rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ 'chi kar smon lam btab pa des n/ dge slong dag nga yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang shin tu mnyam pa dang/ shugasaMmanyam pa dang/ mdzad pa mnyam pa dang/ thabs manyam pa b.ros par gyur nas/ 'dis ngomanyes/
par byas te/ mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sumaM du byas nas/ das 'di
thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis chog tu bstan to// mi 'am ci gnyis zhes bya ba de la/ mi 'am ci dang po na/ gleng gzhi ma nyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod na
khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyodachog/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas des thabs r
bgor las chung ma blangs nas/ des de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyodab las/ phyi zhigan de'i chung ma la bu nagasanas/ dezla ba dgu 'am bculen pa dang/ bu gzug
bzang zhing brtan sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba// gser gyi mdog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dwaphrul ba'i dbyes che ba// sna mtho pi sna legasapa/
smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te/ de'i nus ston rgyas par byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di mchog tu byadagazugs mdzes te/ r+yad/
gzugs mi 'am ci dang 'dra bsan/ khyabu 'di'i ming mi 'am ci zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u ma'am ni'o ma dang/ zhodang/ ma dang/ zhunamaradang/
mar gyi snying rus bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi bad bzhin du skye drug par gyur ro/ de gang gi tshe mir skyes pa de'itsi/ yi ga dang/ khong rtsis dang/ shod dgod pa dang/
lag rtsis dang/ dbyung ba dang/ sku ba dang/ dgram pa dang/ gosakhartag pa dang/ nor bu brtag pa dang/ rin po che brtag pa dang/ stes brtag/
wA bdang/ sman brtag pa dang/ glang pan brtago pa dang rta brtag pa dang/ gomtshan brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang/ klog mkhasapa dang/ mdzangs pa dang/ bya
pa la gsal ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ brtag ba rnam pa brgyud la byang bar gyur to// de nas grong khyer chen bcug po thams cad du de'i grags pa rgyas bar gyur to// mnyan du yod pa
na khyim pa dgag cheg mo'i bu byadagazugs mi 'am tsadang 'dra ba zhig skyes so zhes grags so/ de nas de blos ma thug tu skye bo phal po tsho la mtshan du gyur ta (deb lta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo// de nas
de byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas drigasanas/ su la yang mi ldang ste/ byad gzugs nga dang mtshungs pa med do snyam// de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa// 'di'i nga rgyal
bsal dgos te/ 'dilab rtsom ldan 'das bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa// busuyang nga dang mtshungs pa med de snyam du khyad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs par ma byed cig/ bu khyod
kyis bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste/ khyod ni de'i brgya'i char yang ma bod/ stong gi char yang mi phodo/ 'bum gyi char yang me yod do zhes byas so// de nas thos ma thag tu de yamtshan du/
0/ gyur to// bdag bas dge sbyong go'u ta ma ches gzugs bzung zhing blta na sdug la ches mdzes pa blta snyam nas/ skye bo mang pos g.yog byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo/
khyobu dos thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyanatsang spabar byas kha/ mo lus kyi dbyingasasu'adugapa lta du ma
lcamar gyis btab pa lta bu/ mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta du/ mchod sdong rin pomasnatshogs kyis smras pa lta bu/ blo gsal zhing dri ma med 'o rnam par dag ba dang ldan pa'isangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de'i byad gzugs kyi rgyugs pas dregs pa de med par gyur to// de nas de bcom ldan 'das lashin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar
gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das pa la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i smyan sngar 'dug donas bamaldan
'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang shes ba dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chudanas/ da dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/ des na khyobu mi 'am ci stan/
di nyid la 'dug pa zhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsomo mthon po nyi shu re shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sumadu byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas bam la gsol
te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des kyang brtsonapa dang/ bsgrub ba dang/ 'bad pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ ragra bcom
panyi d mngon sum dubyas so/ de nas dge slong rnams kyisi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lagasolal/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i byad gzugs
kyis rgyags pa bsal nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug bgrub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra/ da ltar 'ba' zhag ma
yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa bsalanus/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas pa de nyonacig dge
slong dag sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wArAsin/ bram ze zhig gnas bdos/ thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangasanas/ da de dang lhan cig turtse zhing dga' dagu'
spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags te/ de zla ba dgu 'chab cu lon pa dang/ bugazugs bzang zhing blta na skyog la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ da 'o ma dang/ ma
dang mar dang/ zhun mar dang [ã€ ]mar gyi snying khus bskyedabasrings te/ de gang gicher skyes pa de'i tsho/ byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs nas su la yang gasong por smras pa/ phyago
'tshul ba dang/ ldang bar byed do// de nas de'il ma gnyis kyis bsamasar/ 'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pakhasal dgosaso// de ltar ma byas n 'di shi bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/
de'i tshe wA rA NA si'i sa phyogs zhig na drang sronga mngonor shes ra ltadang ldan b/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mchub zhig gnas so// renas bram ze des drang srong da la gsol ba btab pa/ khye'u 'di
khyad gzugs kyi rgyags bsadregasanas/ su la yang gsong bor smra ba dang/ phyogasaM 'tshal ba dang/ ldang ba yang ma bgyid kyis/ khyod kyis de'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa bsal du gsol/
zhes byas so// de nas drang srong des bram bre de la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas bram ze de drang srong de'i thadanas song nas/ bu la smras pa/ bu khyod byad gzugs bdag dang mtshungs pa
med do snyam du byadagazugs kyis rgyugs khur ma byed cig/ dka' thub kyi gnas ga ge mo zhig nadrang srong zhig gnas te/ de lan khyod kyi byad gzugs kyis brgya'i char yang mi phod/ steng gyi char yang
mi phod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de zhes byas so// de nas de la mtshan du gyur to/ de ya mtshan du gyuranus/ drang srong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste/ drang srong des khye'u de mthong nas/ des
khye'u de bas ches khyad gzugs bzang bar bdag nyid sprul to// de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas drang srong de ches gzugs bzang ba dang/ ches blta na sdug pa dang/ ches mdzes pa mthong ngo//
mthongonas kyang de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ drang srong de la yang dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas/ drang srong dag la bder song ste phyin nas/

h+pha rkangang mgo bsaphyag 'tshal te/ dros mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/ de nas des dedang 'thun pa'i chos bstanato/ des na khye'u de drang srong de nyid las rab tu byung ngo// derab tu byung nas
bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lha bskyed do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i ni drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni
nganyid yin no// de'i tshe khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khyabu ma 'am ci 'di khon yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'di'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa bsal nas/ bsam gtan bsha dang mngon par shes pa lnga la
gnas bar byas so// da lta yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa bsal nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/ gzhan yang yang dgapar rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab lo 'di rab tu byung ste/ des 'dir tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pas na/ de'i phyir da ltar rnam par grol bar
gyur to// mi 'am ru gnyis pa'i/ glangagazhi yul ser skya'i gnas ni bzhugs te/ der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yab dang sras mjal bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
05/ nyim gcig na rgyal po zas gtsang gi der bshos gsol lo// phyi nyin ni btsunamo'i 'khod du bshos gsol lo// degang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das btsun mo'i 'khor du bshos gsol nas slar gshegs
pa de ni/ grags 'dzin ma khang thog tu song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas gang gi skabs su mi mthong bar gyur pa de'i skabs su khang thog nas mchongs nas/ sangs
rgyus kyis blugs zhing stan shing bal gyi nang tshangs can 'dra par bsgyur te/ can s de la cung zad kyang mi gnod par mdzad do// de nas skabs de dge slong rnam kyis shes nas/
