dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol// btsun pa grugasaM 'dzin m sa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rang gi srog btang pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis
bka' stsal ba/ daltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i phyi'i 'disaji ltar rang gi srog btang bde nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wA
rANA sin/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byad do// de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskonanas/ ridags gshor dusong ba las/ de lta
lam thub nas dpung gi tshog sakyang logs shig tu lus/ rgyal po yang logs shig tu song ste/ de dpung dang bral nas lus ngal ba dang/ lus sdug bsngal ba dang/ lus zhig par gyur
te nags khrod cig tu zhugs te 'dug go/ nags khrod de nam 'am ci zhig mi 'am medang lhan cig tu pi wang thogs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyodad// de nas rgyal
ba des de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu rgyal bo dam rim rtse mo dil na tuchags par gyur te/ de 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyunas/ mi 'am ci da dug mdas gnad du bsnun te/ de phyogs de nyid du
shi'o// de nas rgyal po des mi 'am cidi bsad pa'i 'og tu/ mi 'am ci mo'i thadadu song ste smras pa// bsrung ma tshur shog/ bdag cag gnyis dga' dgur spyad par bya'o// mi 'am rums
smras pa/ khyim bdagashi ba gi mdun na 'dug bzhin du bdag khyodarang ji ltar dga' dgur spyad lta bya/ re zhig 'di'i rus bu la mchod du byas nas/ de'i 'og tu khyedaji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o
zhes smras nas/ des nga rnams bsdus tu spungs pa'i steng du mi'am tsu'o rus bu de bzhag nas me btang ste phyogs gtsug tu 'dug ga/ de nas gang gi tshe rus du bsregs pa'i shing de dag la me'abar
bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi 'am ci mod nyidi me'inang dumachongs nas de der shi/ de nas rgyal po de re thag chad nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gis don gzhan bsam bsam
nas du lob par gzhan du gyur kyisamed// mo 'am rume spyad snyam nas// bdag gisasregachags gnyis bsad do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de ni chami'i
06/ gyur pa byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'in mi 'am ci mor gyur pa gang yin bden grags 'dzin m 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis nga'i phyir
bdag nyid yongs su btadal/ da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo// las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs so//
bam ro sum cu pa// sdoman/ gang po mchod sbyin 'olo can// mgon med dang ni nyam chung ba// pad+ma gnyis dang lta ba dang// rin chen nor dang stobs 'phrog pa
ga/nga po nidon gzigs rung// stobs brtson rtsal dang mya ngan med// mthuna mdzad dang ni pad+ma yin// bla ma gnyis dang legs mthong dang// na chen gtsug tor chu
rlabs dang// rnam par rgyal ba thama'i// zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'o// gang po zhes bya bani/ gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khabag bzhugs te/ bon
lho phyogs kyi 'a'o ljongs na/ 'brugs kyi grong zhigan/ bram bu che zhing mtho btsugatsing nar mang la longs spyodacha ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang/
mnyam nga/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran ba/ byams pa'i rang bzhin can snying rje dang ldan pa// sems can la mnyes gshin pa// sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba gang po
bya// zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de khyim na gnas pa dang/ rab tu byung ba rnams dang/ slongar thams cad la gtong zhing sdud par byed de// dus dus su mchod sbyin gyi/
gnas bcas nas mchod sbyin yang byed do/ das mchod sbyin gyi dus shig la bab de'i tshe/ bstan bcus thams cad kyi gzhung rnams la rtagatsang gang gang gi lta brtsi'odra ba zhig snyam
ste des gzhung de dag yid la khazha gnas asems pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ yongs su rtog par byed do// de nas phyi zhig na khram ze des mchod sbyin bya bar brtsamasanas/ mchod
sbyin byed pa der ston pa thams cad 'dus par gyur to// bram ze des kyang ston pa thams cad kyi gzhung yid la bzhag nas/ sems pa la zhugs pa las/ lta ba'i rnam pa dadag la
samasamagular ma gyur to// donas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khaban gnas pa'i dgebasnyen rnams kyis bram ze de'i man du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod d// de nas deb+bes ma thag tu bum
zade bcom ldan 'daso la lta 'dod par gyur to// de nas phyi zhiban de'i blo skyes nga/ dgosbyong bram ze stong phragadum bdag gi mchod sbyin la 'ongs nas longs sbyod par byed la/ bcom ldan
'dus go'u ta ma de ni mi 'ongan/ mad yang bdag ga mched sbyin la 'ongs te longs spyod par byed kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze do'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen
07/nas dgongos ba/ bram ze 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldogarang sems skyed par 'gyur la/ de khon las brten po bdag gis skye bo mang po la lan gdags so
snyam dud gongs nas/ dge slong mang posazham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ bram ze de la thugs brtse ba'i phyi'i brags kyi grong khyer der gshegs so// bcom ldan
'das der gshegs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te mal bdag gis ci nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas der mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang/ skye bo mang po gzhan rnams kyis bdag gcig bu mthong al/
dge slong gi dag dun rnams sus kyang ma mthong ba de ltabur byon gyis brlab bo snyam dudagongosate de ltar byin gyisabarlabasazhasamachod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so// donas bram ze
des thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'dasa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom lda'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legasaso/ bcom ldan 'das tshul
gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnasasu mchod pa rnams longs spyad pa mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis nga'i lhung bzo
'di bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dag gis ma bkang gi bar du longs spyod par mi bya'o/ khram ze des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das go'u tam ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gso'o nas
00 @#// bram ze des rtsod sbyin byed pa de ba bza' bdad pa rtsa' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po la shams pa de dgablangasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gang bar byas nas/
dag ngo ma nus nas des nga rgyalakhaskyed de/ bdag gis lhung bzed 'dim gangadu ma gtang ngo snyam nas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' bas
dgang ba la brtson par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'adasaM kyis dgongs// dan kha zas 'dis dgeslong stong gi zan chogagosnyam nas/ lhung bzed da gangapar bstan to// de nas bram ze des
bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gang bar mthAng nas/ dga' bar gyur tegasol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bltams lags kyis/ bcomaM ldan 'das go'u tams ni bder gsol cig ces dus
so danas bram ze de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nyid du dge slong stong gi stan sprul te/ chu ra rnams bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'dus gral gyi gtsor bzhugs so// dge slong
rgyu gzhan rnams kyang rgan rims bzhin bkod do// de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs nas/ 'gram mkhan rnams kyis srims so// de nas bram ze des kyang de dag thams cad
mthong nas/ mthong m thag tu bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ dge sbyong go'u tam 'din rdzu 'phrulache zhingamatshurtse ba yin na snyam ste/ de dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhapA
la mgores phyag 'tshal te gsol nas blab gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mdage slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i n bzabudang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims mdang/ gdan/
dang lhunagasos dang/ smanazong rnams sbyar bar 'tshalan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bram ze de la cang mgasungabs
gnang ngo// de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ rgyal bu rgyal khyed kyi tshul du yo byad sbyar te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla
pa gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyenapo kur byas nas/ tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs bdag slong dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
na bza' 'bum ra ba phul lo// dge slong gzhan dag la yang de la ras zung re phul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'disan bdag 'gi
can long 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
po skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyurab/ bla named pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze del
bya/ dka' lapa/ bram ze legs so legasaso// bram ze khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa//
h+pha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasasu ldan ng/ bder gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na medang/
lhadang mA rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das ga nga po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de blunamed pa yang dagopar rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tulung bstanang/ mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nyid dumasnang bar gyur to/ 'od ma'i tshal du zhugs par gyur to// mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yodang na bzhugs
te de'i tshomnyan du yod pa na bram cu zhig gnas te/ des thongs zlar bab pa las chungam blangs nas/ dad dang lhan tsug turtse zhing dag la dga' dgu la spyodang las/ phyizhig na de'i chung ma la
pa du chags te/ de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btag
to 'om dang/ zhadang/ mar dang/ tshunamar dang/ mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas/ gang tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ yi ge dang/ bram tsho'i spyod lam dang/
spyod pa dang o zhes bya ba dang/ b+ho zhes bya ba dang/ gtsang sbra dang/ nog dang/ thal ba gleng ba dang/ ru'i ba thogs pa dang/ nges brjod kyi rig byed dang/ mchodasbyin
gyorig byed dang/ snyan tshig gi rig byed dang/ srid srung gi rig byed dang/ mchod sbyin bya ba dang/ mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ blang bdang/ kha ton bya
bdang/ kha ton slob tu gzhugapa'i thabs bslabs bas/ las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/ de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bcobargyad la sbyang bar gyur to/
des bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud nas/ gzhung gis rtse dang thams cad tshar bcad de/ de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha mganyis shanas/ des bsams pa/ byadaM/thugs
dang blos bas bdag dang mtshungs pa yang mdun smug pa lta ga la yod snyam mo// de'i pha yang sngon dus dus su mchod sbyin byed de/ bram zed rnams kyis/ de la smras pa//
khye'u khyod kyi sad dus dusasu mchodasbyin byed kyis/ khyod kyis kyang pha'i 'khas dang 'thun par gyis shig/ khye'u de mare byadagazugs dang thos pas bdag dngo mtshungs pa
medan/ ci'i phyi'i bdag gis 'di dag la sbyin par bya ba sbyin zhes zer ro// de nas thos ma thag tubram ze de dag de la mi dga' bar gyur to// de dag gis phyi'i nad de dang ma 'grul bar
bya// nang khrims bcas so// de yang de dag la ma dga' bar gyur te/ bdag la yon gnas 'di lta bu dag gi kos snyam m// de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das
lha kyis dgongs// bram ze'i khye'u 'dis rgyan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa de byang chub las phyir mi ldogangar sems skyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur to// bram ze gi khyabu de'i khyim du sa bto'anas tshan du 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ste/ des khyim deshog thag tu gsa gzhur
ma'i kha dog lta bur snang bar byas so// de nas de mthong ma thag tu bram zad khye'u de bcom ldan s 'ashin tu dga' bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyigadan/
bshams ta'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'ud la sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i ches de lta bu bstan tu/ des na 'bre'iphyi'u de sbyor dang nya'i 'dod r skyes nas/ de sbyin pa byed 'dod bas//
khacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag pas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag bgyid ra ra rngo thog par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag la mi bdog lags so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gter bstan stu/ de mthong ma thag tu khye'u de btsem ldan 'das la lhag par yang ga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol/
pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'adas dge slong gis dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang/ 'a wanang/ gzimAchadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ sman khongasbyar tshal na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ danas bcom ldan 'das gyis bram ze'i khye'ud lasu mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas bram ze khyi'u des bcom ldan 'das
kyis cangam gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ mnyan du yodapa dang/ rgyal du rgya'abyed kyi tshul gyi bar dumachod sbyin gyi gnas bcas nas/ dril bsgrags te// bdag ya mtshan
can thums cad la mchod sbyin bgyid kyis/ su mchod ston dang yin 'dod pa de dag pa dag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs la longs spyad par gyisashig/ danas bram ze rnams
bram ze sdang ba la bdag cag longs spyod par mi byed ro zhes zer ro// de nas bram za'i khye'us smrasung/ gal te longs spyod ga mi byed na/ bdag gis khyed kyi phyir yon dang ga ba gad yin pa
de dag thams cad bdag gis dge sbyong gi'u tam 'khoradang pa cas pa la phul la bon ston pa la tshangs spyod pa spyod par bya'o// de nas sram ze rnams kyis bsams pa// bram
ze khye'u 'dini ji skad smras ba bzhin du byed pa yin pa san/ des de kho na ltar byed srid de/ de lta na bdag cag yonagyis pham par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i nang
khrims bshi gnas / mchodasbyin gyi gnas su song ste longs spyod do// de nas brum zer kyi 'das zla ba gsum gyi bar du ya mtshan can rnams kyi bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po sbyar nas/
thamasacad la yo bya mang po khul te/ thama'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams zhal bus ro brgya dang ldan pasatshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nal ba 'bumar
dang phul lo// dge slong gzhan rnams la yang re re la yang ras zung re phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyimadog lta bu'i mtshan gyis brgyan ba mthong nas/ thun med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kyem dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'drenapa mod pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamed dra/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces sa so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u de'abaka' stsal pa// bram ze'i khye'u legs so legs so// bram ze'i khyabu khyod ma 'ongs
pa'i dusan/ 'jig rten leng ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa d bzhi pasasuldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa//
'jig rten mkhyanar// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur/ blun mudar// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes gsungasanas/
bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs so// la lo can zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yodapa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor
mang la longs spyod chog/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu 'i nor dang mnyam pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar bab
ba las chung ma blangasanas de de dang lhan cug rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhigan de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla bdagu bam bcu lonapa dang/ khye'u gzugs
bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/ 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar
dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas/ mtsho'i nang gipad bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// khya'u de lo lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig ste/ khri la nyal zhing khri las ldod du mi btun gnas
[n ]/// pha ma gnyis kyis/ de la dris pa// bu khyod la lus kyi nad dam/ sems kyi gdung ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhes byas nas/ de lo'i dbang gis de dag la cung zad kyang
sgyur ma btub nas/ pha ma gnyis kyis de sman pa la bstanan/ sman ba nare/ 'di la lus kyind kyang ci yang med la/ sems kyi gdudang yang tsayang medakyi/ la la la nas khri las
ldeng du mi btub par zad do zhes zer ro// de nas de la pham gnyis kyis lan mang du bsgo ste/ deltar ma byed cig/ khyod 'di ltar 'dug pas bde ba blob ba ra minus so// mi rnams nye bar
'tsho ba na sgrub phod pa'i 'brasabu yin no zhes lan mang durartul kyang de bslangam nus so// de nas phyi zhaganapa ma gnyis kyi sems skyes na// yon gnas dag spyan drangs la bshosagasolan/ de
dag mthong n Sha sa bskyed de ldang yang sridad snyam nas/ dedag gi sa ston pa drug yang dras te zan nanas/ khye'u des de dag mthong yang mal dus so// danas khyim bdag gis bsamasar/
dgasbyong go'u ta man bsod nams can tshepar grags ba/ tshig btsan pa yin pas naabye bu 'dis de mthong n zhe sa bskyed// ldang bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas des khyad nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa
dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/ danyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po sbyaranas/ nang par sngar langs taM/ gdan bshamasanas chu sna bkang ste bzha gnas //
bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshodal bab ste bshos lags n bcom ldan 'das kyisad de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol
zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro tshos gos dang sham thabs gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnamasanas/ dge slongamang bas nyamard byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdag
nas khyim bdag de'i bkadas ga la ba der gshegs tatsananas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de nas khye'u des thag ring zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du'athod la dbang po zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba dang rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa// gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dang la 'khor ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de gus/
par bsgrim pa'i shugs kyis langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pha ma gnyis dang snyan cig tu sangs rgyas
la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/ ci zhod ba bstabs so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sder nigyu/ phyag ni bcabs bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba dag blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod
de [â€¦ ]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ su brtson 'grus kyis ni bla med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur
zhes bka' stsal to// de nas khye'u des bsamasapa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'di ni bzang ste/ bdag gis brtson 'grus zhan pas bla ma'i khyad par thob par mi nus kyis/
ma la bdag gis rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba bsgrubs la/ sangs rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun khakur sti bya'i snyam nas/ rgyumatsho'inang du 'gro ba'i zing sbyar te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang
duzhugs nas/ dasaron po mi'i gling du'agro ba'i don bsgrubs te/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo tsho'i rin grub nas/ mnyan du yodapar 'ongs te/ des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
zla ba gsum du spyan drangs/ yo khyodathams cad sbyar to/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dragoslong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/
ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas lasogs po dug slong gi dga' dun la zhal zas robargya dang ldan pa gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'adas lan bzung 'bum rab phul lo// dge slong gzhan dag la yang de
la yang ngas thung re phul nas/ blon med pa yang dag bar rdo gas ba'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ dgo pa'i rtsa ba 'disan bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pamedabar/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs l/ 'jig rten mkhyen ba/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa
lha dang mi rnams kyisnyan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur tsa'i nyes byas so// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/ khye'u legs so'i gas so// khye'u khyodam 'ongs pa'i
cusan/ 'jig rten long ba 'dren dmed ba ston pa lodirar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba rem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan ng/ bde bar gshegs pa//

'jig rtan mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamedang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rtsal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur phyogasazhes
gsungs so/ mgonamed zas sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du med pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod ba na/ bram zo dbul po 'tsho bas 'phongs pa zhig gnas te//
doyang gso ba mang zhing g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig ste/ des bsams pa/ bdag gis phya ga po gang zhig la brten te 'tsho ba btsal bar bya snyam mo// de nas des bsams pa/ khyim bdag
mgonamed bos sbyin ni snying rje can/ sbyind la sred pa yin te/ des ni bdag la dgos pa thams cad kyis bstud par nus so snyam mo// de nas de'i grib ma dang ma 'khril ba bzhin du de'i phyi
[p]/ khazhin du 'brang ngo// de nas khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin gyis 'phrogs nas dris pa bam ze khyodang la rag las btsayid/ srom zes smras la/ khyim
g+ha bdag ragatsayang las te/ khyod las brten nas 'tshol ba tsal bar 'dod do// de nas de thos ma thag tukhyim bdag mgonamed bras sbyin gyis de'atshog chas thams cad sbyor ba la zhugs so/
denas zhagan de yis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du songang// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi lugs kyisan/ nyin gcig bzhin du g.yog

bakhor lnga brgya dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing phyag bdar byed do// de nas khyi zhig na de'i bya ba zhig byung nas des bram ze demangags te/ dang khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du phyag
bdar gyis shig ces byas nas/ byin bdag desongado// bram ze de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed gyi tshal gyi byed byed pa la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ brag
za'adi blun med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lasaphyir mi ldog par sems skyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tsanas cung bdatsam zhig byi dor byas pa de tsam
yang byi dor byas par mi mngon pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas da de des ga le ngas te nyi ma rangs par thal bar gyur to// de nas des bsams ba/ dani bdag gis mnyan du yod par mi
[z/ ]phyin no snyam nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du dgongs ma la btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadad ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la//

rtsol du rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nad du bram khri de'i nal nyos te/ khyod kyang de'i 'dab tu 'dug la/ des khyod la dris pa de'i lan khyod kyis thob cig/ gzhan yang dge slong rnams la bsgo ba/ dag slong
dgags dgo ba bcub pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa'i tshul gyis gnas par gyis shig ngas bstan mod kyis/ 'on kyang bram ze 'dil snyang brtse ba'i phyir/ sus rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu thob
kyang rung ste/ des rdzu 'phrul de lta bu ston cig ces gyis zhig/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo// de nas tshadad ldan ba kun dga' bos/
dge slong rnams la bsgo ba/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di nang na/ thamagi 'dug pa de'i mal 'chos la/ de'i 'dab tu 'khod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas de dan 'dug pa la dag slong
rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag ston pa la zhugs so// de nas bram ze des mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 'dis ra/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di
ltar rdzu 'a phu'achi ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag su dag cegi/ tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyanathos rnams yin// de nas bram ze des/
@#// khams pa/ slob pa rnams kyang 'di lan ltar tshunasum tshogs pa dang ldan na/ dag sbyong go'u ta ma ltatsasmos te/ de'i 'dra ba zhig gu snyam mo// de nas/
wA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i sems bskyed do// khyam srod lan rgyal po chen po bzhi da la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so/ nam byed na lha'i dbang po brgya byin nga la ba lta ba'i phyir
'ongs na legs// tho rangs nami mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongasan lags so snyam du dgongs so// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyodapa'i 'phral 'phral
du rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ mi mjed kyi ba dag be tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas bram ze des mthong nas/ tshedang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la dris pa// btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di 'dra ba 'di dag su dgacig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa// 'di dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dad/ lha'idabang
bo brgya rgyun dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no// de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar
gyur to/ mir gyur pa la yang 'di lta bu'i gnas thob pa med pa lta/ kye ma bdag kyang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas basam
kha gnas 'di lta bu ni yid smon du byas pa tsam gyis 'grub par ma 'gyur gyis/ mal bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byos la/ sman med pa yang dag
khar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gdab bo snyam nas/ namanangs pa dang/ brtsou0f00ldan 'das kyi zhabasa'amago bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan du yodapar chas so// khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang g.yog 'khor lnga brgya rang rgyal bu rgyal khyed kyi tshul du dong ste/ khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin gyis thag ring po zhig nas bram ze de mthong ngo// mthong
nas kyang bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyul byed kyi tshal du deng ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lta cung zad ci mthong/ de nas brom 'dis khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin la thams cad bsted do// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bram ze la smras pa// bram ze khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de lta bu dag mthong na/ khyod
'dod par gyur/ bram ze des smras pa// blan med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod mod kyi/ khyim bdag 'on kyang gnas de lto bun yid smonatsam gyis 'grub par m
'gyur bsanaM/ bdag gis slonges mo byas la/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag bya bar 'dod do// de nas thos ma thag tukhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
bram ze der nor gyi phung bo chen po byin no// bram ze des kyang sangs rgyus la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
h+pha du yo byad thums cad sgyur nas sangs rgyas la sogs nganAg slong gi dge 'dun lo zla ba gsum gyi bar du e byad thams cud kyis bstun bkur byas nas/ tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sog
pa dag slong gi dge 'dun zhal bros ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'dum ri ba phul lo// dgoslong gzhan dag la yang r ri lan bza'adas zung re
phul nas/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kyi ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'disan bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan r// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyurang/
thun med pa// lhadangam rnams kyiston pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze de la bka' stsal ba/ bram tso lags so/
legasas// bram zakhyadam 'ongs pa'i dusan/ 'jabartan po'i ba 'don pa med pa ston pa modaras/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rigapa dang
[4 ]na pa sa su ldan pa/ bde ba ra gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blunamed pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya/
nganamed cas khyu bar 'gyur 'o zhes gsungs// nyam chung ba zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhim can du yodang na bzhugs te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la mthar gyis du bdun
byun gnas / de dag rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/ 'o ma dang/ zho dong/ mar dang/ zhun ma ra dang/ mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin
du skya drag par gyur to// danasaphyi zhig na khyim bdagamagonamed zas sbyin gyis bsamasang/ bdag gis byas pa 'di dag mdza' sde dag gnad dugazu da nga ra gyug/ de yang dad pa dang/
ldan pa rnams kyi nang du gzudar bya/ mdad ba rnams kyi nang du gzud par mi bya'o// gal tam dud pa rnams kyi nang du btsud par gyur na ni/ 'di dag kyang de dag gis bsten pas//
sangs kyi bstan pa la mi lta bar 'gyur srid do snyam nas/ sangs rgyas pa'i mdza' sde po'i nang du btsud do// de la mdad nga' mdza' sde gong yin pa de dgan gar thabs dang/ gongargyu bdang/
smad 'tshong ma rnams la chags shing 'khod do// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams n dgabasnyen gyi mdza' sde rnams dad/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la lhog par byed
dpa dang/ bsnyen gnas dang/ chos nyan pa la chags shing 'khod de// mnyan du yod pa don bram ze'i khye'u dbul zhing 'tsho ba'i 'phongs pa zhig 'dug pa des bas mas pa/
bdag mdza' sde dag gi nang du zhugs la/ bdag gis de dag las brten nas 'tsho ba btsal bar bya'osnyam nas/ dge bsnyen gyi mdza' sde'inang du 'jug par 'dod de dris pa/ nor gyi bu ngas ji tsam gyis na

khyod kyi nang du 'jug tu dbang/ dedag gis smras pa/ kar sha pa Nalnga brgyas byed kyin dadu 'jug tudabang ngo// bram ze khye'u des smras pa// bdag la ku shab calnga brgya lta ga la yod/ de'i steng du
khyad ni dbang phyag gis chog par 'dug la/ sbyin pa la sregapa yin/ bdag ni dbul de 'tsho bas 'phongs pa zhig yin pas/ bdag gis khyed la der de bsnyad 'bul mi nus so// de nas khyim bdag

mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams kyis smras ba/ gal te khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par byed nani nged kyis khyod la karashapa calnga brgya sbyin no// bram ze'i khye'us smras pa// dge sbyong go'u/
tam de'i yon tan rnams bdag gis mi shesan/ dag sbyong go'u tama'i yon tan rnams ji lta bu yin/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams kyis/ bram ze 'a cu'ud la sangs/
rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod d// de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u des ngs rgyas la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ bdag kyang khyed kyin ng du'ajug par bgyi'o/
bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi'o// de nas mgon med bus sbyin gyi bu de rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u des tshig de lta bu
brjod pa thos so// thosanas kyang de rnams kyis de la kar sha pa Nalnga brgya phrag dum byin no// bram ze'i khye'u de yang de rnams kyin ng du zhugs s// de nas phyi zhog na mdza'asde bo rnams
kyis blo skyes pa// sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs la// yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes zer ro// de'i nangan kha cig na re/ ]
bdag cag kun gyis zla ba gsum thog thag tu de 'ba' zhig byed kyang 'dug ma nus kyis nyin res kyis bshos gsol bar bya'o zhes zer ro// bram ze'akhyilus smras pa// bdaganadabul
la 'tshubs 'bongs te/ nyani res bzung bdelta bu bdag gis mnus so zhes zeraro// dur kha cig na re/ su sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol minus
pado ni// bdag cag gi nang nas gud du byung zhig ces bar ro// de nas bram ze'i khyi'us bsamasab/ bdag gis 'di rnams kyin ng du de 'u ma chud da chudan/ bdag 'di rnams kyi
nan gnas 'byung ngani nam yin no snyam nas smos pa// bdag gi nyin rasamajug tu gyis la khyed kyi lhagarol ci yod pa de dag thams cad bdag la byon cig rnamadza' sde bo rnams kyis smras pa
khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas/ da rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogasab dge slong gi dge 'dun sgrub gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs nas/ nyin res
h+pha kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byadathams cad kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bsnyen bkur byosas// derd dag gi lhag rol ci yod padodag thams cad bram ze'i khye'u la
byin nus/ bram ze'i khye'us dedag thams cad bsdus te/ gzhan dag kyang kar sha pa Nagazhan dag rar la 'bul du bcu gnas / tha ma'i nyin par des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong

yang mdzas par byas nas/ danyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang re sbyar te/ nad par sngar langasanas gdan bshams te/ chur bkang nas/ bcom ldan

su ni'aphags ba'i nor bdun med pa lasa'aphagos ba'i nor bangan gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug bar bya/ sunadage ba'i rtsa ba rnams m skyid pa las bskyed par bya/ sun dge ba'i rtsad
rnams bskyedazin pa las yongs su smin pa phya/ sunadage ba'i chung rnams yongs su smin pa las yongashes kyi mtshon gyis ngartol bar bya/ su la nas nigs rgyas byang ngs/
sku brgyan pa'i'ajig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ rgya mtsho chu srina rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams
la sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis dgongs pa// dadadapon 'disan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
sems skyed pa'i 'gyur ro snyan du dgongs nas/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong mang pos zhum ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun
du bad nas/ sged ting nas man du yodapa 'inang du gshegs pa dang/ dadadapon des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'imtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
rgyu par brgyan cing phra bar byas pa mthong ngo/ mthongonas kyang deng rtsom ldan 'das sangashin tu dga' ba skyes so// dga' ba skyes nusades ran po che myur gyis btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor
nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lding khang lta bur chags 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs n ni 'gro'i// gzhis nani sdodade// de nas ded dpon/
des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ lhag par yang dga' ba skyes so// dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa// zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcos
ldan 'das dgeslong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims tsha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshalan/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnadabar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcomo ldan 'das kyis cang ma gsung bas ded dpon la gnang ngo// de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'dasakyis nang mi gsung
bas gnang bar rig nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yakhyad mas cad sbyar te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yobyud thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
byas nas/ thoma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dga' dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum grwa ba phul lo// dag slong gzhan
dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/ blunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kyem dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston
pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdabar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i
kha lo sgyur ba/ dran med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so// de nas datsom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba dadadapen legs se legs/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan khyed 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston ng med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rig pa dang zhabasasu ldan ng/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blun mdang// lhadungs rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// nor zhes bya bani/ glangogazhi mnyan du yodapa na bzhugs to/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim
bdag gcig gnas pa das/ thabs zlar babang lasacung ma blangs nas/ dred dang lhan cig tun shing dga' la dga' dgur spyodang las/ phyi zhigan de'i chung ma la bu chags nas//
da zla bdagu 'am bcu lon pa dang/ bu gzugs bzang zhing blton sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/ de 'o
ma dang/ zhadang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas/ de gang gi mchor skyes pa de'i tshe yi ga dang/ khong rtsos dang/ shod dgod pa dang/
0 lag rtsis dang/ dbyung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ dgram pa dang/ gas brtag pa dang// nor bu brtag pa dang/ rin po chibartag pa dang/ sbos brtag pa dang/ sman brtag pa dang//
glang po che brtag pa dang/ rta brtag pa dang/ go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ga mkhas pa dang/ klog mkhas ba dang/ mdzangs pa dang/ byub lags l ba dang/ yid
gzhungs ba dang/ brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byung bar gyur to// de nas phyizhigan des zong khyer te rgya mtshodonang du song ba las/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'adzin grub nas phyir 'ongs so//
khyim bdag des kyang khyim bdag mgon med bras sbyin la brtenanas dam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de// skyabs su 'gro bdang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangasaso// de
nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsangam bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/
rtsib zhad pa bstabs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ donas dpom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khamasadang/ shes pa dang/
rang bzhin thugs su chudanas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ danas khyim bdagade 'khor dang bcas pas stanade nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse memathon po nyi shu ye
shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas yang dang yang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing bcom
shA ldan 'das la chos nyan par byed do// bdag gi bu yang drang yang du dran par byed do// kye ma de yang 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa med par gyural/ chos 'di/
lta bu dag kyang shob nan ma rung snyam mo// de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag gi bu de rgya mtsho'i grub cha'i don grubaste phyir 'ongs te/ des skyed mos tshal du rdzas rnams bzha gnas / pha ma gnyis
blta ba'i phyir shin tu 'das par bdag gi khyim du song las/ de'i pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du sang nas/ khyim bdagagi budas pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i/

phyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du song ste/ de der phyin nas bdag gis pha ma gnyis blta bar bya'o snyam pa las/
kyi khyim bdag gi du das pha ma gnyis chos matanapa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ba tsamoldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pha ma gnyis kyi mgul nas 'jusanas/ chos manyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ don bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i mdun du blo yod

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba skyed par gyurab 'i gtamabaka' stsal to// de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de blunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa skyes so// de nas kyis
bdag de bcom ldan 'das las chos b+hes nas bu dang lhan cig tu bdag gi khyim du song ngo// der songanus de gnyis kyis/ bu de la smrasur/ bu khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas bdag cag
gnyis 'du zhig khyer te 'ongs/ khye'us smras pa// rin po che rinathang che ba dag 'tshal te mchis so// pha ma gnyis kyis/ del skyes pa/ bu khyod kyisani rgya mtsho'i nang du song nas/
sdug bsngal steng phrag grangs med pa myong ste/ rin po che rdo mal pa dag khyer te 'ongs so// bdag cag gsana'adod na 'dug bazhin dugs chung dus ran pa ni rin thang can po dgar
khye'us smras pa// 'on tshogs chung dus rnyed pa'i rin pe cha de dag ni 'dra ba blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la bdag cag gnyis kyi yon tan rgyas par brjod
do denas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de lhag bar yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis lamago bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcomaM ldan 'das kyis de'i rkyen du'atsham pa'i chos bstan to// de nas khyim bdag
ga bu des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de/
logasasu shul me sbyor ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge sle gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang
gzims chu dung gdan dang/ snyun gsos dang/ sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshalag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzod du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis cig
bdag gi bu de la cangami gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyis cung mi gsungs gnang bar rig nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad bAms cad sbyar/
! te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dga' dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ bla ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs padag slong gi dge 'dun la
[E, ]zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsel nas/ bcom ldan 'das lan bza' 'bum rib phul lo// dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zungare phul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub du smon lam btabaste/ kye ma dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dasan bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ dran medu nga/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
bag ldan 'das su gyur cigaces gyusaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khye'u de la bka' stsal ra/ khyim bdog gi bu lags so legs so// ma 'ongs pa'i dusan khyod 'jig/
rten la ngor 'dren pa med pa ston pamedangar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs suldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur pa/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi sten pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu rlabs zhes bya bar 'gyur re zhes gsungs so/
stobs 'phrog ces bya ba ni/ glang gnam tan du yod pan pa zhugs te/ de ni byung phyogs kyi pan tsa la 'i rgyal po dang/ lho phyogs kyi ranatsa la'i rgyal po gnyis phan tshun du min/
par gyur to/ dus dus su skye bo phal po na kha 'dog par byed do// deganyis kyi mdza' bo gshes shing btsugs pa ni rgyal pogs la rgyal yin te/ rgyal po gsal rgya'agyisangasams
pa/ bdag gso thabs jo lta bu zhig gis deganyis bsdum par bya snyam nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma dul ba 'dul ba inan/ ma la bdagagis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
ba gdub bo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom
shA ldan 'dus la// rgyal po gas la rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunang byang phyogs kyi banatsala'i rgyal po dang/ lha phyogs banatsa la'i rgyal po gnyis ban tshun ma mthunapar gyur
ti de gnyis kyis dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das nim dul ba 'dul ba lags na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gnyis kyi khon sbyang ba'i slad du nan tan
mdzad par gasel/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa bskyed de
rjes su yid rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thadanas song ngo// de nas partsom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshil nA mi snang bar
gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi yul pa natsaladang/ lho phyogs kyi yul panatsal gnyis kyi bar mtshams su gshegs te bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ches do dag 'grub par sems pa de lta
bur byin gyis brlabasaso// de nas byang phyogs kyi ban tsalarirgyal po dong/ lho phyogs kyi panatsala'i rgyal bo gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yanalag bzhi go bskonanas/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir so so
[a nas dwangasaso// dedag g.yul 'gyed ngor brtsams pa las/ sangs kyis thus de gnyis kas rang rang phum ste ma nus nas/ gzhan gyis thub par mthong ste/ deganyis so so nas shing rtar
de la zhon te/ com ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ci nas
dganyis gcig las gcig ma mthong bar byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di gnyis las gcig ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byun gnas / nyon mongs pa thams cad
snangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// gtsug gis ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par semaMs skyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs
nas/ gtsug la ni phags pa'i bdenang bzhi'i gtam gsungs so// gcig la ni dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sprobar 'gyur pa'i gtam gsungs so// de nas lho phyogs
kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su grwa lame sbyar ba btud do/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol
to btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dage slong gi dngos po thob tu rungan/ bdagakyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste// bsnyen par rdzogs bar mdzad nas
sku de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrubs pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thamasacad sbyangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// byang phyogs kyi pan
tsala'i rgyal po yang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tug zur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudad/ btsemaMldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
blab gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dag slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang (gdan dang/ snyun gsos dang/ snyanu bong rnams sbyar bar
khanalan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang phyogs kyi nganatsa la'i rgyal po lo cang mi gsungs ba'i gnang ngo// de nas byang phyogs
kyi ban tsa la'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das cad ma gsungabs gnang bar ri gnas / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunarang gi yul du spyanadrangs te/ sangs rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yopyadathams cad sbyar nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen pa dur byas te/ thama'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya
dang ldan pa gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'buma'i yul lo// dge slong gzhan dag la yang de rel ras zung re phul nas/ named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam
btab ste kye ma dag pa'i rtsa ba 'disan/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med da ra/ de la zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla named pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas
so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sa/ ngan tsala'i rgyal bo de la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po tshon po legs se legs so// ma 'ongs pa'i dusan rgyal pachen po khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa
ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// padabar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha
le sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar gyur zhes gsungasaso// las brgya tham pa las/ sdom gyi
tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogs so//sdoman/ budangar yi gcongarodaglud// 'thob dang mis bzung gong mgrig/ pa dangamigod shazad ng// dbangapa'i ma go/
tha ma yin// bu zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhim can du yod na bzhugs te/ de'i tshomanyan du med pan/ bram ze gcig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs
ta ded dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing brtan sdug la mdzes pa zhig
btsas to/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btagasate/ 'o mdang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings so// 'dod
ba rnams ni tsha chu dang 'dra ste/ ji tsam bsten pa de tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro// danas phyis kyang mthar gyis bram ze debu gcig nas gnyis nas/ bdun gyi bar du byung nas/ de rnams rigs dang btsun
pa'i mid btags te/ 'omadang/ zhodang mar dang/ zhun maradang/ mar gyi nying khus bskyodabasrings nas/ dedagagang gitshicher skyes pa de'i tshe/ yi ga dang/ bram ze'i spyod lam
dar spyod pa dang/ azhes bya ba dang/ b+ho zhes bya ba dang/ gtsang sbra dang/ chog dang/ thal ba blang ba dang/ ril ba thogs pa dang/ ngas brjed kyi rig byed dang/ mchod sbyin ris khyad
dang snyan tshagagi rig byed dang/ sud srung gi rig byed dang/ mchod sbyin bya ba dang/ mchodasbyin byed du gzhug pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ glang po dang/ kha nabya bdang/ kha ton slob tu
gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/ las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram ze gyur to// de nas phyi zhig tu bram ze des bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste// bram zed 'i khyim na ni yod pa de dag thams cad/
so sor bgosanas bu de dag la byin no// des phyi zhig na bram zad 'i chung ma yang na/ bram zedayang gs tamagAma mthong abar gyur nas/ de bu de rnams kyis khyim de nas bskradade/ dgazhan dag gi khyim
duslong zhing 'tsho bar byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrodang lagacig bu'i lam ston la/ rnam pa gnyis kye shes bya dang ye shes lamanga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres ba'i dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhes mi 'jigasakha/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhasal/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul
ba rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtanang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa// yang dag pa'i sengage'i sgra chen
bsgrigs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug tusangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ sun rgud/ sun drar/ sun 'bod
shing 'dug/ sun nyam nga bar gyur/ sun gnod pa dang ldan/ sun phongs pa dang/ nyam nga ba dang/ gnon pa dang ldan/ sunangan song dugazhol/ sun ngan song du 'bab/ su
@# na dan sodadu bab/ sunangs nasodanas phyung ste/ mtho risadang/ thar pa dang/ 'brasakhul ga zhagar ra bya/ sunas par sbyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las
la gnas drangabarabya/ sun 'phags pa'i bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdunagyi dbang phyug la dwabad byed du gzhug par bya/ sunI dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya
sunodage ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zinab las yongs su smin par bya/ sun deg ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las langashis kyi mtshon gyis brtolo bar@/ sul nisangs rgyas byung bas brgyan
pa'i 'dzig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du yashes gabris pa 'jugago/ rgyu mtshonusrin rnams kyi gnas/ dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//
sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram zedagadul ba'idus la ngob par dgongs nas/ snga dri tshos gos dngasham thabs gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnamA
nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa gshogs na/ bram khro rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs ba/ 'khar ba dang snod thogs shing gzhan
dag gi khyim du slong ba de gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bram ze de la bka' stsalar/ bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa khyed ci'i phyir 'khar ba dang snod bregs shing gzhan gyi khyim duslong zhing/
0 'dug/ bram zes gsol pa/ kye ga'u ta ma bdag gi bu bdun mchis te/ de rnams bdag gis bsod nams bskyed bsrings nas/ thos pas kyang mtharaphyin par bgyis te bzhag nas/
mchis brang dang bcas teng tsams te/ bdag khyoman ci bdog pa de dag thams cad kyabadag gis so sor bgos te stsal na/ da rnams kyis bdag khyim nas bskrad pas na/ 'khar ba dang snod
thogs shing gzhan dag gi khyim du slongazhing rgyu bar bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'dras kyis/ bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram zakhyod kyis nga las tshigs su bcad pa bslabs te kun chub par
byas la/ bu de rnams 'khor gyi nang 'khod la bsgrags par nus sam/ bram zes gsol pa// kye go'u ta ma bdag gis rje thegaches so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su
bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang dag btsas nadagar 'gyur ba// gang phyir nor na kun bsags pa// dudag bdag gis tshems dang sbyog/ bdag ni khyim nas bskradapor gyur// nor zad r

na gang dag gis// bdag srungs de dag bden ma yin// srin po'i bu yi cha lugs na/ phu ba zhes brjod damaM ba da// rtagan khongog 'darab zhin// tshod ya labar gyur pan// gzhon nunams kyi bganazhig/ gzhan
gyi khyim du slong bar gyur// rten la ma phan bu rnams bas// bdag gi 'khar ba 'di gdam ste// 'khar ba yi niyon tan mthus// baglang brdung zhing 'ong bdang// sbrul dang ci zazlog par ]
khyed mun pa'i nang na mdun du 'gro// yang 'i gnas su tshod kyang rig/ brdeg nyos na yang bdag la stog/ de nas bram ze des/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig
zhwa sudacad de bka' stsal ra 'di dag blosanas/ bu rnams kyis 'khor du song ste brjod nas// bu rnams kyis de thosamathog tu pha la bzod pa gsol to/ snga mkho bzhin du khyim gyi bdag por
bzhag go/ de nas phyi yin bram ze des bsams pa/ bdagagadapal dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang nuyang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das go'u tam de'i bka'adrin yin/
ma la bdagagasabcom ldan 'das go'u tam de bshos gsolal/ na thang che ba'i na bza'adabul bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ bram ze des bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/ bza' ba
dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dgag/sel nas/ rin thang che ba'i na bza' phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram zade dag bu de rnams la/ de dag dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/
zla/ da na bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin dub jig tshogs laltaba'a'i rtsa mo mthon po nyi shu ya shes rdo rjes brtsoms/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
byas te/ de'abaden pamang nas stan las langasati/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ bcom ldan 'dasaMgal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul bal rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dag slong gi dngos bo breg tu rungan/ bdag kyang bcom ldan
'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dag slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gsar du phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nus/
del lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dad/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'badapa'i nyon mongs pa thums cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyidamongonosum du byas so//
nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lo gsol// btsun pa bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa 'di bu rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad de/ 'di bcom ldan 'das
kyis thabs dang ldan pas snga mkho'i gnasasu slar sor chud par mdzad nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das po la bzhi g pa lagazigs/ bcom ldan
bdas kyis bka' stsalal/ daltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dusan yang bram bu'adi bu rnams kyis rang gi khyim nas bskrad pa las/ 'dings snga mkho'i gnas su bzhag nas/
bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga lardaltar ganab byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusane/ grongakhyer tsam pazhes bya ba na/ khyim bdag gcig gnas
kya// pa de lo snga phyi'i bu bdun byung nas/ de dag gang gi tshe char skyes pa de'/ brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur nas/ khyim bdag des bu de dag thams cad khyim
phub ste/ de ru bdog pa thams cad kyang so sor bgos nas de rnams la byon// khyim bdag de yang gs shing 'khogs la gtugs pagyuraMnas/ dbu rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad de/ dergas
bzhin du srong khyer te yul gzhan du mas so// de'i tshadaka' thub kyi gnas shigan/ drang srongaju'aphrul che zhing mthu che zhiga gnas ta/ dAka'athub kyi gnas de'i 'dab gtsug tud 'ongasanas/ drang
srong des khyim bdag de mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa khyod ni'i phyir yul gzhan dums te 'gre/ de nas khyim bdag des gatam dadrang srong de 'argyas par bsnyadad//

danas drang srong gis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod ngas can s bu de rnams kyi mchod pa dang rim gro khyad par gyur pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras pas/ drang srong des khyim bdag de phyir bzlog ste/ rangagi
gnas su khrid nas/ drang srong des da'i bu rnams 'dre dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des n buda rnams kyis phad khyim du bsenas sngamakho'i gnas su bzhag go/ de nas khyim bdag des snga
ma'i drin lan bsab pa'i phyir drang srong dakhyim du thon byin nas/ de'i thadadurab tu byung ste/ de rab tu byung nas bsam gtanab dang/ mngon par shes pa ldabaskyedado/

'ad// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshadrang srong du gyur ba byung chub sems dpa' spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de na nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram
za'adi kho na yin no// de'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni du ba de dag khon yin te/ da'i tshe yang 'di rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas/ khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas brabs
dang ldan pa sa snga mkho'i gnas su bcug ste bzhag nas/ bsam gtan bzhidang/ mngon pa rangashes pa lnga la gnas par byas so// daltar yang 'di rgas shing 'khogasal gtugs par gyur
nas khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan pa'i snamakho'i gnas su bcug ste bzhag nas/ g.yung drungag mthar thug pa grub pa dang bdeba'i mya ngan las 'dus pa la bzhag go/ gzhan
yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la 'di'i bu du byung ste/ der gcig tu tshangos bor spyod pa sbyadonas/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da/
ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod par bzhugs te/ dbatshe mnyan du yod pa khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ thabs zlarab ba ba las chung
ma blangs nas/ de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod palas/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ dablab dgu'amagacu lon pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzapa'i ng bstan sdugal
@#// mdzes pa zhig pa dus te/ rigs dang mthun pa 'a mid btagasonas de 'o ma dang/ kho dang/ mar dang/ zhun maradang/ mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te/
g+ha dgung gi tshanar skyes pa de ni/ yi ge dang/ khong gyis dang/ shid dgodapa dang/ lag rtsis dang/ dbyungab dang/ sba ba dang/ dgram pa dang/ gos brtag pa dang/ noradu
brtag pa dang/ rin po mngartag pa dang/ sos brtag pa dang/ sman brtag pa dang/ glang bo ribartag pa dngo/ rta brtag ba dang/ go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa
dang klog mkhas pa dang/ mdzangs pa dang/ bya ba lags l ba dang/ yid gzhungs bdang/ brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to// de nas phyi zhigand phasamadza' sde rnams
kyi nang du btang ngo// mdza' sde bo da rnamasnyan lta ba dang/ 'dod pa tha dad pa phan tshun mi mthun par snag pa stag/ gangod gang la dga' bde dag de'i sngags parjod par byed do// khyim
bdag gi budanurang bzhin gyisamadzangs pa zhig ste/ thams cad kyi gzhung lugs 'drinapar byed na/ lal duwar/ la latsazir bar gyur nas ( lta ba'i rnam pa dedagama'adod cing mi bzod
rungarar mi 'dzin to// danas phyi zhig na dag bsnyen zhig gas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags ba yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du brjod nas/ dablos ma thag tu khyim bdag gabu des dris pa/ sangs rgyas/
zhes bya ba'i sgra byung pa 'di dag ni sngonam byungan/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de suzhig/ de nas dge bsnyan des de dang 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa brjod de/ des khyim bdagag bu debcom
ldan 'das blta 'dod par gyur to// de nas das thams cad bor tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ chos mnyan pa'i
phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de dang 'thun pa'ices bstan te/ de thosanas khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to// de nas khyim
bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ning rjes su yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas
phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo// de nas phyi zhig nad sbyin pa btang ba'i sems skyes la/ khyim na ni ci yang mi bdog rang mgrong nas/ de'i bye skyes pa/ bdag rgya
mtsho chen po'i nang du sol/ gal te ba dag gis 'ad cig tsam rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrub nus par gyur na yang/ de ltanabade blag tu spyan pa dag sbyar zhing/ bsod nams dag byed nus so snyam

nas[0f10 ]tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu theb sbyar te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song nas/ des rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrubs te phyir 'dzam bu'i gling legs su chas pa las/ de dag la rlung mi
bzad pa byun gnas / des gru bo che de ri'i gcong rong zhig tu btsangs so// de nas rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs phyir log pa dang/ tshongapa dedag 'jigs shing skrag ste// bdag cag
nishi zinano// bdag cag gis srog named zinano// dbadag cag la dka' ba byed pa dang srog 'phangs pa sbyin ba su yod ces 'dzer to// de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa// ma 'jigs
shig ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras la skyabs sudangazhig dang/ des bdag cag 'phongs pa dang/ dgos thug pa dang/ gnodang dang phrad pa las skyabs mdzad par 'gyur
ro zhes byas so// de nas de thos ma thag tutshong pa de dag rnams sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma'ongs pa dang/
da lta byung ba ci yang mi gzigs pa dang/ ma mkhyen pa dang/ thugs su ma chud pa ma mchain/ kyam btsun pa bdag cag 'phangs shing dagos brag la/ gnodar dang phrad pa rnams kyi skyabs
mdzad du gsol/ sroga'aphangs pa stsal du gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cinas rgyu de rang nyid ri'i gtsang rong de nas phyir log ste/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'byung
bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du byung nas/ mthar gyis mnyan du yod par dong ste/ mnyan du yodapar rdzas rnams bzhagaM
nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bder deng ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldanu'adas kyi 'du la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag la dka' ba mdzad mdzad pa lags/ srog 'phangs pa stsal ba lags so zhes gsol nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar nga khodad// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ shes pa dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ dodang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na ded dpon/
lasogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'iri'i rtsamo mthon mi nyi shu yongashes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang (bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge
slong gi dngos po thob tu rungan bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// donAs bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dag slong tshur shog ces bya
ba'i tshig gis rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de dag la lung yong phog ste/ de dag/gas kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bod pa'i nyon mongs pa
thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dedag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bod bar
mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lagamathil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsanadan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par/
gas pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur stel mi lta ba/ dbang po dang 'dabang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjedapa
dang gus par skya ba'i gnas su gyur to// danas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams dadadapon 'di
las brtan ti/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigasapa chen po las bskyabs nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/ bam ldan/
'das kyis bka' stsal ra/ daltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'dus pa'i dusan yang tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di las brten te/ ngas 'jigs pa chen po bas ngaskyabasanas/
bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rAnas ni/ dka' thub kyi gnas shigan/ drang srong
mngon par shes pa ldadang ldan ng rdzu 'phrul chazhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/ de yang lha ra sin gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos bkur tu bya ba dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ ra mor bya ba dang/ mad

bar bya ba zhig go/ de nas rtse zhig na wArANA sa na tshong pa lnga brgya tsamagyis drang srong de la bsnyabakur byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'inang du deng ste/ de dag gis rin po che'i gling bgrod par sgrubs
nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su mas ra las/ dedag gi gru bo chamatsho'i dus rlabs kyis tha'a' bangasanas/ dedag der 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te/ bdag cag 'tshong 'dus
skabasamed desnyam nas// dedag lha rnams la gsol ba 'debs par byed do/ de nas ded dang don gyis lcas pa/ bdag cagagis lha gzhan dag la gsol ba gdab tsadagos/ bdag cag drang
srong de nyid la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o// 'on tang des bdag cag 'bongasashing dags phyag pa dang/ gnodapa dang phradapa las skyabs byed par 'gyur zhing srog 'bangs pa sbyin par byed do//

de nas de bsam thag tu myong pa ljabargya po dedag drang srong de kho na la skyabs su dong ngo// de nas drangasrong de la dga' ba'i lhas drang srong de la sbrenanas/ drang srong des tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag rdzu 'phrul
gyis rgyamatshe chen po'onang nas phyung ste/ rang gi dka'athub kyi tshal du bkod de// de nas tshong pa rnams kyis bsams pa// bdag cag gson por gyur pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cado ni drod
srong 'di'i mthu yin no snyam nas/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsedanams dag byas nas/ thams cad drang srong de'i thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag der rab tu byung nas/
bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga bskyod do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'itshadrang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de ni nga nyid
yin no// de'i tshaded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de dang/ tshong par gyur pa gang yin pa dedag ni tshong ba 'di rnams kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di kho na la brten nas/
ngas 'jigs pa chen pe las bskyabs te/ bsam gtana bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de// da ltar yang 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di la brten nas/ ngas 'jigs pa chen
pe las bskyabs ta/ g.yung drung ga mthar thug pa grub pa dang bad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i dzegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsungs rab la 'di dag
zla thams cad rab tu byung ste/ der 'odi rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ dbang po rnams yongs susman par byas pa des n daltar rnam par grol bor gyur to//
gludaces byaban/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pan bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod par khyim bdag phyugatsang ner mad la longs spyodachab/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che/ rnamakhres
kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/ rnam thos bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/ dad dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de//
khyim bdag de yang du ma bzhin pa zhig ste/ bu dang bu mo btsas secog 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ khyim bdag de'i bsenan tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa yin te/ des khyim bdag de skyabs su 'gro ba
dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas/ sbyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' byed du bcug go/ de nas phyi zhigan khyim bdag de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba
dgu 'am dacu lon pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/ khyim bdag des bsams pa/ thabs ji ltar byas/ khye'u 'di tshe ring bar 'gyur zhig gu
snyam nas de'i blo skyos pa/ 'bags pa ma 'gags pa 'din rdzu 'phrul che zhing bsod nams dang ldan pa/ che bar grags pa yin pas na/ 'di la bdag gis bu 'di g.yog tuphul na/ 'di'i mthus

mi ring bar 'gyur yang srid desnyam nas/ pha ma gnyis khye'u de tsho dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phulanas de nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du khrid cing gso bar byed l/ dge sbyong gi
lugs su bcug nas/ dge slong dag dang lhan tsageg tu bsod snyoms rgyu bar byadado// de nas de gang gi tshe shed bye bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun khyim du spyan
drangs nas// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang bos tshim bar byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas khye'u de'i rgyud du gsar dngul mang po phul lo//
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod yaMngadagor ra dga' bar mdzad nas/ ga
las bzhings rtagangshegs so// bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/ khyim bdag des khye'u de'i chos gos tshon can rnams phud de/ khyim pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams bskonan// de nas de'i
khyim pa'i gos dang rgyan bskon nortseg mi snang bar gyur te/ mos gus tshon can dadag 'ba' gog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gangag tshon lugs de bsgyur mnus pa de re'i dgamyong
gi cha lugs su 'dug bton dugaso bar byadad/ khyim de nyid duno'u 'dwangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob tu bcug go/ de nas de rang gi khyim der yang dga' ba mad na/
cho gzhan du lta ni smos te/ gtsug lag khang 'ba' zhig tu 'gro 'dod par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag des bu de gtsug lag khang du khrid nas de nyid du gsosaso// de nas des gtsug lag khang de
nyidaru bstan bcos thams cad rtogs bar gyur nas/ de phyir khyim du 'grom 'dodod/ gtsug lag khang na 'dug bzhin du des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des
[z]bden pa mthong nas pha ma gnyis la gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i thad du rab tu byung nas/ bsnyen par rdzogs te/ me dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas lung yang phog nas/ des
kyang brtson da dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs to/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas bsams pa/ bdag gis
gdul bar 'gyur ba 'ga' lto ci yod snyam pa dang/ des bltas na bdag gi pha ma la sogs pa na bu 'dangs gyi grogs po lo brgya 'dul bar mthong nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar
gyur te/ rang gi khyim du pha ma gnyis kyi mdun nas sa brtol tu byung ngo// de nas de mthong ma thag tupha ma gnyis de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i
phyirimadun du'adug go/ de nas des pha ma gnyis kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ shes pa dang/ rang bzhin rtogasanas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/
des na mdo gnyis 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag nyid la 'khodabazhin du 'jog tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon pa nyi shu yi shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
mngon sum du byas te/ bdenang mthong nas skyabasasu 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'o gzhi rnams la bkod de/ sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' yang byed du bcu gnas / khyim de khrogong dang 'dra
bar byas te gzhag go/ des ne'u 'dangos kyi grogs po lnga brgya po de dag kyang skyabs su 'grob dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkodad// dunas
dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag gi bu 'dis las su bgyisan/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cig nor mang la longs spyod re
ba'i rigs su skyes la/ bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis la/ 'di nyid la brten nas pham la sogs pa dang/ ne'u 'dangs kyi grigs pa lnga brgyas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang
'dis mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to// gsol pa// btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon 'am
gang du btab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshalo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dzig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srus zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i ri grong khyer wA rA NA si na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa las/ rtse zhig na de'i bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdugal
mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la dad pa red nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi/
rnams blangs// de gang gi nyin par btsas pa de kho na'i nyin par khyim bdag gzhan gyi bu lnga brgya yang btsas taM/ gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar
gyur to// de nas de dag so so'i pha ma rnams kyis mdza' sde'i nang du btang ngo// danas phyi zhiganadapyod kyi dus su mdza'o sde podi rnams skyedamos tshal du shing ljon pa yal ga 'khrigs
shing me tog rgyas pa'i nang du 'gro 'dod par gyur nas/ zla rnams kyis khyo'ud sngon du gtang bar 'dod de/ khyod sngar song la bza' ba dang raca' ba dag sta gon gyis shigadang/ bdag cag gyud
don dag grub nas 'ong ngo zhes byas so// de nas der song nas bza'ab dang bca' bgatsang ma bzang pamang po dag sta gon byas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'khor
dang bcas pa yang sa phyogs de legasanas wAr NAsir bsod snyoms la chas te gshegs so// de nas khye'u des thag ring po lkog nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'khor
dang nus pa magleng ngo// mthong nas kyang des bsams pa// yona gnas kyi mchog 'di lta bu bsod snyoms la chas te gshegs l/ bdag gis kyang tshogs chung/
dus bza' ba dang bca' bdag sbyar ba yodan/ bdag gis rje yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsolal/ de'i 'og tu bdag gis grogs po rnams kyi
bza' bdang bca' ba gnasbyar bar bya'osnyam nas/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'khor dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal de nyid kyi nad du sbyan drangs to/ bza' ba dang bab/
gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te tsabazhed pa bstabs nas/ chos manyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ donas yang dag par rdzogs pa'osangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis de la
chos kyi gtam gyis yang dagapar bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs gshegs so//
denas khye'u des mdza' sde bo rnams kyi phyir bza' ba dang bca' bgazhan dag sta gon byed pa la zhugs so// de nas mdza' sde bod rnams skyed mos tshal der lhags nas/ bdag cag gi bza' bdang
bca' ba sta gon byas pa dadag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sungs 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo zhes thosas// de thos ma thag tu de dag shas cher khros te/ de/
0dag khros nas khye'u de bsad par byas so// de nas khye'u de 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas/ drang srong smra bar song ste/ des gnasadenas pha ma gnyis la bzlugs te/ pha ma gnyis
kyis 'thabam zhi bar bya b.rubatsal ba las/ tsho bar byedramazhus nas/ tshu'u des tsam gnyis la gsol to// yang dgarar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gosung ba la rab tu byung
ngo de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum longs te/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur nas/ des pha ma gnyis skyabs su'agro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams/
la bkodo nas/ sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'abyed du bcug go/ de nas mdza' ste de de rnams kyis do rab tu byung ba mthong nas/ 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag cagags ma legs
pa byas sosnyam nas/ de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te brjod pa gsol to// de las skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang blangs so// de nas phyi zhig na dag
slongadend kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i smana rnams kyis ma grojus kyang sos rar byed ma nus te/ des 'tshikar smon/
lam btab pa/ kum 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob na/
dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de ra phyug cing ser mdu la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
wArgyas 'od srungs kyis bram 'khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin ba'osangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das debadag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mimanyes bar byed par ma gyur cig de na'o/
ba bstan pal rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de'i pham gnyis dang mdza' sdeb rnams kyang dro'i mdun
na' dug bar gyur to/ da rnams kyis kyang thos nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag kyang khyed la srol brten te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes
par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas s// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe sde snod gsum par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gi bu 'di bon yin no// de'i tshong
spyi ma gnyis su gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis nd lta'i pha ma gnyis khon yin no// des de tsho gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nasaM/ 'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang
dang gang du skyes pa de dang dar phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dngashin tumanyam pa dang/ shugs
mnyam pa dang/ mdzad ba mnyam pa dad/ thabs manyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/ 'dis dmanyes par byas te/ mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgabcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// der de'i pha ma gnyis dang mdza'i sdabo de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab des/ daltar yang 'di na la
brtenanas 'di rnams kyis dmanyes par byas te/ ma mnyes par ma byas so///bam po sum cu gnyis pa// 'thab pa zhes bya ba ni/ gleng
gzhumanyan du yod pa na bzhugs te de'i tshe yul kis la dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i bur mtshums na/ seng ge mthu rtsal bde bganyis 'dug ste/ deganyis den 'dug pas/ skye bo mang por
'dog par byed de 'grul bcad do// de gnyis kyis lam tshodapas/ su yang lam der 'gro ma nus par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston
pa rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dung yengashos la mnga' b.res pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa// mi 'jigs pa bzhes mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba ltar 'gro ba
las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug/
padagu la snyoms par 'jug pa// stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa// yang dag nga 'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams n chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus
gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus las las sa rdug dusangs rgyas kyi sbyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ sun rgud/ sunidar/ sun 'phongs shing 'dug/ un nyam nga bar gyur/ suni/
gnod pa dang ldan/ suni 'phos pa dang/ nyamangab dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ sunu ngan song dugazhol/ sun ngan song du 'bab/ sunI ngan sod du bab/ sun ngas ngan songonas
phyung ste/ man+do ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ sunanyis par sbyod pa'i 'dam du byibalas la gnas drang bar bya/ suni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags
pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la drab dabyed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyidar las bskyed par bya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/
sun dgaba'i rtsa ba rnams smin grin pa las yi shes kyi mtshon gyis brdol bar bya/ su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug
go rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i srasa rnams l// sangs rgyas dusalas yol ba med/
bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge de gnyis gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsalal/ kun daba' bo khyod song la// dge slong rnams la bcom
ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har phyogasasu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs kyi/ su bcom ldan 'das dang lhan tsag ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos dag tshes shig ces sgo zhig ces bka' stsal nas/
bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnasashing/ dbyar bzhugs nas/ dge slong mang pos zhamarang byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tums te mthar gyis rgyu
zhing gshegs gshegs nas seng ga'i nags khung du byonanas/ seng ge dganyis zus tshol du song song ba las de gnyis phrad nas 'thab rar chas so// bam ldan 'das kyang de gnyis
la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mdun logs su bzhes so// de nas Thag rang po zhig nas sing ga de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang sang gdaganyis kyi khro ba'i kun s
dkris pa med par gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das 'ashin tu dga'abar gyur nas/ deganyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ racom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhal du lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dganyis la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzangasakhyed gnyis sngonagyi nye bar spyod pa'i las kyis dud 'gro'inang du ga
ka/ na khyed gnyis da ltar yang de 'ba' zhig gi rgyu byed cing 'dug go/ bzhin bzangs gnyis 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad nami rtag go/ chos thams cad ni de dag med do//
mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhiba'o// ngal sems dga'abar gyis shig dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs so//
deganyis partsomaldan 'das las chos thos nas kha 'atsos so// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams ni ma'i drod cheste/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes bzhin du ni nas lha'inang du
skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma brag ban chos nyis kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ bdag gang nas shA 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo//
donas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang/ lha'inang du skyes pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas la soms dga' bar gyur par dganyis kyi mthong ango// danas de gnyis kyis bsams pa/ badraganug
