btsun pa don dal gsaso// donedalags te/ sems can thamasacad ni 'dod pa gcig pa dang/ 'dun pa gcig pa dang/ dad pa gtsag pa dang/ bsam pa gcig pa ma lags te/
btsun ba 'jigarten 'di dag ni kham tha dad pa dang/ khams du ma pa lags te/ dedag khoms gang dang ba ga 'dzin pa de dang de nan gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing mngon par zhen nas/ rjes su spyod par
bgyid de/ 'din bden gyi/ gzhan ni gtimug pa'o snyam du sems lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogasanas som nyi
las rgul te/ the tsom dang bral lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon/
bar bstod cing rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus ra// btsun pa rtsalags/ dge sbyong dang bram zo thams cad g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa dang/ gtanadutshad/
[â€“ ]par spyod pa'i mthar phyin pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra/ ko'u shi ka dge sbyong dang bram bre thamasacad gayung drung gi mthar thug pa dang/ gtan du dris dang bral/
ba dang gtanadu tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin gyi/ dge sbyong ngam bram zasu yang rang ste/ dran med pa'i rnam par grol ba la sredapa yong dgapar brad cing/ yad dag
par sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa de dag ni g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa dang/ gtan tu drim dang bral ba dang/ gtanadu tshangs par spyod pa mthar phyin pa yin no// lha'i dbang
po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ btsun padanadalags so// de ni da lags to/ dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa dang/ gtan du drim dang bral ba dang/ gtan
dutshungs par spyod pa'i mthar phyin ba ma lags kyi/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze gangayang rung ste// blan med pa'i rnam par grol bar gyur pa la sred pa yang dag par brad cing/ yang dag par sems shin/
du rnam par grol ba de dag ni g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa dang/ gtanadu dri ma dang bral ba dang/ gtan du tshangs bar spyodar 'a mthar phyin pa lags go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asnyan
ba'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs shing/ chos bdag gis rtogs nas som nyi las rgal te/ btsem dang bra'o zhing zug rngu phyung nas longs su yi chod po ra ma mchis pa'i sladadu/ bdag gis/
bdag gangalags snyam du bdag gi yid la phyir skye bar mi 'gyur lags so// btsun pa zhu pa lungabastan pa'i khyadapar rtogs ra gang dag bdag gis ma thob pa las/ dan bdag gis yun ring mo/
zhig lags nas/ ricom ldan 'das la brten te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal nas/ somanyidang yid ganyis kyi/
zug rdurtsa ba nas bton lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka sngan chadadage sbyong dang bram ze gzhan dag la yang dri ba 'di lta bu dris par dran nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya
byin gyisogasolopa/ datsun pa grwa ba dran logs te/ dus gcig tsin/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhi
na khyu// gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa 'i sangs rgyas tshul nang mchis pa las/ dedag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
la rgyas m redas stan las langs te/ sosi'i gyis bdedag gnang nas lhache bar gral gas so 'tshal gnas nas 'chi 'pho zhingam snang bar gyur nas/ btsun pa lha che bar grags so 'tshal gnas
nangashi' res pas/ bdag kyang skrag cing bag tsha bar gyur te/ bdag kyang gnas 'di nas shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ bdag dag sbyong dang bram khro gcig bu dben par gnas pas gnas
shing mchis pa gangadang gang mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogasar 'isangs rgyas lags snyam nas/ bdag de dag gi thad dumachis na/ de dag gis bdag
la khyod su yin zhes 'dring bgyid// bdag gis de dag la bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin yin no zhes bgyis nas de dag dga' zhing mgu ste/ kye ma bdag gso brgya byin mthong ngo//
kyam bdag gis brgya byin mthong ngo zhes ched du rjod par bgyid/ de dag bdag la 'drirar bgyid kyi/ de dag la bdag 'dri bar mi bgyi lags so// de dag bdag la skyabs su mchis par bgyid//
kyi bdag de dag la skyabasasu mchi bar mi bgyid lags so// daslan chad bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyanathos lags te/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis lags so// rtog pa
lanamatha' mamachis// bdag la the tsem nem nur mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho ba'i phyir// ring mo zhig tu 'khyam 'khyam ste/ long ba bdag rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsnyan po na
bgyi de du mchis mchin// bdag gis ji ltar mnyes pa'i thabs// de dag la ni dris pa las// lam dang de bzhin grub pa yang// di dag yongs kyis bstanam 'tshal// bdag nicung/
zad tsa'adod pa// rtog par gyur dang dpyadapa dang// yid kyi 'gro dang 'ongab yi// sems ni thugs kyis thugs su chud// yid kyang yid kyis rig rgyunas// de dag thams cad de ring du/
bcom ldan 'das ni dgra bcom gyis// bsgrags shing lung yang bstan par gyur// khyod ni sangs rgyas ston pa khyod// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud kyad btul// khyod kyis bag nyal bcad/
nas kyang/ ba yanas skye dgu grol bar mdzad// 'jig rten du nakhyodasangs rgyas// khyod las lhag pa yongamamanas// lha dang donus pa'i 'jig rten na// gang zag khyed kyi zla
ma mchis// dpa' bo chen po khyed la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod 'phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa 'i zug rngu 'byin pa ste// tima'i rigs skyes khyod la 'dud// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis sngon chad bden pa mthong ba dang/ yid bde ba blong pa 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar dran nam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ yid bde ba thob panaM
bdag gis myong bar don lags so// bden pa ma shong ba ni nyams su myong bar mi dran lags so// btsun pa lan cig gcig na lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa
na lha rnams ni rgyal/ lha ma yin rnams n pamanas/ bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ dani bdag lha'i grong khyeradumachis la lha'i longs spyodagang lags pa dang/ lham yi
gyi longs spyod gang lags pa de dag lhan cig tutshegs pa dga' bzhin du longs spyod par bgyi'o snyam pa de ni yid rade ba thob pa lags te/ de ni yun ring par 'thab me'i mtha' can la gas/ 'tshang/
'ju nga'i mtha' can lags/ 'gyod pa'i mtha' can lags/ rtsod pa 'a mtha' can lags so// btsun pa bdag gi yid r ba thob pa dang/ bden pa glod pa 'di'i yun ring de'i 'thab
mom mnos pa'i mtha' can lags/ ma tshang 'dru ba ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags/ 'gyedapa ma mchis pa'i mtha'acan lags/ rtsod pa mamanasipa'i mtha' can lags so// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i bka' drin stsal pa gang lags pa de la bdag 'disnyam du bgyid de/ bdag gnas 'di nas shi 'phosanas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyamarar
phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba dang/ rdzas dang yo byad mang pa dang/ bdeg pa tshang ba dang/ nor dang/ 'brudang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ mdzod dang/ rang ba'i
tshogs mang ba'i rigs gang lags pa dang/ mdza' bo dang/ grogs po dang/ thunu dang/ nye dumang po dad/ bran dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba med
ba de lta bu'i khyim du skul ba mnyam par skye bar gyuracig/ de nas bdag mthar gyis skyes te/ dbang po rnams smin nas/ sbyin pa dag khyen/ bsod nams dag bgyis nas/ skra dang kha
spu bregs te/ chos gos tshonacan bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ patsun pa bdag 'osarar gnas shing gal tebaka' lungathoban bkalung
bzhen bgyud par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag 'os pare gnas ni/ sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa nidalags s snyam bgyidado// gal te bka' lung ma thob nand stan bdag gzugs mtshos
pa'i lhayod la skyes pa// dbang po ma nyams shing dbang po tshang ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan// mdog bzangar/ rangal 'od machis pa// nam mkha' la 'gro
kha dga' ba'i zas khrab/ draga'a'a'i bras dang ldan pa// tshe ring pa/ yunard du gnas par dir bdag 'gran zla ma mchis par skye bar shog cig snyam bgyid do// lha lus 'di
las shi 'phos shing// mam yin pa'i tshospangs nas// rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug/ bdag gi yid ni ston la dga'// man ngag gisan 'phangasami 'gyur// khastan/
pa'ilam la brten bcas shade// tshangs par spyod pa bkol bgyis nas// bsod snyoms rgyu ba sbyadapar bgyi// nga dag gi 'os par gnas nas kyang// gal ter lta
zhwa lung thob gyur na// bka'alung stsal ba bzhin du bgyi// de nyid bdagagi sdug bsngal mtha'// gal tedaltar ma gyur nas// tshe yi mtha'anicad ba'i tshe// 'og min lha gang yin da/
do dag ni skye bar shog/ bcom ldan 'das bdagan rgyun du zhugs pa lags so// bdeb gshegs pa bdago ni rgyun du zhugs pa lags so// lanacig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i
re ba yang bdag la mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra// ko'u shi ka legs so legasaso/ de'i skal ba khyod la yod do// de yang bag yod pas theb de//
zi brgya byin gyis gsol pa// gang gis bdagan kho 'gyur ba/ rgyun du zhugs par nges 'byung ba// bcom ldan sa khyod las gzhan la med// khyod kyi bstan las gzhan la med//
khyad par rgyunanadwang po'i gzhi// gzhan dag lta la go la mchis/ khyadapar thob pa 'di'odrab// sngan chad gzhan las yong ma thob// btsun pa bdagana'adinyidan// mchis shing
lha lus bgyid bzhin du// bdag gis tshering thob lags kyis// blo ldan de ltar gzung du gsol// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha brgyad khri chog
thabs ms lachos kyi mig rdul med cing drim dang bral ba skyes te/ des bden pa mthong nas stan de lon las shi 'phos nas/ stan de kho na nyid la phyir skyes so// de ltar deshi 'phos pa dang/ skyes
banamig 'dzum sar dngamo snang bar gyurang lus kyirig pa'i sgonas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dad/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'di sogs kyis kyang rtogs so// des
lham yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod shi 'phos nas skyes lags sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa// bdasogs ngade'i 'phos nas/
phyir skyes te 'din 'dug pazhan duphyir bdag gam thob par gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bden pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' zhing yidirang sate/ dga' ba dang
yid bde ba skyes nas/ ston las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar btudado/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to btsun pa bdagana'aphags lags so// 'phags lags so// dang slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge bsnyen lags pa dang khon gnas dga' ste/ skyabs su mchis pa lags
parogazud du gsol/ de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ dr-iwakhugatsug phud lnga pa la smras l/ bu khyod bdag la phan pa dang/ dben pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro
[p]// bar thog ma khyod kyis bskul to// bu zur phud lnga pa bdag caga'adinas sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul dudon gnas / khyod kyis sngon yun ring po nas 'dod cing smon pa gang

shA min pa'i dri za'i rgyal po dum bu ru'i bu mo bzang mo zhes bya ba'od bazangs de khyod kyi chung mar sbyin no// driwa rnams kyidabang po khyod kyi la'i rgyal sar yang gzhug go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdag gis sngon chadam mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la/ dusagasum du tshangs pa la'os pa'i 'dudab byed pa gang yin pa don bdag
gis dpyin chad bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la tshangasapa la 'os pa'i 'dud pas 'dud par bya'o// ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid tshangs pa yin/ tshadas par gyurang
yin zhi ba yin/ zhi bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ lhagazhan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamago res phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mdunagyis phyogs shing phyir nur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dudabazhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig lam du ma snang bar gyur nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
tugathar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ pusamagayas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal leg/ phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras s/ lha'i dbang po brgya byind nyid du ma snang bar gyur to/// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lasaru'i gyisan/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur la/ 'dis bcom ldan
'dasamanyes par bgyis te/ tshims par ma bgyis lags/ lha brgyad khri po 'di rnams kyis kyang las su bgyis na/ las 'di rnam par smon pos brgya byin khron las brten nas 'di
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes bar ma bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to// gsol pa//
'di rnams kyis smonalam gang du btab lags/ bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag snon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'dinyidal skye dgu'i lor zhi khri thub pan/ yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan kha/ bde bar gshegs l/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ slon midar/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston
kha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'go ba 'jigs bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ des gang gzhi blanamed pa'i yo shes khares nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan dugshegs pa de'i tshe/ yang
rgyu// dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi phyir rgyal bo mdzes pas btsug lag khang lnga brgya btsugs te/ des gnas khang drug stong byas nas// yang dpar
cha rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig na thos kyi dpe 'dun dang bcas pa la phul te/ gtsug lag khang de dag tuyo byad thams cad sbyar nas/ 'khor brgyad khri dang bcas pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang rus pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig sangs rgyas/
kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ phung po'i lhag lamed pa'i mya ngan las 'dasar de'atsho/ rgya la lo mdzes pas de'i sku gdung la mchod pa khyasanas/ sku gdungagamachod rten brtsig
te rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mchod rten de la mchod pa chen po byas te smon lam btab pa// kye ma dge ba'i rtsab 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bde
dang der/ gal te de lhar skye bar gyur ni/ lhache bar grags pa rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur cig/ gal tema'i skye bar gyur nani/ mchapar gragasal mi rnams kyi nang na rgyal srid kyi mnga'
bdapag tugyur cig ces byas so// de nas rgyal res smon lam 'debs pa zham ring ba rnams kyis gtso nasatrasal/ lhosasmonalam rizhig pa tapalags/ des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad
0 nas de blosam thag tud dag gis kyang mched rten de labakur sticasanas smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der khyugatsang
nor mang lulongs spyod pa'irogs su skye bar shog cig/ rgyal po 'di bon las brten nas bdag cag gis ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mimanyesalar khyadapar ma
gyur cig ces byas s// dge slong dag ji snyam dusems/ de'atshargyal pomadzes la gyur pa gang yin pa ren lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dikhon yin te/ dus der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
saMngasargyas 'khor ba 'di nyan thos kyidage 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas chod 'ga' lhar skyes pa de'i tshani lhachopar grogs
par gyur te/ lha rnams kyimanga' bdag byas so// choda'aga' mir skyes pa'i min me chu bar grags par gyur nas/ mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag byas te/ dge slong dag nga yang
dag por rdzogapala'isangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tumanyam pa dang/ shugasamanyam pa dang/ mdzad pa mnyamapa dang/ thobasamanyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/ 'dis nga
mnyes bar byas te/ mi mnyes par ma byas so// de'i tshe zhama'ing pa brgyad khrir gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag khon yin te/ dedag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan byes kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa sa gang dang gangadu skyes pa de/
dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyodache ba rigs su skyes te/ brgya byin 'di bon las brten nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/ mimanyes ma byas so/ rgyal po
zhes bya bano/ glong gzhimanyan du yod na bzhugs te/ de'i tshamnyan du yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar bab pa las chung sablangs nas/ dade dang lhan cig rtsezhing dga'
ladagabadagur spyod pa las/ phyi zhiganadi'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang bu btsas nas/ de gang gatshatshor skyes ba de'i tshe yi ga dang/ bram ze'i spyod lam
dang / spyod pa dang/ o zhes bya bdang/ b+hozhes bya ba dang/ gtsang sbra dang/ tsho gdang/ thal ba slong bdang du nil ba thogs pa dang/ nges brjod kyirig byed dang/ mchod
sbyin gyi rig byed dang/ snyan tshagasaMrig byed dang/ sridasrung gi rig byed dang/ mchodasbyin bya ba dang/ mnodisbyin byed du gzhug pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ blang ba dang kha
ton bya bdang/ kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/ lasa rnam pa drug lamakhas pa'ibram zer gyur to/ de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyadal byang bar gyur te/ danas
00 phyi zhig na de'i pham gnyis shi'o// deganyis shanas khye 'u des bsams la// bram ze rnams kyi khe bdasakyi seg+hAn/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ de'i 'og

tachung ma len par byed kyis/ bdag gis kyang lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam nas/ des lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas chung ma blangs te/
de'i chung ma gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdugal mdzes pa dad/ g.yem zhing skyes pa 'dod pa zhig ste/ dekhyim thab rganapo dang lhan cig 'dug pas snying ma tshimanas/ des skyes pa gzhan btsal/
to (denas phyi shog n de'i blo skyes ma/ bdag gis khyim thab 'di ltar jisridan 'jug gi bar duni/ bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu nyal ba'i skyabs med kyis// bdag gis 'di yul
gzhan du btang bar bya'o snyam nas bram ze de la smras pa/ 'di ltar jopo'i khyim ni yang mi bdogan khyod kyis bdag blangs ste ri bgyi/ bdag pha ma'i khyim du slar mchi'o// 'on kyang bdag
gis 'tshalam bde blag lta'atsha' dumams go/ bram zes smras pa/ bzang mo mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ bdagacag bram ze rnams la slong mos 'tsho ba yang yodakyis/ bdag yul
gzhan du songal nor datsal te/ phyir 'ong ngo zhes byasonas chung ma la brgyags phog ste song ngo// de song nas kar shar Na mang po zhig med nas// de dag khyer te mnyan du yod par chas pa las/
de lam du mi rgod kyis bcom nas shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ gal te bdag khyim du yonganani/ bram zem dang 'thabamo chen po 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis
'tsho ba 'dalta bu btangalanags khung thibs lebasedaste/ bdag 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ danags khungathibs por song ste/ shing nas thag pas btagasanas 'gigs par byas pa las
de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongasakha/ bram ze 'di nga'i bstanang la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba
zlazhigan/ da 'di lta bu'i gzug mas byed cing 'dug go snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapanas mi snang bar gyur to/ nags khung thabs de dgashegasanasaM/ der/
racom ldan 'dasakyis// bram ze de la bka' stsalal/ bram ze gzu lums ma byed/ ngas khyod la nor sbyin no zhes bka' stsalanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gtor bstan te/ bram
zakhyod kyi nor 'di yin gyis srog 'phangs pa ma dor cig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das slar gtsug lag khadadugashogs so// de nas bram ze des nor de dag khyer te rang gi khyim dusong/
nas/ sa khyim gyi 'byor pa rgyas par byas te bzha po/nas/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs so// de nas rtsa zhoganade'i blo skyes pa// dge sbyong go'u ta man dag
laphan pa dang dben pa yin gyis/ padagakhyim n gnas ba btang la de 'khrid du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste/ khyim gyi 'khor btang las/ tsem ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos manyan pa'i phyi'i spyan sngar 'dug go danas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang ( khams dang/
shes pa dang/ rangabazhin thugs su chud nas dedang 'thunapa'ichos bstanataM/ de nas bram zed stan de nyid la 'dug bazhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse momathon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
bcomanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ brtsomaldan 'das ga la ba de legs/
su rgyal me sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dgo slong
gidangos po thob tu rungan/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dadu tshangs par spyod pa sbyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces byaba'i tshig gis rang tu phyung ste/
bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang bartsonapa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom mnyid mngon sum du/
byas so/// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa bram ze 'di dbu la bas 'a jigs nas bdag nyid 'gum par bgyis/
@# pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyisanor gyi phung po chen podang sprad de/ g.yung drung ga mthar thug pa dang bde ba'imya ngan las 'das pa la bzhagapa lagazigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
kha daltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'dus ba'i dusanayadabram za 'didabu labs 'jigasanas bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/ ngas nor gyi phung po chen pa byon nas/ dge ba bcu'i
las kyi lam la ji ltar gnas par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag snon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wArANasIn rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byadado/ de'i ring la 'byor
pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdebadang/ lo legs pa dang/ skye bodang mi mang pos gang ba dang/ rtsodapa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dad/ 'khrug pa dang/ nad 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang
zla nod dang/ mugemed pa dang/ 'bras sa lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glangadang/ ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa medatsong tshoram dkrugs la/ bugatsug pa sdug pa la bya ba
bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do// rgya'amo de yang byams pa'i bdag nyidacan snying rjedang ldan ba/ sems can la byams pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste/ de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/
bsodAnams dag byed do/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ stug cing 'phongs pa dang/ bkren pa rnams 'dud rtsi 'dod pa sbyin par byed de// bza' ba dang bca' bam po dag sta gon/
byas to/ srog chags naam mkha' na gnas pa dang/ chul gnas pa dang/ thang la gnas pa rnams la sbyin par byed de// 'jig rten dag kyang dge ba bcu'i lasakyi lam la 'god par byed/
do// des phyin chad bdagags sems can rnams la thams cad sbyin zhes dam bcas so// de chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang de la bsrung bdag
bskyab pa dang/ sku ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// dedag gos dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'ab bsangashing 'bru rnams rgyas par byed do// rgyal po di'i 'dab kyi nying 'og gi rgyu la rinams
ma yin pas rgyal po byed do/ shing sgrogs dang/ rkang sgrol dang/ lag sgril dang anangan btags pa rnams kyis yul na gnas ba'i skye bo mang po la gnod pa byed do// de'i mi rnams
tshanagyi dpu bla skyes rgyud mas 'jigs te/ rgyal po dbang chen sde'i yul du dong ste 'khodado// de nas spyi zhig na nying 'og gi rgyal lo du blon po mang posazham ring byas nas/ yul ltar song
song ba las/ dos bltasan/ grongadang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ nags khrodakyi grong dang/ tshong dus dag stongs par mthong nas/ blon po rnams la ka yatsakaM
phyir yul stongs la thugabar gyur ces dris na/ blon po rnams ra/ lha rgyal dbang chen sde'i yul 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/
dang ldan l/ skye bo mang po de dag kyang dpya khral ma mchis ba dang 'dra bar 'khod pas na/ skye bo pa la kho mo rnams der dong stel khod do zhes zer ro// de nas dbyes mchog tu nying 'og rgyal
pa de khros nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te/ rgyal po dbang chen po dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs// de nas rgyal lo dbang chen sdes nyid 'ogagi rgyal bo de khros nas
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gobaskyon te/ bdag dang g.yul 'gyodapa'iphyiradwangs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang blon po rnams sogs te bsgol/ kyingasan tshig cig gi 'tshe btsan gyi
phyir sdig pa khyadamayodakyis/ gal takhyad yulaphungapar mi 'dod nani/ ting 'og gi rgyal po de laphyag tshol cig/ ngan de la gnod pa byed mi phod de zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
nags kyi nang na shing shun shar bu'igos gyonatsang/ 'bras bu ca lagacan gzan dag dang 'grogs kyang bla'i// 'jig rten pha rol dag gis 'dzes pa'i mi rnams kyis// rgyalasridi dag gi phyir
ni gsad dang bcingam myo// de nas blon po rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po 'din su la yang gasod bodade/ bdagacag kun med par gyur nama'i nga gis/ bdag cag thams cad gyi dbal
stagabasngal bar gyur pa bsani/ bdag cag gis 'digacig pu bor yang bla 'am snyam nas/ de dag gis rgyal po khor te/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po de la babs so// de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdos
kyang tsher te/ blon po 'di rnams kyis bdag bor ro snyam nas/ nags kyi nang du gnas bcas te/ de der song nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing 'dug go/ desengaba'i 'og tu 'ang 'og gi rgyal po de/
'ongasanas/ yul pa rnams la rgyal po de gar song zhes drisan/ blon po rnams n ro/ lhabros lags so zhes khar ro// de nas nying 'og gi rgyal pos yul de chamadu phab ste/ dpa' bo
thams cad kyis bya dgar bgo bsha' byas nas yul de nyidadu btab ste 'dug/khe// de nas de'i khrod kyi grong zhig na/ bram ze dbu la ngo 'tshongs 'bongs pa zhiga gnas te/ mthor gyis
de'abudang duomadakho khatsas nas/ dogasoba medal/ yul der mu ga yadabyungs/ des khyim gyi bar ma rnams bskyang ma nus so// de nas dran ze des wArANas na rgyal kho
dbangatshanasdozhes bya bar zhug te/ rgyal po de yadabyams ra'i bdag nyidacan snying rje dang ldan pa/ sems can la byamasar/ sbyin pa la dga' kha/ mas cad sbyin par byed pa zhig go
nyes shosos/ bdagadi'i thadatu'agror bya'o// de'i thad du song ba dang/ bdag gi nor dalas 'odongo snyam nas/ wArANasIr song ngo
[7 ]@#// nags su gnas bcas so zhes thos so// thos ma thag tu bram ze de shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bsams pa/ bdagu de'i thad dudaka' thub kyi nags tshal du song
pa dang/ deden 'dug kyang bdag la nor byin par 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas/ sa phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' pa dar song ste/ de'i thad du son gnas / byang chub sems dpa'i
des del gi 'jam pos mgu bar byas te/ rdul dang 'bras bu dag byin nas dris pa/ khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs/ bram zes smras l/ daltar mu ge byung ste/ 'phongs shing gnod par gyur
la bdag la gso ba yang mangan/ bdag gis de dag gso yang ma nus nas bdag gis thoson/ rgyal po dbang chen sde nithams cad sbyin par byed do zhes thos nas/ de dag gnor gyi 'byung
khud du 'gyur ro snyam ste/ khyod kyi thad dumachis so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ des nanags kyi nang du gnas bcas so zhes khyodakyis ma thos sam/ dad lanorag la yod
( dbyesamathogatubram zer thag chad nas brgyal tes la 'gyel to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' des gdong du chus gtor te bsrung ngo// des bsams pa// bdag la 'tshe ba 'di lta bu ni
dgosakyis/ bdag song nags stug po'i nang du zhugs te 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ thag pa khyer te nags stug po'inang du zhugs nas/ shing kanas thag pa btags te 'gag par byas pa/
las byang chub sems dpas mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu snying rje skyes te/ des ngos mas kha/ gal te bran khre 'dis bdag khrid de dgra'i dadu song nani/ des 'di la nor gyi dung
bo chen po khyon par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ bram ze de la snusal/ bram ze gzu lumasam byed cig dang/ ngas khyod kyi dbul ba gcod par bya// khram ze khyod tshur shog/ ngaphying
kalog tu dam par bcingasal/ rgyal po chagamo zhig gi thad du khridId song zhig dang/ des khyod la nor gyi phung po byon par 'gyur ro// bram zes smras pa/ bdagan khyodaltadu
'chid ma phodad// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ thatsom mad par gyis la nga mnges la khridade song zhig/ de las thabs gud na ma mthong ngo// de nas bram ze dare/ khyod
ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas/ bram zades byang chub sems dpa' phying ka logatudam dubacings nas khrid de wArANAsir chas so// de nas skyangomang re de dag gis ma thod nas ngo
shes te/ de dag rgyal po'i thad dudong ste gsolan/ de dag la rgyal po yid mnyes nas de bltas bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung ste/ byang nubasems dang ni smad du song nas/ bram
ze des kyang chub sems dar la dam du bcings nas khridade'ongs ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ris pa/ 'di khyod kyis ga la sa khrid 'ongs/ des smras r/ 'dinelha'i dgra lags te//
'di bdag gis dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa la// mthus bzun gnas khridire mchis so// de nas rgyal pos bsams pa// rgyal po 'di ni lus che zhing stobs che/
klal bram ze 'di nalus nyam chung bsan/ 'dis 'di bzung bar bod la nus te/ 'di nyid rjen la sems can 'khyamasarusan/ 'dis bdag gis bdag pacings nas/ 'dir byin gor ma nag
snyam ste// bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze 'dikhyodakyis jiltar ba zung du drang por sgros shakaM/ de nas khramakhredes rgyal ba dol ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du bsnyad do// des de somasngagatargyal
po de dadapar gyur nas// sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la bdag gis gnod pa byas so snyam nas/ bdag nyid kyis bkrol te rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs te/ yan lag thams cad kyis
'khyud de/ seng ge 'i khri steng du bzhu gnas / cod pan gyi thabs phudade/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la btags nas smras pa// khyod ni rgyal po'i 'os lags kyi/ bdag ni'osam
lagis so zhus byas nas// sa de la dbung gi tshogs dang/ dkor mdzod rnams phul nas/ bzod pa gsol te rang gi yul du songang// de nas rgyal po dbangachen sdas tham ze del
@#nor gyi phung po chen po byanas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas// dag slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po dbang chen ster gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang
0yin pa de ning nyid yin no// de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni brag sde 'di khon yin te/ de'i tshe ya da 'di dbul bas 'jigs pas bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/ ngas nor gyi dung
po chen po phyin nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas so// da ltar yang 'di dbul ba'i 'jig pas bdag nyid 'chibar byas pa las/ ngas nor gyi phung po chen re byin nas/ g.yu
drung gi mthar thug po grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/ jon pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ rgyal
po'i khab tu byononas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya kar no ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i lhas byin rgyal po'i khab na ba nas ba'i skye bo mang po la rtag tu nyes pa byed do//
gang dang gang la nyes pa byas r de dang debcom ldan 'das la nyes pas snying bar byed de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod
song la chos gos snam sbyar gyon te/ dge slong su yang rung ba zhig grogs su khrid la/ rgyal po'i khab tu lam po che dang/ srang dang/ bzho mdo dang/ sum mdodrag tubram zad//
khyim bdag rnams kyis lhas byin nas/ lhasatsan gyi phyogs kyis su la nyes pa byas pa des sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la 'dogs par ma byed tsag ces sgo zhig
gal te lhas byin nirdza'aphrul che zhing mthun ba yin no zhes zeran/ sngonani rdzu 'phrul chen/ da ni de'i rdzu 'phrul nyamasaso zhes gyis gces bka' stsal to// de nas
zhwa kun dga' bo setoste/rgyal po'i lad tu lam mi chodang/ spang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dag tupram ci dang/ khyim bdag rnams la bsgo nas phyin chad bcom ldan 'das la
nyasaras stong bar ma byed do// donas phyi zhog na bcomo ldan 'das bsnyung bar gyur nas/ sman pa'i mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la smanamar lcags mda' zhes bya ba phul lo// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sman pa'i rgyal po ro byed la bka' stsal pa 'tsho byed ngo mtshar che'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho/
byed rmadadu khyud ngom ( gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das rmad du byungalags so// bka' stsalal/ 'tsho byed shes sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal la chags
so bkaM' stsalal/ 'tshe byed khyod mi shes sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdagam 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal ra/ 'di byed ci zhig ngo mtshar che/ gsol ba
bcom ldan 'das kha rnams rtswa za zhing chu 'thudal/ ded las bdudartsi 'di 'grung cing des sman mar lcags mda' zhes bya pa bsal lags so/ bka' stsal ba/ 'tsho byed cizhig rmadadu/
byung [0f10 ]gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba las dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgrub pa bzang po 'byung lags so// bka' stsal ba/ 'tshe
byed khyod ci shog shes/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das skyes snyan chad gdon ma 'tshal bar 'gum par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal ra/ 'tsho byed khyodatsazhig ma shes/ gsol pa
bcom ldan 'das su gang du 'chib de ma 'tshal lags so// des dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tsom thamasacad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ra/
btsun pa 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs pa la gathigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i
rusan yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa ji ltar rtogs pa da nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod
tsha bzhig gnas pa des// thabs zla bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/ da de dang lhan cig tu tsazhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyodapa las/ phyi zhog
na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ da zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang/khye'u zhig btsas te/de'i bcos ston zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyas par byas nas/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming
btags so// de'i 'og tu yang de rtse yid dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las bu zhig btsas te/ de'i yang btsas ston rgyas pa byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btagA
A so nas bsams pa/ bdag gi du lona'atshong ba dang nor skyod pa skyes zin gyis/ zong khyer la bdag yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas yang ngasams pa/ bdag
gi chung ma 'di byadabazhin bzang bas/ bdag gis 'di la kar sha pa Namang pabyin te song ni/ skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu dga' la dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang srid kyis// ma
la bdag gis 'di la karangasha ran nyud du zhig byin te 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de la kar sha pa Nanyung ngu zhig byin nas/ dam yin pa gser rnams nibumapa'i nong du bcug ste/ bum pa'i
mgrin pa mu tig gi 'phreng bas btsungos nas/ dur khrod du shing rta zhes bya ba'i rgud du sbas te bzha gnas / tsong khyer te yul gzhan du song nas/ des der red pa mang de grub nas/ des
sku der yang chung ma blangs te 'dug nas de'abu mang po lotsas so// de nas chung ma sngam gdu bu zhes bya bas lag 'ongs dang 'dus bshugs pa tsam gyis bu gnyis gasos gnamasanas/ bu
gnyis kyis smras pa bdag cag gnyis kyi phagar song/ mas smras pa// bu yul ga ge mo zhig na/ gnas che ge mo zhigan 'dug ste/ de nor phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang ldan
sa/ zhes kyang grag gis der song zhig dang/ gal ten khyed kyi 'tshe ba'i thabs cung zad byin yang srid do zhes byas so// de nas phu bo shesapa 'tshel du song nod pa las/ de lamanas lam du
'khor 'khor te/ mtshar gyis pa'i drung du phyin nas/ pas bzhin gyi gzugs lasango shes nas/ skad phyung ste smras pa// khyod ga lasa'od so/ da gar 'gro zhes byas nas/ des
rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas phas rasams pa 'di ni bdag gi bud khon yin na snyam nas des debadag gi thadadu bzhag nas bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyis su la yang bdag gi ba yin zhes ma zer cig/
ces byas nas/ dade la byams par gyur to// de nas su gzhan rnams kyis yang khye'u 'di su'i lags/ pas smas pa nga'i mdza' bo'i bu yin no// de nas de dag gis bsams
ba 'di ltar 'di la shin tuphyamasapalasan/ 'di nyid kyi bu yin 'gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas dedag gcig la gcig smras rta/ 'dini bdag cag gi phu bo yin no zhes zer ro// de
nas pas bsams pa// dgra'anangan na 'di lta ste/ mas dben 'dim rungs pa yin te/ 'di bsad du 'ongasags phyir btang ngo/ de lta mod kyi log la te bdag gsacung zad cig 'di la byin
yang lhod pa can yin pa'i phyir lam dugasad du 'ong na/ ma la bdag gis 'di phyir btang ngo snyam nas/ yi ga zhig bris te byin pa/ gnas nias shar phyogs logs su dpag tshad gcig
a@#// tsaman// grong nas grodadumagyogs kyi rna ba'i shing gi drung// der ni tha bas ma khas bag dang ldan pas brkos nas kyang// bdag dang no skal gcig pa khyod kyis gso/
shA bar gyis// mgu lan 'dug pa gang yin den gdu bu byin// zhes zer pa zhig yi ger bris nas byon te/ des yi ge de khyer te sa nas song pa las/ nuTe rnams kyis lam du bzung ste/
pa lasakhyod kyis ci thobacas byas so// des smras b/ ci yang ma thob ste yi ge 'di byin par zad do zhes byas// de nas de dag na re/ 'din pasasrid pa lta ste stong zhig ces dus nas dpa tapo
ste mthar gyis rang gi khyim du phyin nas/ re zhig ngal bso zhing 'dug 'dug nas/ mas smras r/ khyod kyis phalas rtsi thob/ bus smras pa/ cang ma thob mod kyi/ yi gi 'di lta bu zhig
thob bo// mas smras pa/ bu+o da pas bridadre 'am gyi tshogs byung bar zad kyi so yang ma grub// bus smras pa/ yumade ni chang yin te/ bdag 'drid par ma byed do zhes byas nas de yaM/
kyi ga de dpyod pa la zhugs te/ grong nasazhes rtsa banagengadu skyes pa de in te/ don 'di grong zhes bstan to// grod dushes byabani gang du phyung ste bsreg pa'i sa yin no// mgyogs kyi rna ba'i

shing drung zhes bya ba la mgyogs zhes bya bani rta yin te/ de'i rnabatishing zhes bya ban rtarnazhes bya ste/ shing rtarna'i rdung la bya'o// gnas nios shar phyogs logs su zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs yi/
00na dbag tshadagacig tsam zhes bya ba 'dini'i dir dbag tshad gcig kho na la bya'o snyam nas/ des tshigs su bcad ba de lta bur dpyadanas// mtshan mo ma rgyu ba'itshadur khrod du son gnas / dro'i
'daban rtan zhes bya ba'i shing zhig 'dug ste/des derishar phyogs logs su btsal te/ gnyashing gang tsam tshun chad du brkos pa dang/ re zhig na gser gyi bum pa mgrin pa mu tig gi 'phreng/
bas btsangs pa zhig mthong nas/ de dga' ches te de blangs nas khyim du song ste// mu tig gi 'phreng ba bkrol nasam gdu bu la byin no// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i ma/
khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa den nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i bur gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs so// daltar yang
'dis nga'i dgongos te gsungs pa rtogs so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa// bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' la/ sku che bas na sman mar nyung dus 'di gso bar mi nus snyam ste/
des brtags nas smanama'i srang sum cu rtsa gnyis srad la btsal to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gsol to// lha nga ba khrod kyi lhag ma ni dge slong rnams la ba stabs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
lhung bzod kyi lhag ma'o snyam nas dge slong rnams kyis bstud tsang ba tang ngo// de nas lhas byin gyis bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang sman mar ba tung ngo snyam nas/ des 'ano byed la sa pa//
[n] ]@#// 'tshe byed dge sbyong go'u tams sman mar ji tsam rdatsam zhig 'thungasu/ 'tshe khyed kyis smras pa/ srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gsol to// lhas byin gyis smras pa//
shA kyang srang sum cu rtsa gnyis btung ngo// 'ano byed kyis skyasapa/ bcom ldan 'das ni doji lta bu'i sku mda' la/ sku ngasan sman mar disnyed gsol ba dang 'ju bar sbyodakyi/ khyod kyis 'ju
bar ma nus so// lhas byin gyis smras pa// nga yang rdo rje lta bu'i lus can yanin/ ci'i phyir 'ju mi nus zhes byas naso/ des kyang srang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thungs so// donas bcom ldan
'das kyis ni zhu bar gyur/ lhas khyon gyis ma zhu bar gyur to// de nas khyed nyid yang 'tshe khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la sman mar 'bras chang gyi khu ba dang sbyar ba gsol to// lhas byin gyis
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsolobs/ ngargyal gyi dbang gis ma zhus bzhin du sman mar 'byas chung gyi khu ba dang sbyar to 'thungs nas zug gzer gyis btab ste/ gnadal bab pa'i na tshas thebs nas
gzhi de nas sdug bsngal drag pa dang/ mi bzad pa dang/ tsha ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong nas nyin mtshan duganyid kyang m log par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni phu nu/
bo'akhyams taM/ des gtamakhacom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu/ 'khor lo dang/ bkrashos dang/ g.yung drung ris dang ldan pa/
bsod nams brgya phrag dum las byung ba// 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed ba'i phyag brkyang ste// bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las thal nas/ lhas byin gyi mgo la bzhag ste//
bden pos bskul ba mdzad b/ bden pa gang gis nga'i bu gcig pa sgra gcan zin bzang po sdug gu la lta ba bzhanyidu sems lhag chad med par lhas byin la yang de khon bzhin du sems na/
bden pa des 'di'i nad zhi bar gyur cig ces gsungs nas/ bden pas bskul ba de kho na'i chod la lhas byin gyi nad zhi bar gyur te/ srog yal ra las phyir thob par gyur to// de nas des
bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag mthong nas ngo shes te/ des bsams pa// 'ong na dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lag pa yin no snyam nas/ de yun ring po nas sams kyi rgyudagayo sgyus bsgrubs pas
rgyags pas gos shing dbang du byas pas/ daltar sangs rgyas kyi chab nyid kyis dazhi bar byas kyang/ 'di skad dudonagrub khyod kyis sman dpyad legs par lobs te/ 'dis ni khyod
'tsho b.red par nusazhes zer ro// des 'khor na ba khod pa rnams kyis sgra bsgrogs pa/ lhas byin nad tshabs chen pos gzir te srog yal ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden bas
bskul bas sos par mdzad do zhes 'dzer to// lhas byin gyi phyogs su kani tu zhen pa rnams kyis kyang de thosanas/ btsem ldan 'das kyi ngomatshar che ba brjod de/ kye ma 'di'i byams pa'i/
[p]// yang dag par phunasum tshogs par gyur to// kyel sems can rnams la snying rje bsgoms so zhes bzer to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ lhas byin la smras pa/
lhas byin khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyisasos par 'dzad de// gyi na ni srogadung srol zinano// lhas byin gyis skyas pa/ 'don yid sgyur bar byed pa'i rgyu shes te/ des na 'jig rten
thams cad zhi bar byed do// de nas dedag 'din drin du migazo bdang/ byas pa mtshor ba zhig go snyam te dongonas/ bcomo ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas the tsom skyes/
ti the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// btsun pa lhas byin drin du mi gzo ba dang/ byas pa mtshor bdad/ byas pa chud gzon pa la gzigs//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di rdzoltar drin du mi gzo ba dang/ byas pa mi tsho'i bdang/ byas pa chud gzon par gyur/
pa de cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ yul pa de ha zhes bya ba na/ rgyal lo dbang chen sde rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe na nags khung dgon pa zhig na khron pa zhig yod
do khron pa de'i nang du srog chagaso lnga lhung ste/ mi dang/ song go dang/ sbrul dang/ byi ba dad bya khra rnams sa// rngon pa zhig kyang nags khung dgon pa de na ra dgas
[ro/]gshor zhing 'dug pa las/ skom gyis gdungs nas khron pa de'i drung du song ste/ des khron pa de'i nang dubaltasan/ midis ma de mthong ma thag tukhus btab ste/ kye grogasare
bdag cag gi skya bas gyis shigacesakhyas so// de nas des thosatsha thag tu rngon pa de yang de dag la snying rje skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis 'di rnams ma byunganani/ 'di dag thamasacad
gyin 'da' la 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ dus thagapa khyer te 'ongs nas de dag thamasacad khron pa de'i nang nas bton to// de nas phyi zhoganA rngon pa der dogs shor zhing nags khung
du song ba las/radogs kyi rgyal posang ga des mthong nas/ sang gas/ rngon pa la smras pa// grogs po khyod ci'i phyir nags khung 'din rgyu zhing 'dug/ rngon pas smras pa//
ri dwags shor ba'i phyir bdag 'din rgyu zhing 'dug ste/ bdag ga'atshob 'di yin no// sang gas smras pa// grogs po khyod nyon mongs par ma byed/ ngas khyod la drin lanablun par
byaste/ khyod 'di na 'dug nanyin gacig bzhin dur dgas bzang do cog bsad de sha ji snyed dgos pa de snyed sbyin nozhes smras nas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po sang go song ste/ des nyin gcig
bzhin du 'dags bzang do cog bsad nas de la sha mang po byin no// de nas tsa zhigan na pa des sha khur gyis bskyas te rang gi khyim du 'gro ban/ de phyi khra des mthong nas ngo shes te/ byi
khra des/ rngon pa la smras pa/ grogs po khyod dka' bas 'tsho ba 'di lta bu zhig gis 'tsho zhing 'dug gam/ rtson pas smras pa// bdag gi 'tsho ba ni 'di yin/
cha te/ thabs 'dis bdag 'tsho ba tshel lo// de nas khra des bsams pa/ mi 'dis sngon bdag gi srog phyung bas na 'di la bdug gis drin lan bsab dgos so snyam nas/ des
snus pa/ grogs po khyed 'dir 'dug cig dang/ bdag gis khyod kyi dbul ba gcad par bya'o zhes byas nas song ngo// de nas khra de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song nas/
bdag gis 'dir cizhigared par 'gyur zhig gu/ bdag gis de khyer nas mde la sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ steng gi nam mkha' la lding zhing du bltasan/ de'i mi pho brang don rgyal po dbang
chen sde'i btsun modam pas rgyan thams cad bkro'anas/ gdu'i nang du bzhag nas sku 'khrul pas/ khrus rgyan rnams khyer nas mi de la byin te/ des der+yar tarangagi khyim duchas
ba las/ de ma des mthong nas ngo shes tAdris pa/ grogs po khyod kyis 'dig las red/ don pas/ de la smras ng/ khrus bdag la byin ne zhes byas nas/ rtson pa de rang gi
khyim du song ngo// de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes bya ba thams cad la bsgo ba/ khyed dang la byatshad thams cad du song ste/ rgyan de dag khyer tashog cig ces byas so// mi sdum des kyang
tsher nas bsams pa// 'dis bdag lan gnyis khron sar lhung ba las phyung nam rung gis/ bdag rgyal de'i thad dusong la gsol bar bya// 'on tang des bdag la bya dga' byin par gyur
rosnyam nas/ mi song ste rgyal po la gso'al/ na pa cho game zhig gis lha'i rgyan rnams khyer rogs byas so// de nas da thosam thag tu da la bya dga' chen po byon no// de nas sngon po/
da bkug stargyan rnams kyang phyogs nas khri men 'dir dacug go/ dekhri min na'adug bani byi ba des ngo shes te/ des bsams la/ mi gang gis bdag gi srog ltung ba den 'di yin gyis/
'di 'a bdag gis drin lan bsab par bya'o snyam nas/ des skyas pa/ grogs po khyod ni nyis khri mona'adrir bcug/ de nas de la des thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas bya ba
des smras pa/ grogs po khyed brtan po mdzod la spro ba chen po skyid cig dang/ ngas khyod 'din 'dug pa'i tshozas dang skom gyis mdo mi gzung bar bya'o zhes byas nas/ byi ba des khri mon
na 'dug pa de la zas skom gyis mdo ma bzung bar byas so// de nas khyi zhiganam da khri monan 'dug bzhin du sbrul gdug pa des srog gcig tu byas te/ 'di langasadrinalan blan par bya'o snyam
du bsams nas/ mde la smras pa// kye ma khyodangs khri mon 'di nas thar par byas te/ dbang phyug go bdag po chen po la gzhag par bya'o zhes byas nas/ ngas rgyal po 'di dug gis
[rz]/ @#// zin par byas l/ debadag gisanubya gtol med par gyur tang/ de'i tshe khri lonan 'dug pas// rgyal po 'di gzhan sus kyang sos par byed ma nus te/ dra ba ba'
zhig gis gsonus so zhes gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po des khyod bkug pa dang/ khyod der song la bgrang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gyis la me sbar to/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod gyis shig dang
khyod kyi sgra thos pas nga'ong gas/ khyod kyisanga'ongs nas 'di skad du/ yang n mer mchongs shig/ yang nan rgyal po'i dug med par gyis shig cag byes shig dang/ ngas khyod la 'di
skad bdag ni mi'i nang du mchong bar bya'i/ rgyal po'i dug ni mad par mi bya'o zhes bya'o// de nas khyod kyis nga la 'di skad du khyadakyis srogam gtang gi/ khyod kyis rgyal po 'di dug medu ra rami
byar ma rung de nas gyis shig dang/ ngas khyod kyi tshig gis rgyal po'idug med par bya// 'on tang de'i tshirgyal po khyod la mnyes par gyur nas/ khri mon nas btang stenor gyi phung po chen re
byin par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ sbrul gdug pa de song ste/ rgyal po de dugags zinanas rgyal po dgi bya gtol med par gyuras/ rngon pa des/ btsonasrungs rnams la smras
kha rgyal po 'di sus kyang dug med bor mi nus te/ ngas 'di'i rtug med par byed nus so zhes byas so// donas btson srungs rnams kyis/ rgyal bo la gsol to// do nas
rgyal pos ma da bkug nas smras pa/ kyagal du ma khyod kyis nga'i srog gyi skyabs byed nus par gyur na/ ngas khyod la nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin no zhes byas so// de nas m des smras pa//
lha brtan par mdzod la spro ba chen po skyedacig dang/ bdag mas bzhin dukhyod grongs par ma 'gyur zhabyas nas/ mi das po glang gi lco bsadakyil 'khor byas nas me sbar te sngags brjod/
do tadanas de thos nas sbrul gdug bdedakyil 'khor gyi drung du 'ongs te 'dug go/ de nas mi des smras l/ khyod 'din 'dug pas denaganyisag bya dgos te/ yang nan rgyal po'i
drug med par gyis shig/ yang nan ma'i nad du mchongs shig ces byas so// danas sbrul gdug pas smras ba/ bdag 'di na 'dug pas don gnyis bya dgos pa la/ yang n bdag
nyid gtang bar bya dgos/ yang nargyal po bsod dgos sozhas byas nas/ sbrul gdug pa de mngon du phyogs shing 'dug pa la mdes bzlog te skyes ba/ khyod kyi srog boradu zin kyang ngs
rgyal po'i srog cha btang gas/ khyodakyis rgyal po 'di'i dug med par mi byar mi rung ngo zhes byas so// des de khros ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i dug med par byas so// de nas
rgyal de mnyes par gyur nas/ rngon pa de la nor gyi phung po chen po byon te btang ngo/// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe rngon pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la gnas pa//
gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po la gsol ba gang yin pa de ni lhasakhyon 'di kho na yin te/ de'atshayang 'dirIn mgazo ba dang/ byas pa ma tshor bad
byas pa chud gzon par gyur to////bam po sum cu lnga pa/ chos ba zhes kyan/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yul shur
par na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ thabs M zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/ ded dad lhan tsug rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig nade'i chung ma la bu chags nas/
de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lonapa dang/ khyer gzugs bzang zhing bltanasdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyus par byas nas/ ming rmos pa zhes btags so// de nas khye'u rnyes
pa 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te/ dgang gi mi char skyes pa de'i tshe/ yi ga dang/ khong rtsis dang/ shod dgod pa dang/
zla lagartsis dang/ dbyung ba dang/ snab dang/ dwagramapa nga/ gosabartag pa dang/ nor bu brtag pa dang/ rinapo chub rtagapa dang/ spos brtag pa dang/ snyan brtag pa dang/
glang lo chibartag pa dang/ rtabartag pa dang/ go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ga mkhas pa dang/ klog mkhas pa dang/ mdzangs pa dang/ bya ba la gsal ba dang/ yid gzhutu
ba dang/ brtag pa rnam pa brgyud la byang bar gyur to// de nas phyi zhig na de lus shur bu yungs 'bru tsam sha stag gis khyab par gyur te/ shur bu dedag kyang sman te rdol nas/ de'i
lus chos zhu lung tu yog par gyur to/ den do'i phas sman pa thams cad dang/ yo byad thams cad sbyar to/ gsos kyang d sos par byed ma nus nas/ jitsam dutshabs che bar gyur pa de tsam du/
lus las rnag khrag 'dzag ste/ dring ba 'byung ngo// de nas de'i lus thams cad sgros sna tshogs kyis byugs te/ gos kyis g.yogs nas gso bar byed do// de nas de'i phu nu rnams kyis mthong
nus mang smos te/ khye'u'adi'i lus gos dang rgyan rnams kyis g.yogs tagasos pas na/ 'di'i ming sbas pa zhes zer ro// de nas de la la las ni rmos pa zhes bya bar shes so// la las
nisbas pa zhes bya bar shes so// de nas phyi zhog na de'i pha mganyis shi'o// pha ma gnyis shi nasalas su bya ba thams cad khye'u des so tshes byed do/ de las gdubyed kyang rung shing las gang
byed kyang rung/ tshong byed kyang rung/ gru'ilas byed da rung/ sa las byas so rtseg 'jiganyid 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// danas khyim bdag rmos pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
gis 'dir lasagang byed kyang rung ste/ zhing lasakhyed kyang rung/ tshong byed kyang rung/ gru'i las byed kyang rung/ bdag gis las byas socig 'jig cing 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ 'dzug
[7]@#/// rtenan mi 'jig pa'i chos gang 'jig par mi 'gyur ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhige ga snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag rmos pa de'i mdza'abodang/ grogs pa dang/ phu
b+ha nudang/ rgan rabs snying gi bu ston gyi lha zhig khyim bdag rmos pa'i khyo ga sgo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim de thams cad snangab chen pos khyab par byas te/ khyim bdag rmis
ba la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang/ 'jig ba'i chos can m yin pa gang yin pacha rishas sam/ khyim bdag gis
smas pa// lha dag gis ni'ajig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang/ 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mashesan/ lha khyodakyis 'jig rtenana'ajig pa'i chos
@# na gang yin pa dang/ 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa gang yin pa shes sam/ lhas smras pa/ khyim bdag ngas kyang 'jig rtenan 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang/ 'jig pa'i chos
can s yin pa gang yin pa mi shes so// khyim khadag gis smras pa/ lha bona'ajig rten ne'ajigakha' chos can gang yin pa dang/ 'jig pa'i chos can m yin ba gang yin pa sus shes
lhas smas ba/ khyim bdag shes pa yod// dge sbyong go'u tamakya'i tu/ kya'ogegs las skra dang kha spu bregs to/ chos gos tshon can khagosanas/ yang dag pa'i dad/
ba pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byun gnas / des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcom ldan 'das des ni 'jig rtenan 'jib pa'i//
chos can gang yin pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mkhyen to// khyim bdag gis skyas pa/ lhabcom ldan 'das de da ltag la bzhugs/ lhas smras pa//
khyim bdag shar phyogs kyi ljongasan/ yul mnyan du yod pa zhes bya ba zhig yodadu/ de'i nang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalamagon med zasats+tshan kun dga' ra ba na daltar bcom ldan 'das de
bzhugs kyis/ khyim bdag khyod 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la/ dar byin nas bcom ldan 'das 'don 'di drisol/ bcom ldan 'das des khyod la ji skad du
lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung zhig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas de thosam thag tukhyim bdag rmes pa bcom ldan 'das blta 'dod par gyur to// de nas phyi
zhig na/ yul shurapa raka'i tshodapa mang po dag gis bong khyar te/ mnyan du yodapar dong nas/ de dag der dong bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan bal dad pa rnyed par gyur te//
skyabasasu 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/ de dag phyi zhogon thodod rin rnams khyer te/ yul shur pa ra kar 'ongs nas/ dedag giso ma bdag mos pa'i mdu//
pa[a]@#// dusangs rgyas drung chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do// 'di skad ces kyang sgras// bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis
shAde bo lta ba'i phyir khyodasong zhig dang/ des khyod kyi lus dang sems kyi nad gsobar 'gyur ro// de nas des tshig de thos lhag par yang ra com ldan 'das kyi thad du ltar 'gro ba'i sdeb skyes
so[}]don rgya zhig na khyim bdag rjesabs brgyags mang po khyer te/ bzhon pa lazang po la zhon nas/ yul shur ra ra kanas bzhag gis mnyan du yod par phyin te/ ji srid du
bzhin du rung ba'i sa de srid du bzhon ras song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalaM/
ta phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag rmos pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa bdag ni rnag can gyi lus
'dis dman par gyur/ de tsha bar gyur pas na/ spang bar 'tshal lo// smad par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalar khyim bdag lus 'di ni nad lta bu yin no/
phol mig lta bu yin no// zug rngu lta bu yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khung bo de nyid las brtsams nas/ de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na khyim
bdag rmos pas lha de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthonapo nyi shu yashes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ gal te bdag gi lus
'di kho na ltar mgyuran/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ste/ chu bo rnams las yang dag par brgal bar bya ba dang/ sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'ad/
bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad par bya ba zhig go snyam mo// doltar rab tu 'byung ba'i sams bskyedam zatu khyim bdag de'i lus lag mthil bzhin du rmed par gyur
tre dadanas de lhag par yang btsos len 'das la dga' bar gyur to// de dga' bar gyur nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyenapar rdzogs
shing dag slong gi dngos po thob tu rungan/ bdag kyang brtsom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa sbyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis do dge slong tshur shog cas bya ba'i
gi sarab tuphyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de la lung yang phog ste/ dos kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrubab dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gumadubyas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'o dodachags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyamang/ nam mkha' dang
lag mtha'i du'adrab 'i sems dang ldan// tsanadan snyangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo ra'i sbubasabcom pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so
so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa'i ridapa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur stel ma lta ba dang/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas la'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang/
gus par smakha'i gnas su gyur te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rmas pa snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon te/ lhung bzed thogasanas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ba las/
brdzus mas brdungs te/ saMsadanas de 'anaMkar dbang po rnams rnam par dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag ste/ pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to// de nas dge slong mang po
sdadrongasham thabs dang chos gos gyon te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ba las/ drag slongamang po mnyan du yodapar bsad stems la dong ba
rnams kyis// yul shur pa ra ka'i khyim bdag rmos pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de brdzus mas brdungs te bsad nas/ da'ache kar dbang po rnams rnam par dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog
yongs su dag ste/ pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur te zhes thos so// thos nas kyang dge slong mang po rnams mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms blangs te zan zos nas/ zas/
phyis len pa sbyangs te/ lhud pa zed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyog
gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khodanas/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'din bdagatsug
dge slong mang po snga dror sham thabs dang chos gs 'tshal te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la mchis pa las/ yul shular ka'i khyim bdag chos pa zhes
bgyi ba dob dus mas brdungs te bkum nas/ dgum kar dbang po rnams rnam pa dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag ste/ pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to zhes thos lags na/
de'i 'gro ba ni gang lags/ de'i skyo gnas ni gang lags/ 'gro ba'i sa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de ni nga'i chos kyi
rjes su 'thun pa'i chos rtogs pas na/ nor du gyur pa yin no// dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de mya ngan las 'das kyis/ 'di'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa gyisoshig/ de ltar
bcom ldan 'dus kyis tshe dang ldan pa rmos pa mchog tu gyur bar lung bstananas/ dge slongamang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mnyan
h+pha te bcom ldan 'das kyi thadanas dong nas/ dedag gis de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mnodapa byas te/ rus bu'i mchod rtenabartsigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong stalhags
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bosaphyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun patshe dang ldan ba rnos pas las ci bgyisan/ las do'i rnam
par smin ngas ba jus mas brdungs te bkum lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags pa'i stongadu lhag par yang
'i smon lag las gyur te/ pu ska ra ri'i sa'i sngon gyi rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// gsolar// btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa rmos pas las ci bgyisan/ 'ag
de'i rnam par smin pas phyagacing mo'i mang la longs spyod chesaMrigasasu skyes lags/ las rtsibagyisan/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rmas zhu lu tu yog par gyur te/ 'di'i lus
las rnagakhrag 'dzag cing/ 'di'i lus las dring 'byung bar gyur la/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mamanyos par ma bgyis nas/ btsim ldan 'das kyi bstan
0bal rab tu byung ste/ nyon medas po thams cad stangasanas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sams bskyed ma thag tu de 'a lus la rnam mchis par gyur/
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'da' tshog m yin te/ 'das pa'i dusanayoda'adis las de dag byus shing bsags lasan/ 'dinyidi
kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag lasakhyas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par
mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ mo'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams n zin/
pa'i tshud pa dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'dzab zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams// bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed na bra// gas
shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin pa ra 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wArA NA sin rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba
zhig rgyal po byed de/de'i tshi wA ra NA son cig bdag gnyis zhige gnas pa las/ dganyis panaMtshun 'grasanas/ de'i nang nas gcig gis rgyal po la nor mang po zhig phul to/
[sf]@#// khyim bdag cig shes rgyal de las brnyes nas/ de rgya la po tshangs pas byin gyis gshags 'gyed da/'i tshi g.yo gshugs kyis bab par byas nas/ khyim bdag
da la byin te/ des de rang gi khyim du khrid nas lcag gis zhen par ba zhus nas/ lcags rmadedag gi nang du dug ga phye mas gtor te/ de'i lus de sha snag bu bzhin du gyur nas// de
phu nu rnams kyis nor mang po zhig gis blus te/ smanapa'i lung gis de'i lus ses bar byas so// de nas phyi zhoge na de skyo ba skyes nas/ bdag khyim n ga gnas pas nog gis/
dka' thub kyin gs tshul du 'gro'o snyam ste/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag myasanas/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal du brten bcas so// de der song nas slob dpon
med pa dang/ man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dran par byas nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so// de nas des bsams pa// khyim bdag
rgyudas bdag gi rgyud las bsod nams ma yin pa chen po bskyud kyis/ bdag seng la khyim bdag de gar mda' bya'o snyam nas/ gnas de nyidanas nam mkha' la khyim bdag de ga la ba der songs
sar ba dang/ lam mi 'dug pa dang/ char babab dang/ glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to// so so'i skye bon rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par 'gyur te/ de sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du de'i
00 rkang pa la phyag 'tshal tas+yAs pa// skal bachen po mar spyon/ bdag nyes par spyodang 'i 'dam du bying ba las la gnas drang du gsel zhes byas so// de nas de kho na la snying brtse ba'i phyir sul
babs nas/ des de'i rkangang la phyag 'tshal te/ bawod pa gsol nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyang bsod snyoms bzhedal/ bdag kyang bsod nams 'tshal bas/ bdag giskyid
mas tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs shing dang/ bdag gis kyang yo byad thums cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi// de nas rang sangs rgyas des khyim bdag de la cang ma sku bas gnang ngo// de nas
khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de'i phyir yal ga dang/ lo ma'i spyil po phub nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed ba la zhugs so// de nas phyi zhig na rang sangs rgyas des
bsams pa// bdag gis rnamacan gyi lus 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis byas zin gyis/ ma la bdag ka ba'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ 'bar ba dang/ lam mer/
'dug pa dang/ char 'bab pa dang/ glog 'gyu ba'i mo'aphrul rnams bstan nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'dasaso// de
nas khyim bdag das de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas/ sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsegs te/ mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
ni bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyugatsing nor mang la longs spyod chema'i rigs su skye bar shog cig/ 'di'is kyang ches khyad par du kho phags
zhwapa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyuracig/ mamanyes par byed par ma gyuratsagi/ yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyad bdag gis thob par shog cig/ bdag gis 'dil gnod pa byas pa'i
las de bdag la 'ong bar ma gyurag/ tsaste las 'di'i rnam par smin pa bdag la gdon mi za bar 'ong bar gyur na yang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi bkra ma shis pa de med
bar gyur te/ bkra shis pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i mkhyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa des rmos pa 'di kho na yin te/
des khyomi bdag de'i lus la lcag gsib zhus nas/ dug gi phyi masagator pa'i las de'i rnam par sna na pas na/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lus 'di lta bur gyur to// des phyir yang rang/
sangs rgyas dal bkur sti byas nas/ smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas na/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ dge
slong dag rangasangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te/ mimanyes par ma bgyis la/ rab tu 'byung bar sems bskyed ma thag tu
de'i bkra mi shis pa med par gyur te/ bkra shis pa 'byung bar gyur te/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tubyung nas/ nyon mongs pa thamasacad sbyangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
byas go/ gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungasakyi gsung rab la 'dirang du byung ste/ der 'dis tshegacig tu tshangs par spyod ba sbyadanas/ dbang po rnams yos
su smin par byas pa des n/ daltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// bram ze gsum zhes bya ba del/ bram ze dang de ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i
tshomanyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams te/ mchod sbyin byed pa der rgyal khams tha dad pa'i bram ze rnams 'dus ra ra gyur te/ de dag gis bsams pa// mnod
sbyin byed pa bo gang du'aglab modong/ 'tshang 'dru ba dang 'gyed pa dang/ rtsod pa 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin de'i mi 'grub de snyam mo// de nas phyi shog namachod sbyin byed deraljongs na gnas pa'i
bram zad ng/ mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze yod gyi phyir 'dug pa rnams 'athabamecung nas/ mthal na gnas ba'i bram ze rnams kyis smas pa/ khyadan zhong blas kyis 'tsho ba yin pas na/
yon 'di rnams ni khyed la 'ong ma yin no// ngod na yin gyi gnas yin pAn/ yon 'di rnams ni nged la 'os zhes zer ro// ljongs na gnas pa rnams ra/ kyakhyed rnams kyad
rgyal po'i dpa' bo la brten pa yin pas na khyod yon gyi 'os ma yin gyi/ nged ni yon gnas yin pas na/ yon gyi 'os yin nozhes zer nas/ dedag ter 'khrab
modod/ 'tshang 'drub dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ rtsod pas g.yen zhinga' khod pa'i skabs su bram ze gzhan zhig gis mchod sbyin byed pa'i gnas de nas gser dngul dang/ bza' ba dang/
bca'ab mang po khyer te bros pa las/ debram bdadag gis bzungs nas/ khu tshur dang rdogar dag gis shin tu zhan par brtags te bor ro// de nas da brdegs btsegs pas 'chi bas 'jigs
shing skrag nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs so// de der zhugs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyod lam mdzes shing sgrubaskyangs te/ rtsaco med par 'khod
pa mthong ngo// mthong ma thagatu de bcom ldan 'das kyi pa stan ra la dga' bar gyur to// de dga' bar gyur nas bsams pa// bdag bram ze byed pas tshig gis// bcom ldan 'das
kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das galab der songaste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gab
nas bcom ldan 'adis ga la ba de logasasu thalamo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
'byung pa dang/ bsnyen ra rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thod tu rung na/ bdag kyadabcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshigagis rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyenapar rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubyas te/ des dgra bcom pa nyidathong nas bsams la// bdag gis gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta ru yod skad
sta dbaltasan/ mchod sbyin gyi badrag po la sogs pa bram ze stong phrag mang po 'dul bar 'gyur ba mthong nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul nas mi snang bar gyur te/ gnas de nyid
nas nam mkha' las mnod sbyin gyi gnas dor song nas/ mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang/ dram ze gzhan dag gis dgaslong de steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong pa mthong ngo// mthong nas
kyang dedag dag slong de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' bor gyuranas/ de rnams kyis phad du 'khyudade stan la bzhag nas/ rkang nga la phyag 'tshal te// chos mnyan pa'i phyir
mdun du 'khod do// de nas dge slong des de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/ des na ma chod sbyin gyi bdag po dang/ bram ze de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig
tshog sal lta ba'i ri'i rtsomamathon po nyi'u ya shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// 'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cherani/
sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang/ chos la 'bab pa dang/ dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod de// donas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunang
bram ze 'dis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/
nyon mongs pa thams rud spangs tedagra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to// gsol//
'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa badrang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo to khri zur pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamed pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshi wA rA Nas dram ze zhiga gnas pa las gtan tshigs snga ma gzhin dugyur te/ rab tu byun gnas des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad
nas 'chikar smona' ma btabar/ 'diltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstanang la cha gtsug tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshog sani
yang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u blam lung bstan pa gang yin pa 'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur
cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ de kho na'i bstanor la rang tu byung nas/ nyonamedas pa thams cad spungs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas
sa dge slong dag ji snyam du semaso/ de'atshi bram bor gyur pa gang yin pa da ni bram ze 'di kho na yin te/ des der tshegacig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ 'akarasmon lam btab
ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sa ngos rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par spyod par gyur cig/ mam sa
par byed par ma gyur cig/ de khana'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas// nyon mongs pa tham sa cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubyed par gyur cig ces byas ba des n/ dge
slong dag nga yang dag pa ra rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang shin tu mnyam pa dang/ shugs mnyam pa dang/ mdzad pa mnyam pa dang/ thabs mnyam pa brnyes pa ra gyur nas/ 'dis
ngamanyes par byas te/ mamanyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas// nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas
so/ bram zaganyis pa ni/ glingagazhi mnyan du yodang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yodapa na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlarab ba pa las chung ma blangs nas//
dedadang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyod pa las/ phyo zhog na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang bu btsas te rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags nas/
dra 'o mdang/ no dang/ mar dang/ kun mar dang/ mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te/ dgang gi tshicher skyes pa de'atsho/ de yi ge bslabs so// bram ze de rnams kyi lug
kyis na/ tshes brgyad dang/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par gsang bar byed do// res 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'gre'o/ res 'ga' mu stegs ltar 'gro 'om/ lha ltar 'gro ba 'am/ yam
rma srog shar rdar 'gro'o// de nas phyi zhogan bram ze'i khyabude bsad dus la bab nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel du song ngo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na
bzhugs shing chos ston te// bram ze'i khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to// dga'
05 bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song staphyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de'arkyen dang 'tsham par chos bstan nas/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas so// de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyis gtam
mjug rdzogs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yid rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom/
ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo// de nas phyi zhagan bram ze'i khye'u des mchod sbyan bya bar brtsams nas/ bram ze'i khye'u mchodasbyin gyi ba gnas ni 'dug pas bsams pa/ gal te btson
ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te longs spyod par mdzad cing/ bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso la bzhugs na/ mchod sbyin gyi gnas mdzes par 'gyur ro snyam nas
des bsams pa// bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/ kyam bcom ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir longs spyod cing gshegs par gyur cig ces bsamasasu/[â€ ]/de nas bram ze
des sems bskyed ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur ta/ mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs nas/ mi snang bar bram ze thams cad kyi gral gyi
[p]bya// gtso la bzhugs so// bram ze'i khye'u des n sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gcol bzhugs par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u des bcom
h+pha ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ bza'ab byatsa' bgatsangam bzang po mang nges tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mchod sbyin gyi gnas de longs spyad nas/ mi snang
bar bram ze rnams cud la 'od zer btang nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so// de nas bram khro de dgagis mchod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par mthong/
mthong nas kyang de dag na re/ bdag cag gi mchod sbyin grub bo zhes zer ro// khatsugan ren/ bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa byung ngo zhes zer ro// gzhan
kha cig na ra ni/ 'din tshangs pa ma yin gyi/ dbang phyug debadag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so zhes zer ro// gzhan kha cig na ra ni/ 'di ni tshangasaM pa yang ma yin/ dngad/
phyug kyang m yin gyi/ khyab 'jug de bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir byung ngo zhes zer ro// bram ze'i khya'agar/ kyakhyed rnams thams cad nibasus pa yin te/ mchod na gyi
gnas 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs sozhes zer ro// de nas bram ze rnamaMs bram ze'i khye'u la yid m ches nas/ bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bdag gis sang nang par ni khyid kyi mngon
00 ]sum du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes byas nas/ bram ze'i khye 'u des phyi de nyin bram rje thams cad tshegs pa'i nang du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ thal mo sbyar nas sems bskyed de tshig tu smras pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni 'di lta ste/ 'dasapa dang/ ma 'ongs de dang/
da ltar byung ba ci yang mamkhyen pa 'am/ mgazigs pa 'am/ thugasasum chud pa ci yang mi mang ban kyi ma bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag cag gi
mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te longs spyad par gsol zhes byas he// de nas de skad ces brjod pa'i modal/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/ dge slong
ga dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshags te/ mi snang bar bram ze rnams kyi gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/ bram 'i khya'u des sangs
rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus su bzhugs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la bdor song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas so// de nas bram ze rnams n re/ khye'u 'din smyos te/ gcig du ci yang bla zhing 'dug ge zhes zer ro
denas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa// bdag ni skyes pa ma yin gyi/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis zha ma ring byas te/ mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dadus/
nabazhugs so zhes byas// de nas bram ze'i khye'us deskad ces brjod ma thag tu/ ci nas bram ze de dag thumasAcad kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par
mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dadusan bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bzhugs so// de nas khram ze'i khye'u des 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du bsrem ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pasatshim par byas te ci bzhed pa ba stabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa shes gsol zin te/ gsang sder/
gi rgyu phyag ni bcapas par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khya'u de chos kyi gtam
gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du da rug yang dag par gzangs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las banengs te gshegs so// de nas
bram ze rnams gzhi de las khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa tshanapo skyes to/ ngod kyi phyir bza' ba dang bca' babashams pa de dag dag sbyong go'u ta ma la byin no zhes zer zhing de dag khros pas bram ze'i

[s/]khye'u du gsod par byos pa las bres te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du songan/ 'on kyang bram ze dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ rgyal du rgyal byed kyi rgyal gyi ba bdu song nas smras da/ bdag/
cag gis 'di rgyal du rgyal byed kyi mal du gsod par mi nus te/ 'dini khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yongs su bzungab yin pa'i steng du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khrims bcas so snyam/
du rig nas phyir log de/ bram ze'i khye'u de ni 'jigs shing skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi ka ban la ra go bas dug gamal te/
chos mnyan pa'i phyir sdu ni sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ nyes pa dung/ rang bzhin thugs su chud
nas de dang lAthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na bumacu'i khye'u dus stan de nyid la 'dug baTani du'ajig tshogs la ltapa'i ri'i rtse me mthenapo tigu ye shes rdo rjes brtsom ras/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs tu/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gsar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su sgra9
bsgyur re ba tud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang
ba/ @#// dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas rnams las phyung ste/ lha dang ma rnams kyin ng du gom pa 'dor du stsal ba dang/ 'khor ba'i mthur gtugs pa dang/ khrag dang
mchima'i rgya mtsho rnams bskams pa dang/ rus pa'i la rnams bsgrol ba dang/ thog ma mamanyis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsememathon pe nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mdzad pa 'di lta bu na bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis// lha rnams kyis kyang ma ngagyis/
nang mi dang gnyen mang po rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags se// btsunapa 'dag re gas
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po blob tu rungan/ bdag kyang btsem ldan 'das kyi thad du tsungs de ru spyod pa spyad par 'tshal/
lo de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung// bsnyen pa ra rdzogs par mdzad nas/ del lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang/
bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thamasacad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u 'di bram ze rnams kyis dgum par chad pa las/ de'ajigs shing skrag nas rab tubyung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dusan yang bram za'i ci'u 'di bram ze 'ad
dag kho nas gsodapar byas pa las/ 'di 'jigasashing skrag nas rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar tshe gcig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de nyon cig/ dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tsha le nyi khri thubapan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtan m ga
pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshewArANasI nA dras
thazhig gnas pa des/ thabs M zlar babapa las chungam blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ de la bu yang mod/ du me yang med/ phyi zhi
na de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas te bsams pa// 'di ltar bdag gikhyim n nor dang gser dang ldan par 'dug kyang/ bu yang med/ bume yang med pas/ bdagashi ste dus las 'das
mas/ pa'i 'og tu ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur la/ bdag la bu med pas 'jig rten du yang rung bar mi 'ong ngo snyam ste/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug go
denas des 'dilta bur yid m bcas te/ gal te bdag gi bu skyes par gyu'on mchod sbyin byas te/ bram ze rnams la yon mang po dbul bar bya'o zhes zer zhing/ dbu skyor re zhing 'dug
ste de ring ngam/ sang du bdag gi bu skyobar 'gyur ro snyam sams bzhin du/ de'i'abrang du bram ze de rgas nas bu yang med/ bu mo yang med par gyur to// danas phyi zhagin bram ze
das bsams pa/ bdag la bu yang med/ sbyin pa gtangab yang ma byas la/ bdag kyang rgas kyis/ dan bdagagi bu skye yang rung/mu skye yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/
