bsod nams dag bya'i snyam m// de nas ci zhig nadas mchod sbyin byas te/ bram ze rnams la yonamang po phul ba las/ yind dag 'gyedapa 'i tshe'athub ma chen po byung sta mnod sman gyi
kyi bdag pos 'thab mo zhi bar bya'o zhes byas nas/ bram ze rnams kyis de nyidakyi steng du brgyugs tagasod do snyam pa las/ de'ajigs shing skrag nas/ drang srong sgruba'i gnas su song ste/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstanang la rab tu byung ngo// ngaderarab tu byung nas/ tshigacig tutshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ 'chikar smon lam btab nga/ 'di ltar
wa bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la tshe gcig tu tshungs par spyod paspyad kyang/ yon tanagyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bsten pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas partsem ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed pa ra gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/
dbona'i bstan pa la rab tubyung nas/ nyon medus pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag de'i tshe bram ze gyur pa gang
yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'di bram ze rnams kyis gsod par byas pa las/ 'di'ajigs shing skrag nas rab tu byung ste tshagacig tu tshungasapar spyodar
spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das debadag gosams
par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ de kho na'i bstanang la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa ra
gyur cig ces byas pa dosan/ dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dong shin tu mnyam pa dang/ shugs mnyam nga dang/ mdzad pa mnyam pa dang/ thangs/
na/ @#// mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/ 'dis nga mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyas nga ra ma byas la// da ltar yang 'di bram ze rnams kyis gsodapar byas pa las 'di
'jigs shing skra gnas rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas so// bram ze gsum pa ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du/
yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pan bram ze zhig ba/sa mchod sbyin byas nas/ gser dngul mang po bram ze'i rnams la yon du phul ba las/ de dag yon 'gyed pa'i
che 'thab me chen re byung nas/ der ljongs na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams na re/ khyed ni rgyal po'i dpang po rnams la sten pa yin gyi/ nged ni yon gnas yin te/ yon dbul ba'i
'os yin pas ni/ yon nyi rim du debang nge zhes zurar// mthu'i na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams na re/ khyed nizhing blas kyis 'tsho ba tshel ba yin gyi ngadan yon gnas yin te/
yon dbul ba'i 'os yin pas na/ nged nayin ti rim du dbang nge zhes ze re// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa// rnam pa gnyis kyi
shes du ba dang ma shes la mnga' brnyesapa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gazhag bgasum la makas pa/ mi 'jigs pa pa'i 'jigs pa med pa// 'gro ba ltar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba//
ba0 skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyod shul ba/ rnam ra ra sha pa brgyad la bsam gtanang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyims pa ra 'jug pa dgu la sems nga ro
'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa// yang dag par ser ga'i sgra chen re sgrogs da rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyani dus gsum mtshan dus gsum sta/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu
sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ sun der/ su ni 'phongasashing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ sun gnod pa dang ldan/ sun 'apongs pa dang/
nyan ngab dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ su nin gnas ong dug nolaM/ sun ngonas da du 'bab/ sunin gnas odadu dang/ su ni des ngan song nas phyung ste/ mthoros dang/ rdor
'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ sunas par spyod pa'i 'dam du bya ba las lag nas drad bar du/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdunamed pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du
gzhug par bya/ suni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyod par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni dag pa'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su snyorawaM/
ba las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brdol bar bya/ su la nisangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs par jug go/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi/
gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// des bcom ldan
cha 'das kyis mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/ dge slong mang posazham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ sad/
nyid las nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te/ dge slongag dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te/ de mthong ma thog tu do rnams bcom ldan 'das la shin tu
dag 'a bar gyur to// dga' bar gyuras/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram bre de dag la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag chud pa drug po rnam
! pa lta'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i 'thab mo'i rtsa ba 'di'i phyore 'thung tur yod ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa de nyid sbas pa las brtsams nas/ de dang 'thun pa 'a chos
ba stan te/ des na bram ze brgya phrag du ma dag gis stan dedag nyid la 'bod bzhin du btsagani rdo sol 'gyurapa bskyed do// kha cig gis ni spyi ba dang/ bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bod pa dang/ 'di
rtenagyi chos kyi mchog dang/ mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyedade// khacig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
mtshaba mngon sum dubyas so// khacig gis ni phyi'i mi 'i ngob 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas so// khacigagasan 'khor los
sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do// kha cig ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang/ gcig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur bdang/ kha cig gis ni nas ra ra 'gyur pa dang/
khecog gsanAnyan blos kyi byang chub dang/ kha cig gisan rang sangs rgyas kyi byang nubo dang/ la cig gsan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa de na bskyed do// 'khor de dag
nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bang/ dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod nas// gtsug lag khangadu gshags so// donas dge slong rnams kyis/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'di rnams kyis lasar bgyis na/ las de'i rnam bar snyan pas kha cig gis ni decom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyen
par ma bgyis/ khacig gis ni rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa//
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la/ 'di rnams las kha cig na dag bsten du gyur to// kha cig ni rab tu byung nas der de dag gis tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba
dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te/ dbang po rnams yongs su sman par byas pa des n/ daltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//
A bam po sum cu drug pa// khyab 'jug ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das yulam ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dge slong stong dang thabs gcig ste/
thams cad kyang sngon gyi ral pa can sha stag ge/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa// srid par kun tu sbyor ba yod
su zad r// yang dag pa'i shes pas sems rnam par grol ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ yul ma ga d+hAb rnams kyi mchod rtenarab brtan zhes bya ba na/ smog ma'i
nags khrod kyi rgyud thog thug gangshegs nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rang brtan du byen nus/ mag d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan gyi phyogs der bzhugs so// de nas yul ma gat+ta
rgyal po bablo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dunamang pa dag slong steng dad thangs gcig tu yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yulam ga d+hapa lharnags
kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/ smig ma'i nags khrodadu byon te zhes thesaso// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang// shing rtakhri nyis stong dang/
00 kod ma stong brgyad brgya dang/ yul ma ga d+han gnas pa'i bram re dang/ rtsin bdag stong phrag du ma dag dang zangs gcig tu rgyal po'i ngang nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngalta ba dang//
bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du so ngab las grong khyer gyi sgor byung banas/ de'i mgo bo las cod pan lhung nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
gis bcom ldan 'das blta ba ma legs pa zhig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyis sbanapa/ 'di ni legs par 'gyu/ khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das bltab dang/
bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni legs par 'gyur pa yin no// delta med kyi khyad gang dag dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa ni de dag kha cig ni khri mon du bcug cing 'dug ba rtsi/
ni yul dgan 'dug gis/ rgyal po khyod kyis ngatson rnams btang ba'i rigs se// ljongs dag tu yang dril bsgrags te/ de dag dang lhan cig tu ngacom ldan 'das nga lta ba dang/
bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir deng zhig ces byas so// de nas de rjes ma thug rtargyal po gzugs can snying pos brtson rnams btang nas/ yulan gnas pa raMskye bo mang po tham sa
bsdus to/ do skye bo phal po che dag dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+hu pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/ snyig ma'i nags khrod kyi rgyud thog thag tu song nas/ des rang gi
ba00[p]// dpung ga tshogs rnams la phyir bltas te/ des dmag tshogs chen po mthong nas rgyags pa skyes te/ byad gzugs dang/ mthu bdag dang mtshungs pa med desnyam
zla mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ dbas kyang ches blta na sdug pa dang/ ches khyod gzugs bzang ba'i rgyal po lnga
brgya mngon par sprul nas/ de dag la chos ston cing bzhugs so// de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ dejisod
dubazhon ngas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa desrid dubazhonor la rten tison gnas / rgyal thabs rnam pa lngaste/ gtsug tor dang/ gdugs dang/ ral gri dang/ nor bu dang/ rnga yab rnams
dang lham khra bo rnams bzha gnas / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan ldan/ rgyal po chos gzugs bzang zhing chos
mdzas pa lnga brgya chos nyanacing 'khod pa mthong anas/ de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to// de nas de 'di snyam du soms te/ gal te bdag gis bdag gi ming
dang rus nasam smosan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyisam dgongs so snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar te/ dusamo g.ya/
ba 0 ]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bdag gi ming dang rus lan gsum gyi bar du smos te/ datsun babadag ni yul ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// btsun pa bdag ni yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal de bablo sbyangs gzugs can snying re lags so zhes byas so// bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka'
stsal pa// rgyal lo donadi yin te/ khyodan yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snyade po yin na/ rgyal po chen po rang gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug cig/ de nas yul ma gzhi/
rgyal po babro sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag khacig bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabasal phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu'akhod du// khacigon bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar
'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
kha cig gis ni thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'dasa mthong nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ltangargyas 'od srungs ral pa can yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug go
de nas yulam ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen bod 'od srungs kyi thadanatshangs par spyad pa spyodadam/ 'on te ltangargyas
'od srus rol pa can dag sbyong chen po 'o tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig gu snyam mo// do nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyi sems thugs kyis
mkhyenas/ tshe dang ldan pa ltangargyas 'od srungs latshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ltengargyas gnas pa khyod kyis ci mthong na// 'dir ni mi spar drang srong brtul zhugs spangs// 'od srungs
khyod kyi sbyin sreg phyir sbas/ don da lakun nas brjod par gyis// gsolar/ 'din kha cig zas dang btung ba rnams// khu bcud 'dod dadabu med bsngags par bgyid/
do rnams bungape'i dri ma mthong pas na// bdag ni mchod sbyin m la dga' m mchis// bka' stsal pa// khyod ni 'dod pa rnams lama dga' zhing// zas skom stan rnams la yang mig za/
na khyodan ji ltar lha mi'i 'jig rten na// yid dga' 'od srungs dris pa'i lan blob cig/ gso'ab/ bung pomadapa zhi mchogaci yang med// 'dod dang srid la ma chags gzhan
mi 'gyur// gzhan gyis bkra'i medago 'bangamathobasan/[0f10]bdag gi mchod sbyin el dga' mamachis// mchodasbyin nams dang brtul zhugs me rnams kyis// grol bar 'gyur snyam
ba zabadag gi yid kyang rmongs// 'chi 'pho mamachis gnasamatshog ma mthong bas// skye 'chi'i rjes 'brang bdag ni long bar gyur// mi mchog skyob pas legs gsungs 'dus ma byas// ge
'phang don bdag gis d mthong ngo// thub pa rnam 'drenago'i tam bden pa'i rtsal// khyodon skyi bamang phyi'i byung ba lags// bka' stsal pa// rab tu rnam par phye ba'i chos rnams la// gnas/
kyi gshis su bab pa gang yin pa// de ni khyod kyis legs par basams pa yin// khyod kyis gtan la legs pas legs par 'ongs// khyodasungs 'khor rnams skyo ba ma skyed cig donas
tsha dang ldan pa ltang rgyas 'od srungs rul ra can gyis ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa dolta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gnam mkha' la mngon par 'phags
nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de// 'chag pa dang/ sdod pa dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyalabar byed de// ma'i khams la snyoms par 'jug par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
'od srungs ral pa can me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar ro dang/ btsod kha
dang sholagyi kha dog lta burnams 'byung ngo// cho'aphrul zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi stodanas na me 'bar la/ lus kyi smad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab po/ lus kyi smad
ga/ nasam 'bul/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babade/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dung [.]byang phyogs su yang

klu/ dadang 'dra bar byas so// danasatshodang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pacinagyis phyogs bzhi'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bzhi'i stananas/ rdzu 'phru'a mngonopar 'du byed pa bsdus te/ bla gos
phragapa gcig tu gzar nas/ pusam g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'dasani bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdagani da bar gshegs pa'i nyan
thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ 'od srungs don de yin// den donate/ 'od srungs khyod kyi ston pa ni nga nyid yin na// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od

srungs khyod rang gi stan ji ltar bzhin du'adugacig/ donas tsho dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can rang gi stan ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas yulam ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnam

naMsnyam du sems te/ ltangargyas 'odosrungs ral pa can de dag sbyong chen po ga'i tama'i thadanatshangs bar spyad pa spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong chen po lding rgyas 'od srungs kyi thad na tshangs par spyad/
'tha pa spyod panam yin no snyam mo// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal pochen po gzugasan skye yang skye la/ 'grab
kyang 'grub ste/ de'i skye ba yang rig par bya dgos la/ 'grib ba yang rig par bya dgos so// rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang/ 'dus shes dang/ 'dubyed rnams dang/ rnam par shos/
pa yang skye yang skyel/ 'gribakyang 'grib ste/ 'i skye ba yang rig par byadagosal/ 'grong pa yang rig par bya dgos so// rgyalabo chon re gzugs skye ba dang 'grib pa'i chos can yin par
ri gnas / gzugs de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen pe tshor nga dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'dubyad rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skyo ba dang/ 'grib pa'i chos can yin pa rarig nas/
rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so// rgyal bo chen po gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugasad la bdag gi yin no snyam du'adzinapar ma byed/ len par mabyed/ gnas par ma byed//
mngon par gnapar ma byadade// rgyulapatshan ba tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su shesan/ rnam par shes pa de la bdag gi badrago yin nosnyam
du'adzinapar mi byed/ len par mkhyed/ gnas par mabyed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed de/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la mi 'dzin M/ tshalan/ mi gnas / mngon par zhen par mabyed
ma ga/ na dbag tumedang/ grangs med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes ng zer ro// rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par/
zhwa shesang mi' dzan/ mi lan/ mi gnas / mngon par zhen par ma byed na/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa// mya ngonalas 'das pa zhes nga zer// donas yul ag d+ha'i bram zad ng/
khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ castegazugs bdag ma yin zhing/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin no// bdag gam//
bsems can nam/ srog gam/ skyob 'am/ gso ba 'am/ gangabrag gam/ shadabu 'am/ nad can nam/ byed pa 'am/ byed pa po 'am/ sgrub po 'am/ tshorang po ma//
skyed pa po 'am/ kun tu skyed pa bo su zhig 'gyur/ ma skyes shing ma byungal/ 'byung ba mi 'gyur na yang phung po 'di dag ni 'dor la/ phung bo gzhan 'i na par mi'agyur ro snyam mo// de nas
zla bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+ha'abram zad ng tsami bdag rnams kyi sems shugs kyis mkhyonanas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni/ so so'i badzes
pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis so ser bzung bar zad kyi/ 'dinabadag kyang med/ bdag gi yang med do// dge slong dag skyo ban sdug bsngal 'di nyid skyel/ 'gag par sdug bsngal 'di nyid
ba 'gag go/ skye ban du byed rnams nyid skye la/ 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams tid 'gag so// rgyu de dag dang/ rkyenade dag las brten nas/ sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug par 'gyur ro//

dge slong dag de ngagon gshegs pas naaM/ sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud kyi mtshams sbyor ba thugasasu chud nas/ 'chi lo dang skyo ba zhes 'dogs par 'dzad do// lha'i sman rnamapar dag pa'i mi'i
las 'das pas/ sems can rnams 'chi 'pho zhing 'dug pa dang/ skye zhing 'dug pa// khadog bzang po dang/ khadog nganapa dang/ bzang po dang/ nganapa dang/ bde 'grora'agro ba rnamA
dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams rang/ sems can las ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub rnams kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kye sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod
pa dang ldan pa dang/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams la skurar 'dabs ra dang/ log par lta ba dang/ log

par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyud dang/ rkyen des lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngana'agro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyengar 'gyur ro//
kyis sems can 'di dagazhi lus kyis legs par sbyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ ngagabs legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ yid kyis legs par sbyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams
la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba dang/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang/ sayang dag par blangasara'i gi/ rgyud dang/ rkyen des lus dang bral te/
lha gi de'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'og rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong drag ngas de ltar shes shing/ daltar mthong bas na/ nga ni 'di skadadung ni bdag de yin nozhi 'am
ni sems can m/ srog gam/ skye ba'am/ gso ba 'am/ gang zag gam/ shod bu 'am/ shod can m/ byed pa 'am/ byed pa bo'am/ sgrub pa 'am/ tshor ba
po 'am/ spyod pa po 'am/ kun tu skyed pa de yin no zhes ma zer ro// ma skyes shing ma byung la 'byung bar mi 'gyuranaya de phung po 'di dag ni 'dor la phung po gzhan ni'i nangor mi 'gyur ro snyam
dumi 'dzin to// chos kyi brdatsaman ma gtogs te/ de la chos kyi brdani 'di lta ste/ 'di yodan 'di 'byung la/ 'di skyes pas 'di skyo bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ mariso pa'i rgyun
zla gyis 'du byad rnams 'byung/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mde dang gzugs 'byung/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skyo mchadadrug 'byung/ skye
mched drug gi rkyen gyis regor 'byung/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'byung/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'byung/ srid pa spyodabyas len pa 'byung/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung/ srid pa'i rkyen
ba gyis skye ba 'byung/ skyeba'ican gyis rga shi dang/ mya nganadang/ zla sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug sngalab dang/ yid m bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyurato/ deltar n sdug bsngal
gyi khung po chen po 'bagazhig po 'di byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltaste/ 'dimadan 'di mi 'byung/ 'di'agags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'dupyod na
'gag/ 'dubyed rnams 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs nyagag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched
drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sredapa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa'i gag/
srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang/ mya nganadang/ smesngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag bar
'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar rgyu byungan sdugasngal 'byung bar 'gyur la// rgyu 'gagasan sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur te/
lamachodaras 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gag par 'gyur ti/ sdug bsngal gyi mtha'amedakhon yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyos
gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal pochen po ji snyam dusems/ gzugs rtag pa yin nam/ tshu la gi/ gso'akha/ btsun pa
wA de ni mi rtag pa lags so/ bka' stsal pa/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba zhinam/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ gsolol/ tsun bden sdug bsngal ba lags so// bka' stsal
ra mi rtagatsang sdug bsngal pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin bde la cithos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos bdag tu 'dzicade/ 'di bdag gi yin no/ 'din bdag yin no//
'dinibadag gi bdagayono snyam du 'dzanitam/ gsol pa// btsunapa den ma lags so/ bka' stsalal/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed/
dang/ rnam par ngedas pa rtag pa yAn nam/ mi rtag pa yin/ gso'akha/ btsun pa de ni log pa lags so// bka' stsal ba/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba nanam/ sdug bsngal
bzhayin/ gsol pa/ btsun pa dan sdug bsngal ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ mi rtag cig sdug bsngal l rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa de la tsho sa pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags ba
blos bdag tu 'dzanicinge/ 'din bdag gi yin no// 'di ni bdag yin no// 'din bdag gi bdag yin snyam du 'dzin tam/ gsol pa/ btsunab ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/
rgyal de tshon med pas na gzugs gang yang rung ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba nang ga 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ ma phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am bzang
bo'am/ nyab 'am/ ridi ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi lad ma yin/ da ni bodag kyang ma yin te/ dakho na ltar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta
bar bya'o// rgyal po nanapo ji snyam dusems/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yang rung ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar
byung ba nang ga'am/ phyi'il gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am ma phra ba 'am/ nganapa 'am/ bzang re 'am/ chub 'am/ ring pa gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi yang ma yani/
dan bdag kyang ma yin/ da ni bdag gi bdug kyang ma yanite/ dekho ltar yang dag par lta babazhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o// de ltar mthong ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags
pa nathos ni gzugs las skyo bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa las skyo bar 'gyur ro// skyon ma chags par 'gyur ro// mtshugs
na rnam par grol bar 'gyur// rnam par grolan bgazhi rnam par grol le snyam du ye shes gzigs r 'jug ste/ bdag gi skye ba ni zad do// tshangs par spyod pa spyad zin ti// mya ngan byas
se srid pa 'di las gzhan medad snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jugag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs

shAcan snying nge lho brgyad khridi yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mgi rdul med cing drim dang bral ba skyes so/ de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po de waM
sbyangs ba zugs can snying pos chos mthong/ chos rnyed/ chos rtogs/ chos kyi ga tings bslabs som nyi las rgal/ the tsem 'a sa rgal taM/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing/ gzhan
rgyas bkri ba med la// ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ snyan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su snga lamo
sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadacasagasol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phagasal gsaso// 'phags lags so// btsun pa bdag ni sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/
dge slong gi dag bdun la skyabs su mchi'i// bdag deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khong nas dad pa'i dge ba snyan legs par gzung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su
gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// jisrid 'tsho'i bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang pa cas ba'i na bza'
ra zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ smanazong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal lozhas gsol to/// de nas dge slong rnams kyis/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag stong phragadu
ma skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug ba grub dang bdeba'i mya ngan las 'dus pa labakodapa drang/ gzhi de las bcom ldan 'dus kyi grags pas
'jig rten kun tu rgyas par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'akha/ da ltar 'ba' zhigam yin te/ 'das pa'i dusan yang rgyal bo gzugs can snying bol sogs pa
lhabargyad khridang/ chu la ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag stong phrag dum mang po 'dinamakhasam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ngas ji ltar
khakodapa dang/ gzhi ni nga'i grags pas 'jig rten rgyas par gyur pa de'on cig/ dgaslong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer rdul ldan zhes bya ban/ rgyal bo phyogs kyi khe dag
bo zhes bya ba rgyal po byed d/ de'i ring la 'byor ba dang/ rgyas M ba dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs po dang/ skye bod mi mang pos gang bdang/ rtsod ba dang 'thobang zhi ba dang/ 'khrug
pa dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ nad dang/ mu gamed pa dang/ 'bras sA lus dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ri glang dang/ ma he dang ldan par 'dug
h+pha ste gnod pa med cing tshar ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal sridabyed do// de nas rgyal ba de btsun mo dang lhan tsag rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ btsun
mo 'bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang/ bu gzugs bzang zhing brtson sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsus ston rgyas pa byas nas/ ming rdul zhes bya bar btags
so/ de nas khye'u rdul padan 'tsho ba'i mam gnyis dang/ numabasnun pa'i mam gnyis dang/ dri ma 'khruba'i mam gnyis dang/ rtse ba'i mam gnyis te/ mam brgyad la gtad nas/ de
ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhunamor dad/ mur gyi snying khu dung/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cig gisabaskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin/
du skye drag par gyur te/ dunas gang gi tshe char skyes pa de'itshe/ khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha
dad pa 'di lta ste/ glang patshabazhon pa dang/ rta bzhon pa dang/ mtshon chu bcang ba dang/ 'phong dang/ mdun du bo nub dang/ phyir bsnur ba dang/ g.yul las thar par bya ba dang/
ba lcags kyusagazung ba dang zhags pas gzung bdang/ mda' ba mi'aphang ba dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang/ mtshon rtse gcis pagadab pa dang/ 'khor lo ba phang po dang/ gared/
ba dang/ gshogs pa dang/ lag pas gzung ba dang/ rkang pa'i stabs dang/ mgo ba bskyabapa dang/ rgyang mag 'phang ba dang/ sgra grag par 'phang ba dang/ gnad du 'phang ba dang/
gdenAm bra bar reg par bya badrang/ tshabasacher gtang ba rnams kyang bsubasanas/ gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to// rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i mdunan 'den na bram ze khyab 'jug ces bya ba
yin te/ dayang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa/ rtsis mgo'i thabs shes parishA rab dang/ dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhig ste/ dargyal pa phyogs kyi bdag po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thamA
cad byed l/ rgyal bo phyogasakyi bdag pos kyang madun na 'don bram ze khyab 'jug de largyal srid gtad nas/ khang bzangs kyi stang na 'dug cing/ budamed 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtsi zhing
dga' la dga' dgur spyod de// phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug gi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am da cu lon pa dang/ bug zugs bzang zhing bstan sdug lamadzes pa zhig datsas te/
de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ ming me skyobazhes btags so// de nas khye'u me skyong 'om dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyi snying rus bskyed bsrings nas/ gang
gi char skyes pa de 'tsha/ yi ga dang/ bram ze'i spyod lam dang/ spyod pa dang/ e zhes bya ba dang/ b+ho zhes bya ba dang/ gtsang sbra dang/ cho ga dang/ thal bgrad

[j]ba dang/ ril ba thogs pa dang/ ngas brjod kyi rig byed dang/ mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang/ snyan tshig gi rigabyed dang/ srid srung gi rig byed dang// mchod sbyin bya ba dang// mchod sbyin byed du
gzhug pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ rlung ba dang/ kha ton bya ba dang/ kha tonabyad du gzhug pa'i thabs paslabs nas/ las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram ze gyur te/ d mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas
bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to// de nas de'i las khya' ma skyong la smras pa// bu khye'u 'dini yab 'das pa'i 'og tuyab kyi thabs kyis rgyugasar 'jug par 'gyur laM/ don 'di'i mdunan 'don du
'gyur gyis 'di la khyed kyis skor cig/ sdunas skor dang khyod la 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// me skyong gis smras pa// jibs ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ gzhon

rgyu nu rdul gyi khyobazhin du grib ma bzhin 'khrung go denas phyi zhogin/ bram zakhyab 'jug shin s da shi ba'i phyir rgyal po phyogasakyi bdag po shin tu mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la skyesngags 'don par byed
de/de nas gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol ba/ lha khyoda'i slad du bram ze khyab ba drug gum pa'i slad du shin tu thugs ngana mdzad cing/ 'bargyal la smre sngags 'dinacing bzhugs/ rgyal pos
wa smras pa/ bram ze khyab 'jugananga'i rgyal po'i 'phrin las bya ba thams cad byed byed de/ de'i mthus nga snying khral chung ngur 'dug go/ gzhen nurdul gyis ga sel la/ lha khyod bram ze khyab
'jug ga 'bum pa'i slad du hacang khrugs nganama mdzad ha caga'o brgyal bar ma mdzad/ hacang smyosdags 'don pa ramatshadzad tsag dang/ lha mkhanapo de nyid kyi bu bram bra'i khye'u ma skyong nas
bgyi ba pha bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mchis pa dalhasamadun na 'don du bskabar gsil/ na tang des lha'i rgyal bo'i 'phrin las bgyi ba thams cad bgyidabar 'gyur ro//
denas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos bram ze'i mi skyong 'gugs pa btang nas/ mdun na 'donadu bcug go/ de nas des kyang rgyal po de'i bya ba thams cad nyams su blangs so//
denas phyi zhig na rgyal bo phyogs kyi bdag bas gzhon nu rdul rgyal sar bcu gnas / phyogs kyi bdagadoshig/ dos pa'i ming gzhonan rdul zhes bya ba demed par gyuranas/ rgyal po rdul
zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po rdul gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'am skyong 'gug pa btang nas de la smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis jiltar nga'i yab kyi rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thams cad
byas pa de bzhin du nga yang gyis shig khram ze'i khye'us gsolo ba/ lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bram ze'i khye'u maskyong gis rgyal bo rdul gyi rgyal srid kyi bya ba thams cad
wa[z/ Â©]// nyams su blangs so// de nas de'i ming me skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur nas/ ma skyong khyab 'jugaces bya bar gyur to// de'i tshargyal po rdul gyi sden gzhon
shA/ nu'i mdza' zhingabashesal gcugs pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu drug cig yod pa de dag rgyal po de'i thad du'ongs nas smras pa/ lhas bdag cag gi yul dbog tugasol/ de nas de thosam
thag tu rgyal des m skyong khyab 'jug la bka' stsal te/ mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen bo 'di na da dun dubagos la/ che drugana gzhon nu 'di rnams la byin cig/ cha gcig ni nga'i bya'o// des
gsol pa// lhade bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/ moskyong khyab 'jug gis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du bgos te/ madrugan gnon drug po rnams la byin no// cha gcig ni rgyal de rdul
gyi skal bar lus shing 'dug go/ de nas rgyal bo rdul gyis rgyal rigs drug po de dag rang rang gi rgyal srid la bkod do// de nas m skyong khyab 'jug 'dzamabu gling thams cad du tshangs par
bkur to/ bram za khyab 'jug ni tshesapa'i lam yin no snyam du'adzin cing tshangs pa'i lam yin par blta'o// de nas phyi zhig nabram ze khyaba'ajug 'di snyam duse mas tre/ bdag ni rgyal
khams thams cad kyi monams kyis tshangs par bkur te/ bram ze khyab 'juganings pa'i 'a ma yin no snyam du 'dzin tsang/ tshangs pa'i lam yin par lta la/ gan bram ze rgas shing
@# la logs la 'dug pa sdetshanagyi slobadapon chen bo dag las bdag gis khros// bram ze gong dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du byams pa dang ldan pa sums kyisa gnas pa de la/ mimajed kyi bdag
po tshangs ba ltag 'ong ngo zhes zer gyis/ ma la bdagags thams cad sbrangs te/ khang bzangs kyi snyingadu songal byams pa dang/ snying rjod ng/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang
ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas par bya gor ma chag stams/ rgyal po la gsol ba/ lhamkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni dubya zla ba bzhings pa'i gnas pas gnas 'tshal te/ do
bsan lhas lha nyid kyi rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bgyi ba gang lags pa thams cad bgyidanga'i mdun du 'don gzhan zhig bsko bar gasol zhes byas s// de nas rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/ khyod
ji ltar dga' ba dobazhin du bya'o// de nas da thos ma thag tukhram bre khyab 'jug chen pos las su bya ba thams cad sngangs te/ khang bzas kyi stengadu song ste/ khang bzangs kyi ste 'dug
cing byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sams kyis gnas so// de nas phyi zhigan/ dal mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs babaltar 'ongs nas/
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i kha dog gimathus khang bzang de dag thams cad snang bachen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas de mthong nas tshigs su bcad desnas pa/ bdag gis khadeg 'di 'drab//
@#// sngan chad ma mthong am thos te// kha dog ldan zhing gzugs bzang ba/ grogs po khyod su zhig lags// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smas pa/ gzhon nu brgya byin
hAlasogs dang// de bzhin lus can g zhan dab kyang/ bdag la tshangs ba'i lus su shes// khyab 'jug de ltar shis par gyis// bram bre zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ tshangs pa
khyod la 'dud par bgyi// tshangs pa khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// bdag gi tshig ni gsan nas kyang// lan ni myug dubaka' stsol cig/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pa// khyab 'jus khyod
kyis smras pa yi// tshiganibadag gis gzung bar bya// drag yod la tsa'adod pa/ khram zung 'dri bar gyis// tshe 'di yini don yang rung// ma'i tshiya don yang rung// khyod kyis dris pa de
dang de// ngas nings par ga rtsod pa bya// bram ze khyab 'jugachen pos smras pa/ bdag gi blo rtser gzhan brtags thetsem rnams// bram zakun 'agyeda gzhon driber bgyis// gang la gnas nigashing
'i bslab bgyis na// rdul mdamisan tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pa/ tshangs pa ma yisang rgyal sbas byas la// rtse gcig btudad snying rjemos byas
shing dring medacing 'khrig pa rab sbyangs la// de la gnas shing de la bsladabyas na// rdul med ma yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob// bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ tshangasar
[o ]gang dag mi yodri nga lags// chu 'gram chus yegs khazhin du gang gis g.yogs// nasong rgyu ste 'jig rten thams cad bsgribs// tshangs pa klob pa'i lam yang yod mi shes// mamadzod kyi
bdag po tshangs pas sbasapa/ khrodang rdzun dang ngan sems 'tshab dang// ngan dubyed dang blomod dram dang// chags dang sdang dang de bzhinagatimug dang// 'chab pa dn gnas ar snagatumatshig rnams
bram kho 'di dgam yodring ba// chu'agramatshus yogs bzhin du de yis g.yogs// ngan song rgyu ste 'jig rten thams cad bsgribs// tshangs pa thob pa'i lam yang yong mi shes/ chos 'di rtag
tu skyod pa yin// de rnams las nu'adas gyur na// tshangs pa dag tu skye 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis brtan por bsgrims par gyis// de skad ces smras nas/ mimajed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de ni
dum snang bar gyur te misadzod kyi bdag po tshangasarami snang bar gyur nas ring bo ma lon par bram ze khyab 'jug chen des bsamasal/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ji skada bshad pa'i den
bdag gis shes te/ 'di ltar bdag khyom par 'dug ste/ khyim na gnas bzhin du gtsug tu brtul te jisrid 'tshe'i 'i dungs par sbyod pam 'dres ra/ yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs su
dgang/ yongs su bya sbyad par dkan/ ma la bdag gos skudang kha sku bregs te/ gosatshen can rnams bgosal/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byagor
su chag snyam mo// denus phyi zhig nargyal po rdul bram ze khyab 'jug chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze khyaba'ajug chen de'i rkang pa la mag posakhyag 'tshal te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug g/ de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos/ rgyal po rdul la 'di skad ces smras so// yul bdag rgyal chen rdul gyis ni// darang bdag gi tshig gson cig/ khyod nyid ni
rgyal srid srungs// khyab 'jug bdag ni spros med// rgyal po jul gyi skyes ng/ khyod kyis 'dedapa ma skongs pa// den bdag sangs par bskang khyod kyi nad pa bdag gis bsal//
khyab 'jug pa dag nas der cig// khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa// bdag gi 'dod ngam skongasamed// bdag la kha/nodong byed pa'i ng med// ming yin pa'i tshig blosan// khyim n gnas par
skye ba med/ rgyu la de tshul gyis smras pa// bram zes su yi tshig rjes ngas// ngo dang 'dod pa spyod byed pa// mi ma yin pa ci 'dra de// dris pa de ni bdag la sgros// khyab 'jug chen pos
skyasab/ snying rje la ni gnas nas kyang// dbenapa'i bsam gtan byed pan// detshatshangs dbyung nas// phyogs rnams thams cad snang bar byas// bdag gis de yi tshig thos nas//
khyim du gnas par rdzob mod/ rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa mkhan po khyodanam bdag gi bu thu bo rgyal sar ma bcug gi bar du sdod cig dang/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag kyang rad tu
bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ tshigasasu bcad de smras pa/ bram ze gang du 'grob de// bdag kyang der ni 'grobar bya// bdag gis khyod kyi slobam bya// bdag gi ston pa khyab 'jug khyod//
khyab 'jugachen pos smras pa/ so'i skya bo gang chags pa// 'dod pa don spangs par gyis// 'dod pa rnams lam lta ba// bden ra'i chos la gnas par gyis// rgyal po rdul gyis smras
ba tshongs pa dag par skye ba'i phyir// nam mkha' dri med ltakhudang// nor bu baiDUr dag pa ltar// tshangs par sbyod pa sbyad par bya// khyab 'jug chen des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
de'i dus la bab par mkhyanan de ltar mdzod rtsis byas/ bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal rigs kyi rgya la po drug la smras r// kyi bdagan skadang kha sbyo bregs te gos tshon can bgo la yang dag
ba'i dad/ khonas khyim nas khyi mchedapar rab tu 'byung bar 'dod n/ khyad ji ltar byed sems/ dadag gisasmras ng// mkhan po khyod la bdun gyi bar du sdod cig dang/ lo bdun lon nas
bdag cag gas bu dang nu bo dag rgyalasar bcug la/ mkhanapo rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu'abyung ngo// khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ kye lo bdunan ha cang yunaranges chesaso//
'dod pa rnams zhin gsabar 'gyur ba'o// los spyod rnams nargyagasarar 'gyur ba'o/ 'tsho ba dang 'chi ni drodor bzung dka' 'o// lo bdun lononas khyim bcu dbyung ma mi 'byung yang gto med
kyis bdag de rab tu 'byung ngo// de dag gis smras// mkhan po dar zhig sdodatsag dang/ lo drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am/ gsum mam//
klu gnyis sam/ gtsagi gam/ de bzhin du zla ba bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi'am gsum mam/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ zhag bdun nam/ drug gam/
lnga ma/ bzhi ma/ gsum nam/ gnyis sam/ gcag lonan/ bdag cag gisobudang nu bo rnams rgyal sar bcug nas/ mkhanapo rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu byung
pa'i ngo[j]khyab 'jug gis smras ng kyin bdun yang ha cang yun aringesasam/ 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'o/ longs spyod rnams ni rgyags rar 'gyur ba'o// 'tshong dod
'chib 'drod gzung bar dka' 'o// zhag bdun nanas kyang khyod rang tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med kyis// bdag rjerd tu 'byung ngodo/ de dag gis smras pa/ zhag bdun yod
btang ste/ dong nyid dung dag cag gis bu dang nu bod rgyalasaradatsu gnas am 'khor ba tu byung po'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rang tu'abyung do// khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ khyod kyis de dus la
bab bar shesan/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chon po rgyal rigs kyi rgyal bo drug go 'khor bltas nas/ bram ze che 'di mtho ba bdun bltas so// bram zemozhing mtho
sa ba bdun bltas nas/ bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas so// bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas nas/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas so// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas nas
shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang/ glang po tshe'i kha lo ba rnams dang/ rtar rnams dang/ shing rta pa rnams dang/ mtshon chacan rnams dang/ 'bong ba rnams dang/ zhabs 'bring ba rnam
dang tshal zla ba rnams dang/ drag shul can rnams dung/ dpa' bo rnams dang/ rab gnen rnams dang/ tshanapo che chen po rnams dang/ rgyal po sras dum dag bltas te/ kyabadag
niskra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gosatshon can rnams bgos la yang rag pa'i dadapakho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byungan/ khyed jiltar byed sems/ dedag gis smras ba/ bdag/
cag byung mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byungango// khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ khyadakyis de'i dus la bab par shesan/ de bzhin du gyisashagacos byas nas/ bram ze khyab
'jugachen pos khyim gyi 'khor thams cad btang ste/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing/ bsod nams dog byas te/ dum zhig dbul bor rtagatad nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gosatshan can/
rnams bgosanas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// rab tu byung nas kyang nags khrodagacig tu gnas bcasanas/ yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil pophug ste/ dedaM
ma @#// na' dug nas bsam gtanabazhidang/ mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed de/ rdza'aphru'achazhing mthu che bar gyur to// khyab 'jug rab tu byung nas/ rgyalapo rdul g.yog 'khor
'bum phrag dum dang/ skradang kha spu bregs te/ gos tshon can rnams bgosanas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyayin s khyim med par rab tu byung// de bzhin du rgyularigs kyi rgya la de
drug gi 'khor dang/ bram zer zhing mogrongo bdun dang/ bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu dang/ bram ze'i khya'u ldangargya dang/ shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang/ glang bo che'i kha lo pa rnams dang/
rtab rnams dang/ shing rtapa rnams dang/ mtshon cha can rnams dang/ zhamarang ba rnams dang/ tshal za ba rnams dang/ drag shul can rnams dang/ dpa' bo rnams dang/ rang
'azhi gnen rnams dang/ tshanapo rnaman po rnams dang/ rgyal bo'i sras du ma dag skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos tshon can rnams bgosanas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa khonas tsami nas khyim med
skurar khyab 'jug rab tu byung pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ste/ bram ze khyab 'jug gis thams cad la yid la byed pa'i lung phog nas/ de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bod
ras po sam gtanal zhi dang/ mngon rar sob lnga bskyedado/ de nas bram zachozhing mthong khyab 'jug gi ming dram zache sheng mkho po khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa de med par gyur nas/ ]
tha0 ston khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'irgyal po rdul
cos bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa donargyal po gzugs can snying de 'di kho na yin no// de'i rgyal po rdul gyis mgo drangs ba'i skye bo 'dum phrag du mar gyur ba gang yin bu de dag ni/ rgya la deb zug
can snying posi mgodrangs pa'i lha brgyad khri dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i bram lnga dang/ khyim bdag stong phrag dum po 'di dag kho na yin no// de'i tshe yang ngas rgyal po rdul la sogs yul gyi
mo dumadang/ brom bro dang/ khyim bdag stong phrag du mard tu byung nas bsam gtanang zhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de/ gzhi des n/ nga'i grogs pas 'jig rtan rgyas
bar gyur to/ daltar yang ngas rgyal po gzugs can snying po lasogs pa lha brgyad khri dang/ ma ga d+ha'i bram zad ng/ khyim bdag stong phrag dum dag dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshims par
byas nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'amya ngan las 'das pa la bkod de//kham bosumachub dun pa// 'brang mo zhes byani/
gleng gzhi mnyan du yodapa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshemnyan du yod pan/ skye bo phalapoche 'thubapa dang/ mtshang 'brub dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ rtsod pa la zhugs shing ' khodado// sangs/
rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrodapa gcig pu'i lam ston pa// rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ya shes la mnga' brnyes la/ ma 'dres pa 'dren pa 'du bar gzhagar gsum la mkhas
h+pha ba ma 'jig pa bzhima'ajigasakha/ 'gro ba ltar 'grob las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yulang/ rnam par thar pa brgyudal
bsam gtanang/ mthar gyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la snyoms par 'jug pa// stobs bcu'i skyobs dang ldan r/ yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/
chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug tusangs rgyas kyi sbyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te sun rgud/ sun dar/ suni'aphongs shing 'dug
sun nyamang por gyur/ sun gnod pa dang ldan/ sunI'aphongs pa dang/ nyam nga bdang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ sun nased du gagrol/ sunangan song du 'bag/ sun n gnas eng
du bab/ sun ngosangan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu lagazhag par bya/ sunItis par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drung par bya/ suni/
'phags pa'i nor bdunamed pa las 'phags pa 'anor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ sun reg pa'i rtsa ba rnams m skyod pa la bskyod par bya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
ba0 bskyed zin pa las yongasasu smin par bya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zinapa las yashes kyi mtshon gyis brdol bar bya/ sulanisangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig
rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs par 'jugale// rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/dus rlabs yil bar 'gyur yang srid//
gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol bamed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongasab/ skye phalape gdul ba'idus la bab ste/ de
dag ngas 'thab pa dang/ 'tshang 'drub dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ rtsod pa las bzlog ste/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grung pa dang bdaba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par bya'o snyam du
dgongasanas/ snga dre sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnamasanas/ mnyan du yodapar bsod snyoms la gshigs te/ skye bo phal po che ga la ba der gshegs nas
skyepo pal por dadag gis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong de// mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar bar gyuratu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'dasagshegs pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'dasatshur gshegs/ bzhugs su gsol lo// de nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ]
kyis skye bo phal pa tshul bka' stsalang/ grogs po dag ni byad cing 'khod ( gzhan dang 'thab dgosan/ gzhan dang 'grub cing 'dug gam/ de rnams
shA kyis gsel ra/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag su dang 'thab 'tshul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// grogs po dag 'on 'khodatsig dang/ ngas khyedal rgyas par brjod par bya'o//
des skye bo phal po che de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ chos manyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skye be ra la po chade dag
la bka' stsal pa/ khyadani'onamongs pa rnams dang 'brub dgos kyis/ nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir 'bad par gyis shig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i ches/
bstan to/ des na de dag gis khroba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas/ stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la ltanga'i ro'i rtse me mthen pa tishu yongashis rdo rjes bcomo nas/ rgyun
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas to/ de dag gis bdanar mthong nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bam/
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs por bo/sungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rungan//
mtsha bdag/cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi klad du tshangs par sbyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bam ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen
par rdzogasabar mdzadonas dedagal lungayang phog ste/ dadagagos kyang bartson ba dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad bas nyonomongs pa thams cad sbrangasazhas/ dgra bam pa nyid mngon sum
dubyas to/ dedag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsor dang bong ba'amanyam ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du'adrab 'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan
dan sbas pa lta bur bsil bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgonga'i sbubs brtsom ba/ rig bdang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ sos yang dag pa ra rig pa thob pa/ sridapa'irid pa dang/ chags
pa dang/ bkur sti lam lta ba/ dbang po dang nyedabang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchodacudirjod pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur te// de nas dge slong rnams
kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsalab btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po cha'athab pa lasazhi bar mdzad nas/ g.yungodrung gimathur thug pagrub pa dang bde ba'imya ngan las
'dasapalakhakodapa lagazigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// daltar 'aba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dusan yang ngas skyobo phal po ma 'di dag bsam gtan bzhi dang//
ma/ @#// mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ ri khrod kyi grongazhig na bram tho zhig gis mchod sbyin byas te//
zla mchod sbyin byed ra der bram ze rnams stan gyi phyir 'grub pa las/ de'i tshadaka' thung kyi gnas shig na/ drang srong 'khor lnga brgya yodapa zhig gnas so// de nas mchod sbyin byed pa der/ drab/

srong des bram ze de dag 'khrab pa zhi ba' bya ba'i phyir de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos stan te/ des na' khrab mo de yang zhi bar gyur la/ bram ze rnams kyang skyo ba skyes nas/ danyid kyi thod du rab tu
byung ngo// de dag der rab tu byung nas/ bsam gtanabazhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga bskyadado// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas po gang yin pa deni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe bram ze lta brgyaragyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni skye bo phal po ched dwag khe na yin te/ da'i mi yang ngas skye bo phal po chal thar/
pa zhi bar byas nas/ bsam gtan bzhidang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkodado// da ltar yang ngas skye bo phal pa tsha 'thub pa zhi bar byas nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug ba grung pa/
dang bdeba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkodad// gzhan yang yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la 'di dag thams cad rang du byung nas/ dar 'di rnams kyis tsho gcig
tutshangs par spyod pa spyad s/ dbangape rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des n/ daltar rnam par grolabar gyur to/ klazhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yodapa nabazhug
to de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po chen po zhig gyodacig la btags te/ cir dogar phrogs nas// khrimon du gcug pa las/ dodar zas dang skom gyis mnar te hra'o// de nas
des smon lamalog par btang nas/ shi 'phos tadus las 'das pa'i 'og tu gnod sbyin ma rungs ba zhig tu skyes nas/ das yulakos la de thams cad du mnad btang ste/ skya bophal pa mo/
dag kha btags par gyur nas/ ltas mkhan dag gis smras pa/ blunapo chen po dasa' kar smon lam log par btab nas/ gnod sbyin mtshungs par skyes to/ des mnod 'di dag btang
ngozhas byas/ danas de blo ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag ni bya gtolamed par gyur to// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa// 'di ni sus kyang gdul bar mi nus kyis/ 'di'i
phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab dgos so snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu/
'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni klu ma rungs pa dga' bo dang//
ta dga' ba la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang btul/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brog gnas la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang btulen/ btsunapa blon bzhi/
po mi ge mo zhig gis smon lam log par btab ste/ gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes nas/ des bdag gi yul dum nadabatungan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtsuba'i spyodaduganod sbyin
ma rungs pa de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisargyal po gsal rgyal rung mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po gsal rgya'akhacom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
bzha mngon la bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo des phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'dras kyi thudanas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyi rdzu 'phrul
zla gyis gnod sbyin de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'dab tu bzha gnas / bcom ldanu'adus kyis de gdul ba'i phyir me chen po sbrul te/ de'i khor khor yu gnas bdag nyid ma chen pos 'khor/
bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi chung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ngo// danas de 'jigs shing skra gnas / com ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin s/ bcom ldan
'das kyis/ gnod sbyin marungs pa de la bka' stsalapa/ bzhin khazangs khyod kyis sdom dge ba'i las byas pas/ rgyal pogasalargyal gyis bsad pa yin na/ da yang khyod 'dir
bar skyes nas/ skye bo mang re kha 'dog par khyadan/ 'dinas sha ra phos pa'i 'og tu khyod kyi 'gro bani so gang yin/ skye gnas ni gang yin/ 'gro ba'i sa ni gang yin/ gnod sbyin gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ristsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sdig pa'i las 'di thong zhig/ gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag la bka' ni stsal ba bzhin du 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol to/ des skyabs su 'grob dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsolapa
ratsun pakhadag gis sdig pa'i las btang lags te/ btsunang dang mnachadamanyan du yodang na gnas pa'i skye bo mang bo rnams kyi srungasam dang/ skyod ban bdag lags so//
denas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsolapa/ btsunapa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin m rungs pade btul nas/ skye baphal pa tshad dag
'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ daltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus yang ngs gnod sbyin m rungs pa 'di
btul nas/ skye bo phal po che ji ltar 'jigs pamed pa'i gnas su bkodapa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wA ra NA sin/ rgyal po tshangasams byin
rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe yul kAshi'i klu gdug pa dugam brje dpa zhig byung ste/ das grong yang stongs bar byed/ ljongs kyang stengs par byed cing/ wA rA NAsa'i
h+pha phyogs su sa pa las/ rgyal po tshangs pasabyin gyis thosanasaM/ dbros ma thag tu 'jigs bzhin bo skyes te/ des dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon tebatang nas/ khyadadar la gdug
bdagod cig ces bsgo re// de nas de dag gis rkubapa la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ lhaden dpung gi tshogs kyis dgum par 'dus kyis// sngags sam sman gyis de dag ma par nus lag
sa yang n dge ba'i tshul gyis bkur ba'i dag sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis gdul bar nus lags so zhes gsol to// de nas de'iri wAr NA sidi nyidan/ gdol ba khye'u byams
ba'i rang bzhin can snying rje ba/ sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa des/ skye bo mang po dadag ni bya gtol med par gyur pa mthong nas// mthong ma thag tu de snying rje skyes nas/ des
skya ngon de rnams 'a sar// khyedachubya gtol medabar bya mi dgos kyis/ bdag gis klu gdug pa de gdul bar bya'ozhis byas s// de nas de'i pha ma gnyis nare/ de ni dbugs
gdug pa yin te/ khyod kyis de gdulam nus so// khye'us smras pa/ byams pa'i gon gyon pa la des cungad bya gnodapar byed mnyis so zhes byas nas/ khye'u des phyogs gangan klu gdug pa de
sa 'dug pa'i phyogs der seng nas/ klu gdug pa des thag ring po zhig nas khye'u de ma gleng nge// ang+ gnas kyang khros nas khye'u de la dbugs btang ngo// de nas khye'u de byams pa lasnyom/
bar zhugs nas/ byams pa'i lta ba klu gdug pa de la bltas te/ des bltas ma thag tu dug med par gyur to// de nas khye'u des klu sbrul de lag pa gnyis kyis rlangasanas/ mimi gnas /
pa'is phyogs su gzhagago/ de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang/ skyebamang po gzhan dgags gdol pa'i khye'u che gam zhig gis klu gdug pa btul lo zhes thos nas/ thosamabrag tu rgyal
bod rang nyid gdol pa'i khye'u de'i thad du son gnas / des khye'u de la dam pa sna gcig 'dam du bcug ste/ khya'akhyod la dam pa sna gcig sbyin ni zhes byas so// khye'us smras pa dgo ba bcu'i
las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par mdzod cig/ yul na gnas pa'i mo rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gzud par mdzod cig ces byas so// de nas rgyal po tshangs pasaM
byin gyis khye'u longs spyod kyi dbyings chen po tsananas/ dge ba cu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug go/ yulana gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkodad/
dge slong dag ji snyam dusems/ de'i tshigade'o pa'i khye'ur gyurang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa dan nga nyid yin no// de'i tshi klugajug par/
gyur pa'i ng yin pa de ni gnod sbyin ma rungs ba 'di khon yin no// de'atshi skye bo phal por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ga na yul ko sa lan gnas pa'i skye bamang bo 'di
dgakhon Ate/ de'i tshayang sa klu gdug pa btulanas/ skye bo pal re tsho 'jigs pamed pa'i gnas su bkod de// da ltar yang ngas gnod sbyin m rungs pa 'di ba dul nas/ skye
bo phal po che 'jigs pamed pa'i kenasaMsu bkodudo/ gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad dge bsnyen du gyur/
der 'di rnams kyis tshog ci tshangs par spyod pa sbyadanas/ dbang po rnams longs su smin par byas ba des n/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur te/ shi so gnyis
zhes bya ba de la/ shi bi de pan/ bcom ldan 'das gyudakyi yul ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ chu klung 'thab ldan dang/ grong khyer ku shi'i bar gyi lam nas gud du gzur te/ mi
drang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo da bzhin gshegs pa'iblo gos bzhibaltapa tu gyis te bris shig dang/ nga'i rgyab mi bde bde re zhig blta bar bya// danas
tshodang ldan kun dga' bos btsunapa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba bzhin du mnyananas/ bla gos bzhibaltab tu byas te ba tings/ dmo/
0 ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi bltab tu bgyis te bting lags na/ rtsom ldan 'das kyis dade'i dus la bab par dgongs sugasol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos snam sbyar stug por bltab ste/ phangs su bzha gnas / snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa dang/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa ni
'dus thugs ladagengasashang glo g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te/ zhabasagacig gi stong du gcig gazhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'khor 'dir so so'i skye
po'i dge slong rjesnyad 'dus shing tshogs pa de dgathams cad chusangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba yin nam/ 'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul ba yan zhig gu snyam dudagongs so/ de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs nga// 'di na kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni tran thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo da byang chub kyi phyogs rnams los spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas 'khor thams cad du sgra des
gang bar 'gyur ba da lta bur byin gyis brlabs so// de nas dge slong mang po dag gis tshig de lta bu gsung ba'i sgra thos nas de dag gis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
@#// dga' bo la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi gtamagyis shig bar bskul bsan dan dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ma bu'i sbrang rtsi btsir babazhin du chos snyan na cig ston par
'gyur snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'adas bskor te'akhod de// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ dge slong rnams la smras
tshe dang ldan pa dag dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dbanapa la rtenapa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la rten pa/ 'gog pa la chen pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasasu bsgyurab ni//
bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon par shes pas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to// blodang ldan pa dag chos rnam par 'byed pa dang/ brtson 'grusadong/ dga'
ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin drang/ btang snyoms pang drag byung chub kyi yan lag dbenang la rtan pa// 'dod chags dang bral ba la rten pa/ ( 'gog pa la
chen pa/ rnam par spyodabs yongs su bsgyur ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon bar shes pas/ mngon bar rdzogs par sangasargyusanas bstan to zhes/ tshe dang ldan ng kun
dga' bos byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag nyid las brtsamasanas/ dge slong rnams la de lta bu dang 'thunapa'i chos bstanato/ des nanyan thosad dge ba'i rtsa ba 'brel ba gang yin pa de/
[}]dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad sdangs te/ dgrabcom pa nyid ma nasum du byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
nad 'bo'i gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par thugs su chud nas bzhugs taM/ spyi'amo krung bcasanas sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du bzha gnas bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshodang ldan ng kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'abokhyodabartson 'grus ston tam/ gsolo pa/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus ston lags so// bka' stsal pa// kun
dga' bo khyodabartson 'grus ston tam/ gsol ra/ bde bar gshegs pa brtson 'grus ston lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo na bgrusan/ blan med pa yang dag par
chos pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i kos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi phyogs dag nyid la btsams nas/ de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ dasan bcom ldan 'das dang dpe
ba'i rtsa ba 'brel ba gang yanipa dedag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nus/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/ dadagra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i
'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bong bar mnyamang/ nam mkha'adang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyurang/
tha// rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sridapa redapa dang/ chags pa dang/
shu bkur ste lam ltab/ dbang po dang dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchodacing rjedapa dang/ gus par sgruba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas de'i mi dag slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad/
dam+mas ba/ snyan pa'i chos ni gsan pa'i phyir// ston ba snyung bzhin nyid kyis bskul// khyod la byang chub yan lag rnams// yod na dge slong tshos shod cig/ gnas brtan kun dga'o
mkhas shing grags// byang bar gyur pas lags zhes gsol// dpa' po khyed kyi gsung rab la// dkar bas chos rnams dedagamanga'// dran dang rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang// dga' dang
rab sbyangs ting 'dzin dang// btang snyoms 'di dag rdulamed pa/ khyod kyi byang chub yan lag lags/ byang chub yan lag bcud thos nas// byang chub yan lag bcud kyang rtogs// bcom
ldan snyanu tshabs che ba las// gnod pa de las bzhengasabar gyur// dam chos rin chen 'diston pa// chos kyimanga' bdag de nyid kyang// dam chos gsan par bzhedagyur na// gzhan lta ji
ltar dmi nyan// stobs bcumanga' bas nye rgyalani// dge slong rnams kya shes rab mchog/ bstanapa gangalaMn de nyidakyang// chos nyana'adodapas gzi bor gyur// mdo sde 'dul bam me
'dzin/ mkhas shing tshul dang tshul min shes// ded dam chos nyanabyed na// bzhan lta ji ltar de mi nyan// mkhas pa shes 'dod sems bzha gnas // rjes bzhin nyanub byed gi/
sangs rgyas gsung bar skyodamada'ag/ de bzhin dga' ba thob par gyur// yid dga' lus kyang shin tu sbyangs/ bdar yanamyong bar 'gyur// bde bar gyuran sems nyidakyi// ting
'dzin la yang rag par 'gyur// sems namanyam par gzhag las// 'du byed gayul gyi rnam pa rig/ srid pa'i 'gro las skyong bar 'gyur// chags med sems kyis grol bar 'gyur// rtag/
tu srid 'goskyegyuran// lha dang malachagasapa med/ bud shing me bkol bzhin du// dgra bcom rnams namya ngana'ada'// dmotshesalanyanaba'i phan yon ni/ mang po gzhon yang rgyal
bas bstan// de phyir 'di'i ni yod snyam du// ston pa'i bka' ni mnyaparapya/ de nas dge slong rnams kyisaM/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol kha/ btsun pa
bam ldan 'dasani'igs par smras pa gsung bdang/ legs par smras pa bzhadar lags te/ legs par smras pa'i donagyi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe na pa kun dga' bo la
bskul mdzadonas/ bkur sti dang ldan pasagasan kyang gsan/ bshad kyang bshad ng la gzigs/ bam ldan 'das kyis loka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni//
ltar 'ba' zhig legs par smras pa gsung ba dang/ legs par smras pa bzhed pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa 'dus yang legs par smras pa gsung
bdang legs par smras pa bzhedapa yin te/ legs bar skyas pa'i don gyi phyir ngas mchog tudaka'ab ji ltar sbyadapa de nyon cig/ dge slongadas sngon byung 'das ba'i dusan/ rgyal pe'i
pho brang zhing ldan zhes bya ban/ rgyal de shi'o zhes bya ba rgyal de khyadade/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le logs pa dang/ skyob dang ma mang re so gangang dang/ rtsod
ba dang 'thabamo shi bdang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrugadang/ rtsom rkun dang/ nad dang/ tshugamedub dang/ 'bras sAlu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma he dang ldan
par 'dug ste/ gnodapa medacing tsher mdakrugs la/ bu gcig pa sdug pa la byang bzhin du rgyal sridabyed do// rgyal po de yang byams pa'i rang bzhi can snying rjedang ldan ng/ sems can
'byams la sbyin pa la sredapa zhig ste/ dasbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byed ng la zhugs te/ zas 'dod pa lan zas sbyin par byed/ skom 'dod la ni skom sbyin
bar byed/ gos 'dod pa 'ani gos sbyin pa byed/ rgyana'adod pa la rgyanasbyin par byed/ mal stan 'dod pa lanamal stan sbyin par byed/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la niban pa sbyin par byed/
nga da na nanan 'da'adas zhanasmyan par byudad// nadagaseba'onod brang bcas te/ yo byad thams cad sbyang nas/ sman pa rnams dang/ nadagayog rnams bskos te/ nad pa
bza'abad ba car ba btsadam mang po dag kyang sta gon byas te/ nam mkha' la gnas pa dang/ rgyun gnas pa dang/ thang la gnas
ba'i srog chags rnams la sbyin par byed do// des yi dram 'di lta bu yang bcas te/ dpyin chad bdag gis thams cad la thams cad sbyin par bya ste 'dzig rten dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi
lamal dgod par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/ das 'jig rten thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkodad// der dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ sams
can phal cher shi ba'i 'og tu lha'i nang du skyes nas/ dedag gis lha'i gnas rnams gang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di ci zhig sgrub/ brgya byin du gyur
bsgruba'am/ no te tshangs par gyur ba sgrub cig bu skam mo// de nas des bltas na blanamodang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub sgrub cung 'dug go/ de nas lha'i dbang nga brgya byin gyis
bsamasal/ ba 'disimasatsanabartan po yin nam/ 'onatisems can mi brtan pa yin/ bdagagis rjabartagag lo/ gal tasems can brtan pa yin na ni mchod pa byago/ de ste
sems can brtan po ma yin n yang 'di'osams stobs bskyed par bya'o snyam nag/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid srin po'i gzugagasasu mngon par sprul nas/
h+pha de rgyal po shi ba'i khang bzongs kyi char khab la 'dug ste/ tshigs bcad pa'i byed skyasapa/ kyem 'du byed rnams mi rtag/ skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ zhes ny+tsasaMpa/
lha'i dbang po rgyun mam yin pa'i cha luganadonas cang mi zabara'adug go/ de nas rgyal po shi ngos lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyisagad skadu brjod ng glesaso/
thos nas kyang des bsams te/ gcig tunani mya ngan las 'das ba'i rtenacing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgo khyi'o// gcig tun niyod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan te skam mo//
de nas rgyal po shi bo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin mam yin pa'i cha lugs can khang bzangs kyi ra khab la 'dug pa mthong ago/ mthong nas kyang skyen par la ngasanas bla gos phrag pa gcagi rtagazar te/
lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig yin pa'i cha lugs can g la ba de logs suwal mo sbyar ba btud nas smras l/ grogasapa tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smos shig dang/ bdag gisoslobam/
bgyis tesanyanato// brgya byin gyis smras kha/ khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byas pas tsal na/ bdagani bkres shing skom pas gzi'i te/ rtsi rgyag tol med par bla zhing 'dug ge/ byang chub semA
dasamasmras pa/ grogs re tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smos ga/ bdag gis khyad lazas kyis tshim par bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin gyi cha lugs can gyis smras pa/ grags
po khyed kyis nga kha zas kyisazhim par byed nusasam/ nga'i kha zas dang skomadzaltabu yin pa de ni khyod kyis sbyin bar dka' 'o// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyi zas skom rtsi yin/
des smras pa/ ma 'phrul du bsad pa'i 'dron powi/ khrag dron pe na 'thung ngo/ danas byang chub sems dngas bsams pa/ de lta bu'i sha khrag ni gsod par ma byas kyi bar du mi
red la/ bdag gsalegs par skyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ sems can gzhan su la yang gnod byed mi phod do kAmanas lcas pa/ gal te bdag gi drakhrag khyod za zhing 'thung phodanAni/
grogasakho bdag gis sbyin nus chos kyis/ tshigs su bcad batshang bar skyes shig dang/ lags par smras pa'i don gyi phyir/ bdag gis khyod la rang gsha khragasbyin na// donas lha'i nang
bo brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smasapa/ kum 'du byed rnams mi rtag/ skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin// skyes su dar dag par 'gyur ba ste// dengag nya tUr zhib bde// danas
byang chub sems dpas tshagasasu bcad pa tshang ba de gus par mnos nas/ yun ringamo zhig tu kha ton dumya nasabasamasar/ 'dinamya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi rten cing 'bral par/
'khyud ba'i sgo yano// 'di'i skya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi lam yin no// lam 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung nge snyam
nas mtshonan rgon de blos tasmas pa grogasape lags par smras ba'i don gyi phyir yon bzhes shigacesabyas nas/ brang gi phyogs gcig nas sha bcad de/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin maMm[W]ni
ba'i cha lugs can 'byin temasal/ grogs po 'grangs sam/ des smras pa/ ma 'gras se// de bzhin du byang gi phyogs yagacig nas bcad de ci no// de bzhin du dbu dpa'i sha rnams
nas lus thamasacad kyi ngesha bcad cing byin nas smras// grogs po'agrangs sam/ des smras pa/ ma 'grongs so// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras l/ dan lus ri'igyis
yongs su btang ba'i dusakhon la bab bo snyam nas/ blan medab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kyem dge ba'i rtsa ba 'disan/ bdag 'di'i rten long ba 'dren pa med
ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdebar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i
kha lo sgyur ba/ dran med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyuracig ces byas nas/ tshigs su bcad desmras pa/ sbyin pa chen per gyur pa 'di yis/ srid
ma/pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog/ sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis mabasgral ba'i// skye bo phal chen rgal nas bsgral bar bgyi// de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
smonalam btab nas smras pa/ grogs po bdag gi lus 'di ci dga' bar gyis shig/ de nas byung chub sems dpas sems bskyedan thug tus rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// nam mkha'i
la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis me tog gi char phabanas/ legasaso zhes bya ba byin te/ grogasabolag solegs so// khyodakyis mchog tu dka' ba'i lasakhyags nas 'dzer to// de
nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa// byang chub sems dapa' 'dis mchog tu dka' ba byas te/ bdag gis 'di'i lus snga mkho bzhin du bsgyur ban nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis
'dinyid kyi slob tshod zin pa bskyedadagos so snyams/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa// grogs po khyod sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang rtsabrangabreng rnams gse ban/ sems mi
dga' ba cung zad tsamam skyes sam/ byang chub sems dpas sbasab/ grogs po bdag gsha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang rtsa brang srong rnams gas ban/ sems ma dga' ba cung zad kyang
ma skyes kyi/ bdag sdugabasngal myong ba na/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'grodang/ ya dgas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'ba' zhig la snying rje'i dbang du gyur to// lha'i dbang po rgya
byin mi yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras// grogs po khyod kyi tshig de lasu zhig yid ches/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la bden pa bskul ba
de lta bu s yid ches par bstan to// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ daltar khyed kyis bdenangasakhaskul bar chadan/ jikhyod bdag lus 'di bden pa bstsal bas sdamakho bzhin du gyurag doskad
casalcasam thag tu/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di ltar bdagag sha rnams gcod cing rgyus ba dang rtse brang phreng rnams gse banA/ sems cung
'tsha bod mi dga' ba ma skyas te/ bdagags sdug bsngal myong ba na/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'grodang/ yid gs su skyes pa'isems can rnams 'ba'azhig la snying rje'i dbang dgyur
na bdan pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdagog lus 'di snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig ces byas so// de skad ces brjod ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus snga mkho bzhin du gyur to//
rdo danas de mthong ma thag tu lha'idabang pobargya byin yi rang ste/ malugs dmed par byas nas/ rangabazhin gyigazugs su bsgyur to/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nasaM lcasapa/
gyi bdag gis khyod la gnod pa 'ibasam pasam dga' bar byas pa ma yin gyi/ khyod nyid kyi sgrib paskyed pa'i phyir/ bdagagis khyod mi dga' bar byas par zad do// khyod kyi brtson 'grus 'di/
wa0 'drab dang/ spro ba 'di 'dra ba lasan/ gdenam zabar khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshebadagarngan par madzod cig/ de nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam dusems/ de'in rgyal po shi bar gyur pa byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang sa legs par sla bas sla ba dang/ legs par sla bas 'dod par gyuran/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur
pan/ legs par sgrub sla ba dang/ legs par smra bar 'dod par ci ste maM mdzad/ de ci'i phyir zhe no/ dge slong dag nga na chos rnams drang po byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// shi
riganyis pani/ gtan tshigs dang/ sngon gyi rgyud sdom dang 'drab las/ lha'i dbang de brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byas pas la phan/
nga khyod la gnodapa zhogazer gyis/ gal te gnod pa de khyod kyis byed phodanani/ de'i 'og tu tshigs su bcad pa de ngas khyod la brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po tshigs
su bcad pa de jarjod cig dang/ khyodakyis bdag la gnod pa byed dubatsug pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o// grogs de tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar skyes shig/ de skad ces smras ma thag
[6 ]/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chung sems dba' mdun du tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar brjod de// donas byang chub sems dpas blages phrag pa gcig tu
gzar nas/ lha'i dbang por byin gyisaIpa'i lugasacan g labade logasasu thalami sbyor ba btudunas/ tshigasasu bcad pa de tshangabaramanos te/ yun ring mo zhog tu kha ton sbyangs
nas khang sor bzhi pa stongashing leb la btsugs padelta bu shing leb gnyis kyi bar du bdag nyidakal te 'tshari bar khyed do// dadan 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang/
'a chung dusmon lam btab ste/ kye ma dag ba'i rtsa ba 'disan/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pamedapor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrubartson pa yang dgasarardzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdebar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dulakhya'akha lo sgyur ba/ blunamed pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das su gyuratshig cesabyas nas/ tshigs su bcad de sgrus pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'dayisan// sridapa dag turang byung sangs rgyas shog/ sngon gyi rgyal dbang man
kyisomabasal khagi skye bo phal chen lanas bsgral bar bgyi// de nas shing lebakyi bar du btsiram thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad las khrag 'bab par gyuranas/ sanam/
ba drug g.yosas// nam mkha' la 'khodapa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// lhag ma rnams ni kho'i gtam rgyud snga ma bzhin du bden pas
bsku 'as/ lus sdamakho bzhin dusor chudapar gyur pa'i bar dubarjod par bya'o/ ko'u sham ba zhes bya ni/ sangs rgyas badzem ldan 'das yul ko'u sham bin/ ma
bdag gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba nang zhugs te/ de'atshako'u sham ba'i dag slong ma rungasab/ mthu rtsalare ba/ mde snga'adzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin/ mamo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing
char g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas taM/ de'i dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang yodal ( dedag kyang ma rungasang/ mthu rtsal ched/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin b/
mamo 'dzin b/ rtsa 'jing meng/ g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go/ yul yangs ba can gyi dag slong zhig gis kyang/ yul ko'u sham bar 'ongs te/ de yang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che
ba mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin b/ mamo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzin b/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig yin la/ de'i dag slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang yod la/ dod kyang
marungs pa/ mthu rtsalareb/ mdesde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing chung/ g.yog 'khor mngang sha stag de// de nas de dag dbyar gnas bcasanas/ nang
khrims bcas te/ bdag cag gi nang nas gang gis chur stong partsi yang med pa mu med du mazodon/ de nyidakyis dgang bar bya// yang n yo byad kyi zhal ta bye dang la sbran
ka par bya'o// bdag gis kyang ma bkang/ yo byad kyi zhal tabyed pa la yang m sbranan/ debadag cagags gzhi de las nyesapachags su gzhug go zhes zer ro// de nas der dbyar gnas pas
pa rnams mngadag pa'i gtamagatan la 'babs pan/ detshig rtsub pos 'dresanas/ gcig la gcig glags 'ba'azhig lta zhing 'khodado// de'i khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la
sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du ba shos la spyan drangs/ bcom ldan 'adas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das
shegasanas/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong dunub khungasar song ste bkru bshal byas nas/ chu ra'i nang du chu nyung du zhug las ma lus par mthong nas/ sams pa/ dge slong thams cad
nga zin pas/ da ni su yang chab khungs 'gro ba med kyis// bdag gis chur 'dirang gisatwagang yang ma dgos/ yokhyad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbran yang mi dgosasosnyam nas/ des chu
ngabazhin du bor tesong ngo// de long nas rangezhag lon pa'i 'og tu/ ko'u sham ba'i dge slong dachang khungasar 'gro bar chas talas des bltasan/ chu ra'i nang na chu nyung ngu zhig las med par
ma mtho nas/ des kyang sngar yangs pa can gyi dge slong des bkru bsha' byas nas song pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ dge slong 'di ni las rnamaganyis byed par 'gyur te/ yang na ni
bdag nyid kyis chur 'gengs par byed par 'gyur ro// yang na ni khyad kyi zhal ta byed ngal sbren par byed do snyam nas de la sdod cing 'dug go/ de nas dal lhan cig 'khod pa'i slob ma rnams
kyis smras pa/ mkhan po dge slong thamasacad niding lags na/ khyod 'din gyi lo gzhes/ des skyas pa/ bkru bshalabya bar 'dod// yangs pa can gyi dge slong des bkru bshal
byas tesengangasan/ de 'ongs tayang na ni kho padrag gis chu rab gis par 'gyur ro// yang nani yo byad kyi zhal tubyed pa la sbran par 'gyur ro// de dgags snasal/ mkhanapo
de 'khor dang bcas panodong lags kyi/ 'diram 'azhes shig/ de nas tos chur de dge slong rnams la bstanata khyod ltosashig/ tshe 'di tsam gyis bkru bshal byar rung ngam/
de dag gis lcasapa/ mkhan po khyed kyis 'din nu med de zhus de nyi mazhig gsungs shig dang/ bdag cag gis khyod kyi 'jing dang/ mthudang/ grogs bgyi'i zhes byas nas dang nga/
yang pa can gyi dge slong de yang 'gyodang skyenas/ de lhan cig gnas pa'i slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye bdag gis 'dir bkrungashel byas pa las/ chu ra'i nangan chu nyung shas
maTha @#// shig lasam lus bzhin du der ta'ongs la/ dge 'dun gyis nang khrimabacas pa ni yang bdag nyid kyis dgar bar bya ba dang/ yang na yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la spyan
'di/ dgos pa yinen/ debadag rang gis kyang ma bkangal/ yo byad kyi gal tedapa la yang m sbranan/ bdag 'dir 'ongs pa'i 'og tudage slong 'ga'azhig bkru bshal byed par ma 'gyur grang zhes
byas so// de nas dedag gis smras// mkhanapo khyod kyis 'di skad du/ de'i nang na chu yodadazhes de nyitshazhig gsungs shig dang/ bdag cag gis khyod kyi 'jing dang/ mthu dang/
grogs bgyi'o zhes casanas/ de nas de dag khyim der zan zas nas phyir dengang// dadag gi nang nas ke'u sham ba pa rnams kyis bsams pa/ yadub can gyi dge slong das dge 'dun gyi
nang khrims las 'gal dar byas kyis/ des nyes pa byas pa'i phyor/ bdag cag gas nyes pa 'chags su gzhug go snyam te/ gdan bshams nasagats+tshibardungs taM/ dge 'dun su
cad 'dus shing 'khod par gyur nas/ ko'u shar ba'i dag slong des/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong del glengs pa dang/ des smras pa// de'i nangan chu med do// des smras pa// chud
pa tsam gyis bkru bshal byar chog gam zhes byas nas/ de dag gis de la yul med rar bsnyen pa'i phyir dag ba'i las byas so// de nas yang sapa can gyi dag slong gis las deshig ste gyos
nas gso sbyong gi las logs shig tubyas s/ de nas gzhi de las de dag 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ rtsod par gyur nas/ dadag 'brabs shing 'tshang
