brus lare zhing brtsadanas 'khodado// de nas btsem ldan 'das kyis dgar ngas khacad pa'i dge slong dang/ dgarabs bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang/ dgar bas bcad pa'i rjesasu 'brang
b rnams bku gnas ka'astsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thobcu/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyudal rtsod bar gyur pa bdananam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'adas mad lags so// bka'astsal/
pa dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste 'tshang 'du ting 'gyod la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste mtshang 'du zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod na ni/ dag pa'i chos rnams 'gro bar
'gyur gyi/ 'pha'abar ma 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig/ dge slong dag khyed ma 'e thab// mchang mi 'du zhing ma'agyedal/ martsod par 'khod na ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba 'ba' zhig tu
'gyur gyi/ grab par ma'agyur bar rig pa ra gyis shig/ dge slong dgagazhanayang dgar bas bcad ba'i dge slong gisani 'di ltar bya dgos te/ dgar bas bcad pa'i dge slong nam rungs pa//
ma[Ã©] rtsal reb/ mde sde 'dzin pa// 'dul ba 'dzin ba/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin la/ dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang m rungs pa/ mthu
rtsal che ba// mdo sde 'dzan pa// 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin na/ dedag gis bdag la 'dod pa ma yin
bas gleng bar byed l/ 'dod pa ma yin pas dran bar byed kyis/ bdag gis nyes pa gleng ba de tshes bzhin du mnyan par mi bya'o// de dag gis kyang bdag mi snang bar dgar bar byed de/
phyir bcosasumed pa dang/ phyir 'byung du med par sdig pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed de/ gzhi des na dge 'dun gyi 'thab mo dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ rtsod pa 'byung bar
'gyur ro snyam du rige nas glengs pa'i dge slong gis nyes pa bzhin du phyir bcos nani legs/ de ltar phyire mabacosaMna'aga' bar 'gyur ro// da nusaM bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar sa bcad pa'i dag
rtsa slongadang/ dgar bsabacad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang/ dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjesasu 'brang ba rnams btang nas/ dgarab r byed pa'i dge slong dang/ dga' bar byed pa'i rjes su
'brang ba dang/ dga' bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsa lapa/ dge slong khyed 'khrul skyo mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtse dbar gyur pa bdenanam/
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'adas mdalags so// bka' stsalapa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsodacing ma 'khod cig/ dge slong dgakhyed 'thabs te/ 'tshang
'du'ang 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khodanani/ dge ba'iches rnams 'grib par 'gyur gyi/ 'phel bar ma'agyur bar rig par gyis shig/ dgeslong dag khyed mi 'thab ste/ ma tshang ma 'dra zhing ma 'gyed/
la ma rtsod par 'khodamanaM/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'bil ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur gyi/ 'gribapar mi 'gyur bor ragi par gyis shagi/ dge slong dag gzhan yang dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong gis ni/
'diltar bya dgos te/ dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong nim rungasal/ mthu rtsalam ba/ mdo sde 'dzanapa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin r// rtsa 'jing na ba/ g.yog 'khoramang/
g.yi la/ dge slong grogs pomang po gzhan dag kyang ma rungs pa// mthu rtsal che ba/ mde sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jang chub/ g.yog 'khor mang ba
yin te/ bdag gisadel 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byas/ 'dod pa ma yin pasadran par byas na/ des nyesal de chos bzhin dumnyan par ma byed nas/ de bdag gis mi snang bar dgar
bar byas te/ phyir bcosasu med pa dang/ phyir 'byung dumed par sdig pa'i lta bsadagar ba byas te/ gzhi ris nadage 'dun gyi 'thabamodang/ ma tshang 'drub dang/ 'gyedapa dang/ rtsod
pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/ 'dod pa[&]yin pas gleng bar ma byed cig/ 'dod pam yin pas dran par ma byed cig/ gal te 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byed na 'gal bar
'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kyang/ de bzhin du'athabacing 'tshang 'dzul 'gyed cing rtsod 'khod nas/ darung yang gso sbyong byas par mi
b+hUrtsinas/ skangs kyi gtamad dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas btsemaldan 'das kyis dgarabs bcad pa'i dge slong dang/ dgar bas bcad pa'i rjesasu 'brang/
bdang/ dgarab sabacad pa'i rjesasu 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsalam/ dge slongadag khyed 'thab ste/ mtshang 'du zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig ces ngas bsgo/
yang de bzhin du khyad 'thab tamtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khodad/ da dung yang gso sbyong byas par mi rtsob bden nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mdu lags so// bka'

stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab la te/ mtshang 'dru zhi de 'gyod la rtsodapar ma byed cig/ dge slongadag khyed 'thab ste/ mtshang 'du zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khodan ni gso sbyong byed dam/ skabs 'byed
pa'i las byed dam/ gsol ba'i dang gnyis kyi las byed dam/ gsolab dngagazhi'i las byed kyang rung ste/ las de dag 'jig par 'gyur te/ gzhag dgos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ dag/
slong khyedan de dag las thadad par gnas par byed la/ dedag kyang khyed las tha dad par gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag tha dad par gnas pa ni 'di gnyis yin te/ gang bdag nyid kyis bdag
sa[tha dad par gnasalar 'dogs pa dang/ gang dge 'dun 'thun pas tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa'o// de la dge slong bdag gis bdag thadadadu gnas par 'dogs pa ji lta bu zhen/
'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin gyi phyogasal/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i phyogs yin par 'jog de lta bu ni/ bdag gis bdag bdad par gnas par 'dogs pa yin no//
dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du tha dadapar 'dogs pa ji lta bu zhen 'diltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi snang bar dugar bar byas te/ phyis bcos su med parung/ phyir 'byung du med par sdig
pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed po ste/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa yin no// dge slong dag lhan cig tu gnas pan 'di gnyis yin te/ gang gis bdag lhan cig tu
gnas par 'dogs pa dang/ gang dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan cige tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o// dal bdag gis bdag la lhan tsog tu gnas par 'dogs pa ji lta bu zhen/ 'di ltar dag/
slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin ma yin pa'i phyogs la/ chos bzhin gyis phyogs yin par 'jog pa ste/ de lta bu ni bdag gis bdag lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa yin no// dge 'dunagyis
chos bzhin dulhan cig tu gnas bar 'dogs par ltadu zhen/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma snang bar dgar bar byas te/ phyir bcos su med pa dang/ phyir 'byung du med par sde pa'i lta bas
dgar par byed pa ste/ de lta bu ni deg 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bas bcad pa'i dge slong
zha dang dgar bos bcad pa'i rjesasu 'brang ba dang/ dgarabs bcad pa'i rjesasu 'brang ba'i rjesasu 'brang ba rnams la tang nas/ dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong dang/ dgar bar byed pa'i
rjes su 'brang bdung/ dgarab r byed ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'irjesasu 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal ba/ dag slong dag khyed 'thung te/ mtshang 'dra zhing 'gyed la rtsad cing ma 'khod/
cigs dus bsgo yang de bzhin du khyod 'grub ste/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsodacinga'akhod de/ da rung yang gso sbyodabyas bar ma rtso ba bden nam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dasamad
lags so zhusabagyi banas/ da ltabu ni dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan cig tu 'dogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal
kyang de bzhin du 'thabacing mtshang 'dru la/ 'gyed cing rtsodade 'khod do// de nas khyim bdag cig gisasangs rgyas la sogasapadage slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshes la spyanadrangs nas
dge slong dag de dong ngo// dems bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad kyi zhal takhyadabal/ bshos 'dir drongs shig cesapa ka' stsaladeta/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi rnam pa lnga'i
gyi'i yo byad kyi zhal tabyed l/ bshos lenadu 'jug par mdzad// nang duyang dag par 'job par bzhed pa dang/ lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang/ nad pa gzigs par bazhed
padrang/ mal stan gzigs par bzhi dang drang/ nyanathos rnams la slob pa'i ge zhib 'bar bzhed pa rnams kyi bya'o// skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i/
gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'i phyir/ robud kyi zhal dbyed pa la khashos len du btang ngo// donas ga slong mang po khyim der dang ba rnams mal stan la 'khod nas 'brub te/ mtshang 'dru shing
'gyedaArtsod par gyur to// de dag 'thab ste mtshang 'dru shong 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khodad/ 'tsham pa ma yin ra'i lus kyi las dang/ 'tshamar ma yaMnar 'i ngag gi las byed cing 'khodal/ jitsam
nurtag pa ya da byed do// de nas bashos len du song bas/ bshosakhrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sa phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go denas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ bshos lenapa'i dge slongad la bka' stsalar/ dge slong ci dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bzang posatsham par gyur tam//
gsolar/ btsun pa danadalags te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bzang pos tshim par gyur lags na/ btsunapa 'on kyang dag slongamang po khyim der mchis pa rnams 'thab ste/ mtshang 'ju
ba kya/ zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur to// de dag mtshang 'du zhing 'gyedal rtsod cing 'khod// 'tsham pa ma lags pa'i lus kyi las dang/ 'tsham pa ma lags pa'i ngag gi las
h+pha gyid cing mchis la/ jitsamanardeg par yang bgyid do zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ btsug lag khang gi myol tu zhabs bkrus te/ nang du yang dag
'jog pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi nang du gshegs so// donas bcom ldan 'das phyed 'brodanang du yang dag 'jog las bzhungasanas/ dge slong la dga' dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la
bzhugs s// gdan la bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod khyim der dongs rnams 'thab ste/ mtshang 'dra zhing 'byed l/
rtsadapar gyur nas khyeda'athab ste/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'byed la rtsod cing 'khod/ 'tsham pam yin pa'i lus kyi las dang/ 'tsham pa ma yin pa'i ngag gi las byed cing 'khodal/ ji tsaman rdeg
bar yang byed ng bdenanam/ btsun pa mdalags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyim der deng ba'i dgo slong sde sderachad pa rnams la khrims su
byas pa'i chos rnams ngas khartsa'abar byaste/ dgeslong sde sderachad pa rnams kyis rtsod pa'i gcugs kyis ba gnas so rtog sngongs shig/ dge slong thamal par 'dug pa rnams dang/ nyin par
ka4/ yang rung/ mtshan mo yang rung/ nang par yang rung/ dril yang rung ste/ gtsug lag khang gcig gam/ dgon r 'am/ grong 'dab gcig tu gnas pa ram byed cig/ lhan cig tu yang/
gnas bar ma byed cig/ lam cig tu yang m 'gro zhig/ lamadu yang m 'grogs shig/ brdal ng maredacig/ brda skad kyang ma le nag/ tha mal par gnas par rtse dpa'i gzugs de
khong du chudanas tshes bzhin dang/ 'dul ba bzhin du zhi bar byed nusal/ ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung pa'i phyire 'thun par byed nanaM/ zhi bar byed pa'i thabs dag cing 'dul ba dang 'thun ba/
gcig gis rtsod pa'icugs de ni khar byas pazhes bya'o// las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcudapa bcupa rjegs te/ las brgya tham pardzogs so//
sngonas nigs rgyas maldan 'das thub par 'anyichug gi steng na bzhugs te/ da'i phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dpacas pa dang/
dgabcom pa dang/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ wadang/ lham yin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto phye chen po dang/ mamakha' lding dang/ bdud sdig can la sogs
mthubotshothams cad tshogs pa de 'dusaM na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi smanamatshamasanas 'od zer shar gyi lus 'bags dang/ lho'i 'dzam bu gling dang/ nub kyi bolang spyod
[pp ]/dang rta byang g sgra mi snyan dang/ gling 'dibazhir 'od zer kun tu khyab par bkram ste/ 'od zer btang bde[& ]/ rim robar la sogs pa'i chinapo dang/ ri dang/
zhwa nags tshal dang/ sman ljongasari la brag grog kun la yang snang bar snyam ste/ lag mthil dang 'drab r grang btso snang bas gsal bar gyur/ bodawarade dag las sangs rgyas phal po che'i
sku gzugs kha deg dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang bcas pa phal po ma byung byang chub sems dba' dang/ lhadang/ klu la sogs pa sems can kun gyis mthong ste ngo mtshar du gyur te// de nas
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par/ bashra ma nAlasogs pa rgyal portan po bzhis gsolang ( 'od zer de lta bu ni'i don du mdzad pa lags zhes zhusal las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ dmyungan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gling bzhir ngesadam pa'i chos kyi gsung rab dang/ ring bsrel dang/ gzugs brnyan 'diltabu dag 'byung ste// 'di khyod kyi lag tu gtad do//
srungasag/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ byang chub sems daba' zla ba'i snying pos zhusal/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrula chen ngos/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'dasapa'i
log tu dmar ba chos rgyal po lag tadapa thugasadzema'o// sngam 'das pa'isangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/ dgung lo bdun logasaMnas/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan nuban/ bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'ogatu dam pa'i chos jitsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur/ danas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta bu'i phyi tsam zhus pa legs so legs
so/ nyonarig dang ngas bshad de// nga mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugos bar nalo nyis stong gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dapa' zladapaM snying pos gsol
ma ldan 'das dam pa'i chos 'di thamar dziltar nub par 'gyur/ rgyu tsalas nyams/ susamamanyes par bgyid/ bka' stsal// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lolta brgya'i bar du/
ngab bstan pa sbyod pa'i sems can rnam par grol ba mdadu 'gyur/ de nas le lnga brgya'i bar du ting nge 'dzin spyod pa mang du 'gyur rgyal podang sems can phal dam pa'i chos la dad cing/
sbyod pa yang phyir zhing ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lolta brgya'i bar dudam pa'i chos ston rung sems can 'dren ba dang thar par byidapa'i slob dpon mang du 'byung/ nyan thos kyi dgra bcom
pa chung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang sems can phal gyi rnams kyang tan ba tsam du zad kyi/nyamasasu len rtsing spyodang 'am/ brtson 'grusan mkhyad/ dad pa'i bri bar 'gyur ro// dus
pa'i chos kyi srungs ma dag kyang ma dega' bar 'gyur te/ dmapa'i chos la ma dad pa rnams n sngon pas mthu dang stobs skyes so// 'dzam bu gling gi mo'i rgyal bo rnams kyang phan tshun gcig la
gcig dmag 'dren cing 'khrug par 'agyur ro// de nas yang lo lnga brgya'i tshe/ lo sum brgya ni dam pa'i chos spyod pa'i lha klu la sogs pa sems can srungs ma rnams
kA tsha gnas shing/ sems can chos lam dadapar 'gyur/ sems can chos spyod pa rnams kyang/ chos kyi gzhung bzhin maspyod/ brtson 'grus chung bas grub pa yang nyungobar 'gyur/
kha dog bzhi dang bzhi las gyurang yang drodang rol sogs pa chung bar 'gyur ro// mi nad phyugasand dang mug yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lo nyis brgya la dge slong yang chos bzhin ma spyod/ 'jig
rtan gyi ba dang gragasapatshol/ snying rjechud/ tshul khrims la mi gnas/ dam pa'i chos mnar ba spyod pa la ni bskrun cing skur pa 'debs/ longs spyodadang yo byad 'phrog/ 'jigarten gyi
rgyal bo'agesangalarten cing rgyal srid 'dzin/ rgyal po 'phrinupar 'gro zhing nge 'phralatshel/ rgyal po dang 'bangs 'khrugs pa'i dbyen byed/ nyo tshong dang khe spogs byed/ thabs tshul//
dam pa'i chos sbyod pa yang tsunas niinyams su blangs te mi spyod kyi/ phal cher kha gsag dang 'phral gyi tshul 'chos pa yom bar byed/ de'i dus nas chos la dag pa'i lha klu thamasacad kyis kham
kyi dge slong 'di ltar spyod pa'i sa gzhi'i tami gnas shing/ bdud kyi ris la sogs ba ches kyi bgegs rnams der 'byung ste/ mthu dang stobs skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dang blon pe lasogs
wazab dadapa tra/ dge sdig gi mtshamasamazin/ dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor dang dge 'dun gyi rjes la rku 'phrog khyed/ sdig pa la mi 'dzam/ gzugs brnyan
dang arodarten rnams khad kyis bge/ mchod pa'i yo byadab+baM/ de'i dam ba'ichos ma'o bar sbyod pa dge slong dang khyim pa 'ga' tsam gnas pa de'i bsod nams kyis yul phyogs su la
char dus su btsung lo legs/ mnad phyugs nad nyung zhing yul bder dag kyang yod/ shadi ltadu mgonas pa phal cheranisdug bsngal ma bdeb sna tshogs 'byung/ de'i dus na rgya gar dang/ rgyu
yin bargyu'apochan po gsum 'byung ste/ gsum la yAnab dang ( b.lA ba dang/ shi kun 'di gsum dam pa'i chos mo skyed/ dmag 'dren cing 'thung rtsod/ nubadang byang gi yul mA
mang po zhig med par byas/ yul khams de'i mchod rtadang gtsug lhag khang bshig/ mes btang/ mchod pa'i yo byadadang/ dkon mchog gi dkor la sogs pa phrog bcom/ rgya'akho
bdagasum gcig la gcig gnodapa sna tshogs kyis 'thab mo khyod/ gsum can gyi rgyal srid ma bde bar 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po 'digasum mjal dum ste/ sridagacig tu byas/ dmag maro/
'dus nas/ rgyagar gyi yul yulagang+ga'i tshulo 'gan d+haradang/ mahedaMsha la sogs pa'i yul phyogasanas bzung/ de'is gang+gA'i pha rol lho phyogasan ko'u sham+ba'iyul na/ rgyal
bo ma na' dras zhes bya ba de la bu zhig 'byung ba de'i ming ni tu pra sa hazhes bya ba leg 'byung ste/ smina mtshams na lcags kyi skye ba zhig yod pa/ grumeman chod khrag gis

bskus pa zhig 'byung ba dadang lhan cig tu/ bonapa ldagargya la bu 'byung ba yang ril gyis lag pa khrig ma mnachad khrag can du 'khyung/ de dang dus gcig tu rgyal po de la rte'u smra shes pa cig kyang 'byung
ste de'i nub mo yang gnam las khragagi char bab nas/ rgyal po ma byon 'drase nas/ drang srongab mkhan po lnga mngon par shes pa zhig la bdag gi 'khor du bu dang/ rtag mtshan 'di lta bu 'abyed

khrag gi char pa bab ra tsa'i ltas zhes pa rtags pa las/ drang srong na re/ khyod kyis bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa gzhi 'di mi'i khrag gis gnas nas/ de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po khyod
ngar 'gyur zhes smras so// rgyalabudatsas nas lobcu gnyis lonapa dang/ de'atshirgyal po yA ba dang/ ba lAb dang/ sha kun gsum 'dus ra'i dmag sum 'bum rgyal po dang chus rgyal po
mahan 'drasana'i yul dudrangs pa las/ yul dudamago phal po che byung ngasargyal po snying ma dga' ste/ mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa las/ bu du dras has/ phal dris// yab 'di lta bu thugs
ma dgyes pa rtsalas gyur ces zhus pa las/ phanar/ rgyal po byinegasum gyi dmag bdag cag gi yul du byung bas/ mi dga' zhes smras so/ bus smras pa// yang mdegyes sumamadzod
gi dmag 'di bdag gis zur par bgyi'o zhes pa dang/ na re/ legs sogs smras nas/ rgyal blon po'ibu ya mtshan can lnga brgya la sogs te dmag nyis 'bum dang chas nas
'thab mo byas pa'i tsho/ smina mtshams nas lcags kyi sme ba bskyedanas lus ril gyis lcags su byas nas/ ratu khros tabargal ba dang/ du sras grwa'i dmag rgyal te/ phyir log pa
dang/ phan re/ bu khyodakyis rgyal pogasum gyi dmag 'di lta bu dang 'thabam byas palas rgyal b.legasaso// da6nad khyod kyis rgyal srid zung zhig dani'i byung ngozhes bsgonas
rgyal srid bus bzung ngo// de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rgyal po gsum gyi dmag dang 'thabosar las/ dmag mang po yang rim gyi gtubs/ rgyal pogasum yong bzunas med
par byas so// dpanachad 'dzam bu gling gi rgyal po byas bar gyur to// de nas rgyal pos/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ nga'adzam bu'i glingag rgya'ade byadapani dga'an/ gudanas tshade
bzhig yodasasmras s// blonapa rnams kyisatsamo dgyes shosadris pa dang/ sems can mang po 'disnyadacig [']ngasadapa'i sdig pa che bas madragacan/ sdig pa 'di lta bu zhig tu byas zhus//
sus 'byang bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang/ blonabo rnams kyis smras po/ yu'adedali po tra zhes bgyi ba na/ chos kyi mkhan po sde snod gsum shes pa/ bram ze a kan drad+ha'ibu shir shaka/
zhes bgyi ba zhib/dgon pa'i sa la gnas pa de spyan drangs na/ sdig byang par bgyid rje thog ces gsal ba dang/ rgyal po dga' nas dge shareshakayang 'gugs pa btang ste/ gangs
rgyal ro 'drung du 'ongasas// mkhanaposhir sha ka largyal pos phyag byas te sdig pa byas pa rnams cu zhog gas byang bar 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang/ dkona mchog gsum la lobcu gnyis kyi bar du
mchod cing skyabs su gsolan/ sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas 'dzam bu glinganadage slong 'dug go cig la 'gugs pa btang ste/ ril gyis gang+gA'i pha rol tu yul ko'u
kha shan/ rgyalapo gnas brnga bsdus te/ mul bzhan du chos spyod ma ster bar 'gyur ro// dge slong bsdus bde'i tshilamadu chud bros pa yang mang/ rgyul re'i 'i khor dun 'bumatsam zhig gis
phyin par 'gyur ro// dge slong lam du chud zos pa yang gcan gzan snyatshegasadang/ margodadang/ chu la sogs pasapalakhyer te chud zos so// dge 'dun mang po byon pa dang/ dge 'dun
(largyal pos mchodasten gsol/ yon phul temachod do// de'i tshe dge 'dun rnams gcig la gcig gtam dusmras pa// khyod kyi mkhan po gar/ slob ma gar song/ grogs de khrims
zla bo re zhes so sor gtam dris pa dang/ stag dang song ga dang/ mi rgod kyis bsad pa dang/ chus khyer ba dang/ nad kyis btab ste shing la sogs pa'i gtamabyas nas/ dge slong se
so nas mya ngana'angs te dud mo 'debs/ brang rdeb par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe rgyal re samya nganam byed cig ces bsgo ba dge 'dun rnams kyis nyan pa dang/ rgyal po yang ma dga'
bar gyur nas/ kha phyogs te nyal leg/ nyal ba'i mi smona'am du btab pa/ da 'jig rtan gyi dge 'dun lan skyabs kyang mabyungan/ dgra bcom pa zhala mthong bar shog cigaces smon lam/
btab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi lhas rmi lam du bstan ra/ rigun d+ha mahana'iri la/ su radashana'i bu su rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa zhig bzhugs te/ de spyan drangs na sdig kyang 'byung
thertsom yang sel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa dang/ rgyal pos da de 'phral dupa 'bakya ste/ spyanadrangs nas phyin pa dang/ dgra bcom pa la rgyal bos mchod cing phyag byas so// de'i dus
tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo dge 'dun 'dus pa'inang nas/ dge slong gsarazhugs rnams kyis sde snodagasum shes pa'i mkhan po shir shaka 'dul de bshad paragasol ba las/ shirahaM
kanar/ mal mig zhar/ sna dang rnab medan/ ma long ci dgos/ bltar ci yod/ 'dul ba bshad kyang khyed 'dul ba ltar mo spyod/ chos khrims ma srungs pa la 'dul ba bshadun
rtsisan zhes smras pa dang/ de'i tshesu rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pasaseng ge 'i sgra bzhin du smras pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos khrims ngas mnosanas/ datsam gyi bar du
( @#// mchogatsam yang ma nyams na/ deskadam zer bar 'dul da shod ces smras radang/ mkhan po shiri sha ka yang dag bcom pa yin bar shes nas/ rab tug med sta
zhwa mastsa'o// shig ka'i slobam dag slongs kadezhes byang de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas langs te/ surd ces bya ba dgrabcom pa de'akhyod stenga'i mkhanapo 'daskad smra/ khyod khrims kyang
med 'dul ba yang mi shesan/ nga'i mkhan po sde snod gsum la mkhas pa de la ci'i phyir bams zhes khros nas/ dgra bcom pa bsregs tebasadado// de 'tshachos l dga' chu'i gnod/
da ta mu kha zhes bya bas lag pa de ji thogs pa mngon du byung nas/ dge slong a ka de la ci ste dgra bcom pa bsadaces smras nas/ rdorje byung ste bsad do// de'idusan dag slong gi rad ces bya
pas dge slongashir shaku brdegs stabasadado// donas de'i rjes la dag slongarir gyis gcig gis gcig bsad de/ gcig kyang ma lus so// de'i dus na nam mkha' las lha klu la sog
pa chos kyi srungs ma phal po ma mi dga' nas ngus pa'i mchim ni khrag dang me'acharas gzhi der bab bo// nam mkha' yang ser po// nag po// dmar por rtag tu gyuracing/ grogo sgrachen/
khyung/ skor mdu me ka dushes byapa'i lus las du ba nag po zhig byung ste/ des zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i 'od kyang med/ gcig kyang bltar masnyingabar 'ong ngo// de'i dus na sum cu rtsa
gsum gnam gyi lha dang/ yulamahAm yal sogs pa'i 'khor thal lo tshader 'ongs nas/ dge 'dun gyi gos chen can ri'i bsdus te khyer bu'ong ngo// de'i dus na rgyal pos 'di lta bu'i
cosgrachen po khyung ba tsalas gyuraces smras pa dang/ dge 'dun 'khrugs nas gcig gis gcig bsad par gyur to zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal po mi dga' nas langs to/ thorangs mkhar
gyi phyirol gyi lci khang duphyin pa dang/ dge 'dun la lanamago bcad/ la la ni rkang lag bcad/ khacig mig phyung/ 'diltar sna tshogs su sha u0f7a ba mthong nas/ dgra bcom pa dang/
shi'i shaka sde snod gsum shes pa'i mkhan po'i robatsalanas gnyis ka'iro radade/ mchan khung g.yas g.yon du bcu gnas / dgra bcom pa ni nge'i ma yin/ shari sha ka ni chos kyi med
yin te/ 'di gnyis 'das par gyur bde phyin chadanga'i srog kyang gcesapa med/ rgyal sridakyang su 'dod pa la sbyin no zhes smras nAs/ mig kyang tsums te mi lta bar 'gyur ro// de'i
dusan blonapo rnams rgyal pal snying brtse ste/ myanabasang ba'aphyoremalnga brgya ban de ltar bcos te/ mgo dang kha spubreg khyospu gris ma chod nas/ phyugs nag po dang dmar po'i ko gyen
taban de ltar bcos nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs so// blon pos rgyal po la ban de lta brgya'ongs so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal po dga' nas mgi phye sta/ ban de la bltas ba dang/ ban de yang
ril gyis phyugs kyi kob gos su gyonal/ sladang kha spu mes bsregs par mthong nas/ rgyal po dga' ste/ dkona mchog gsum lamachod pa'i yo byad 'ocig bar
k+Sha bsgo nas/ ban de da rnams l mchod do// rgyal pos chos dris pa dang/ chos tshig gcig kyang m shesanas/ rgyal yang mya ngan langs te ngago/ ban deshade'i ral gyis bsdusanas
bsregasate/ mchod pa byed do// de'i tshe de'i dusan 'dzam bu gling gi lha chos ril nub bo// gser ni dngul ngan padad rdor 'gyur/ dngul ni ra gan dang rdor 'gyur/ ra gnanazangs su 'gyur/
zhe po mdang mu tig na rwar 'gyur/ zas la ro drug yod pa las mngar zhing zhim pa la sogs pa bzhin nub/ kha ba dang rtsub pa gnyis lus so// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la byang chub sems
dpa' zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa las lung bstan pa rdzogs so@#// rgya gar skad du/ bam la prab+ha par pI// bod skad du/ dri ma med
ba'i 'od kyis zhusapa// bam po dang po// thams cadumkhyen ng la phyag 'tshal lo// gangagAtshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
mdo bshad pa'itshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling ba yul thams cad sungs ma rnams kyi lag tuso soragatadapan/ bcom ldan 'adas byargod kyi phung po 'irol bzhugs nas/ lhathoms cad basdu phyir
mtha'i/ 'od zer btang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed ma thag tu/ lha'i rgyal de thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus so// de'i tshe/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal pechen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ gnodasbyin gyi dbang po kun tu rgyal labs te bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag nga'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bzhin gyis las
gro byos shig/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lenang na/ la yul zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ ngas khyed kyi la gzhugatad de//
rgyal po rnam thos bu khyod dang// rdzu 'phrul chen po kun tu rgyal// klu'i dbang po ma dros dang// glorab brtan pa'i lha yi bu// nga yi tshig namanyan par gyis// yul 'di rgyal ba'i dbang po
yis 'dulab yin tigazhan gyis min// gangadag dusan mkhyol ba'i// sems can de dag la yul 'khor// sangs rgyas lung bstan grong khyer du// so sor skye ba lenapar gyur//
ngayasangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang// smon lam chen po rab mang// btab par gyur pa gang yin pa'i// bsod nams kyi ni tshegs de yis/ yul 'di
nga yi phyagamtshan gyur// zhi bar mya ngan nga 'dasan// khyed rnams la ni gtadapar bya// gang tshe nga la byams pa'is// la lul 'din byung ba na// rtagu ma ti ri gnas mdzes der// chos kyi
rgyal po'i mchod rtan du// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// de tshe dang ni 'dul bar 'gyur// yul 'di yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir// ngayis khyed la byon pa
yin// de nas rgyal bo rnam thos bus// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba yi// 'dren pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'// gcig tu rung bam lags te// rab mchogargyalakhas
bka' stsal pa'i// las 'di shin tu dka' ba lags// ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs bzhin du// yul dang ljongs rnams 'khrug ma mchis// khyod kyis dam chos bangashadan yang// yongs su
bsrung bar dkon lags na// ston pa mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe// lha yis bor ba'i yul dag tu// lha lasogs pa bsrung ba rnams// bka' bzhin ma nyan ci zhig smos// bdag cag rnams
rtsal thugs rjemadzod// gang zhig khros n lha rnams kun// khyod kyi bka' bzhin bgyid 'gyur ba// de'adra'i chos n bshad par gsol// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnams kyi bkag/ de ni sa stangs gcog
tumed// skyabagang du ma byung ba// las shin tu dga' lags na// bcom ldanodir ni bdag cag gis// ji ltar yongs su bsrung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rnams ni dus gsum gzigs//
kun mkhyen ye shes sbyan dang ldan// rgyal ba skyes mchogade yi phyir// las 'dibadag cagamachid kyis 'tshal// de re gtadapa nod par bgyi// rgyal pos sngar na bka' stsal pa'i// lasani/
ji ltar brgyade 'gyur ba// de ltar byin gyis brlab par gsol// rgyal bas lung bstan grong khyer du// rgyal bas sngonan lung bstan pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// gzugs bzang
sdom pa 'dzin pa yi// dge slong brgya phrag gsum dag dang// dge slongamanitas brgya 'byung// sdig pa'i las rnams gang dag gis// sngon nasmon lam btab gyur cing// sdig byed phyogasani lnga
rgya ga/ de dag rnams kyang 'byung gyur te// dge byed la 'gags bya'i phyir// yul 'di dag tu skye bar 'gyug/ dag byed mdza' bo de dag kyang// la yuladag tu skyeb len// rgyal bas lung
bstan yul dag tu// legs pa rnams ni byed par 'gyur// ji ltar yul 'dir bdag cag rnams// legs par 'gyur dang bdag cag gis// rinas bzung ba'i thabs btsal bar// bcom ldan
bdag cag dam pagasol// de la bcom ldan gsungs pa ni// dam pa'i mchog nasbyin par byas// gnod sbyin dabang po dus kun tu // yulalongs su bsrung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems/
gnas bzung 'ad// ngayi tshig gsagazungabar gyis// yulade 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni// lha yi skyedamos tshal mchog bzhin// dge 'dun kun dga' ra bas rgyas// drigatsang khang gis mdzes par
byas der ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams kyang// bde ba can dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dge slong dge slong ma yis gang// de dag theg ba mchog kyang stod// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas abazang der/ mi
rnams skyes pa gang yin pa// dge ba yi ni las byed tsang// byang chub phyir ni sngog byed// ji srid thub pa'i dang nga de yis// bstanang yul der ba gnas pa dang// mchod
bar byed pa de srid du// yun dag kyang ni gnas par 'gyur// bstan pa dag la mamachod na// srungasama rnams ni 'khrug par 'gyur// yul yang la bar 'dor ba dang// 'khrug pa'i sems
kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// srungs ma dag na song ba dang// yul ni lha yis bor bder// nad dang mu ges nyen pa dang// rgyal po dag kyang tshe thung 'gyur// srungasam kun tu khros pa yis// dbu
rnams kyang ni med par byed// rgyal bdam pa lha mchog gis lha rnams la de skad cesabaka' stsal nas/ de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das dpal 'od bltadu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la skams par zhugs te/ smina mtshams kyi gseb nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams byung ngo// 'od zer de dag kyang 'od zar tshan med/ grangs med par byung
bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gangan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der/ tshig tu brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste//
lha'i lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gnod pa nyungangam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ zhes bya ba'ibar du 'dri'o// 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir ngas bskal
'tha0 pa mang por dka'ang byas so// dmapa'ichos bsdu ba'i phyir lus grangasamed pa yongs su btang byas te/ sbyin pa mang po byin// sdug bsdal shin tu mang po byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
gis ma myod ba dag nyams su myong ste/ des blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su thob par gyur to// de'ing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus dang/ skabs su bab nas/
'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi yul rnams yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ srungs ma rnams kyi lag tu byin no// lha rnams mya ngan nga 'das nas// lo brgya lon pa de'i tshe// ming gi lo de yul zhes bya ba/
rab tu 'byor par 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas dang// byang nub sems dpa' skyob rnams kyi// 'dul ba'i phyire na meng kyu ste// rtogag bdadadral ba yin/ bskal ba brlag
bo'i rgyal sras rnams// li yul 'bar gyi grong khyer der// skye ba dag kyang lan 'gyuraMzhing// mdang 'drab r snang bar 'gyur// sems can rnams ni smon bya dang// chos kyang mnyan par byapa'i
phyir byang chub spyod pa bzang bo dag/ de tshe de kun spyod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la dgongs// nyima'isnying bo mdosten// mdo sde mchog ni bshad pa na// snying rjesanod/
pa'i sems kyisasu/ yul de bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// gzungs sngagasa rnams dang 'od zer dag// ji ltar sngonanibaskur ba bzhin// sangs rgyas zhingan thams cad nas// yul 'khor 'dir ni skyes/
[%e]/ kyi rnams// rgyala mchog rnams kyis bskul bar mdzod// bstan pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag la dbyed pas bskur par madzod// skyob pa seng ge yis// 'od zer/

de dag ba tang ba na// sangs rgyas zhing rnams song nas nii// denyid du ni slar yang 'ongs// de nas de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham sa cad nobazhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yul yongs su bskyang bar bzhed pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ skyes su 'od zer dag kyang btang/ gzungs sngags dag kyang bskur te/ 'di
pa'i skadares kyang gsungs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis 'od zer dag kyang btang/ gzungs sngags dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag tu bskur ba de dag gi mtshan
[@]ni 'di zhes bya/ byang chub sems dang 'dedag gi ma yang 'dizhis bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mu stegs thams cad 'dzud pa la dpa' ba 'phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang ga tshig gsang
b.laphyag 'tshal lo// gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ tAr+yathA/ bar pa ra/ kA sha a ra/ tsakra go khaM/ guh+ya ka b.re swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i yul gyi lha dang mi rnams la/ lha rnams
dam pasbyin par gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' pa'i chos la dpa' ba 'a phyag 'tshalalo// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bar ti/ ki bu la
0lhasha sa ri tAre dAr sAhA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa chos l zhugs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i tog gi gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang la rang gi yid la gsal ba'i tshig la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal bol
phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya na/ hAkya rate hohaha/ b.rurar/ Ab bar/ ma ba bar/ charu he bya sA hA/ gzungs
sngags 'di su 'dzin pa n gnas ong ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyural/ sems can rnams kyi 'grobaston gyi rabs su ji lta bur gyur pa dang/ tshar ngs phyim la ri 'gyur ba yang shes bar 'gyur/de
bzhin gshegs pa bu sdug rgyal ba'ichos 'phel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ byang chub sems dba' lhadad mi'i chos gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ d+harasne ta/ tatha tA/ badz+dzob de
tadza tA sAhA/ gzungs sngags 'dis nagazungs thob par gyurato// de nas dabazhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug sar la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dapa' dri'i dbang phyug laphyag 'tshal lo/
tad+ya thA a pa hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yAta ke to/ ba ting ti/ paTir Di sAhA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// dengazhi
gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang 'dapal rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ta tha dbu khre dra bran/ sajis ra Te/ gu rgyaman
tra ta tA d+han swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'disan byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba chen po mdzad ng ra 'gyur re/ sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang/ nad nams las yongs su thar par 'gyur
ro de bzhin gshags pa 'od dang ga med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i snangagasol la phyag 'tshal lo// tu byawA radan ka te/ bgyi ba ti ta Ti lho ti tsan tra sAhA/ gzungs
sngags 'disan byang chub sems dpa' s ngas rgyas kyis zhing rnams yongasasu sbyong bar byed de/ su 'di 'dzin pa'i lus dang/ sams kyi sdug bsngal rnams zad bar 'gyur ro// ding nyin gangashag
lci/ pa kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang nge 'a phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ b+hin de ri'i
samasam cig ba/ danar/ sumanu dorar NasUt+tA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' bya ba thams cad shes par gyurato// 'dis nidi bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang rgyun
po rnams mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis/ gzungs sngags 'di dog yul kun tu srung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa la skyes su bskur ro// de'i tshe sangs rgyas
0 bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dang po thugs bskyed nas byang chub kyi snying de'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
dang chos la gus par yang dag par rjes su dgongs so// de nas rang gi don dang/ lha la sogs pa'idon gyi phyir/ dedag la yul gtams shing gatadado// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams
dang lha thams cad kyi gzungs sngags 'di yang brjod par bya'o// nam brah+maN/ namo/ sarba de banan tad+ya/ brah+man anirta/ dang tapa titaM/ ang+gAhAs na/ ba rain te/ sA par par/
har kin pa in rngu/ san ta tha par dehare/ am b+he ku b+ha kIgrid+d+he/ a lang kar/ sarbade bgam swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis lha dang mi rnams rgyal ba thob par 'gyur zhing/ dgrasakyang
del gnodapar mid la/ dbang phyug thamasacad kyi bdagapor 'gyur ro// la yul du gang la la rgyalapar 'gyur bde 'di snyam du la yul 'din skye bo dang mtshungapos gang zhing/ nor dang 'bru mang pos
rgyas yin te/ yul thams cad kyi mchog dam pa yonabs/ gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'ong bar ma nus so snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ de'i rgyal po das dgon pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga'
rab dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i 'khor thams cad du/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dgo bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyenaa rnams dang/ yul gyi mo
u@#// thams cad sngar bshad pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams kyi tshig rnams klog tu gzhug par bya'o// 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o// kun chub par byed du gzhug go/
dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyenadang/ dge bsnyen ma dedag dang/ yul na gnas pa 'dod dag la yang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugasadang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bdun
rnams dang/ khabras dang/ btung ba sna tshogs dang/ ma chod pa'i las sna tshogs dang/ yo byad thams cad kyisarim gror bya'o// btsun par bya'o// bsti stang du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de
ltar byas n la yul de gnodapa thams cad med pa dang/ phyir rgol ba'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dpung gis rgyal po de'i yul gzhig par mi nus so// de nas yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag
nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rang rang gamtshan dang/ 'od zar dang/ gzungs kyi gsang sngagasakyi tshig rnams bskur ro// brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i rgyal

po sum cu rtsa gnyis pod dag dang/ 'jig rtenaskyong babazhi dang/ lha'i bu kun tu rgyal ba lasogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sdedi bdag ngog na po ti'artsa brgyad dang/ byang chub sems dapa'i dri ma med pa'i 'od
dedang/ goms la gnada'i mchod rten mchod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khri pod dag dang/ klu'i rgyal po gdon laganyams pa la sogs pa khri brgyad stong po gang yin pa de dag gi 'bag tu/ bcom
ldan 'das shAkyagrub bas/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thamasacad kyi gnas/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thamasacad kyi phyag mtshan du gyur pa/ la
yuladang thub pa drang srong chen ba'i gnas su gyur pa// goms la gnada'imachod rten de dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dedag bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ rtsod/
medabar byab dang/ 'dre bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yul na gnasab de yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gtad do// sangs rgyas kyimtshan 'di dag dang/ 'od zer 'dag
dang gzungs kyigasang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag snying rjes non pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang/ gsol ba chen pob rtab pas skyes su bskur nas/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dedag gi
bka'amnyan te/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i rgyal bo sum cu rtsa gnyis po dadag dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang/ gnod sbyin gyi snga' bdag po de dag dang/ klu'i rgyal ngo
de dag dang/ drima med nga 'i 'od la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dedag dang/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyarato/la yul de dang/ thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas gom sa la
gnada'imachod rtan dadang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de dag bsrungaba'i phyir mnos so// sangs rgyas kyimtshan de dag dang/ 'od zer dadag dang/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag kyang
rgya// yul bsrung ba'i phyir mnos so// 'od zer de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i drima med pa'i 'od kyi lus la gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims la rab
tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dngazhin gshegs pa zhi bas rol pa laphyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i bla ma la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' larab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshon rab tu 'jal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de zhinagshegs pa spyan brgyar
laphyag 'tshal lo// debaton gshegs pa 'od bazang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po 'i rnam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs b nyi ma'i rnam pa la phyag 'tshal
la// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ bdud rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba'i 'odra trer dang/ shabar 'gyur ba zhes bya pu'i 'od zer dang/ lem dang bral ba zhes blaba'i 'od zer dang/
kazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ ma zhes bya ba'i dbra dang/ gnas pa zhes byara'i 'od zeradang/ migayongs bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ g.yob dang mgayo ba'i 'od zer dang/ thogs med
sbyin zhes bya ba'i'od zer dang/ yid dang 'thadabazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ bar chadamed pazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rimasamed rgyal mtshan bye ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'khrug med
gnasazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ tog gi blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ grong khyer du 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i'od zer dang/ 'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dpa' bo'i tog
cesangaba'i 'od zer dang/ darje'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ bsodran masakyi tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ bsam gtan gyi tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ melce dang ldan pa zhes
bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i'od zer dang/ zhi gnas kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zeradang/ mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i
'od zer dang/ nor bu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dpa' bo'i ronachen ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ sgrub snang bzhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ nyis snangab zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ ya

shes 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ snanganga' rin po che zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes byuba'i 'od zer dang/ 'jig rten snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zur dang/ snying rje'i
rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zuradang/ rgyalar dmal zhes bya ba'i 'od lngar dung/ shes rab kyi snang bzhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ me zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'jig rten gyi sgron ma zhes duba'i
'od zer dang/ rab rib kyi rnam pa rang tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rgyala mchog ces byang 'i 'od zer dang/ 'jig rten gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'od chen po zhes bya
ba'i 'od zer dang/ ko ka ra zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ a'i tshul du khyedapa zhes bya ba'i dbyeradang/ dzad tshar yazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dba' bo byed pa'i dad
bo rgyalamtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'od can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zeradang/ mkhaskyod pa zhes byaba'i 'od zer rung/ rgyal mtshanublo gros nas
bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'bad pa mthong zhes bya ba'i 'od zor dang/ bden pa can zhes bya ba'i 'bar dang/ mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rab sgrogs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
dang 'od byed pa zhes byara'i dber dang/ rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba 'od zer dang/ 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zur dang/ dpa' ba'i rgyal mkhas
sU bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ g.yobazhes bya ba'i 'od zeradang/ mthoros su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rnapo'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/
bsam gtan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dung/ dga' ba'i tog cesabya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'dam bu lta bu'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zeradang/ mig snang ba zhes ng pa'i 'od zer dang klu
'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ klung gi 'od cas bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ skyes bu'i rnam pa zhes byaba'i 'od zer dang/ 'bar btsan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ me zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/

[pad+ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dbang po'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'driba'i tshul zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ skyodapa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dbang po la gnas pa zhes byaba'i
bodazer drang/ 'khrugapa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ sa'i rgyal mtshan stenupa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ bdenapa'i ga ces bya ba'i 'od zeradang/ snangabar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od war dang/
dongar pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dbang po la rtenapa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ yid la 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rab tu 'gromadzes zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'phral ba'i
rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zeradang/ legs 'barazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'dri bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ tim 'khor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
'od zer dang/ ye shes kyi chu zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zuradang/ rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ dben pa snang zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/
sangs rgyas kyi rnam pazhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rdo rjergyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ rdo rdzol gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bod zer dang/ bsod nams
kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ lce'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ yid dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer yin/ tad+ya thA/ lo ka hAr
@#// shud d+hakar sgyuting bya la ba/ karu le swA hA/ sdig pa gcodapar byed pa zhes bya'o// tad+yathA/ shud rnamati/ ud dzam b+he bu lum re/ a gram tri tshur kA re du sku
zhwa dga' byed snying rje zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA in// in// bAne// dwade ba sdureswAhA/ rdo rje blogris zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ba keb ke/ dzadzamab+he/ b+ham dzAre swAhA/ pad+ma redul zhes
bya'o dang/ shur/ re baa leka/ ko Shaka re swAhA/ 'byed par byed pa zhes bya'o// tad+yathA/ tsale be tathA/ askyon/ pra dzA ka re swAhA/ sbyor ba med pa zhes bya// tad+ya thA/ jojor/
tshe hA ra nAl/ li le pradzA kar sAhA/ 'gog pa med pa zhes bya'o// tad+yathA/ badzeb+hAbakare/ sa ras ra/ adzAmAdzA/ nar ri ka/ nar/ sang de ri kAr phu At+tA/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya'o//
tad+ya tha/ adu re dwa ba'i/ sadare/ ma kha ka ro sAhA/ bdenapa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ tshe phyi ti/ badzra a ak+Sha man dra ba/ brag sa pe/ padri mu g+ha/ su kha ka re mU/
gzungs sngags kyi dbang phyug rgyal mo zhes bya ste/ gzungs sngags 'din pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zhi bar byed pa dang/ dag pa'i tshigs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tad+ya tha/ shikA/
dragati/ ba dra to'u sapra ti su sgyutesAg+ha/ gzungs sngags 'di ni mu gemed par byed pa dang/ dbul bamed par byed pa'o// dam pa gang 'dod pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa
[2 gcig bar du nyin lanabazhi/ mtshan la na bzhi ste/ dus brgyad du lan ti shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod byas na/ gter ram/ yang n nor gangasa'i 'og tu sbas pa gzhan thob par 'gyur ro// tadu/
thA o hamo hadzamab+ha ya/ ma sha maman tra ka/ dam ka rel b+hakar/ ba kA res ngadzA kAr du gdim d+ha ka/ dra sham/ nabu aka na pra sha mne phu sAhA/ nad thams cad zhi bar byed bdag
bud med du skyob las thar par byed pa dang/ bud med rnams kyi dudamed kyi nad rab tu zhibir byed pa ste/ brtul zhugs byam dgos par dzultar 'dod pa de bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod/
bya'o[}]bud med gang la la mo mtshan gyi nad yod pa de la ni nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun zlas brjod byig/ tang/ kaka/ ko shaphu ma ma/ rob rar/ sta re phu/ sa ka re phu
sAhA gzungs sngags 'di gnod pa byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed pa ro bshadade/ brtul zhugs byami dgos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gi mtshan
sngar smos pa dang/ gang dag gis gzungs sngags dngadapo de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ grogs su gyur pa sha stag go/ sangs rgyas de
dag gis mi mjed kyi 'jigarten gyi khams dang/ bcom ldan 'dasang+gashAkya thub ba'i phyag mtshan deli yul 'dir skyeb mang po la phan pa'i phyir/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' mA
nya@#/// kyis skye ba blangasate/ sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag gis bcom ldan 'adas shAkya thub pa'i la yul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ gzungs sngag
h+pha dedag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer dedag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dedag skyes su bskur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyis zhus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phags pa spyan ras
gathigs dbang phyug bas/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ li yul yongasasu bskyang ba dang/ bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las
skyes de dag blangs nas 'dir myur te'ongs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshog sana gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyis lung pa stan pa'i yul 'di nas 'jig par mi

'gyurang dang/ bstan pa yang yun ringadu gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dir lhags nas skye ba blangs so// gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa byung na/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag drang/ gzungs sngags/
de dag dang/ 'od zer sngar bshad pa dadag dris te/ grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su btsugs la/ dmag gi ru mtshon la yang bris tobasha gnas / mi rnams kyang glog tu bcugatsang 'chad du bcugan//
pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang/ mu ges 'jigs pa dang/ las 'byang bar bya ba dang/ dge ba'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can rnams kyis ji ltabur bsams
pa bzhin du phan du dogs par 'gyur ro// sems can nad pa rnams la yang skyabs byed par 'gyur ro// gang la sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba dag yodan yang/ des zhag nyi shurtsa gcig gi bar
du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang/ gzungs sngags dang/ 'od zer rnams bzlas brjod pya zhing/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams rnganapar bya'o// gang na sku gi dung dang ldan pa'i
mchod rtenanam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bzhugs pa de'i spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas nas/ dgaba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa de myur du yongs su rdzogasapar 'gyur te/ 'od
zer dadag kyang de'i steng du gnas par 'gyur/parol gdamag tshogs 'ongana'ang bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na zhag bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya// su yang rung ste/ gnod byung ba'am/
nadang 'am/ jilta bu 'dod pa las/ bzlasabarjod bya'am/ yang na bklag par bya'o// tsa lta klog minusan/ de'itsaskud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te ]mdud pa byas nas btags
na gnodapa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gangagi sgodag tu/ sangasargyus kyi mtshan dang/ gzungs sngags dang/ 'od zera rnams bris d bzhi gan/ grong khyer de gzhan gyi
yidamag tshogs kyis gzhom par mi nus so// rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa la ni sgangami dgos so// dngos po gzhan yang spang mi dgos// danas rigs gyi bu gang dag sangs
rgyas kyi rjes su byung ba de dag shin du dgongs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa de dag la// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras

sh+'a so dbudag bag tsha bar gyur pa de ma byed cig/ khyod kyi don gyi phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga'arab mang po dang/ chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i drigatsang khang la sogasapa sku gdung dang ldan pas na
rten yul der 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du yul de nas ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas kyi bar du yul de ma lus par gazhiganus pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di
lta ste dngar ldan zhes bya ba yodadu 'ongab dang/ phag gisa mtshon pa'i grongakhyer dang/ grong khyeraring ra dedag gis yang/ jisrid dusangasaMrgyas kyi bstanapo gnas nigashing/ dge 'dun
rnams la mchod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mchodartan dka' ba'an yodakyi bar du de dag 'jig par ma 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis/ rgyal bsus thams cad la bos tabasob/ kye grogs po dag/ byang chub sems M dpa' rnams dang/ lha la sogasapo yongs su myong ba gang yin pa dag gis chos dung
maldan pa'i 'a pos yul de gzhig pa na/ yal bar m dor cig/ mal zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma mnyan te/ 'jig pa'i tshiyul btang bar gyuran/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog/
pa'i byang chub las bskal pa mang por bar chad du 'gyur ro// de nas gzungs sngags bshad do// tad+yatha/ kale/ akA le/ ni shame thungasha ]a kal krame/ Anih+phame/ abra be sha/
par same pa ra sum ti/ sas se/ a srasase/ saku te/ paru re/ pa rare a ga me/ a samamahi/ sadad+hisid d+hA ya/ na mo b.ro tsanAyasAhA/ phaN Te nas As te susanane//
sAru ste/ sidad+he/ sid d+hA ya swAhA/ de nas byang chub samasadapa' 'phagasapa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ li yul gyi rgyal por gyur la dris nas/ 'di ni khyed kyi skyes yin no//
ji ltar khyod kyis byas pa dang/ khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi phyir lus dang srog btang bar byas pa gang yoni pani/ sangs rgyas kyi srasa rnamA kyis las de lta bu yin te/ khyod kyis legs
par byas pa yin no// gang gitsho yul du dgra chen pa'i 'jigapa 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de'i tshimado sde 'di bklag par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// mchod pa ra bya'o// 'od kyang 'jigs par

thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ sa hab tiyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro// yul yosrung ba'i phyir mdo 'di cho ga bzhin du brisato/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bcang bar bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang phyi rol dang/
grong khyer gyi sgo rnamasosu yang de bzhin du bris tagazhag par bya'o// lam po tshe dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du yang gzhag bar bya'o//
[r]@#// gang gi mi mang du bklags sam/ bslabs sam/ bcangasan/ de'i tshe yul der yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
dar 'u 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dabang phyug gis de skad ces smras nas/ bar snang la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ lha'i me tog gi charani phab/ lha'i sil snyan rnams nadakrol/ lha'i
rdabon rnams n brdungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ lhadang/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad ces brjod do// gang gi tshe yul der gzungs sngagasade dag dang/ 'od zer
dengag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag 'ong bar 'gyur pa de'i tsho/ bdagacog kyang ji ltar sngon bcom ldanu'adas shAkya thub pa'i thad du 'ongs pa bzhenadu phyi bzhin 'ong par bya'o// rgyal po da
la yang yul bsrung ba'i phyir bdag cag gis gzungs sngogs sbyin pa byas te/ dam par slong ba de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o// des byang chub sems dpa' zhig budamed kyi gzugs kyis/
'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sorab rgyanab zhes bya ban 'dug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i'adab madrimamadapa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon bshis pa'i
me tog kun tu rgyas ba'i mngon sum du smon lamagadab ste/ cinas kyang bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gong dumachis la/ der bcom
[s.]]ldan 'das de las dmapa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byos par gyur cig/ der bdag gis sems can thams cad la phanapa dang/ bde ba dang/ nadalas thararar
bgyid par gyur cig ces de skad du smonulam btabranas/ byung chub sems dapa' des ngs rgyas kyi zhingade nas shi'aphos nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang
dubatsun mo dam pa'i bu mor skyes te/ drim med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa drim med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'khor datsonang du 'dus par gyur te/
'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yongasasumyang n las 'das nas/ lo brgya lags ngan/ li yul yongs su bskyang ba'i sladadu/ bdag gis
kyang bkas gtad pa nod par 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs pa'i 'od zer btang ba rnams gang gi tshibadrag gi stang du gnas par 'gyuran/ gzungs gang gis
gzungs thams cad rtogs par 'gyur gzungs deyang/ bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyis thos par gyur cig/ gang gi tshul yul du 'jigs pa chen po byung bar gyur pan/ de'i tshe yul
yongs su bsrung bdang/ bstan pa yang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ b.rog lasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongasapar gyur cig/ thabs kyang ston par gyur/
[s ]a/ ga lha rnams kyang dam pa stsol bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag der mi'i bud med gzhan 'drab r bud med tha mal pa'i gzugs su snang bar gyur cig/ sangs
zhwa rgyas kyi 'od bre dre dag gi steng du gnas pa yang thob par gyur gi/ simasacan gnod pas nyen pa rnams dang/ chudakyis thebs pa rnams dang/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad las
thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzungs sngags de dag kyang bdag gas rjes par gyur cig/ gang gari rgyal po chen pa de dag phan tshun 'thabar dang/ gang tshigadong dmar gyisal yul gyi yul
'khor khyed pa na yang/ der badrag bud med kyi skye ba len par gyur cig/ songs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po gsungs pa la nga lag
pa de yang bdag 'dzin par gyur cig/ mdo sde 'dilas gzungs sngags 'byung ba rnams kyang rtogasabar gyur cig/ sems can 'dul ba'i sladadu/ sgrathams cad la rtogs pa'i ting
zlange 'dzin yang rtogs par gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par gyur cig/ la yul gyi srungasam gang lags pa lha rnamA
la yang chos kyi sbyin pa dang/ mchod pa'i las bgyid par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po 'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos khad+madakarapo 'di dang/ lha gang dgags mdosde 'dibastanatsang mnos pa dedag kyang
bdag gi dbang du gyur cig/ de nas srungs ma rnamathob kyi bu dang/ srin mo 'amang kon ti srin me thams cad dang/ grogs po dang bcas pa dang/ 'phrog ma bu dung 'khor du bcas pa de dag
gos brtsomaldan 'das dang/ lha mo drima med pa'i'od kyi tshig thos nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyaranas 'di skadas gsol to// gang tshe lha mo 'di la yul du skye ba len par
'gyur ba de 'tshe/ bdag cag kyang glegs bgyid pa'i sradadu/ srungs ma bgyidatsung theg pa chen pa'i mdo sde dumapa'i chos pad+ma dkar po dang/ layul gyi yul 'khor sangs rgyas bcom
ldanu'adasakyis gtad pa khyod kyis mnos so zhes dran par bgyi'o// de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po sumacu rtsaganyis kyis/ lha mo de'i dam pa bcas pa 'dithos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang
gitshulha mo 'di la yul bsrung ba'i slad du skye ba len par 'gyur bde'i tshe/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang yul bsrung ba dang/ bsam pa bzhin du 'byor par bgyi ba'i slad du grogs
bgyi 'o// de'i tshilha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od stan las langs ti/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ phus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'dasal
dam pa gsol zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin dusems par gyur cagi/ brtson 'grus gang
rtsom pa de thams cad grub par gyur cig/ lus bastanupa dang/ bams bstan dang/ sems can gyi don bgyid pa dang/ bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par bgyid/
h+pha pa dang/ yul gyi sladadusems mngon par brtson par gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos pad+madakar po'i mdo sdesems can rnams laphan 'dogs pa dang/ ting nga 'dzin yang thob par gyur cig/
ces smras s// lha tshes bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de skad ces smras pa de'atshe/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i bod kyi stong dulha'i mi tog gi char bab bo/ de tsho
lhame dri med 'od// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mdzesang/ li yul dun skyes shigaces// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar smon lam btab// skyob ba shAkya sengag yi// bstan pa ji srid
gnas pa'i bar// dusridapaMr dub dag kyang der// rtag tu skye ba 'dzin gyur cig/ rgyal ba'i spyan sngar gang ga/[â€ ]lhamos smon lam btab na// sangs rgyas zhing bzhugs rgyal rnams
kyis de tshulegs zhes bya ba byin// lham yul gyisrungasam la// rgyalang rnams kyiselegs byin pa// rnam thos budang gnod sbyin dbang// kun tu rgyal gyis de bshaMn thos// de tshe
rnam thos bul sogs// lha rnams gang dag der 'dus pas// bcom ldan 'das la tshigagasagasol// li yul yongs subasrung ba'i phyir// lharab dam pa 'thunagyur ba// bdag cag
[2/]gas yul yang bzung// gang tshe gsar gyi rigs dag dang// skar rdo'i yulani mdzes gyurar// 'an dbang bar gyur ban// gser gyi dpyani 'dzul bar 'gyur// de tshe lha mos gse'angan/
skar rdodanganagaser gyi rigs// lha rnams kyis ni bsrung ba'i phyire/ rgyal bskyes matshog stsal bar mdzod// sa 'disdon gyitshar ba sasu// gang tshe bdag ni dge bsnyenam// ming nihul
gyur ngan// yul 'di gnyis ni dgagalags// de yi 'khir du rgyal byung// u rgyan bdag po dbang phyug de// rgyal postana'as las nas kyang// lus leganyis nas la btsugs// btsan
ldan 'das la gsol ban// gang gi tshel yul zhes// bya bdenaM'abyung 'gyur zhing// yongasasu rgyusangashing skye bosagang// de yoskar rdo'i yuladagutu// stobs chen rgyal por bdag gyur nas
doran yi bdag po dang// rtag tu gnyis n bgyid pa dang// bdag gis yuladebasrung ba'i phyir// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar gyid/ de yitshodimada'od// lhamos smon lam 'doskad
btag/ gang yul gyi dang bo 'dir// sum pa mang bo 'ong pa dang// gang mi yul 'dire rgya dang ni// bzhu dang ni sum pa rnams// 'phags skyes po yodim bzhin du// yul der 'ong bar gyur pa/
na detshoyul 'di'i skye'o khyo'i// bdag gis skye ba blang bar bgyi// bdag gis skyebader blangs pas// sum pa la sogs lkog gyur cig bal ya4ra gnas rnams kyis// lonanigang du'
@#// bgyis pa// der na bdag kyang dga' bzhin du// bdag gis sun las rnams gyis// der ni sngon gyi rgyal po gang// blon po khyim bdag yulam dang// bdag tu
shA sdug par gyur ba dang// de dag drang ni bral bar gyur// detshe bdag nugacig busdug/ migatsang ting 'dzani thob gyur nas// der ni skyo bar gyur na// sngon gyi smon lam dran gyur cig/ de/
tshod yi 'khor du// ka sngar yi bdag po rgyal// des ni lha mo dromada'od// smras pa klob par gyur nas kyang// rgyal po stan las langs nas ni/ 'di skad kyi ni tshig kyango smras//
bdag gis tsherangs sngamar na// mi bzad las byas gang yin pas// shAkya rnams ni brlag pa'i phyi'i// bdag nirgyal po 'phags skyes dang/ mdzes pa'i yul du lhan cig dang/
lasade rnam smin mi bzad pa// tsho'adi lan mo myong bar// bdagan 'di skad smon lam 'debs// gang gi tshanusum pa dang// 'a zha dag der dong ba dang// bdag sngon shAkya'i yul du
'phags skyes po'i g.yul ngor las byas pa gang yin pa de/ gang gi tshe lha mo 'di skyo ba chen por gyur pan/ de'atshibadag 'di'i bur gyural/ bdagag phyir 'di skye bar gyur cig/ dang po
gzungs thob par gyur pa bzhin du/ des bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad las grolabar gyur cig ces byas so// rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dug pa des
[7 ]smon lam btab deb tsho/ bdag kyang lha mo dram med pa'i 'od kyi mar gyur la/ bdag gis 'phags skyes po'i dmag slar ldog la/ sdig pa'i lasachen po 'di lta bu bya ste/ rtsi bya zhes
gyod btab pa'i de ba'i sims bskyed pa gang yin pa des n/ la yul dor bdag 'di ba'i dus la ma bab kyi bar du/ bdag gis la yul de nyid du ma rtag pa nyid mthong nas/ gang gi tshe
der 'kha dang sum pa 'ong ba de'i tshe/ bag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'jig rten gyi mas bdag can du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so// lha madri ma med pa'i 'od de'i mngare rgyal po ma skyes
dgra'u bu gang yin ra de yang shin tu nga rgyal che shing rgyags pas/ g.yul 'gyedapa blta ba'i phyir/ shAkya'i yul der rgyalapo 'phags skyes posridamag gi zla la 'ongs nas/ des kyang g.yul
der mabasad pa lasogs pa'i sdig byas te/ gangagatshe dang sems can mang boshibe mthong nga de'itshe/ ris lengasargyas mthong nas/ 'gyodab chen po dang/ skyongar gyur te/ de'atsho des lha
mo dri ma med pa 'od la smras pa/ nakhyod kyi mang po shin tu sdug pa yin pas/ ngas dmag de'i nang sdig pa 'i lasakhyus/ khyodakyis thos nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ khyod kyi yod
sim dag bsleb par gyur pa la/nga yin pa'ilas kyi rnam par smin pa des/ khyod kyi yul du sum pa'i dmag 'ong bar gyur te/ de'i tshod ltar ji lta ba bzhin du/ derang khyod kyi sdug pa'i ming po'
gyur la/ khyod kyis gcig pu lung med par mig/tsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyurab dang/ khyod kyis thog ma lon gzugs thob pa 'gyur bzhin du/ de'i tshe nga khyod kyi
mthusasems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i sdugabasngal rnams las thar bar gyur nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnam thos kyi bu'i gu yog byed pa'i gnod sbyin adzul zhes bya bar gyur la/ ngas
rtag tu khyod bsrung zhing/ ngas rnam thos kyabu la sogasab de dag dang/ gnod sbyin gazhan de dag dngo/ lha'ilobrangsum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu lha'i rgyal bodradag ladrenapar bskul te/ gang gi tshe
khyod la dgos pa de'i tshe 'ongs nas rtswa 'ded pa grub par gyur ces smras so// der lhame dinyid kyi nu mi tha chung/ rgyal pomaskyes dagra'i bu mor gyur pa des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi
ming po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla la sdig pa'i lasabyas pa bdag gas thos nas dga' bar gyurapo'i lasadisan/ derayang khyod kyi nu mor tshul/ gang gi tshe las de'i rnam par smin
pas bdag myu ngan gyis 'chi ba'idus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyodadelta bur skyo bar gyur ba na/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen redanas/ chos gang gis 'bras bu dang po thob ste/ sdug
bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos thosan/ de'i tshe sngon dang phyima'i las rnams dran par gyur cig ces byas so// der lhamo de'i ming de thachung dugyur cing/ dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes
bya par gyur pa phyin chad de song por gyur/ de'i sngon gyi las kyis sems can rnams skrag bar byas/ des sring mo btsemaldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'debs pa yang mthong la/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyanasngar smonalam btubanas/ li yulagyi yul 'khor yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mnos pa yang mthong ng// de nas lhame droma med pa'i 'od kyi ming be tha chung/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i
dus gtsem ldan 'dasagangan ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsolato/ sngon bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po la bsnyen bkor byas te/ dus thams
cad du skyes bar gyur nas/ rgyalasrid kyi bgyi bo mang po yang bgyis so// bdag gi sring mo 'di yang budamed kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags te/ 'das la u0f7a
yul yongs su bskyong ba'i sladadu/ sum par blangs pa denaMlasa chen pomachid kyis 'tshal ba lags te/ budamed kyi bsam pa nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas nyid kyisamkhyen parabs so//
bcom ldan 'das can s kyang bdagagi steng du 'od thar rnams batang ba de lta bur bdag 'byin gyisabarlabapar gsol/ cis kyang yul bsrung ba'i slad du grogs brgyadapar 'gyur ba dang/ bdag
gi rigs kyisayun ring po la yul du yul 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyang stsal bar stsol// skyeb blangs te 'brasabu thob nase gum ba'i 'og tu yang lha rnams kyinong du skye bar gyur
cig gang gi tshe yul dusum pa 'am/ gdong dmar rnams 'ong bar 'gyur bde'i tsa/ bdag skar rdo'i yul gyi rgyal por gyur te/ lhamo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di'i
shAmang por gyural/ li yul dar bar bgyi ba'i sladadu bdag de'i grogs bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so// gang gi tshi gzhon nu de skad ces gsol nas/ smonalamayang btab pa de'i ri//
bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char babaste/ lha'i sol snyan rnams dkrol lo// bcom ldan
'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa// ngas thog ma sems bskyes panas/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bsod nams dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de dag dang
de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mang pa mdzad mdzad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung re tshan po de dag dang/ cho 'phrul de ngas gcig tu bsdus tagacig
rgyajubartul bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lham dri ma med pa' khyod 'dis yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ lag tu blangs pa'i lo yul 'khor rab tu gnas par bya'o// danas bcom ldan 'des byargod
kyi phung po'i ri 'os mi snang bar gyur te/ phyogs gang du la yul dang/ thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas go ma sa la bo/nadason rten 'byung bar gyur pa'i phyogader bzhugs so// bcom ldan
'das de na bzhugs bzhin du/ daral thoms cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyedas par zhugs nas/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od per btang ngo// bya rgod phung po'i ro
la gnas pa'i 'khor dedag thams cad kyis kyang gnas gcig nas 'khrod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang du la yul 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs denaskyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par mthong
thub pa'i drung srong chen po'i gnas/ ri glang ru zhes bya ba de la gnas pa'i byang chung sems dpa' sngon bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byung chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ grogs su gyur pa
gang yin pa de dag gis kyang 'od zer dedag btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyid ni gong du gomasAl gnada'imachod rten gyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i de'i bar snang la bzhugs so// byang
chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang dang gang dag tu dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab dang/ dgon pa'i gnas dang/ dri gtsang khang dang/ mchodarten chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i nang gi pad+ma'i
stong de dag dedag la 'khod do// de nas der sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thamasaM cad thugs su chud par 'gyur pa'i

gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi spyi bo zhes bya ba 'di bshad do// tad+ya thA/ A ba par/ pra t+yab pa ra/ pra dzA ba pa ra/ bdud+ha ba pa ra/ sad d+harma bapa ra/ shu ra ba par/ sarba d+harma skanaM d+ha bar
prab dzrapA Nib pa ra/ tik+Shitabra bar sAhA/ gang gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshadapa de'atshe/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa'i 'khor
shA blamasacad kyis rjes so// ri glang ru'i zoman/ bcom ldan 'adres byang chub sems dapa'i ms cad kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mthong// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lhamo
dri ma med pa' 'od dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde la bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'dis nga'i las rgyas la/ li yul gyi yul 'khor khyad la gtad pa yongs su bsrung ba gyis shig
de'i tshulha modris med pa'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dang 'ardo rje sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das layul gtad pa 'di bdag cag gsanodapar 'tshal lo//
drim med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa bam po gnyis pa// de'i mi ngacom ldan 'das kyis drima med pa'i 'od dang/ gzhon nu rdoja sde'i don gyi phyir gzungs sngags gzhan
bshad/ tad+ya thA/ nirdzitaM/ brdzitaM/ brdzitaM/ b+ha Ti ti/ d+harma skadad+hu/ aparA dzitaM/ in dri dzitaM/ pusAhA/ de'i rtsisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po la sogs ba
gang dgal/ lhamo drama med pa'i 'od kyis sngon sangs rgyas nyid du thog masems skyes pa de dag kyang der gshegs so// gzhon nu rdorjesdes kyang yon phul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gathigs pa de las sngon sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob po// drima med pa'i 'od kyisasangs rgyas kyi gong 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya bder byang chub thob bar gyur te/
debakr-in gshegs pazlade'irgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gunas pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pal/ 'jig rten gyi khams bud med du grags pa zhes bya bar//

de bzhin gshog saMpa chos kyi sgra sgrogasaphyaganarinainamadzodabasnams zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe lha mo de dag de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ de lung bstan
nga'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer btang ste/ gang gi tshelha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis lung bstan pa de thob pa de'i tshe/ der byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi tshig ces bya ba
gyur to/ de phyin chad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cadran gnus pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang lung bstanato// bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisakyang/
byang chub gang la khyoda gnas pa tren shin tudakon pa yin no zhes smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag ston sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa'i thad du 'od zer gtong ba'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyazagasung gcig tu 'thun par gzungs sngags bshad ng/ tad+ya thA/ ta tha tA/ lokA gu/ tathAtA/ ka ba ba bo/ ka ra dza/ b+hu taki Ti/ babadrapral
[t/ ]@#// shar sas sas sa sa b+ha dra prab+hA/ ba bad karan sa/ bar cab ba ba/ a sa tsa ru nan/ tsang par tshan/ ka ka ko tirAdzan/ bya ka ra Nasu g+ha tra/ kar Na
shAsAhA gzungs sngags 'dinaM lung ston pa zhes bya ste// gzungs sngags 'disangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu lung ston par mdzad de/ mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byung chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
lhamo dram medarar grags pas sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstanapa thob pa de'i tshe/ sa bodab chen po thob par gyur te/ de'i tshi dus smon lam btang// ji srid du li yul du 'jigs pa
chen re 'byung bar 'gyur pade srid du bdag dudamed kyi gzugs su snang bar gyur te/ smon lam btab pa des na/ de'i tshe bdag skar rdo'i rgyalapo 'bu mor skye ba len par gyur cig ces byas so//
de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od zur gyi'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgra sgrogs phyag na rin chen madzod bsnyams pa laphyag
pa/ 'tshal lo// zhes sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di gnyis su brjod pa ni bud med du skye ba las thar bar ba gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyepar 'gyur ro// chos dang ldan pa'i dam pa ji lta bu 'dod
ba de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te// sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i las rnams kyang bshags par 'gyur ro// bunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir ma ldog
par 'gyur ro sa [5 ]medan/ dadadad/ pra dzA kas phra dzA ka re/ bar pradzA/ pratiha te swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'dinaMbyang chub kyi yan lag gromi tog ces bya ste/ chos ji lta bu
'dod pa di lta bu 'brong par 'gyuro/ bdud ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas su sgrubapalabarachad byed ma nus shing/ glags rodapar mi 'gyur ro// dran pa dang yang ldan par
'gyur ro// sems kyang phyin ci log tu ma 'gyur ro// gang gisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzua sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tsho/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis smon lam bcas/
pa/ bdag gusi der skye ba blangs te/ skar rje'i rgyal po'i bu mor gyur nas/ gsur gyi yul gang du bdag gi pha gum pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bdag skye bar 'gyur ba der bdag 'gro bar gyur
cig ces byaso// de'i 'khor de'i nang na rgyal po ma skyes dga'i grong khyer skyong ba'i rigs kyi bu gzhwan zhig 'dug pa des 'de skyod ces smasaso// bdag khyed kyi khyim thab tu gyur la/ bdag
gi khyim na khyod bud med kyi lus kyis las dedag byed codi/ bdag gis kyang de la bar chadabyed par mi 'gyur ba dang/ khyod kyi yul gyi phyi'i dang/ sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'ongar gyis las
'byed pa de dag thams cad bdag gi khyim dubyed cing/ dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad kyang dran par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas grong khyer skyong pa de'i bur gyur pa zhig
yod pa des smras pa/ gang sngon khyod dge bsnyen ma gshazhes byabar gyur pa de'itsa/ bdag khyod kyi bur gyur cig ces bdag gis smon lam btab nas/ de phyin chad tshe rabs thamasacad du
khyod ni bdag gi mar gyur la/ bdag ni khyod kyi buragyur to// gang gi tshe khyod gsar gyi yul du smon lamachen po'i dbangag las byed par 'gyur ba dang/ gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa chen po
'byung bde'i/ yang cinas kyang badrag dor sems son thams cad gnod pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir grogs su'agyur ba dang/ yul dan rgyal po med par yang bdag gis chos bzhin du skyongang
dngo bdag gzhan gyisabakolabar mi 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur gyiber dubadag khyod kyi bur gyur cigaM/ khyod kyang bdag gi mar gyur cig ces byas so// de'itsho'akher do'i nang
nalha mo drim med pa'i 'od da'aphyi bzhin 'brang ba'i rigs dang ldan ba 'budamed gcig 'dug pa ngargyalagyis shin tu khengs shing rgyags la 'dod chags kyi sems dang ni tu ldan pa des smon lam btab
pas pa bdag kyang khyo khyod kyi numor gyurato/ gzhon nu'i tshabadagags skyes bu mang po dag dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phyir bgadapa dang/ rtsos pa gang yin pa bdag gi las de dag thams cad byang

bar gyur cig ces byas so// 'khor de'i nangan skyes pa gzhan zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasdur 'dug pa des/ rigs dang ldan pa'i bud medadol smras ng/ gang khyod kyis nga'i phyir gsang ba'i
don gyi dam bcas pa de ni ngas mi btang zhes byas nas/ de'atshemados smon lam btudang// gangag tshe ma 'ongs pan rigs dang ldanupa'ibudamed 'di lha mo dri ma med pa'i bod dang lhan cig tuli yul na
gnasashing/ las chen po byed pa 'gyur bde'itsha/ bdag gis las 'di bshags te/ 'khor ba nas 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byas so// de'i tshe lham drim med pa'i mang po byang chub sems
dpa' rdo rje sde su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasngar bus mo'i lhangs lapatsugs te phyalame sbyanas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gser gyi rigs su chos dang lhan ba'i
rgya 'khor gyur te/ yul rtas par bgyi ba'i sladadu/ lha mo dris med pa'i 'od kyi grogs su gyur la/ li yul 'khor rtas par bgyiba'i sladadu/ gser gyi yul gang dudage bsnyenamahugazhas rgyab
gnas par gyur bder/ norasa'i 'og tu gzhug pa dang/ mi shi ba rnams kyi dur khrod na yod pa gang yin pa dang/ dge bsnyen ma shuba'i nor du gyurapa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gis
btsal to/ gas
do/ gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa 'byung ba de 'tsho yang/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ 'byung po gangasu yang nor de la gegs byed par ma 'gyur ro// yul de'i rgud
mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kums cad kyang/ cinusanorade rnyed par 'gyu bar rang skyid grogs byed par gyur ro// sngon gser gyi'i gang du dge bsnyen ma hu sha 'byungabar 'gyur ba der bud me dga'/
zhig byung ste/ des sbyin pa mang bo byon la/ tshul khrims nangs ma bsrungs ta/ des 'di skad du bodag gis sbyin pa dag byin pa'i bsod nams bsagasang gang yin pa des n/ bdag
gsarag rigs kyi rgyal du 'batsun mo dam par gyur la// cinas kyang la yul de ltasapar byapa'i phyir nor sbyin par byed pa de lta bur bdag grogs su gyur cigaces byas/ de'i tshe lha mo dri mamadapa'i
bod kyi ming re gzhon nu rdordzas sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi dmag gi dpung chen po de dag phan tshun 'gyed pa'i 'gyurab de ni/ bdagi skar rdo'i rgyal por gyuranas/ gang gi gdong/
dmaradagu dmag 'dren pa de'atshi/ ba dag gus gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po lasanor blangs te/ laM yul rtas pa bgyiba'i slad du/ chos bzhin du stsol bar gyur cig ces byas so// de'i tshon rigs
dadaldan pa'i budached gzhan zhig lha me ri'i grogs mor gyur pa sa dang po thob pa gang yin pa de 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des smon lam btab bo/ bdag la yul du tshe rabs bdunagyi
bar du rgyal po'i btsunamo dam par gyur cig/ gang gi tshidamagag dpung chen po gang yin pa de dag la yul du g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus la bab pa de'itsi/ bdag rgya yul du skyeb len par gyur cig/
gang gi tsho gzhonanu rdo rje sde 'di la'i rgyal por gyur padi na/ bdagan de'i btsunamo dam par gyur nas/ bdag cag gnyis kas la yul slar rtas par bgyi ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab
rnams dang/ dgon pa'i gnas rnams dang/ mchodan chen po dang/ drigatsang khang dang/ gdong dmar rnams kyis bsregs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang/ bdag cag gnyis kyis slar gsar du
bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so// gang gi tshe de dag gis 'khor gyi nangadusmon lam btab pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rgyal
pa rnam thos kyi du dang/ gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ lha'i bu blo gros rab tu brtan pa drang/ lha mo 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang/ lha mo drimane dpa'i 'od rnams
kyang de'i tshosangs rgyas yid 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs s// de nas treng nge 'dzin lasalangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarapusamo'i lha nga sa la
btsugs da 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas bdag cag gis ma 'ongs ba'i dus su la yuladebasrung ba'asadadu rnyed par 'tshal te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa de
@#// bzhin du sug las thams cad 'tshalalo// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa gang yin pa'i lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyinedang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'/
lding dang/ mi'am cidang/ ste 'phye chen pe dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog gnyer phab nas/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs
ji lta bu s sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par 'os pa rnams kyang bsgrags so/ de'i tshe 'khord nang na rnam thos kyabu dang/ kun tu rgyal la sogs pa gang drag gi lag tuyul debasrungapa'i
phyi gtadapa dedag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul bsrung ba'i phyir khyod kyi lag tu yang dang yang du gtad do// gang gi tshigadong dmar dag gis yul bzung// dge 'dun gyi kun dga'
lha rab dung/ dri gtsang khang dang/ mchod rten chen po rnam pa 'phrog par byed cing sreg par byed d/ dredag gis cinas kyang nga'i bstan pa gzhug par bya ba'i phyi'i smon lam log par btab pas
ring po ma thogs par de dag dmag sde gnyis pa de dag phan tshun 'gyedapar 'gyur/ de'i tshe lham dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ming po gzhon nu rdo rjesde nyid gser gyi rigs kyi yul der song nas/ gser
gyi rigasakyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras ti/ drimamadapa'i 'od kyis zhusanga'imadabcom ldan 'das shAkya thubangs bka' stsal pa yodado/ li yul nas 'ongs pa 'dini sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das dang/ lha rnams kyis gsungs pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ lha rnams kyi bku'an gtsug tu rung ngo ma yin no// gdong dmar gyi 'o yul gyi yul 'khor khyer
ba'i dus lanadabang ste/ rgyun gsar gyi rigs kyi yul du 'ong bar 'dod de// gang gi tshe phan tshun g.yul 'gyed par byed pa de ni 'jigs pa chen po yin te/gang gi tshigadengadamar rnams skrag bar
gyur pa de'atsho/ gsar gyi rogasakyi yul du 'grobar nasasi// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pani'adi yin to/ gang gi gser gyi rigs kyi yul gdong dmar mi gtong la/ rgya yang
gnodapa byed dum 'ong ba de'i tshe/ gsar gyi roges ba yul du mdo 'di 'phrin yig tu khyer la/ gsar gyi rogasakyi rgyal pa la 'di skadadu/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ lha rnams
kyis bka' stsalar yin te/ lha dang mi rnams kyis 'gal bar byar ma rung ba yin gyis/ bdag gis la yul gyi gludasbyin pa dang/ skur rdo'i don gyi phyirang la nor mang po byon nas smras la/ gang

ga mi nor thob par gyur pa de'i tshe thog mar lo yul du nor rdzongs la gdong dmar la bskur cig/ layul pa rnams la yang der sbyin par bya ste/ gang gi tsha' yul du skyes bskurangan/ der thog mar skardo
yang bskur bar bya ste/ mi'i yul chos bzhin du bya'o// de'i tshe 'di skad dung ni gdong dmar rnams kyi bran mibyed de/ sa la yulag zung gis/ nga lanor phyin cig dang/ de dag gi dmag gi dpung chen
@#// po yang der 'ong dar mnas sunas smyos shig/ gang gi tshe de'i dmag la yuladu 'ong ban der ma 'ongs shig dang/ yul de ru ri ra'i rin pasusbyin no// ci ste yul rgyu ba'i phyire ba
